  282: -define(MGC_START(Pid, Mid, ET, Conf, Verb), 
  283: 	megaco_test_mgc:start(Pid, Mid, ET, Conf, Verb)).
  284: -define(MGC_STOP(Pid),        megaco_test_mgc:stop(Pid)).
  285: -define(MGC_REQ_PEND(Pid,To), megaco_test_mgc:request_pending(Pid,To)).
  286: -define(MGC_REQ_HP(Pid,To),   megaco_test_mgc:request_handle_pending(Pid,To)).
  287: -define(MGC_ACK_INFO(Pid),    megaco_test_mgc:ack_info(Pid,self())).
  288: 
  289: -define(MG_START(Pid, Mid, Enc, Transp, Conf, Verb), 
  290: 	megaco_test_mg:start(Pid, Mid, Enc, Transp, Conf, Verb)).
  291: -define(MG_STOP(Pid), megaco_test_mg:stop(Pid)).
  292: -define(MG_SERV_CHANGE(Pid), megaco_test_mg:service_change(Pid)).
  293: -define(MG_NOTIF_REQ(Pid), megaco_test_mg:notify_request(Pid)).
  294: -define(MG_AWAIT_NOTIF_REP(Pid), megaco_test_mg:await_notify_reply(Pid)).
  295: -define(MG_CONN_INFO(Pid,Tag), megaco_test_mg:conn_info(Pid,Tag)).
  296: -define(MG_USER_INFO(Pid,Tag), megaco_test_mg:user_info(Pid,Tag)).
  297: -define(MG_NOTIF_RAR(Pid), megaco_test_mg:notify_request_and_reply(Pid)).
  298: 
  299: -define(SEND(Expr), 
  300: 	?VERIFY(ok, ?USER_MOD:apply_proxy(fun() -> Expr end))).
  301: 
  302: -define(USER(Expected, Reply),
  303: 	?USER_MOD:reply(?MODULE,
  304:                         ?LINE,
  305:                         fun(Actual) ->
  306:                                 case ?VERIFY(Expected, Actual) of
  307:                                     Expected   -> {ok, Reply};
  308:                                     UnExpected -> {error, {reply_verify,
  309:                                                            ?MODULE,
  310:                                                            ?LINE,
  311:                                                            UnExpected}}
  312:                                 end
  313:                         end)).

  319: -define(GM_START_USER(M, RI),    ?GM_START_USER(M, RI, [])).

  339: %%======================================================================
  340: %% Common Test interface functions
  341: %%======================================================================
  342: 
  343: suite() -> 
  344:     [{ct_hooks, [ts_install_cth]}].
  345: 
  346: all() -> 
  347:     [
  348:      connect, 
  349:      {group, request_and_reply},
  350:      {group, pending_ack}, 
  351:      dist, 
  352:      {group, tickets}
  353:     ].
  354: 
  355: groups() -> 
  356:     [
  357:      {request_and_reply, [], request_and_reply_cases()},
  358:      {pending_ack,       [], pending_ack_cases()},
  359:      {tickets,           [], tickets_cases()},
  360:      {otp6442,           [], otp6442_cases()},
  361:      {otp6865,           [], otp6865_cases()},
  362:      {otp8183,           [], otp8183_cases()}
  363:     ].
  364: 
  365: request_and_reply_cases() ->
  366:     [
  367:      request_and_reply_plain, 
  368:      request_and_no_reply,
  369:      request_and_reply_pending_ack_no_pending,
  370:      request_and_reply_pending_ack_one_pending,
  371:      single_trans_req_and_reply,
  372:      single_trans_req_and_reply_sendopts,
  373:      request_and_reply_and_ack, 
  374:      request_and_reply_and_no_ack,
  375:      request_and_reply_and_late_ack,
  376:      trans_req_and_reply_and_req
  377:     ].
  378: 
  379: pending_ack_cases() ->
  380:     [
  381:      pending_ack_plain,
  382:      request_and_pending_and_late_reply
  383:     ].
  384:

  386:     [
  387:      otp_4359, 
  388:      otp_4836, 
  389:      otp_5805,

  394:      otp_6276, 
  395:      {group, otp6442},
  396:      {group, otp6865}, 
  397:      otp_7189, 
  398:      otp_7259, 
  399:      otp_7713,
  400:      {group, otp8183}, 
  401:      otp_8212
  402:     ].
  403:

  405:     [

  413:     [

  419:     [
  420:      otp_8183_request1
  421:     ].

  424: 
  425: %%
  426: %% -----
  427: %%
  428: 
  429: init_per_suite(suite) ->
  430:     [];
  431: init_per_suite(doc) ->
  432:     [];
  433: init_per_suite(Config0) when is_list(Config0) ->
  434: 
  435:     ?ANNOUNCE_SUITE_INIT(),
  436: 
  437:     p("init_per_suite -> entry with"
  438:       "~n      Config: ~p"
  439:       "~n      Nodes:  ~p", [Config0, erlang:nodes()]),
  440: 
  441:     case ?LIB:init_per_suite(Config0) of
  442:         {skip, _} = SKIP ->
  443:             SKIP;
  444: 
  445:         Config1 when is_list(Config1) ->
  446: 
  447:             %% We need a (local) monitor on this node also
  448:             megaco_test_sys_monitor:start(),
  449: 
  450:             p("init_per_suite -> end when"
  451:               "~n      Config: ~p"
  452:               "~n      Nodes:  ~p", [Config1, erlang:nodes()]),
  453: 
  454:             Config1
  455:     end.
  456: 
  457: end_per_suite(suite) -> [];
  458: end_per_suite(doc) -> [];
  459: end_per_suite(Config0) when is_list(Config0) ->
  460: 
  461:     p("end_per_suite -> entry with"
  462:       "~n      Config: ~p"
  463:       "~n      Nodes:  ~p", [Config0, erlang:nodes()]),
  464: 
  465:     megaco_test_sys_monitor:stop(),
  466:     Config1 = ?LIB:end_per_suite(Config0),
  467: 
  468:     p("end_per_suite -> end when"
  469:       "~n      Nodes:  ~p", [erlang:nodes()]),
  470: 
  471:     Config1.
  472: 
  473: 
  474: %%
  475: %% -----
  476: %%
  477: 
  478: init_per_group(Group, Config) ->
  479:     ?ANNOUNCE_GROUP_INIT(Group),
  480: 
  481:     p("init_per_group -> entry with"
  482:       "~n   Config: ~p"
  483:       "~n", [Config]),
  484: 
  485:     Config.
  486: 
  487: end_per_group(_GroupName, Config) ->
  488:     p("end_per_group -> entry with"
  489:       "~n   Config: ~p"
  490:       "~n", [Config]),
  491:     Config.
  492: 
  493: 
  494: 
  495: %%
  496: %% -----
  497: %%
  498: 
  499: init_per_testcase(Case, Config) ->
  500:     process_flag(trap_exit, true),
  501: 
  502:     ?ANNOUNCE_CASE_INIT(Case),
  503: 
  504:     p("init_per_testcase -> entry with"
  505:       "~n   Config: ~p"
  506:       "~n   Nodes:  ~p", [Config, erlang:nodes()]),
  507: 
  508:     init_per_testcase2(Case, Config).
  509: 
  510: init_per_testcase2(otp_7189 = Case, Config) ->
  511:     C = lists:keydelete(tc_timeout, 1, Config),
  512:     init_per_testcase3(Case, [{tc_timeout, min(tfactor(2, Config))} |C]);
  513: init_per_testcase2(request_and_no_reply = Case, Config) ->
  514:     C = lists:keydelete(tc_timeout, 1, Config),
  515:     init_per_testcase3(Case, [{tc_timeout, min(tfactor(2, Config))} |C]);
  516: init_per_testcase2(Case, Config) ->
  517:     C = lists:keydelete(tc_timeout, 1, Config),
  518:     init_per_testcase3(Case, [{tc_timeout, min(tfactor(1, Config))} |C]).
  519: 
  520: init_per_testcase3(Case, Config) ->
  521:     megaco_test_global_sys_monitor:reset_events(),
  522:     megaco_test_lib:init_per_testcase(Case, Config).
  523: 
  524: 
  525: 
  526: end_per_testcase(Case, Config) ->
  527: 
  528:     p("end_per_testcase -> entry with"
  529:       "~n   Config: ~p"
  530:       "~n   Nodes:  ~p", [Config, erlang:nodes()]),
  531: 
  532:     p("system events during test: "
  533:       "~n   ~p", [megaco_test_global_sys_monitor:events()]),
  534: 
  535:     megaco_test_lib:end_per_testcase(Case, Config).
  536: 
  537: 
  538: 
  539: min(M) -> ?MINS(M).
  540: 
  541: tfactor(T, Config) ->
  542:     case ?config(megaco_factor, Config) of
  543:         Factor when is_integer(Factor) andalso (Factor > 1) ->
  544:             T * Factor;
  545:         _ ->
  546:             T
  547:     end.
  548:

  551: 
  552: connect(suite) ->
  553:     [];
  554: connect(doc) ->
  555:     [];
  556: connect(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  557:     %% ?SKIP("Needs a re-write..."),
  558:     ?ACQUIRE_NODES(1, Config),
  559:     PrelMid = preliminary_mid,
  560:     MgMid   = ipv4_mid(4711),
  561: 
  562:     d("connect -> start megaco app",[]),
  563:     ?VERIFY(ok, application:start(megaco)),
  564:     d("connect -> start (MG) user ~p",[MgMid]),
  565:     ?VERIFY(ok,	megaco:start_user(MgMid, [{send_mod, bad_send_mod},
  566: 	                                  {request_timer, infinity},
  567: 	                                  {reply_timer, infinity}])),
  568: 
  569:     d("connect -> get receive info for ~p",[MgMid]),
  570:     MgRH = user_info(MgMid, receive_handle),
  571:     d("connect -> (MG) try connect to MGC",[]),
  572:     {ok, PrelCH} = ?VERIFY({ok, _}, megaco:connect(MgRH, PrelMid, sh, self())),
  573: 
  574:     connections([PrelCH]),
  575:     ?VERIFY([PrelCH], megaco:user_info(MgMid, connections)),
  576:     
  577:     ?VERIFY(bad_send_mod, megaco:user_info(MgMid, send_mod)),
  578:     ?VERIFY(bad_send_mod, megaco:conn_info(PrelCH, send_mod)),
  579:     SC = service_change_request(),
  580:     case megaco:call(PrelCH, [SC], []) of
  581: 	{_Version, 
  582: 	 {error, 
  583: 	  {send_message_failed, 
  584: 	   {'EXIT', {undef, [{bad_send_mod, send_message, [sh, _]} | _]}}}}
  585: 	} ->
  586: 	    %% R14B and previous
  587: 	    ?LOG("expected send failure (1)", []),
  588: 	    ok;
  589: 	
  590: 	%% As of R15, we also get some extra info (e.g. line numbers)
  591: 	{_Version, 
  592: 	 {error, 
  593: 	  {send_message_failed, 
  594: 	   {'EXIT', {undef, [{bad_send_mod, send_message, [sh, _], _} | _]}}}}
  595: 	} ->
  596: 	    %% R15B and later
  597: 	    ?LOG("expected send failure (2)", []),
  598: 	    ok;
  599: 
  600: 	Unexpected ->
  601: 	    ?ERROR(Unexpected)
  602:     end,
  603: 
  604:     ?VERIFY(ok, megaco:disconnect(PrelCH, shutdown)),
  605: 
  606:     ?VERIFY(ok,	megaco:stop_user(MgMid)),
  607:     ?VERIFY(ok, application:stop(megaco)),
  608:     ?RECEIVE([]),
  609:     ok.
  610: 
  611: 
  612: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
  613: 
  614: request_and_reply_plain(suite) ->
  615:     [];
  616: request_and_reply_plain(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  617:     ?ACQUIRE_NODES(1, Config),
  618:     d("request_and_reply_plain -> start proxy",[]),
  619:     ?USER_MOD:start_proxy(),
  620: 
  621:     PrelMid = preliminary_mid,
  622:     MgMid   = ipv4_mid(4711),
  623:     MgcMid  = ipv4_mid(),
  624:     UserMod = ?USER_MOD,
  625:     d("request_and_reply_plain -> start megaco app",[]),
  626:     ?VERIFY(ok, application:start(megaco)),
  627:     UserConfig = [{user_mod, UserMod}, {send_mod, UserMod},
  628: 		  {request_timer, infinity}, {reply_timer, infinity}],
  629:     d("request_and_reply_plain -> start (MG) user ~p",[MgMid]),
  630:     ?VERIFY(ok,	megaco:start_user(MgMid, UserConfig)),
  631: 
  632:     d("request_and_reply_plain -> start (MGC) user ~p",[MgcMid]),
  633:     ?VERIFY(ok,	megaco:start_user(MgcMid, UserConfig)),
  634: 
  635:     d("request_and_reply_plain -> get receive info for ~p",[MgMid]),
  636:     MgRH = user_info(MgMid, receive_handle),
  637:     d("request_and_reply_plain -> get receive info for ~p",[MgcMid]),
  638:     MgcRH = user_info(MgcMid, receive_handle), 
  639:     d("request_and_reply_plain -> start transport",[]),
  640:     {ok, MgPid, MgSH} =
  641: 	?VERIFY({ok, _, _}, UserMod:start_transport(MgRH, MgcRH)),
  642:     PrelMgCH = #megaco_conn_handle{local_mid = MgMid,
  643: 				   remote_mid = preliminary_mid},
  644:     MgCH  = #megaco_conn_handle{local_mid = MgMid,
  645: 				remote_mid = MgcMid},
  646:     MgcCH = #megaco_conn_handle{local_mid = MgcMid,
  647: 				remote_mid = MgMid},
  648:     d("request_and_reply_plain -> (MG) try connect to MGC",[]),
  649:     ?SEND(megaco:connect(MgRH, PrelMid, MgSH, MgPid)), % Mg prel
  650:     d("request_and_reply_plain -> (MGC) await connect from MG",[]),
  651:     ?USER({connect, PrelMgCH, _V, []}, ok),
  652:     ?RECEIVE([{res, _, {ok, PrelMgCH}}]),
  653: 
  654:     d("request_and_reply_plain -> (MG) send service change request",[]),
  655:     Req = service_change_request(),
  656:     ?SEND(megaco:call(PrelMgCH, [Req], [])),
  657: 
  658:     d("request_and_reply_plain -> (MGC) send service change reply",[]),
  659:     ?USER({connect, MgcCH, _V, []}, ok), % Mgc auto
  660:     Rep = service_change_reply(MgcMid),
  661:     ?USER({request, MgcCH, _V, [[Req]]}, {discard_ack, [Rep]}),
  662:     ?USER({connect, MgCH, _V, []}, ok), % Mg confirm
  663:     ?RECEIVE([{res, _, {1, {ok, [Rep]}}}]),
  664: 
  665:     d("request_and_reply_plain -> get (system info) connections",[]),
  666:     connections([MgCH, MgcCH]),
  667:     d("request_and_reply_plain -> get (~p) connections",[MgMid]),
  668:     ?VERIFY([MgCH], megaco:user_info(MgMid, connections)),
  669:     d("request_and_reply_plain -> get (~p) connections",[MgcMid]),
  670:     ?VERIFY([MgcCH], megaco:user_info(MgcMid, connections)),
  671: 
  672:     Reason = shutdown,
  673:     d("request_and_reply_plain -> (MG) disconnect",[]),
  674:     ?SEND(megaco:disconnect(MgCH, Reason)),
  675:     ?USER({disconnect, MgCH, _V, [{user_disconnect, Reason}]}, ok),
  676:     ?RECEIVE([{res, _, ok}]),
  677:     ?VERIFY(ok,	megaco:stop_user(MgMid)),
  678: 
  679:     d("request_and_reply_plain -> (MGC) disconnect",[]),
  680:     ?SEND(megaco:disconnect(MgcCH, Reason)),
  681:     ?USER({disconnect, MgcCH, _V, [{user_disconnect, Reason}]}, ok),
  682:     ?RECEIVE([{res, _, ok}]),
  683:     ?VERIFY(ok,	megaco:stop_user(MgcMid)),
  684: 
  685:     d("request_and_reply_plain -> stop megaco app",[]),
  686:     ?VERIFY(ok, application:stop(megaco)),
  687:     ?RECEIVE([]),
  688:     d("request_and_reply_plain -> done",[]),
  689:     ok.
  690: 
  691: 
  692:

  695: %% OTP-4760
  696: request_and_no_reply(suite) ->
  697:     [];
  698: request_and_no_reply(doc) ->
  699:     [];
  700: request_and_no_reply(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  701:     Pre = fun() ->
  702:                   MgcNode = make_node_name(mgc),
  703:                   Mg1Node = make_node_name(mg1),
  704:                   Mg2Node = make_node_name(mg2),
  705:                   Mg3Node = make_node_name(mg3),
  706:                   Mg4Node = make_node_name(mg4),
  707:                   d("start nodes: "
  708:                     "~n      MgcNode: ~p"
  709:                     "~n      Mg1Node: ~p"
  710:                     "~n      Mg2Node: ~p"
  711:                     "~n      Mg3Node: ~p"
  712:                     "~n      Mg4Node: ~p", 
  713:                     [MgcNode, Mg1Node, Mg2Node, Mg3Node, Mg4Node]),
  714:                   Nodes = [MgcNode, Mg1Node, Mg2Node, Mg3Node, Mg4Node], 
  715:                   ok = ?START_NODES(Nodes, true),
  716:                   Nodes
  717:           end,
  718:     Case = fun do_request_and_no_reply/1,
  719:     Post = fun(Nodes) ->
  720:                    d("stop nodes"),
  721:                    ?STOP_NODES(lists:reverse(Nodes))
  722:            end,
  723:     try_tc(request_and_no_reply, Pre, Case, Post).
  724: 
  725: do_request_and_no_reply([MgcNode, Mg1Node, Mg2Node, Mg3Node, Mg4Node]) ->
  726:     %% Start the MGC
  727:     i("[MGC] start"),    
  728:     ET = [{text,tcp}, {text,udp}, {binary,tcp}, {binary,udp}],
  729:     {ok, Mgc} = ?MGC_START(MgcNode, {deviceName, "ctrl"}, ET, [], ?MGC_VERBOSITY),
  730:     ?SLEEP(?SECONDS(1)),
  731: 
  732:     i("[MG] start"),    
  733:     Mg1Mid = {deviceName, "mg1"},
  734:     Mg2Mid = {deviceName, "mg2"},
  735:     Mg3Mid = {deviceName, "mg3"},
  736:     Mg4Mid = {deviceName, "mg4"},
  737:     ReqTmr = #megaco_incr_timer{wait_for    = 3000,
  738: 				factor      = 1, 
  739: 				incr        = 0,
  740: 				max_retries = 2
  741: 			       },
  742:     LongReqTmr = #megaco_incr_timer{wait_for    = 10000,
  743: 				    factor      = 1, 
  744: 				    incr        = 0,
  745: 				    max_retries = 3
  746: 				   },
  747:     %% Start the MGs
  748:     PendingTmr = 10000,
  749:     ReplyTmr = 16000,
  750:     MgConfig = [{request_timer,      ReqTmr}, 
  751: 		{long_request_timer, LongReqTmr}, 
  752: 		{pending_timer,      PendingTmr},
  753: 		{reply_timer,        ReplyTmr}],
  754:     {ok, Mg1} = ?MG_START(Mg1Node, Mg1Mid, text, tcp, MgConfig, ?MG_VERBOSITY),
  755:     ?SLEEP(?SECONDS(1)),
  756:     {ok, Mg2} = ?MG_START(Mg2Node, Mg2Mid, text, udp, MgConfig, ?MG_VERBOSITY),
  757:     ?SLEEP(?SECONDS(1)),
  758:     {ok, Mg3} = ?MG_START(Mg3Node, Mg3Mid, binary, tcp, MgConfig, ?MG_VERBOSITY),
  759:     ?SLEEP(?SECONDS(1)),
  760:     {ok, Mg4} = ?MG_START(Mg4Node, Mg4Mid, binary, udp, MgConfig, ?MG_VERBOSITY),
  761:     ?SLEEP(?SECONDS(1)),
  762: 
  763:     d("MG1 user info: ~p", [?MG_USER_INFO(Mg1, all)]),
  764:     d("MG1 conn info: ~p", [?MG_CONN_INFO(Mg1, all)]),
  765:     d("MG2 user info: ~p", [?MG_USER_INFO(Mg2, all)]),
  766:     d("MG2 conn info: ~p", [?MG_CONN_INFO(Mg2, all)]),
  767:     d("MG3 user info: ~p", [?MG_USER_INFO(Mg3, all)]),
  768:     d("MG3 conn info: ~p", [?MG_CONN_INFO(Mg3, all)]),
  769:     d("MG4 user info: ~p", [?MG_USER_INFO(Mg4, all)]),
  770:     d("MG4 conn info: ~p", [?MG_CONN_INFO(Mg4, all)]),
  771: 
  772:     i("[MG1] connect to the MGC (service change)"),    
  773:     ServChRes1 = ?MG_SERV_CHANGE(Mg1),
  774:     d("service change result: ~p", [ServChRes1]),
  775:     d("MG1 user info: ~p", [?MG_USER_INFO(Mg1, all)]),
  776:     d("MG1 conn info: ~p", [?MG_CONN_INFO(Mg1, all)]),
  777:     ?SLEEP(?SECONDS(1)),
  778: 
  779:     i("[MG2] connect to the MGC (service change)"),    
  780:     ServChRes2 = ?MG_SERV_CHANGE(Mg2),
  781:     d("service change result: ~p", [ServChRes2]),
  782:     d("MG2 user info: ~p", [?MG_USER_INFO(Mg2, all)]),
  783:     d("MG2 conn info: ~p", [?MG_CONN_INFO(Mg2, all)]),
  784:     ?SLEEP(?SECONDS(1)),
  785: 
  786:     i("[MG3] connect to the MGC (service change)"),    
  787:     ServChRes3 = ?MG_SERV_CHANGE(Mg3),
  788:     d("service change result: ~p", [ServChRes3]),
  789:     d("MG3 user info: ~p", [?MG_USER_INFO(Mg3, all)]),
  790:     d("MG3 conn info: ~p", [?MG_CONN_INFO(Mg3, all)]),
  791:     ?SLEEP(?SECONDS(1)),
  792: 
  793:     i("[MG4] connect to the MGC (service change)"),    
  794:     ServChRes4 = ?MG_SERV_CHANGE(Mg4),
  795:     d("service change result: ~p", [ServChRes4]),
  796:     d("MG4 user info: ~p", [?MG_USER_INFO(Mg4, all)]),
  797:     d("MG4 conn info: ~p", [?MG_CONN_INFO(Mg4, all)]),
  798:     ?SLEEP(?SECONDS(1)),
  799: 
  800:     d("tell the MGC to ignore requests"),
  801:     ?MGC_REQ_PEND(Mgc, infinity),
  802:     ?SLEEP(?SECONDS(1)),
  803: 
  804:     d("[MG1] send the notify"),
  805:     ?MG_NOTIF_REQ(Mg1),
  806:     ?SLEEP(?SECONDS(1)),
  807: 
  808:     d("[MG2] send the notify"),
  809:     ?MG_NOTIF_REQ(Mg2),
  810:     ?SLEEP(?SECONDS(1)),
  811: 
  812:     d("[MG3] send the notify"),
  813:     ?MG_NOTIF_REQ(Mg3),
  814:     ?SLEEP(?SECONDS(1)),
  815: 
  816:     d("[MG4] send the notify"),
  817:     ?MG_NOTIF_REQ(Mg4),
  818:     ?SLEEP(?SECONDS(1)),
  819: 
  820:     d("[MG1] await notify reply"),
  821:     {ok, {_Vsn1, {error, timeout}}} = ?MG_AWAIT_NOTIF_REP(Mg1),
  822:     d("[MG1] received expected reply"),
  823:     ?SLEEP(?SECONDS(1)),
  824: 
  825:     d("[MG2] await notify reply"),
  826:     {ok, {_Vsn2, {error, timeout}}} = ?MG_AWAIT_NOTIF_REP(Mg2),
  827:     d("[MG2] received expected reply"),
  828:     ?SLEEP(?SECONDS(1)),
  829: 
  830:     d("[MG3] await notify reply"),
  831:     {ok, {_Vsn3, {error, timeout}}} = ?MG_AWAIT_NOTIF_REP(Mg3),
  832:     d("[MG3] received expected reply"),
  833:     ?SLEEP(?SECONDS(1)),
  834: 
  835:     d("[MG4] await notify reply"),
  836:     {ok, {_Vsn4, {error, timeout}}} = ?MG_AWAIT_NOTIF_REP(Mg4),
  837:     d("[MG4] received expected reply"),
  838:     ?SLEEP(?SECONDS(1)),
  839: 
  840:     d("MG1 user info: ~p", [?MG_USER_INFO(Mg1, all)]),
  841:     d("MG1 conn info: ~p", [?MG_CONN_INFO(Mg1, all)]),
  842:     d("MG2 user info: ~p", [?MG_USER_INFO(Mg2, all)]),
  843:     d("MG2 conn info: ~p", [?MG_CONN_INFO(Mg2, all)]),
  844:     d("MG3 user info: ~p", [?MG_USER_INFO(Mg3, all)]),
  845:     d("MG3 conn info: ~p", [?MG_CONN_INFO(Mg3, all)]),
  846:     d("MG4 user info: ~p", [?MG_USER_INFO(Mg4, all)]),
  847:     d("MG4 conn info: ~p", [?MG_CONN_INFO(Mg4, all)]),
  848: 
  849:     %% Tell MG4 to stop
  850:     i("[MG4] stop"),
  851:     ?MG_STOP(Mg4),
  852: 
  853:     %% Tell MG3 to stop
  854:     i("[MG3] stop"),
  855:     ?MG_STOP(Mg3),
  856: 
  857:     %% Tell MG2 to stop
  858:     i("[MG2] stop"),
  859:     ?MG_STOP(Mg2),
  860: 
  861:     %% Tell MG1 to stop
  862:     i("[MG1] stop"),
  863:     ?MG_STOP(Mg1),
  864: 
  865:     %% Tell Mgc to stop
  866:     i("[MGC] stop"),
  867:     ?MGC_STOP(Mgc),
  868: 
  869:     i("done", []),
  870:     ok.

  876: request_and_reply_pending_ack_no_pending(suite) ->
  877:     [];
  878: request_and_reply_pending_ack_no_pending(doc) ->
  879:     ["This test case tests that megaco correctly handles the return "
  880:      "value handle_pending_ack from handle_trans_request when NO "
  881:      "pending message has been sent"];
  882: request_and_reply_pending_ack_no_pending(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  883:     Pre = fun() ->
  884:                   MgcNode = make_node_name(mgc),
  885:                   MgNode  = make_node_name(mg),
  886:                   d("start nodes: "
  887:                     "~n      MgcNode: ~p"
  888:                     "~n      MgNode:  ~p",
  889:                     [MgcNode, MgNode]),
  890:                   Nodes = [MgcNode, MgNode], 
  891:                   ok = ?START_NODES(Nodes, true),
  892:                   Nodes
  893:           end,
  894:     Case = fun(Nodes) ->
  895:                    do_request_and_reply_pending_ack_no_pending(Config, Nodes)
  896:            end,
  897:     Post = fun(Nodes) ->
  898:                    d("stop nodes"),
  899:                    ?STOP_NODES(lists:reverse(Nodes)),
  900:                    ok
  901:            end,
  902:     try_tc(rar_panp, Pre, Case, Post).
  903: 
  904: do_request_and_reply_pending_ack_no_pending(Config,
  905:                                             [MgcNode, MgNode]) ->
  906:     d("[MGC] start the simulator "),
  907:     {ok, Mgc} = megaco_test_megaco_generator:start_link("MGC", MgcNode),
  908: 
  909:     d("[MGC] create the event sequence"),
  910:     MgcEvSeq = rarpanp_mgc_event_sequence(Config,
  911:                                           text, tcp),
  912: 
  913:     i("wait some time before starting the MGC simulation"),
  914:     sleep(1000),
  915: 
  916:     d("[MGC] start the simulation"),
  917:     {ok, MgcId} = megaco_test_megaco_generator:exec(Mgc, MgcEvSeq),
  918: 
  919:     i("await MGC ready announcement"),
  920:     receive
  921:         announce_mgc ->
  922:             i("received MGC ready announcement"),
  923:             ok
  924:     end,
  925: 
  926:     d("[MG] start the simulator (generator)"),
  927:     {ok, Mg} = megaco_test_tcp_generator:start_link("MG", MgNode),
  928: 
  929:     d("[MG] create the event sequence"),
  930:     MgEvSeq = rarpanp_mg_event_sequence(text, tcp),
  931: 
  932:     i("wait some time before starting the MG simulation"),
  933:     sleep(1000),
  934: 
  935:     d("[MG] start the simulation"),
  936:     {ok, MgId} = megaco_test_tcp_generator:exec(Mg, MgEvSeq),
  937: 
  938:     d("await the generator reply(s)"),
  939:     await_completion([MgcId, MgId]),
  940: 
  941:     %% Tell Mgc to stop
  942:     i("[MGC] stop generator"),
  943:     megaco_test_tcp_generator:stop(Mgc),
  944: 
  945:     %% Tell Mg to stop
  946:     i("[MG] stop generator"),
  947:     megaco_test_megaco_generator:stop(Mg),
  948: 
  949:     i("done", []),
  950:     ok.

  953: %%
  954: %% MGC generator stuff
  955: %%
  956: -ifdef(megaco_hipe_special).
  957: -define(rarpanp_mgc_verify_handle_connect_fun(), 
  958:         {?MODULE, rarpanp_mgc_verify_handle_connect, []}).
  959: -define(rarpanp_mgc_verify_service_change_req_fun(Mid),
  960:         {?MODULE, rarpanp_mgc_verify_service_change_req, [Mid]}).
  961: -define(rarpanp_mgc_verify_notify_req_fun(),
  962:         {?MODULE, rarpanp_mgc_verify_notify_request, []}).
  963: -define(rarpanp_mgc_verify_handle_disconnect_fun(),
  964:         {?MODULE, rarpanp_mgc_verify_handle_disconnect, []}).
  965: -else.
  966: -define(rarpanp_mgc_verify_handle_connect_fun(), 
  967:         fun rarpanp_mgc_verify_handle_connect/1).
  968: -define(rarpanp_mgc_verify_service_change_req_fun(Mid),
  969:         rarpanp_mgc_verify_service_change_req_fun(Mid)).
  970: -define(rarpanp_mgc_verify_notify_req_fun(),
  971: 	rarpanp_mgc_verify_notify_request_fun()).
  972: -define(rarpanp_mgc_verify_handle_disconnect_fun(),
  973: 	fun rarpanp_mgc_verify_handle_disconnect/1).
  974: -endif.

  976: rarpanp_mgc_event_sequence(Config,
  977:                            text, tcp) ->
  978:     CTRL = self(),
  979:     Mid = {deviceName,"ctrl"},
  980:     RI = [
  981:           {port,             2944},
  982:           {encoding_module,  megaco_pretty_text_encoder},
  983:           {encoding_config,  []},
  984:           {transport_module, megaco_tcp}
  985:          ],
  986:     ConnectVerify = ?rarpanp_mgc_verify_handle_connect_fun(), 
  987:     ScrVerify     = ?rarpanp_mgc_verify_service_change_req_fun(Mid),
  988:     NrVerify      = ?rarpanp_mgc_verify_notify_req_fun(),
  989:     DiscoVerify   = ?rarpanp_mgc_verify_handle_disconnect_fun(), 
  990:     EvSeq = [
  991:              {debug, true},
  992:              {megaco_trace, disable},
  993:              ?MEGACO_TRACE(Config, max), % {megaco_trace, max},
  994:              megaco_start,
  995:              {megaco_start_user, Mid, RI, []},
  996:              {megaco_update_user_info, sent_pending_limit, 100},
  997:              start_transport,
  998:              listen,
  999: 
 1000:              %% ANNOUNCE READY
 1001:              {trigger, fun() -> CTRL ! announce_mgc end}, 
 1002: 
 1003:              {megaco_callback, handle_connect,       ConnectVerify},
 1004:              {megaco_conn_info, all},
 1005:              {megaco_callback, handle_trans_request, ScrVerify},
 1006: 	     {megaco_callback, handle_trans_request, NrVerify},
 1007:              {megaco_callback, nocall, 10000},
 1008:              {megaco_callback, handle_disconnect,    DiscoVerify},
 1009:              megaco_stop_user,
 1010:              megaco_stop
 1011:             ],
 1012:     EvSeq.

 1028: rarpanp_mgc_verify_service_change_req(
 1029:   {handle_trans_request, _, ?VERSION, [AR]}, Mid) ->
 1030:     io:format("rarpanp_mgc_verify_service_change_req -> entry with"
 1031: 	      "~n   AR:  ~p"
 1032: 	      "~n   Mid: ~p"
 1033: 	      "~n", [AR, Mid]),
 1034:     (catch rarpanp_mgc_do_verify_service_change_req(AR, Mid));
 1035: rarpanp_mgc_verify_service_change_req(Crap, _Mid) ->
 1036:     ED       = cre_ErrDesc(Crap),
 1037:     ErrReply = {discard_ack, ED},
 1038:     {error, Crap, ErrReply}.
 1039: 
 1040: rarpanp_mgc_do_verify_service_change_req(AR, Mid) ->
 1041:     io:format("rarpanp_mgc_do_verify_service_change_req -> entry with"
 1042: 	      "~n   AR:  ~p"
 1043: 	      "~n   Mid: ~p"
 1044: 	      "~n", [AR, Mid]),
 1045:     CR = 
 1046: 	case AR of
 1047: 	    #'ActionRequest'{commandRequests = [CmdReq]} ->
 1048: 		CmdReq;
 1049: 	    _ ->
 1050: 		Err1      = {invalid_action_request, AR},
 1051: 		ED1       = cre_ErrDesc(AR),
 1052: 		ErrReply1 = {discard_ack, ED1},
 1053: 		throw({error, Err1, ErrReply1})
 1054: 	end,
 1055:     Cmd = 
 1056: 	case CR of
 1057: 	    #'CommandRequest'{command = Command} ->
 1058: 		Command; 
 1059: 	    _ ->
 1060: 		Err2      = {invalid_command_request, CR},
 1061: 		ED2       = cre_ErrDesc(CR),
 1062: 		ErrReply2 = {discard_ack, ED2},
 1063: 		throw({error, Err2, ErrReply2})
 1064: 	end,
 1065:     {Tid, Parms} = 
 1066: 	case Cmd of
 1067: 	    {serviceChangeReq, 
 1068: 	     #'ServiceChangeRequest'{terminationID = [TermID],
 1069: 				     serviceChangeParms = ServChParms}} ->
 1070: 		{TermID, ServChParms};
 1071: 	    _ ->
 1072: 		Err3      = {invalid_command, Cmd},
 1073: 		ED3       = cre_ErrDesc(Cmd),
 1074: 		ErrReply3 = {discard_ack, ED3},
 1075: 		throw({error, Err3, ErrReply3})
 1076: 	end,
 1077:     case Tid of
 1078: 	#megaco_term_id{contains_wildcards = false, id = ["root"]} ->
 1079: 	    ok;
 1080: 	_ ->
 1081: 	    Err4      = {invalid_termination_id, Tid},
 1082: 	    ED4       = cre_ErrDesc(Tid),
 1083: 	    ErrReply4 = {discard_ack, ED4},
 1084: 	    throw({error, Err4, ErrReply4})
 1085:     end,
 1086:     case Parms of
 1087: 	#'ServiceChangeParm'{serviceChangeMethod = restart,
 1088: 			     serviceChangeReason = [[$9,$0,$1|_]]} ->
 1089: 	    AckData = [rarpanp_mgc_service_change_reply_ar(Mid, 1)], 
 1090: 	    Reply   = {discard_ack, AckData},
 1091: 	    {ok, AR, Reply};
 1092: 	_ ->
 1093: 	    Err5      = {invalid_SCP, Parms},
 1094: 	    ED5       = cre_ErrDesc(Parms),
 1095: 	    ErrReply5 = {discard_ack, ED5},
 1096: 	    {error, Err5, ErrReply5}
 1097:     end.
 1098:

 1100: %% Notify Request verification
 1101: -ifndef(megaco_hipe_special).

 1104: 	    rarpanp_mgc_verify_notify_request(Req) 
 1105:     end.

 1108: rarpanp_mgc_verify_notify_request(
 1109:   {handle_trans_request, _, ?VERSION, [AR]}) ->
 1110:     (catch rarpanp_mgc_do_verify_notify_request(AR));
 1111: rarpanp_mgc_verify_notify_request(Crap) ->
 1112:     ED = cre_ErrDesc(Crap),
 1113:     ErrReply = {discard_ack, ED},
 1114:     {error, Crap, ErrReply}.
 1115: 
 1116: rarpanp_mgc_do_verify_notify_request(AR) ->
 1117:     io:format("rarpanp_mgc_do_verify_notify_request -> entry with"
 1118: 	      "~n   AR: ~p"
 1119: 	      "~n", [AR]),
 1120:     {Cid, CR} = 
 1121: 	case AR of
 1122: 	    #'ActionRequest'{contextId       = CtxID,
 1123: 			     commandRequests = [CmdReq]} ->
 1124: 		{CtxID, CmdReq};
 1125: 	    _ ->
 1126: 		Err1      = {invalid_action_request, AR},
 1127: 		ED1       = cre_ErrDesc(AR),
 1128: 		ErrReply1 = {discard_ack, ED1},
 1129: 		throw({error, Err1, ErrReply1})
 1130: 	end,
 1131:     Cmd = 
 1132: 	case CR of
 1133: 	    #'CommandRequest'{command = Command} ->
 1134: 		Command;
 1135: 	    _ ->
 1136: 		Err2      = {invalid_command_request, CR},
 1137: 		ED2       = cre_ErrDesc(CR),
 1138: 		ErrReply2 = {discard_ack, ED2},
 1139: 		throw({error, Err2, ErrReply2})
 1140: 	end,
 1141:     NR = 
 1142: 	case Cmd of
 1143: 	    {notifyReq, NotifReq} ->
 1144: 		NotifReq;
 1145: 	    _ ->
 1146: 		Err3      = {invalid_command, Cmd},
 1147: 		ED3       = cre_ErrDesc(Cmd),
 1148: 		ErrReply3 = {discard_ack, ED3},
 1149: 		throw({error, Err3, ErrReply3})
 1150: 	end,
 1151:     {Tid, OED} = 
 1152: 	case NR of
 1153: 	    #'NotifyRequest'{terminationID            = [TermID],
 1154: 			     observedEventsDescriptor = ObsEvsDesc,
 1155: 			     errorDescriptor          = asn1_NOVALUE} ->
 1156: 		{TermID, ObsEvsDesc};
 1157: 	    _ ->
 1158: 		Err4      = {invalid_NR, NR},
 1159: 		ED4       = cre_ErrDesc(NR),
 1160: 		ErrReply4 = {discard_ack, ED4},
 1161: 		throw({error, Err4, ErrReply4})
 1162: 	end,
 1163:     OE = 
 1164: 	case OED of 
 1165: 	    #'ObservedEventsDescriptor'{observedEventLst = [ObsEvLst]} ->
 1166: 		ObsEvLst;
 1167: 	    _ ->
 1168: 		Err5      = {invalid_OED, OED},
 1169: 		ED5       = cre_ErrDesc(NR),
 1170: 		ErrReply5 = {discard_ack, ED5},
 1171: 		throw({error, Err5, ErrReply5})
 1172: 	end,
 1173:     case OE of
 1174: 	#'ObservedEvent'{eventName = "al/of"} ->
 1175: 	    AckData = notify_request_verified, 
 1176: 	    Replies = [rarpanp_mgc_notify_reply_ar(Cid, Tid)],
 1177: 	    Reply   = {{handle_pending_ack, AckData}, Replies},
 1178: 	    {ok, AR, Reply};
 1179: 	_ ->
 1180: 	    Err6      = {invalid_OE, OE},
 1181: 	    ED6       = cre_ErrDesc(OE),
 1182: 	    ErrReply6 = {discard_ack, ED6},
 1183: 	    throw({error, Err6, ErrReply6})
 1184:     end.
 1185:

 1190: rarpanp_mgc_verify_handle_disconnect(Else) ->
 1191:     {error, Else, ok}.

 1193: rarpanp_mgc_service_change_reply_ar(Mid, Cid) ->
 1194:     SCRP  = cre_serviceChangeResParm(Mid),
 1195:     SCRes = cre_serviceChangeResult(SCRP),
 1196:     Root  = #megaco_term_id{id = ["root"]},
 1197:     SCR   = cre_serviceChangeReply([Root], SCRes),
 1198:     CR    = cre_cmdReply(SCR),
 1199:     AR    = cre_actionReply(Cid, [CR]),
 1200:     AR.
 1201: 
 1202: rarpanp_mgc_notify_reply_ar(Cid, TermId) ->
 1203:     NR    = cre_notifyReply([TermId]),
 1204:     CR    = cre_cmdReply(NR),
 1205:     cre_actionReply(Cid, [CR]).

 1231: rarpanp_mg_event_sequence(text, tcp) ->
 1232:     DecodeFun = ?rarpanp_mg_decode_msg_fun(megaco_pretty_text_encoder, []),
 1233:     EncodeFun = ?rarpanp_mg_encode_msg_fun(megaco_pretty_text_encoder, []),
 1234:     Mid       = {deviceName,"mg"},
 1235:     ServiceChangeReq = rarpanp_mg_service_change_request_msg(Mid, 1, 0),
 1236:     ScrVerifyFun = ?rarpanp_mg_verify_service_change_rep_msg_fun(),
 1237:     TransId = 2, 
 1238:     TermId = #megaco_term_id{id = ["00000000","00000000","01101101"]},
 1239:     NotifyReq = rarpanp_mg_notify_request_msg(Mid, TransId, 1, TermId, 1),
 1240:     NrVerifyFun = ?rarpanp_mg_verify_notify_rep_msg_fun(TransId, TermId),
 1241:     EvSeq = [{debug,  true},
 1242:              {decode, DecodeFun},
 1243:              {encode, EncodeFun},
 1244:              {connect, 2944},
 1245:              {send, "service-change-request", ServiceChangeReq},
 1246:              {expect_receive, "service-change-reply", {ScrVerifyFun, 10000}},
 1247:              {send, "notify request", NotifyReq},
 1248:              {expect_receive, "notify-reply", {NrVerifyFun, 10000}},
 1249:              {expect_nothing, 11000},
 1250:              disconnect
 1251:             ],
 1252:     EvSeq.

 1276: rarpanp_mg_verify_service_change_rep_msg(#'MegacoMessage'{mess = Mess} = M) ->
 1277:     io:format("rarpanp_mg_verify_service_change_rep_msg -> entry with"
 1278: 	      "~n   Mess:  ~p"
 1279: 	      "~n", [Mess]),
 1280:     Body = 
 1281: 	case Mess of 
 1282: 	    #'Message'{version     = _V,
 1283:                        mId         = _MgMid,
 1284:                        messageBody = MsgBody} ->
 1285: 		MsgBody;
 1286: 	    _ ->
 1287: 		throw({error, {invalid_Message, Mess}})
 1288: 	end,
 1289:     Trans = 
 1290: 	case Body of
 1291:             {transactions, [Transactions]} ->
 1292: 		Transactions;
 1293: 	    _ ->
 1294: 		throw({error, {invalid_messageBody, Body}})
 1295: 	end,
 1296:     TR = 
 1297: 	case Trans of
 1298:             {transactionReply, TransReply} ->
 1299: 		TransReply;
 1300: 	    _ ->
 1301: 		throw({error, {invalid_transactions, Trans}})
 1302: 	end,
 1303:     TRes = 
 1304: 	case TR of
 1305:             #'TransactionReply'{transactionId = _Tid,
 1306:                                 immAckRequired = asn1_NOVALUE,
 1307:                                 transactionResult = TransRes} ->
 1308: 		TransRes;
 1309: 	    _ ->
 1310: 		throw({error, {invalid_transactionReply, TR}})
 1311: 	end,
 1312:     AR = 
 1313: 	case TRes of
 1314:             {actionReplies, [ActRes]} ->
 1315: 		ActRes;
 1316: 	    _ ->
 1317: 		throw({error, {invalid_transactionResult, TRes}})
 1318: 	end,
 1319:     CR = 
 1320: 	case AR of
 1321:             #'ActionReply'{contextId       = _Cid,
 1322:                            errorDescriptor = asn1_NOVALUE,
 1323:                            contextReply    = _CtxReq,
 1324:                            commandReply    = [CmdRep]} ->
 1325: 		CmdRep;
 1326: 	    _ ->
 1327: 		throw({error, {invalid_actionReplies, AR}})
 1328: 	end,
 1329:     SCR = 
 1330: 	case CR of
 1331:             {serviceChangeReply, ServChRep} ->
 1332: 		ServChRep;
 1333: 	    _ ->
 1334: 		throw({error, {invalid_commandReply, CR}})
 1335: 	end,
 1336:     SCRes = 
 1337: 	case SCR of
 1338:             #'ServiceChangeReply'{terminationID       = _TermID,
 1339:                                   serviceChangeResult = ServChRes} ->
 1340: 		ServChRes;
 1341: 	    _ ->
 1342: 		throw({error, {invalid_serviceChangeReply, SCR}})
 1343: 	end,
 1344:     SCRP = 
 1345: 	case SCRes of
 1346:             {serviceChangeResParms, Parms} ->
 1347: 		Parms;
 1348: 	    _ ->
 1349: 		throw({error, {invalid_serviceChangeResult, SCRes}})
 1350: 	end,
 1351:     case SCRP of
 1352: 	#'ServiceChangeResParm'{serviceChangeMgcId = _MgcMid} ->
 1353:             {ok, M};
 1354: 	_ ->
 1355: 	    {error, {invalid_serviceChangeResParms, SCRP}}
 1356:     end;
 1357: rarpanp_mg_verify_service_change_rep_msg(Crap) ->
 1358:     {error, {invalid_message, Crap}}.
 1359:

 1361: rarpanp_mg_verify_notify_rep_msg_fun(TransId, TermId) ->

 1363: 	    (catch rarpanp_mg_verify_notify_rep_msg(Msg, TransId, TermId)) 
 1364:     end.

 1367: rarpanp_mg_verify_notify_rep_msg(#'MegacoMessage'{mess = Mess} = M,
 1368: 			     TransId, TermId) ->
 1369:     io:format("rarpanp_mg_verify_notify_rep_msg -> entry with"
 1370: 	      "~n   TransId: ~p"
 1371: 	      "~n   TermId:  ~p"
 1372: 	      "~n   Mess:    ~p"
 1373: 	      "~n", [TransId, TermId, Mess]),
 1374:     Body = 
 1375: 	case Mess of 
 1376: 	    #'Message'{version     = _V,
 1377:                        mId         = _MgMid,
 1378:                        messageBody = MsgBody} ->
 1379: 		MsgBody;
 1380: 	    _ ->
 1381: 		throw({error, {invalid_Message, Mess}})
 1382: 	end,
 1383:     Trans = 
 1384: 	case Body of
 1385:             {transactions, [Transactions]} ->
 1386: 		Transactions;
 1387: 	    _ ->
 1388: 		throw({error, {invalid_messageBody, Body}})
 1389: 	end,
 1390:     TR = 
 1391: 	case Trans of
 1392:             {transactionReply, TransReply} ->
 1393: 		TransReply;
 1394: 	    _ ->
 1395: 		throw({error, {invalid_transactions, Trans}})
 1396: 	end,
 1397:     TRes = 
 1398: 	case TR of
 1399:             #'TransactionReply'{transactionId     = TransId,
 1400:                                 immAckRequired    = asn1_NOVALUE, % No ack
 1401:                                 transactionResult = TransRes} ->
 1402: 		TransRes;
 1403: 	    _ ->
 1404: 		throw({error, {invalid_transactionReply, TR}})
 1405: 	end,
 1406:     AR = 
 1407: 	case TRes of
 1408:             {actionReplies, [ActRes]} ->
 1409: 		ActRes;
 1410: 	    _ ->
 1411: 		throw({error, {invalid_transactionResult, TRes}})
 1412: 	end,
 1413:     CR = 
 1414: 	case AR of
 1415:             #'ActionReply'{contextId       = _Cid,
 1416:                            errorDescriptor = asn1_NOVALUE,
 1417:                            contextReply    = _CtxReq,
 1418:                            commandReply    = [CmdRep]} ->
 1419: 		CmdRep;
 1420: 	    _ ->
 1421: 		throw({error, {invalid_actionReplies, AR}})
 1422: 	end,
 1423:     NR = 
 1424: 	case CR of
 1425:             {notifyReply, NotifyRep} ->
 1426: 		NotifyRep;
 1427: 	    _ ->
 1428: 		throw({error, {invalid_commandReply, CR}})
 1429: 	end,
 1430: 
 1431:     case NR of
 1432: 	#'NotifyReply'{terminationID   = [TermId],
 1433: 		       errorDescriptor = asn1_NOVALUE} ->
 1434: 	    io:format("rarpanp_mg_verify_notify_rep_msg -> done when verifyed"
 1435: 		      "~n", []),
 1436:             {ok, M};
 1437: 	#'NotifyReply'{terminationID   = A,
 1438: 		       errorDescriptor = B} ->
 1439: 	    throw({error, {invalid_notifyReply, 
 1440: 			   {A, TermId}, 
 1441: 			   {B, asn1_NOVALUE}}});
 1442: 	_ ->
 1443: 	    throw({error, {invalid_notifyReply, NR}})
 1444:     end;
 1445: rarpanp_mg_verify_notify_rep_msg(_TransId, _TermId, Crap) ->
 1446:     {error, {invalid_message, Crap}}.

 1448: rarpanp_mg_service_change_request_ar(_Mid, Cid) ->
 1449:     Prof  = cre_serviceChangeProf("resgw", 1),
 1450:     SCP   = cre_serviceChangeParm(restart, ["901 mg col boot"], Prof),
 1451:     Root  = #megaco_term_id{id = ["root"]},
 1452:     SCR   = cre_serviceChangeReq([Root], SCP),
 1453:     CMD   = cre_command(SCR),
 1454:     CR    = cre_cmdReq(CMD),
 1455:     cre_actionReq(Cid, [CR]).
 1456: 
 1457: rarpanp_mg_service_change_request_msg(Mid, TransId, Cid) ->
 1458:     AR    = rarpanp_mg_service_change_request_ar(Mid, Cid),
 1459:     TR    = cre_transReq(TransId, [AR]),
 1460:     Trans = cre_transaction(TR),
 1461:     Mess  = cre_message(?VERSION, Mid, cre_transactions([Trans])),
 1462:     cre_megacoMessage(Mess).
 1463: 
 1464: rarpanp_mg_notify_request_ar(Rid, Tid, Cid) ->
 1465:     TT      = cre_timeNotation("19990729", "22000000"),
 1466:     Ev      = cre_obsEvent("al/of", TT),
 1467:     EvsDesc = cre_obsEvsDesc(Rid, [Ev]),
 1468:     NR      = cre_notifyReq([Tid], EvsDesc),
 1469:     CMD     = cre_command(NR),
 1470:     CR      = cre_cmdReq(CMD),
 1471:     cre_actionReq(Cid, [CR]).
 1472: 
 1473: rarpanp_mg_notify_request_msg(Mid, TransId, Rid, TermId, Cid) ->
 1474:     AR      = rarpanp_mg_notify_request_ar(Rid, TermId, Cid),
 1475:     TR      = cre_transReq(TransId, [AR]),
 1476:     Trans   = cre_transaction(TR),
 1477:     Mess    = cre_message(?VERSION, Mid, cre_transactions([Trans])),
 1478:     cre_megacoMessage(Mess).

 1483: request_and_reply_pending_ack_one_pending(suite) ->
 1484:     [];
 1485: request_and_reply_pending_ack_one_pending(doc) ->
 1486:     ["This test case tests that megaco correctly handles the return "
 1487:      "value handle_pending_ack from handle_trans_request when ONE "
 1488:      "pending message has been sent"];
 1489: request_and_reply_pending_ack_one_pending(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1490:     Pre = fun() ->
 1491:                   MgcNode = make_node_name(mgc),
 1492:                   MgNode  = make_node_name(mg),
 1493:                   d("start nodes: "
 1494:                     "~n      MgcNode: ~p"
 1495:                     "~n      MgNode:  ~p",
 1496:                     [MgcNode, MgNode]),
 1497:                   Nodes = [MgcNode, MgNode],
 1498:                   ok = ?START_NODES(Nodes, true),
 1499:                   Nodes
 1500:           end,
 1501:     Case = fun(Nodes) ->
 1502:                    do_request_and_reply_pending_ack_one_pending(Config, Nodes)
 1503:            end,
 1504:     Post = fun(Nodes) ->
 1505:                    d("stop nodes"),
 1506:                    ?STOP_NODES(lists:reverse(Nodes))
 1507:            end,
 1508:     try_tc(rar_paop, Pre, Case, Post).
 1509: 
 1510: do_request_and_reply_pending_ack_one_pending(Config,
 1511:                                              [MgcNode, MgNode]) ->
 1512:     d("[MGC] start the simulator"),
 1513:     {ok, Mgc} = megaco_test_megaco_generator:start_link("MGC", MgcNode),
 1514: 
 1515:     d("[MGC] create the event sequence"),
 1516:     %% MgcEvSeq = rarpaop_mgc_event_sequence(text, tcp),
 1517:     MgcEvSeq = rarpaop_mgc_event_sequence(Config,
 1518:                                           binary, tcp),
 1519: 
 1520:     i("wait some time before starting the MGC simulation"),
 1521:     sleep(1000),
 1522: 
 1523:     d("[MGC] start the simulation"),
 1524:     {ok, MgcId} = megaco_test_megaco_generator:exec(Mgc, MgcEvSeq),
 1525: 
 1526:     %% i("wait some time before starting the MG simulator"),
 1527:     %% sleep(1000),
 1528: 
 1529:     i("await MGC ready announcement"),
 1530:     receive
 1531:         announce_mgc ->
 1532:             i("received MGC ready announcement"),
 1533:             ok
 1534:     end,
 1535: 
 1536:     d("[MG] start the simulator (generator)"),
 1537:     {ok, Mg} = megaco_test_tcp_generator:start_link("MG", MgNode),
 1538: 
 1539:     d("[MG] create the event sequence"),
 1540:     %% MgEvSeq = rarpaop_mg_event_sequence(text, tcp),
 1541:     MgEvSeq = rarpaop_mg_event_sequence(Config,
 1542:                                         binary, tcp),
 1543: 
 1544:     i("wait some time before starting the MG simulation"),
 1545:     sleep(1000),
 1546: 
 1547:     d("[MG] start the simulation"),
 1548:     {ok, MgId} = megaco_test_tcp_generator:exec(Mg, MgEvSeq),
 1549: 
 1550:     d("await the generator reply(s)"),
 1551:     await_completion([MgcId, MgId]),
 1552: 
 1553:     %% Tell Mgc to stop
 1554:     i("[MGC] stop generator"),
 1555:     megaco_test_tcp_generator:stop(Mgc),
 1556: 
 1557:     %% Tell Mg to stop
 1558:     i("[MG] stop generator"),
 1559:     megaco_test_megaco_generator:stop(Mg),
 1560: 
 1561:     i("done", []),
 1562:     ok.
 1563: 
 1564: 
 1565: %%
 1566: %% MGC generator stuff
 1567: %%
 1568: -ifdef(megaco_hipe_special).
 1569: -define(rarpaop_mgc_verify_handle_connect_fun(), 
 1570:         {?MODULE, rarpaop_mgc_verify_handle_connect, []}).
 1571: -define(rarpaop_mgc_verify_service_change_req_fun(Mid),
 1572:         {?MODULE, rarpaop_mgc_verify_service_change_req, [Mid]}).
 1573: -define(rarpaop_mgc_verify_notify_req_fun(),
 1574:         {?MODULE, rarpaop_mgc_verify_notify_request, []}).
 1575: -define(rarpaop_mgc_verify_reply_ack_fun(),
 1576: 	{?MODULE, rarpaop_mgc_verify_reply_ack, []}).
 1577: -define(rarpaop_mgc_verify_handle_disconnect_fun(),
 1578:         {?MODULE, rarpaop_mgc_verify_handle_disconnect, []}).
 1579: -else.
 1580: -define(rarpaop_mgc_verify_handle_connect_fun(), 
 1581:         fun rarpaop_mgc_verify_handle_connect/1).
 1582: -define(rarpaop_mgc_verify_service_change_req_fun(Mid),
 1583:         rarpaop_mgc_verify_service_change_req_fun(Mid)).
 1584: -define(rarpaop_mgc_verify_notify_req_fun(),
 1585: 	rarpaop_mgc_verify_notify_request_fun()).
 1586: -define(rarpaop_mgc_verify_reply_ack_fun(),
 1587: 	rarpaop_mgc_verify_reply_ack_fun()).
 1588: -define(rarpaop_mgc_verify_handle_disconnect_fun(),
 1589: 	fun rarpaop_mgc_verify_handle_disconnect/1).
 1590: -endif.
 1591: 
 1592: rarpaop_mgc_event_sequence(Config,
 1593:                            text, tcp) ->
 1594:     Port      = 2944, 
 1595:     TranspMod = megaco_tcp, 
 1596:     EncMod    = megaco_pretty_text_encoder,
 1597:     EncConf   = [], 
 1598:     rarpaop_mgc_event_sequence(Config,
 1599:                                Port, TranspMod, EncMod, EncConf);
 1600: rarpaop_mgc_event_sequence(Config,
 1601:                            binary, tcp) ->
 1602:     Port      = 2945, 
 1603:     TranspMod = megaco_tcp, 
 1604:     EncMod    = megaco_ber_encoder,
 1605:     EncConf   = [], 
 1606:     rarpaop_mgc_event_sequence(Config,
 1607:                                Port, TranspMod, EncMod, EncConf).
 1608: 
 1609: rarpaop_mgc_event_sequence(Config,
 1610:                            Port, TranspMod, EncMod, EncConf) ->
 1611:     CTRL = self(),
 1612:     Mid = {deviceName,"ctrl"},
 1613:     RI = [
 1614:           {port,             Port},
 1615:           {transport_module, TranspMod},
 1616:           {encoding_module,  EncMod},
 1617:           {encoding_config,  EncConf}
 1618:          ],
 1619:     ConnectVerify = ?rarpaop_mgc_verify_handle_connect_fun(), 
 1620:     ScrVerify     = ?rarpaop_mgc_verify_service_change_req_fun(Mid),
 1621:     NrVerify      = ?rarpaop_mgc_verify_notify_req_fun(),
 1622:     AckVerify     = ?rarpaop_mgc_verify_reply_ack_fun(),
 1623:     DiscoVerify   = ?rarpaop_mgc_verify_handle_disconnect_fun(), 
 1624:     EvSeq = [
 1625:              {debug, true},
 1626:              {megaco_trace, disable},
 1627:              ?MEGACO_TRACE(Config, max), % {megaco_trace, max},
 1628:              megaco_start,
 1629:              {megaco_start_user, Mid, RI, []},
 1630:              {megaco_update_user_info, sent_pending_limit, 100},
 1631:              start_transport,
 1632:              listen,
 1633: 
 1634:              %% ANNOUNCE READY
 1635:              {trigger, fun() -> CTRL ! announce_mgc end}, 
 1636: 
 1637:              {megaco_callback, handle_connect,       ConnectVerify},
 1638:              {megaco_conn_info, all},
 1639:              {megaco_callback, handle_trans_request, ScrVerify},
 1640: 	     {megaco_callback, handle_trans_request, NrVerify},
 1641: 	     {megaco_callback, handle_trans_ack,     AckVerify},
 1642:              {megaco_callback, nocall, 10000},
 1643:              {megaco_callback, handle_disconnect,    DiscoVerify},
 1644:              megaco_stop_user,
 1645:              megaco_stop
 1646:             ],
 1647:     EvSeq.
 1648: 
 1649: %% Connect verification
 1650: rarpaop_mgc_verify_handle_connect({handle_connect, CH, ?VERSION}) ->
 1651:     {ok, CH, ok};
 1652: rarpaop_mgc_verify_handle_connect(Else) ->
 1653:     {error, Else, ok}.
 1654: 
 1655: %% Service Change verification
 1656: -ifndef(megaco_hipe_special).
 1657: rarpaop_mgc_verify_service_change_req_fun(Mid) ->
 1658:     fun(Req) -> 
 1659: 	    rarpaop_mgc_verify_service_change_req(Req, Mid) 
 1660:     end.
 1661: -endif.
 1662: 
 1663: rarpaop_mgc_verify_service_change_req(
 1664:   {handle_trans_request, _, ?VERSION, [AR]}, Mid) ->
 1665:     (catch rarpaop_do_verify_service_change_req(AR, Mid));
 1666: rarpaop_mgc_verify_service_change_req(Crap, _Mid) ->
 1667:     ED       = cre_ErrDesc(Crap),
 1668:     ErrReply = {discard_ack, ED},
 1669:     {error, Crap, ErrReply}.
 1670: 
 1671: rarpaop_do_verify_service_change_req(AR, Mid) ->
 1672:     CR = 
 1673: 	case AR of
 1674: 	    #'ActionRequest'{commandRequests = [CmdReq]} ->
 1675: 		CmdReq;
 1676: 	    _ ->
 1677: 		Err1      = {invalid_action_request, AR},
 1678: 		ED1       = cre_ErrDesc(AR),
 1679: 		ErrReply1 = {discard_ack, ED1},
 1680: 		throw({error, Err1, ErrReply1})
 1681: 	end,
 1682:     Cmd = 
 1683: 	case CR of
 1684: 	    #'CommandRequest'{command = Command} ->
 1685: 		Command; 
 1686: 	    _ ->
 1687: 		Err2      = {invalid_command_request, CR},
 1688: 		ED2       = cre_ErrDesc(CR),
 1689: 		ErrReply2 = {discard_ack, ED2},
 1690: 		throw({error, Err2, ErrReply2})
 1691: 	end,
 1692:     {Tid, Parms} = 
 1693: 	case Cmd of
 1694: 	    {serviceChangeReq, 
 1695: 	     #'ServiceChangeRequest'{terminationID = [TermID],
 1696: 				     serviceChangeParms = ServChParms}} ->
 1697: 		{TermID, ServChParms};
 1698: 	    _ ->
 1699: 		Err3      = {invalid_command, Cmd},
 1700: 		ED3       = cre_ErrDesc(Cmd),
 1701: 		ErrReply3 = {discard_ack, ED3},
 1702: 		throw({error, Err3, ErrReply3})
 1703: 	end,
 1704:     case Tid of
 1705: 	#megaco_term_id{contains_wildcards = false, id = ["root"]} ->
 1706: 	    ok;
 1707: 	_ ->
 1708: 	    Err4      = {invalid_termination_id, Tid},
 1709: 	    ED4       = cre_ErrDesc(Tid),
 1710: 	    ErrReply4 = {discard_ack, ED4},
 1711: 	    throw({error, Err4, ErrReply4})
 1712:     end,
 1713:     case Parms of
 1714: 	#'ServiceChangeParm'{serviceChangeMethod = restart,
 1715: 			     serviceChangeReason = [[$9,$0,$1|_]]} ->
 1716: 	    AckData = [rarpaop_mgc_service_change_reply_ar(Mid, 1)], 
 1717: 	    Reply   = {discard_ack, AckData},
 1718: 	    {ok, AR, Reply};
 1719: 	_ ->
 1720: 	    Err5      = {invalid_SCP, Parms},
 1721: 	    ED5       = cre_ErrDesc(Parms),
 1722: 	    ErrReply5 = {discard_ack, ED5},
 1723: 	    {error, Err5, ErrReply5}
 1724:     end.
 1725: 
 1726: 
 1727: %% Notify Request verification
 1728: -ifndef(megaco_hipe_special).
 1729: rarpaop_mgc_verify_notify_request_fun() ->
 1730:     fun(Req) -> 
 1731: 	    rarpaop_mgc_verify_notify_request(Req) 
 1732:     end.
 1733: -endif.
 1734: 
 1735: rarpaop_mgc_verify_notify_request({handle_trans_request, _, ?VERSION, [AR]}) ->
 1736:     (catch rarpaop_mgc_do_verify_notify_request(AR));
 1737: rarpaop_mgc_verify_notify_request(Crap) ->
 1738:     ED       = cre_ErrDesc(Crap),
 1739:     ErrReply = {discard_ack, ED},
 1740:     {error, Crap, ErrReply}.
 1741: 
 1742: rarpaop_mgc_do_verify_notify_request(AR) ->
 1743:     {Cid, CR} = 
 1744: 	case AR of
 1745: 	    #'ActionRequest'{contextId       = CtxID,
 1746: 			     commandRequests = [CmdReq]} ->
 1747: 		{CtxID, CmdReq};
 1748: 	    _ ->
 1749: 		Err1      = {invalid_action_request, AR},
 1750: 		ED1       = cre_ErrDesc(AR),
 1751: 		ErrReply1 = {discard_ack, ED1},
 1752: 		throw({error, Err1, ErrReply1})
 1753: 	end,
 1754:     Cmd = 
 1755: 	case CR of
 1756: 	    #'CommandRequest'{command = Command} ->
 1757: 		Command;
 1758: 	    _ ->
 1759: 		Err2      = {invalid_command_request, CR},
 1760: 		ED2       = cre_ErrDesc(CR),
 1761: 		ErrReply2 = {discard_ack, ED2},
 1762: 		throw({error, Err2, ErrReply2})
 1763: 	end,
 1764:     NR = 
 1765: 	case Cmd of
 1766: 	    {notifyReq, NotifReq} ->
 1767: 		NotifReq;
 1768: 	    _ ->
 1769: 		Err3      = {invalid_command, Cmd},
 1770: 		ED3       = cre_ErrDesc(Cmd),
 1771: 		ErrReply3 = {discard_ack, ED3},
 1772: 		throw({error, Err3, ErrReply3})
 1773: 	end,
 1774:     {Tid, OED} = 
 1775: 	case NR of
 1776: 	    #'NotifyRequest'{terminationID            = [TermID],
 1777: 			     observedEventsDescriptor = ObsEvsDesc,
 1778: 			     errorDescriptor          = asn1_NOVALUE} ->
 1779: 		{TermID, ObsEvsDesc};
 1780: 	    _ ->
 1781: 		Err4      = {invalid_NR, NR},
 1782: 		ED4       = cre_ErrDesc(NR),
 1783: 		ErrReply4 = {discard_ack, ED4},
 1784: 		throw({error, Err4, ErrReply4})
 1785: 	end,
 1786:     OE = 
 1787: 	case OED of 
 1788: 	    #'ObservedEventsDescriptor'{observedEventLst = [ObsEvLst]} ->
 1789: 		ObsEvLst;
 1790: 	    _ ->
 1791: 		Err5      = {invalid_OED, OED},
 1792: 		ED5       = cre_ErrDesc(NR),
 1793: 		ErrReply5 = {discard_ack, ED5},
 1794: 		throw({error, Err5, ErrReply5})
 1795: 	end,
 1796:     case OE of
 1797: 	#'ObservedEvent'{eventName = "al/of"} ->
 1798: 	    AckData = notify_request_verified, 
 1799: 	    Replies = [rarpaop_mgc_notify_reply_ar(Cid, Tid)],
 1800: 	    Reply   = {{handle_pending_ack, AckData}, Replies},
 1801: 	    {ok, 5000, AR, Reply};
 1802: 	_ ->
 1803: 	    Err6      = {invalid_OE, OE},
 1804: 	    ED6       = cre_ErrDesc(OE),
 1805: 	    ErrReply6 = {discard_ack, ED6},
 1806: 	    throw({error, Err6, ErrReply6})
 1807:     end.
 1808: 
 1809: 
 1810: %% Ack verification
 1811: -ifndef(megaco_hipe_special).
 1812: rarpaop_mgc_verify_reply_ack_fun() ->
 1813:     fun(M) -> 
 1814: 	    rarpaop_mgc_verify_reply_ack(M) 
 1815:     end.
 1816: -endif.
 1817: 
 1818: rarpaop_mgc_verify_reply_ack({handle_trans_ack, _, ?VERSION, ok, _}) ->
 1819:     io:format("rarpaop_mgc_verify_reply_ack -> ok~n", []),
 1820:     {ok, ok, ok};
 1821: rarpaop_mgc_verify_reply_ack({handle_trans_ack, _, ?VERSION, AS, AD} = Crap) ->
 1822:     io:format("rarpaop_mgc_verify_reply_ack -> incorrect ack-status:"
 1823: 	      "~n   AS: ~p"
 1824: 	      "~n   AD: ~p"
 1825: 	      "~n", [AS, AD]),
 1826:     ED       = cre_ErrDesc({invalid_ack_status, {AS, AD}}),
 1827:     ErrReply = {discard_ack, ED},
 1828:     {error, Crap, ErrReply};
 1829: rarpaop_mgc_verify_reply_ack(Crap) ->
 1830:     io:format("rarpaop_mgc_verify_reply_ack -> invalid ack:"
 1831: 	      "~n   Crap: ~p"
 1832: 	      "~n", [Crap]),
 1833:     ED       = cre_ErrDesc(Crap),
 1834:     ErrReply = {discard_ack, ED},
 1835:     {error, Crap, ErrReply}.
 1836: 
 1837: 
 1838: %% Disconnect verification
 1839: rarpaop_mgc_verify_handle_disconnect({handle_disconnect, CH, ?VERSION, _R}) ->
 1840:     {ok, CH, ok};
 1841: rarpaop_mgc_verify_handle_disconnect(Else) ->
 1842:     {error, Else, ok}.
 1843: 
 1844: rarpaop_mgc_service_change_reply_ar(Mid, Cid) ->
 1845:     SCRP  = cre_serviceChangeResParm(Mid),
 1846:     SCRes = cre_serviceChangeResult(SCRP),
 1847:     Root  = #megaco_term_id{id = ["root"]},
 1848:     SCR   = cre_serviceChangeReply([Root], SCRes),
 1849:     CR    = cre_cmdReply(SCR),
 1850:     AR    = cre_actionReply(Cid, [CR]),
 1851:     AR.
 1852: 
 1853: rarpaop_mgc_notify_reply_ar(Cid, TermId) ->
 1854:     NR    = cre_notifyReply([TermId]),
 1855:     CR    = cre_cmdReply(NR),
 1856:     cre_actionReply(Cid, [CR]).
 1857: 
 1858: 
 1859: %%
 1860: %% MG generator stuff
 1861: %%
 1862: -ifdef(megaco_hipe_special).
 1863: -define(rarpaop_mg_decode_msg_fun(Mod, Conf),
 1864: 	{?MODULE, decode_msg, [Mod, Conf]}).
 1865: -define(rarpaop_mg_encode_msg_fun(Mod, Conf),
 1866: 	{?MODULE, encode_msg, [Mod, Conf]}).
 1867: -define(rarpaop_mg_verify_service_change_rep_msg_fun(),
 1868: 	{?MODULE, rarpaop_mg_verify_service_change_rep_msg, []}).
 1869: -define(rarpaop_mg_verify_pending_msg_fun(TransId),
 1870: 	{?MODULE, rarpaop_mg_verify_pending_msg, [TransId]}).
 1871: -define(rarpaop_mg_verify_notify_rep_msg_fun(TransId, TermId),
 1872: 	{?MODULE, rarpaop_mg_verify_notify_rep_msg, [TransId, TermId]}).
 1873: -else.
 1874: -define(rarpaop_mg_decode_msg_fun(Mod, Conf),
 1875: 	rarpaop_mg_decode_msg_fun(Mod, Conf)).
 1876: -define(rarpaop_mg_encode_msg_fun(Mod, Conf),
 1877: 	rarpaop_mg_encode_msg_fun(Mod, Conf)).
 1878: -define(rarpaop_mg_verify_service_change_rep_msg_fun(),
 1879: 	rarpaop_mg_verify_service_change_rep_msg_fun()).
 1880: -define(rarpaop_mg_verify_pending_msg_fun(TransId),
 1881: 	rarpaop_mg_verify_pending_msg_fun(TransId)).
 1882: -define(rarpaop_mg_verify_notify_rep_msg_fun(TransId, TermId),
 1883: 	rarpaop_mg_verify_notify_rep_msg_fun(TransId, TermId)).
 1884: -endif.
 1885: 
 1886: rarpaop_mg_event_sequence(Config,
 1887:                           text, tcp) ->
 1888:     Port      = 2944, 
 1889:     EncMod    = megaco_pretty_text_encoder,
 1890:     EncConf   = [], 
 1891:     rarpaop_mg_event_sequence(Config,
 1892:                               Port, EncMod, EncConf);
 1893: rarpaop_mg_event_sequence(Config,
 1894:                           binary, tcp) ->
 1895:     Port      = 2945, 
 1896:     EncMod    = megaco_ber_encoder,
 1897:     EncConf   = [], 
 1898:     rarpaop_mg_event_sequence(Config,
 1899:                               Port, EncMod, EncConf).
 1900: 
 1901: rarpaop_mg_event_sequence(_Config,
 1902:                           Port, EncMod, EncConf) ->
 1903:     DecodeFun = ?rarpaop_mg_decode_msg_fun(EncMod, EncConf),
 1904:     EncodeFun = ?rarpaop_mg_encode_msg_fun(EncMod, EncConf),
 1905:     Mid       = {deviceName, "mg"},
 1906:     TransId = 2, 
 1907:     TermId = #megaco_term_id{id = ["00000000","00000000","01101101"]},
 1908:     ServiceChangeReq = rarpaop_mg_service_change_request_msg(Mid, 1, 0),
 1909:     NotifyReq = rarpaop_mg_notify_request_msg(Mid, TransId, 1, TermId, 1),
 1910:     Ack = rarpaop_mg_ack_msg(Mid, TransId),
 1911:     ScrVerifyFun  = ?rarpaop_mg_verify_service_change_rep_msg_fun(),
 1912:     PendVerifyFun = ?rarpaop_mg_verify_pending_msg_fun(TransId),
 1913:     NrVerifyFun   = ?rarpaop_mg_verify_notify_rep_msg_fun(TransId, TermId),
 1914:     EvSeq = [{debug,  true},
 1915:              {decode, DecodeFun},
 1916:              {encode, EncodeFun},
 1917:              {connect, Port},
 1918:              {send, "service-change-request", ServiceChangeReq},
 1919:              {expect_receive, "service-change-reply", {ScrVerifyFun, 10000}},
 1920:              {send, "notify request", NotifyReq},
 1921:              {sleep, 2000},
 1922:              {send, "notify request", NotifyReq},
 1923:              {expect_receive, "pending", {PendVerifyFun, 5000}},
 1924:              {expect_receive, "notify-reply", {NrVerifyFun, 5000}},
 1925:              {send, "reply ack", Ack},
 1926:              {expect_nothing, 11000},
 1927:              disconnect
 1928:             ],
 1929:     EvSeq.
 1930: 
 1931: -ifndef(megaco_hipe_special).
 1932: rarpaop_mg_encode_msg_fun(Mod, Conf) ->
 1933:     fun(M) ->
 1934:             encode_msg(M, Mod, Conf)
 1935:     end.
 1936: -endif.
 1937: 
 1938: -ifndef(megaco_hipe_special).
 1939: rarpaop_mg_decode_msg_fun(Mod, Conf) ->
 1940:     fun(M) ->
 1941:             decode_msg(M, Mod, Conf)
 1942:     end.
 1943: -endif.
 1944: 
 1945: -ifndef(megaco_hipe_special).
 1946: rarpaop_mg_verify_service_change_rep_msg_fun() ->
 1947:     fun(Msg) -> 
 1948: 	    (catch rarpaop_mg_verify_service_change_rep_msg(Msg)) 
 1949:     end.
 1950: -endif.
 1951: 
 1952: rarpaop_mg_verify_service_change_rep_msg(#'MegacoMessage'{mess = Mess} = M) ->
 1953:     Body = 
 1954: 	case Mess of 
 1955: 	    #'Message'{version     = _V,
 1956:                        mId         = _MgMid,
 1957:                        messageBody = MsgBody} ->
 1958: 		MsgBody;
 1959: 	    _ ->
 1960: 		throw({error, {invalid_Message, Mess}})
 1961: 	end,
 1962:     Trans = 
 1963: 	case Body of
 1964:             {transactions, [Transactions]} ->
 1965: 		Transactions;
 1966: 	    _ ->
 1967: 		throw({error, {invalid_messageBody, Body}})
 1968: 	end,
 1969:     TR = 
 1970: 	case Trans of
 1971:             {transactionReply, TransReply} ->
 1972: 		TransReply;
 1973: 	    _ ->
 1974: 		throw({error, {invalid_transactions, Trans}})
 1975: 	end,
 1976:     TRes = 
 1977: 	case TR of
 1978:             #'TransactionReply'{transactionId = _Tid,
 1979:                                 immAckRequired = asn1_NOVALUE,
 1980:                                 transactionResult = TransRes} ->
 1981: 		TransRes;
 1982: 	    _ ->
 1983: 		throw({error, {invalid_transactionReply, TR}})
 1984: 	end,
 1985:     AR = 
 1986: 	case TRes of
 1987:             {actionReplies, [ActRes]} ->
 1988: 		ActRes;
 1989: 	    _ ->
 1990: 		throw({error, {invalid_transactionResult, TRes}})
 1991: 	end,
 1992:     CR = 
 1993: 	case AR of
 1994:             #'ActionReply'{contextId       = _Cid,
 1995:                            errorDescriptor = asn1_NOVALUE,
 1996:                            contextReply    = _CtxReq,
 1997:                            commandReply    = [CmdRep]} ->
 1998: 		CmdRep;
 1999: 	    _ ->
 2000: 		throw({error, {invalid_actionReplies, AR}})
 2001: 	end,
 2002:     SCR = 
 2003: 	case CR of
 2004:             {serviceChangeReply, ServChRep} ->
 2005: 		ServChRep;
 2006: 	    _ ->
 2007: 		throw({error, {invalid_commandReply, CR}})
 2008: 	end,
 2009:     SCRes = 
 2010: 	case SCR of
 2011:             #'ServiceChangeReply'{terminationID       = _TermID,
 2012:                                   serviceChangeResult = ServChRes} ->
 2013: 		ServChRes;
 2014: 	    _ ->
 2015: 		throw({error, {invalid_serviceChangeReply, SCR}})
 2016: 	end,
 2017:     SCRP = 
 2018: 	case SCRes of
 2019:             {serviceChangeResParms, Parms} ->
 2020: 		Parms;
 2021: 	    _ ->
 2022: 		throw({error, {invalid_serviceChangeResult, SCRes}})
 2023: 	end,
 2024:     case SCRP of
 2025: 	#'ServiceChangeResParm'{serviceChangeMgcId = _MgcMid} ->
 2026:             {ok, M};
 2027: 	_ ->
 2028: 	    {error, {invalid_serviceChangeResParms, SCRP}}
 2029:     end;
 2030: rarpaop_mg_verify_service_change_rep_msg(Crap) ->
 2031:     {error, {invalid_message, Crap}}.
 2032: 
 2033: -ifndef(megaco_hipe_special).
 2034: rarpaop_mg_verify_pending_msg_fun(TransId) ->
 2035:     fun(Msg) -> 
 2036: 	    (catch rarpaop_mg_verify_pending_msg(Msg, TransId)) 
 2037:     end.
 2038: -endif.
 2039: 
 2040: rarpaop_mg_verify_pending_msg(#'MegacoMessage'{mess = Mess} = M, TransId) ->
 2041:     Body = 
 2042: 	case Mess of 
 2043: 	    #'Message'{version     = _V,
 2044:                        mId         = _MgMid,
 2045:                        messageBody = MsgBody} ->
 2046: 		MsgBody;
 2047: 	    _ ->
 2048: 		throw({error, {invalid_Message, Mess}})
 2049: 	end,
 2050:     Trans = 
 2051: 	case Body of
 2052:             {transactions, [Transactions]} ->
 2053: 		Transactions;
 2054: 	    _ ->
 2055: 		throw({error, {invalid_messageBody, Body}})
 2056: 	end,
 2057:     TP = 
 2058: 	case Trans of
 2059:             {transactionPending, TransPending} ->
 2060: 		TransPending;
 2061: 	    _ ->
 2062: 		throw({error, {invalid_transactions, Trans}})
 2063: 	end,
 2064:     case TP of
 2065: 	#'TransactionPending'{transactionId = TransId} ->
 2066: 	    {ok, M};
 2067: 	_ ->
 2068: 	    throw({error, {invalid_transactionPending, TP}})
 2069:     end;
 2070: rarpaop_mg_verify_pending_msg(Crap, _TransId) ->
 2071:     {error, {invalid_message, Crap}}.
 2072: 
 2073: -ifndef(megaco_hipe_special).
 2074: rarpaop_mg_verify_notify_rep_msg_fun(TransId, TermId) ->
 2075:     fun(Msg) -> 
 2076: 	    (catch rarpaop_mg_verify_notify_rep_msg(Msg, TransId, TermId)) 
 2077:     end.
 2078: -endif.
 2079: 
 2080: rarpaop_mg_verify_notify_rep_msg(#'MegacoMessage'{mess = Mess} = M,
 2081: 				 TransId, TermId) ->
 2082:     Body = 
 2083: 	case Mess of 
 2084: 	    #'Message'{version     = _V,
 2085:                        mId         = _MgMid,
 2086:                        messageBody = MsgBody} ->
 2087: 		MsgBody;
 2088: 	    _ ->
 2089: 		throw({error, {invalid_Message, Mess}})
 2090: 	end,
 2091:     Trans = 
 2092: 	case Body of
 2093:             {transactions, [Transactions]} ->
 2094: 		Transactions;
 2095: 	    _ ->
 2096: 		throw({error, {invalid_messageBody, Body}})
 2097: 	end,
 2098:     TR = 
 2099: 	case Trans of
 2100:             {transactionReply, TransReply} ->
 2101: 		TransReply;
 2102: 	    _ ->
 2103: 		throw({error, {invalid_transactions, Trans}})
 2104: 	end,
 2105:     TRes = 
 2106: 	case TR of
 2107:             #'TransactionReply'{transactionId     = TransId,
 2108:                                 immAckRequired    = 'NULL', % Ack
 2109:                                 transactionResult = TransRes} ->
 2110: 		TransRes;
 2111: 	    _ ->
 2112: 		throw({error, {invalid_transactionReply, TR}})
 2113: 	end,
 2114:     AR = 
 2115: 	case TRes of
 2116:             {actionReplies, [ActRes]} ->
 2117: 		ActRes;
 2118: 	    _ ->
 2119: 		throw({error, {invalid_transactionResult, TRes}})
 2120: 	end,
 2121:     CR = 
 2122: 	case AR of
 2123:             #'ActionReply'{contextId       = _Cid,
 2124:                            errorDescriptor = asn1_NOVALUE,
 2125:                            contextReply    = _CtxReq,
 2126:                            commandReply    = [CmdRep]} ->
 2127: 		CmdRep;
 2128: 	    _ ->
 2129: 		throw({error, {invalid_actionReplies, AR}})
 2130: 	end,
 2131:     NR = 
 2132: 	case CR of
 2133:             {notifyReply, NotifyRep} ->
 2134: 		NotifyRep;
 2135: 	    _ ->
 2136: 		throw({error, {invalid_commandReply, CR}})
 2137: 	end,
 2138: 
 2139:     case NR of
 2140: 	#'NotifyReply'{terminationID   = [TermId],
 2141: 		       errorDescriptor = asn1_NOVALUE} ->
 2142:             {ok, M};
 2143: 	#'NotifyReply'{terminationID   = A,
 2144: 		       errorDescriptor = B} ->
 2145: 	    throw({error, {invalid_notifyReply, 
 2146: 			   {A, TermId}, 
 2147: 			   {B, asn1_NOVALUE}}});
 2148: 	_ ->
 2149: 	    throw({error, {invalid_notifyReply, NR}})
 2150:     end;
 2151: rarpaop_mg_verify_notify_rep_msg(Crap, _TransId, _TermId) ->
 2152:     {error, {invalid_message, Crap}}.
 2153: 
 2154: rarpaop_mg_service_change_request_ar(_Mid, Cid) ->
 2155:     Prof  = cre_serviceChangeProf("resgw", 1),
 2156:     SCP   = cre_serviceChangeParm(restart, ["901 mg col boot"], Prof),
 2157:     Root  = #megaco_term_id{id = ["root"]},
 2158:     SCR   = cre_serviceChangeReq([Root], SCP),
 2159:     CMD   = cre_command(SCR),
 2160:     CR    = cre_cmdReq(CMD),
 2161:     cre_actionReq(Cid, [CR]).
 2162: 
 2163: rarpaop_mg_service_change_request_msg(Mid, TransId, Cid) ->
 2164:     AR    = rarpaop_mg_service_change_request_ar(Mid, Cid),
 2165:     TR    = cre_transReq(TransId, [AR]),
 2166:     Trans = cre_transaction(TR),
 2167:     Mess  = cre_message(?VERSION, Mid, cre_transactions([Trans])),
 2168:     cre_megacoMessage(Mess).
 2169: 
 2170: rarpaop_mg_ack_msg(Mid, TransId) ->
 2171:     TR    = cre_transRespAck(cre_transAck(TransId)),
 2172:     Trans = cre_transaction(TR),
 2173:     Mess  = cre_message(?VERSION, Mid, cre_transactions([Trans])),
 2174:     cre_megacoMessage(Mess).
 2175: 
 2176: rarpaop_mg_notify_request_ar(Rid, Tid, Cid) ->
 2177:     TT      = cre_timeNotation("19990729", "22000000"),
 2178:     Ev      = cre_obsEvent("al/of", TT),
 2179:     EvsDesc = cre_obsEvsDesc(Rid, [Ev]),
 2180:     NR      = cre_notifyReq([Tid], EvsDesc),
 2181:     CMD     = cre_command(NR),
 2182:     CR      = cre_cmdReq(CMD),
 2183:     cre_actionReq(Cid, [CR]).
 2184: 
 2185: rarpaop_mg_notify_request_msg(Mid, TransId, Rid, TermId, Cid) ->
 2186:     AR      = rarpaop_mg_notify_request_ar(Rid, TermId, Cid),
 2187:     TR      = cre_transReq(TransId, [AR]),
 2188:     Trans   = cre_transaction(TR),
 2189:     Mess    = cre_message(?VERSION, Mid, cre_transactions([Trans])),
 2190:     cre_megacoMessage(Mess).

 2195: single_trans_req_and_reply(suite) ->
 2196:     [];
 2197: single_trans_req_and_reply(doc) ->
 2198:     ["Receive a (single) transaction request and then send a "
 2199:      "reply (discard ack). "
 2200:      "The MGC is a megaco instance (megaco event sequence) and the "
 2201:      "MG is emulated (tcp event sequence)"];
 2202: single_trans_req_and_reply(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 2203:     Pre = fun() ->
 2204:                   MgcNode = make_node_name(mgc),
 2205:                   MgNode  = make_node_name(mg),
 2206:                   d("start nodes: "
 2207:                     "~n      MgcNode: ~p"
 2208:                     "~n      MgNode:  ~p", 
 2209:                     [MgcNode, MgNode]),
 2210:                   Nodes = [MgcNode, MgNode],
 2211:                   ok = ?START_NODES(Nodes, true),
 2212:                   Nodes
 2213:           end,
 2214:     Case = fun do_single_trans_req_and_reply/1,
 2215:     Post = fun(Nodes) ->
 2216:                    d("stop nodes"),
 2217:                    ?STOP_NODES(lists:reverse(Nodes))
 2218:            end,
 2219:     try_tc(strar, Pre, Case, Post).
 2220: 
 2221: do_single_trans_req_and_reply([MgcNode, MgNode]) ->
 2222:     d("[MGC] start the simulator "),
 2223:     {ok, Mgc} = megaco_test_megaco_generator:start_link("MGC", MgcNode),
 2224: 
 2225:     d("[MGC] create the event sequence"),
 2226:     MgcEvSeq = strar_mgc_event_sequence(text, tcp),
 2227: 
 2228:     i("wait some time before starting the MGC simulation"),
 2229:     sleep(1000),
 2230: 
 2231:     d("[MGC] start the simulation"),
 2232:     {ok, MgcId} = megaco_test_megaco_generator:exec(Mgc, MgcEvSeq),
 2233: 
 2234:     %% i("wait some time before starting the MG simulator"),
 2235:     %% sleep(1000),
 2236: 
 2237:     i("await MGC ready announcement"),
 2238:     receive
 2239:         announce_mgc ->
 2240:             i("received MGC ready announcement"),
 2241:             ok
 2242:     end,
 2243: 
 2244:     d("[MG] start the simulator (generator)"),
 2245:     {ok, Mg} = megaco_test_megaco_generator:start_link("MG", MgNode),
 2246: 
 2247:     d("[MG] create the event sequence"),
 2248:     MgEvSeq = strar_mg_event_sequence(text, tcp),
 2249: 
 2250:     i("wait some time before starting the MG simulation"),
 2251:     sleep(1000),
 2252: 
 2253:     d("[MG] start the simulation"),
 2254:     {ok, MgId} = megaco_test_megaco_generator:exec(Mg, MgEvSeq),
 2255: 
 2256:     d("await the generator reply(s)"),
 2257:     await_completion([MgcId, MgId], 30000),
 2258: 
 2259:     %% Tell Mgc to stop
 2260:     i("[MGC] stop generator"),
 2261:     megaco_test_megaco_generator:stop(Mgc),
 2262: 
 2263:     %% Tell Mg to stop
 2264:     i("[MG] stop generator"),
 2265:     megaco_test_megaco_generator:stop(Mg),
 2266: 
 2267:     i("done", []),
 2268:     ok.

 2294: strar_mgc_event_sequence(text, tcp) ->
 2295:     CTRL = self(),
 2296:     Mid = {deviceName,"ctrl"},
 2297:     RI = [
 2298: 	  {port,             2944},
 2299: 	  {encoding_module,  megaco_pretty_text_encoder},
 2300: 	  {encoding_config,  []},
 2301: 	  {transport_module, megaco_tcp}
 2302: 	 ],
 2303:     ConnectVerify          = ?strar_mgc_verify_handle_connect_fun(), 
 2304:     ServiceChangeReqVerify = ?strar_mgc_verify_service_change_req_fun(Mid),
 2305:     NotifyReqVerify        = ?strar_mgc_verify_notify_req_fun(),
 2306:     DiscoVerify            = ?strar_mgc_verify_handle_disconnect_fun(), 
 2307:     EvSeq = [
 2308: 	     {debug, true},
 2309: 	     {megaco_trace, disable},
 2310: 	     megaco_start,
 2311: 	     {megaco_start_user, Mid, RI, []},
 2312: 	     start_transport,
 2313: 	     listen,
 2314: 
 2315:              %% ANNOUNCE READY
 2316:              {trigger, fun() -> CTRL ! announce_mgc end}, 
 2317: 
 2318: 	     {megaco_callback, handle_connect,       ConnectVerify},
 2319: 	     {megaco_callback, handle_trans_request, ServiceChangeReqVerify},
 2320: 	     {megaco_callback, handle_trans_request, NotifyReqVerify},
 2321: 	     {megaco_callback, handle_disconnect,    DiscoVerify},
 2322: 	     {sleep, 1000},
 2323: 	     megaco_stop_user,
 2324: 	     megaco_stop
 2325: 	    ],
 2326:     EvSeq.

 2345: strar_mgc_verify_service_change_req(
 2346:   {handle_trans_request, _, ?VERSION, [AR]}, Mid) ->
 2347:     (catch strar_mgc_do_verify_service_change_req(AR, Mid));
 2348: strar_mgc_verify_service_change_req(Crap, _Mid) ->
 2349:     ED       = cre_ErrDesc(Crap),
 2350:     ErrReply = {discard_ack, ED},
 2351:     {error, Crap, ErrReply}.
 2352: 
 2353: strar_mgc_do_verify_service_change_req(AR, Mid) ->
 2354:     io:format("strar_mgc_verify_service_change_req -> entry with"
 2355: 	      "~n   AR:  ~p"
 2356: 	      "~n   Mid: ~p"
 2357: 	      "~n", [AR, Mid]),
 2358:     CR = 
 2359: 	case AR of
 2360: 	    #'ActionRequest'{commandRequests = [CmdReq]} ->
 2361: 		CmdReq;
 2362: 	    _ ->
 2363:                 Err1      = {invalid_action_request, AR},
 2364:                 ED1       = cre_ErrDesc(AR),
 2365:                 ErrReply1 = {discard_ack, ED1},
 2366:                 throw({error, Err1, ErrReply1})
 2367: 	end,
 2368:     Cmd =
 2369:         case CR of
 2370:             #'CommandRequest'{command = Command} ->
 2371:                 Command;
 2372:             _ ->
 2373:                 Err2      = {invalid_command_request, CR},
 2374:                 ED2       = cre_ErrDesc(CR),
 2375:                 ErrReply2 = {discard_ack, ED2},
 2376:                 throw({error, Err2, ErrReply2})
 2377:         end,
 2378:     {Tid, Parms} =
 2379:         case Cmd of
 2380:             {serviceChangeReq,
 2381:              #'ServiceChangeRequest'{terminationID = [TermID],
 2382:                                      serviceChangeParms = ServChParms}} ->
 2383:                 {TermID, ServChParms};
 2384:             _ ->
 2385:                 Err3      = {invalid_command, Cmd},
 2386:                 ED3       = cre_ErrDesc(Cmd),
 2387:                 ErrReply3 = {discard_ack, ED3},
 2388:                 throw({error, Err3, ErrReply3})
 2389:         end,
 2390:     case Tid of
 2391:         #megaco_term_id{contains_wildcards = false, id = ["root"]} ->
 2392:             ok;
 2393:         _ ->
 2394:             Err4      = {invalid_termination_id, Tid},
 2395:             ED4       = cre_ErrDesc(Tid),
 2396:             ErrReply4 = {discard_ack, ED4},
 2397:             throw({error, Err4, ErrReply4})
 2398:     end,
 2399:     case Parms of
 2400:         #'ServiceChangeParm'{serviceChangeMethod = restart,
 2401:                              serviceChangeReason = [[$9,$0,$1|_]]} ->
 2402:             AckData = [strar_mgc_service_change_reply_ar(Mid, 1)],
 2403:             Reply   = {discard_ack, AckData},
 2404:             {ok, AR, Reply};
 2405:         _ ->
 2406:             Err5      = {invalid_SCP, Parms},
 2407:             ED5       = cre_ErrDesc(Parms),
 2408:             ErrReply5 = {discard_ack, ED5},
 2409:             {error, Err5, ErrReply5}
 2410:     end.

 2419: strar_mgc_verify_notify_request({handle_trans_request, _, ?VERSION, [AR]}) ->
 2420:     (catch strar_mgc_do_verify_notify_request(AR));
 2421: strar_mgc_verify_notify_request(Crap) ->
 2422:     ED       = cre_ErrDesc(Crap),
 2423:     ErrReply = {discard_ack, ED},
 2424:     {error, Crap, ErrReply}.
 2425:     
 2426: strar_mgc_do_verify_notify_request(AR) ->
 2427:     io:format("strar_mgc_do_verify_notify_request -> ok"
 2428: 	      "~n   AR: ~p~n", [AR]),
 2429:     {Cid, CR} =
 2430: 	case AR of
 2431: 	    #'ActionRequest'{contextId       = CtxID, 
 2432: 			     commandRequests = [CmdReq]} when (CtxID == 1) or
 2433: 							      (CtxID == 2) ->
 2434: 		{CtxID, CmdReq};
 2435: 	    _ ->
 2436:                 Err1      = {invalid_action_request, AR},
 2437:                 ED1       = cre_ErrDesc(AR),
 2438:                 ErrReply1 = {discard_ack, ED1},
 2439:                 throw({error, Err1, ErrReply1})
 2440:         end,
 2441:     Cmd =
 2442: 	case CR of
 2443: 	    #'CommandRequest'{command = Command} ->
 2444: 		Command;
 2445: 	    _ ->
 2446:                 Err2      = {invalid_command_request, CR},
 2447:                 ED2       = cre_ErrDesc(CR),
 2448:                 ErrReply2 = {discard_ack, ED2},
 2449:                 throw({error, Err2, ErrReply2})
 2450:         end,
 2451:     NR =
 2452:         case Cmd of
 2453: 	    {notifyReq, NotifReq} ->
 2454: 		NotifReq;
 2455: 	    _ ->
 2456:                 Err3      = {invalid_command, Cmd},
 2457:                 ED3       = cre_ErrDesc(Cmd),
 2458:                 ErrReply3 = {discard_ack, ED3},
 2459:                 throw({error, Err3, ErrReply3})
 2460:         end,
 2461:     {Tid, OED} =
 2462:         case NR of
 2463:             #'NotifyRequest'{terminationID            = [TermID],
 2464:                              observedEventsDescriptor = ObsEvsDesc,
 2465:                              errorDescriptor          = asn1_NOVALUE} ->
 2466:                 {TermID, ObsEvsDesc};
 2467:             _ ->
 2468:                 Err4      = {invalid_NR, NR},
 2469:                 ED4       = cre_ErrDesc(NR),
 2470:                 ErrReply4 = {discard_ack, ED4},
 2471:                 throw({error, Err4, ErrReply4})
 2472:         end,
 2473:     OE =
 2474: 	case OED of
 2475: 	    #'ObservedEventsDescriptor'{observedEventLst = [ObsEvLst]} ->
 2476: 		ObsEvLst;
 2477:             _ ->
 2478:                 Err5      = {invalid_OED, OED},
 2479:                 ED5       = cre_ErrDesc(NR),
 2480:                 ErrReply5 = {discard_ack, ED5},
 2481:                 throw({error, Err5, ErrReply5})
 2482:         end,
 2483:     case OE of
 2484: 	#'ObservedEvent'{eventName = "al/of"} ->
 2485:             Replies = [strar_mgc_notify_reply_ar(Cid, Tid)],
 2486:             Reply   = {discard_ack, Replies},
 2487:             {ok, AR, Reply};
 2488:         _ ->
 2489:             Err6      = {invalid_OE, OE},
 2490:             ED6       = cre_ErrDesc(OE),
 2491:             ErrReply6 = {discard_ack, ED6},
 2492:             {error, Err6, ErrReply6}
 2493:     end.

 2549:     Mid = {deviceName, "mg"},
 2550:     RI = [

 2553: 	  {encoding_config,  []},

 2555: 	 ],
 2556:     ServiceChangeReq = [strar_mg_service_change_request_ar(Mid, 1)],
 2557:     Tid = #megaco_term_id{id = ["00000000","00000000","01101101"]},
 2558:     NR = fun(Cid, Rid) ->
 2559: 		 [strar_mg_notify_request_ar(Rid, Tid, Cid)]
 2560: 	 end,
 2561:     ConnectVerify            = ?strar_mg_verify_handle_connect_fun(), 
 2562:     ServiceChangeReplyVerify = ?strar_mg_verify_service_change_reply_fun(), 
 2563:     NotifyReplyVerify        = ?strar_mg_verify_notify_reply_fun(), 
 2564:     EvSeq = [
 2565: 	     {debug, true},
 2566: 	     megaco_start,
 2567: 	     {megaco_start_user, Mid, RI, []},
 2568: 	     start_transport,
 2569: 	     {megaco_trace, disable},
 2570: 	     {megaco_system_info, users},

 2574: 	     megaco_connect,
 2575: 	     {megaco_cast, ServiceChangeReq, []},
 2576: 	     {megaco_callback, handle_connect, ConnectVerify}, 
 2577: 	     {megaco_callback, handle_trans_reply, ServiceChangeReplyVerify},
 2578: 	     {sleep, 1000},
 2579: 	     {megaco_system_info, users},
 2580: 	     {megaco_system_info, connections},
 2581: 	     {sleep, 1000},
 2582: 	     {megaco_conn_info, all},
 2583: 	     {megaco_cast, NR(1,1), []},
 2584: 	     {megaco_callback, handle_trans_reply, NotifyReplyVerify},
 2585: 	     {sleep, 3000},
 2586: 	     megaco_stop_user,
 2587: 	     megaco_stop,
 2588: 	     {sleep, 1000}
 2589: 	    ],
 2590:     EvSeq.
