 2615: strar_mg_verify_service_change_reply(
 2616:   {handle_trans_reply, _CH, ?VERSION, {ok, [AR]}, _}) ->
 2617:     (catch strar_mg_do_verify_service_change_reply(AR));
 2618: strar_mg_verify_service_change_reply(Crap) ->
 2619:     {error, Crap, ok}.
 2620: 
 2621: strar_mg_do_verify_service_change_reply(AR) ->
 2622:     io:format("strar_mg_verify_service_change_reply -> ok"
 2623: 	      "~n   AR: ~p~n", [AR]),
 2624:     CR = 
 2625: 	case AR of
 2626: 	    #'ActionReply'{commandReply = [CmdRep]} ->
 2627: 		CmdRep;
 2628: 	    _ ->
 2629: 		Reason1 = {invalid_action_reply, AR},
 2630: 		throw({error, Reason1, ok})
 2631: 	end,
 2632:     SCR = 
 2633: 	case CR of
 2634: 	    {serviceChangeReply, ServChRep} ->
 2635: 		ServChRep;
 2636: 	    _ ->
 2637: 		Reason2 = {invalid_command_reply, CR},
 2638: 		throw({error, Reason2, ok})
 2639: 	end,
 2640:     {Tid, SCRes} = 
 2641: 	case SCR of
 2642: 	    #'ServiceChangeReply'{terminationID       = [TermID],
 2643: 				  serviceChangeResult = Res} ->
 2644: 		{TermID, Res};
 2645: 	    _ ->
 2646: 		Reason3 = {invalid_service_change_reply, SCR},
 2647: 		throw({error, Reason3, ok})
 2648: 	end,
 2649:     case Tid of
 2650: 	#megaco_term_id{contains_wildcards = false, id = ["root"]} ->
 2651: 	    ok;
 2652: 	_ ->
 2653: 	    Reason4 = {invalid_termination_id, Tid},
 2654: 	    throw({error, Reason4, ok})
 2655:     end,
 2656:     SCRParm = 
 2657: 	case SCRes of
 2658: 	    {serviceChangeResParms, ServChResParms} ->
 2659: 		ServChResParms;
 2660: 	    _ ->
 2661: 		Reason5 = {invalid_serviceChangeResult, SCRes},
 2662: 		throw({error, Reason5, ok})
 2663: 	end,
 2664:     case SCRParm of
 2665: 	#'ServiceChangeResParm'{serviceChangeMgcId = _RemoteMid} ->
 2666: 	    {ok, AR, ok};
 2667: 	_ ->
 2668: 	    Reason6 = {invalid_service_change_result, SCRParm},
 2669: 	    {error, Reason6, ok}
 2670:     end.
 2671:

 2689: strar_mg_service_change_request_ar(_Mid, Cid) ->
 2690:     Prof  = cre_serviceChangeProf("resgw", 1),
 2691:     SCP   = cre_serviceChangeParm(restart, ["901 mg col boot"], Prof),
 2692:     Root  = #megaco_term_id{id = ["root"]},
 2693:     SCR   = cre_serviceChangeReq([Root], SCP),
 2694:     CMD   = cre_command(SCR),
 2695:     CR    = cre_cmdReq(CMD),
 2696:     cre_actionReq(Cid, [CR]).
 2697: 
 2698: strar_mg_notify_request_ar(Rid, Tid, Cid) ->
 2699:     TT      = cre_timeNotation("19990729", "22000000"),
 2700:     Ev      = cre_obsEvent("al/of", TT),
 2701:     EvsDesc = cre_obsEvsDesc(Rid, [Ev]),
 2702:     NR      = cre_notifyReq([Tid], EvsDesc),
 2703:     CMD     = cre_command(NR),
 2704:     CR      = cre_cmdReq(CMD),
 2705:     cre_actionReq(Cid, [CR]).

 2709: 
 2710: single_trans_req_and_reply_sendopts(suite) ->
 2711:     [];
 2712: single_trans_req_and_reply_sendopts(doc) ->
 2713:     ["Receive a (single) transaction request and then send a "
 2714:      "reply with handle_ack and a reply_timer in sendoptions. "
 2715:      "The MGC is a megaco instance (megaco event sequence) and the "
 2716:      "MG is emulated (tcp event sequence)"];
 2717: single_trans_req_and_reply_sendopts(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 2718:     Pre = fun() ->
 2719:                   %% <CONDITIONAL-SKIP>
 2720:                   Skippable = [{unix, [darwin, linux]}],
 2721:                   Condition = fun() -> ?OS_BASED_SKIP(Skippable) end,
 2722:                   ?NON_PC_TC_MAYBE_SKIP(Config, Condition),
 2723:                   %% </CONDITIONAL-SKIP>
 2724: 
 2725:                   MgcNode = make_node_name(mgc),
 2726:                   MgNode  = make_node_name(mg),
 2727:                   d("start nodes: "
 2728:                     "~n      MgcNode: ~p"
 2729:                     "~n      MgNode:  ~p", 
 2730:                     [MgcNode, MgNode]),
 2731:                   Nodes = [MgcNode, MgNode],
 2732:                   ok = ?START_NODES(Nodes, true),
 2733:                   Nodes
 2734:           end,
 2735:     Case = fun do_single_trans_req_and_reply_sendopts/1,
 2736:     Post = fun(Nodes) ->
 2737:                    d("stop nodes"),
 2738:                    ?STOP_NODES(lists:reverse(Nodes))
 2739:            end,
 2740:     try_tc(straro, Pre, Case, Post).
 2741:     
 2742: do_single_trans_req_and_reply_sendopts([MgcNode, MgNode]) ->
 2743:     d("[MGC] start the simulator "),
 2744:     {ok, Mgc} = megaco_test_megaco_generator:start_link("MGC", MgcNode),
 2745: 
 2746:     d("[MGC] create the event sequence"),
 2747:     MgcEvSeq = straro_mgc_event_sequence(text, tcp),
 2748: 
 2749:     i("wait some time before starting the MGC simulation"),
 2750:     sleep(1000),
 2751: 
 2752:     d("[MGC] start the simulation"),
 2753:     {ok, MgcId} = megaco_test_megaco_generator:exec(Mgc, MgcEvSeq),
 2754: 
 2755:     %% i("wait some time before starting the MG simulator"),
 2756:     %% sleep(1000),
 2757: 
 2758:     i("await MGC ready announcement"),
 2759:     receive
 2760:         announce_mgc ->
 2761:             i("received MGC ready announcement"),
 2762:             ok
 2763:     end,
 2764: 
 2765:     d("[MG] start the simulator (generator)"),
 2766:     {ok, Mg} = megaco_test_megaco_generator:start_link("MG", MgNode),
 2767: 
 2768:     d("[MG] create the event sequence"),
 2769:     MgEvSeq = straro_mg_event_sequence(text, tcp),
 2770: 
 2771:     i("wait some time before starting the MG simulation"),
 2772:     sleep(1000),
 2773: 
 2774:     d("[MG] start the simulation"),
 2775:     {ok, MgId} = megaco_test_megaco_generator:exec(Mg, MgEvSeq),
 2776: 
 2777:     d("await the generator reply(s)"),
 2778:     await_completion([MgcId, MgId], 30000),
 2779: 
 2780:     %% Tell Mgc to stop
 2781:     i("[MGC] stop generator"),
 2782:     megaco_test_megaco_generator:stop(Mgc),
 2783: 
 2784:     %% Tell Mg to stop
 2785:     i("[MG] stop generator"),
 2786:     megaco_test_megaco_generator:stop(Mg),
 2787: 
 2788:     i("done", []),
 2789:     ok.
 2790:

 2815: straro_mgc_event_sequence(text, tcp) ->
 2816:     CTRL = self(),
 2817:     Mid = {deviceName,"ctrl"},
 2818:     RI = [
 2819: 	  {port,             2944},
 2820: 	  {encoding_module,  megaco_pretty_text_encoder},
 2821: 	  {encoding_config,  []},
 2822: 	  {transport_module, megaco_tcp}
 2823: 	 ],
 2824:     ConnectVerify          = ?straro_mgc_verify_handle_connect_fun(), 
 2825:     ServiceChangeReqVerify = ?straro_mgc_verify_service_change_req_fun(Mid),
 2826:     NotifyReqVerify        = ?straro_mgc_verify_notify_req_fun(),
 2827:     TransAckVerify         = ?straro_mgc_verify_handle_trans_ack_fun(), 
 2828:     EvSeq = [
 2829: 	     {debug, true},
 2830: 	     {megaco_trace, disable},
 2831: 	     megaco_start,
 2832: 	     {megaco_start_user, Mid, RI, []},
 2833: 	     start_transport,
 2834: 	     listen,
 2835: 
 2836:              %% ANNOUNCE READY
 2837:              {trigger, fun() -> CTRL ! announce_mgc end}, 
 2838: 
 2839: 	     {megaco_callback, handle_connect,       ConnectVerify},
 2840: 	     {megaco_callback, handle_trans_request, ServiceChangeReqVerify},
 2841: 	     {megaco_callback, handle_trans_request, NotifyReqVerify},
 2842: 	     {megaco_callback, handle_trans_ack,     TransAckVerify},
 2843: 	     megaco_stop_user,
 2844: 	     megaco_stop
 2845: 	    ],
 2846:     EvSeq.

 2865: straro_mgc_verify_service_change_req(
 2866:   {handle_trans_request, _, ?VERSION, [AR]}, Mid) ->
 2867:     (catch straro_mgc_do_verify_service_change_req(AR, Mid));
 2868: straro_mgc_verify_service_change_req(Crap, _Mid) ->
 2869:     ED       = cre_ErrDesc(Crap),
 2870:     ErrReply = {discard_ack, ED},
 2871:     {error, Crap, ErrReply}.
 2872: 
 2873: straro_mgc_do_verify_service_change_req(AR, Mid) ->
 2874:     io:format("straro_mgc_do_verify_service_change_req -> ok"
 2875: 	      "~n   AR: ~p~n", [AR]),
 2876:     CR = 
 2877: 	case AR of
 2878: 	    #'ActionRequest'{commandRequests = [CmdReq]} ->
 2879: 		CmdReq;
 2880: 	    _ ->
 2881:                 Err1      = {invalid_action_request, AR},
 2882:                 ED1       = cre_ErrDesc(AR),
 2883:                 ErrReply1 = {discard_ack, ED1},
 2884:                 throw({error, Err1, ErrReply1})
 2885: 	end,
 2886:     Cmd =
 2887:         case CR of
 2888:             #'CommandRequest'{command = Command} ->
 2889:                 Command;
 2890:             _ ->
 2891:                 Err2      = {invalid_command_request, CR},
 2892:                 ED2       = cre_ErrDesc(CR),
 2893:                 ErrReply2 = {discard_ack, ED2},
 2894:                 throw({error, Err2, ErrReply2})
 2895:         end,
 2896:     {Tid, Parms} =
 2897:         case Cmd of
 2898:             {serviceChangeReq,
 2899:              #'ServiceChangeRequest'{terminationID = [TermID],
 2900:                                      serviceChangeParms = ServChParms}} ->
 2901:                 {TermID, ServChParms};
 2902:             _ ->
 2903:                 Err3      = {invalid_command, Cmd},
 2904:                 ED3       = cre_ErrDesc(Cmd),
 2905:                 ErrReply3 = {discard_ack, ED3},
 2906:                 throw({error, Err3, ErrReply3})
 2907:         end,
 2908:     case Tid of
 2909:         #megaco_term_id{contains_wildcards = false, id = ["root"]} ->
 2910:             ok;
 2911:         _ ->
 2912:             Err4      = {invalid_termination_id, Tid},
 2913:             ED4       = cre_ErrDesc(Tid),
 2914:             ErrReply4 = {discard_ack, ED4},
 2915:             throw({error, Err4, ErrReply4})
 2916:     end,
 2917:     case Parms of
 2918:         #'ServiceChangeParm'{serviceChangeMethod = restart,
 2919:                              serviceChangeReason = [[$9,$0,$1|_]]} ->
 2920:             AckData = [straro_mgc_service_change_reply_ar(Mid, 1)],
 2921:             Reply   = {discard_ack, AckData},
 2922:             {ok, AR, Reply};
 2923:         _ ->
 2924:             Err5      = {invalid_SCP, Parms},
 2925:             ED5       = cre_ErrDesc(Parms),
 2926:             ErrReply5 = {discard_ack, ED5},
 2927:             {error, Err5, ErrReply5}
 2928:     end.

 2937: straro_mgc_verify_notify_request({handle_trans_request, _, ?VERSION, [AR]}) ->
 2938:     (catch straro_mgc_do_verify_notify_request(AR));
 2939: straro_mgc_verify_notify_request(Crap) ->
 2940:     ED       = cre_ErrDesc(Crap),
 2941:     ErrReply = {discard_ack, ED},
 2942:     {error, Crap, ErrReply}.
 2943:     
 2944: straro_mgc_do_verify_notify_request(AR) ->
 2945:     io:format("straro_mgc_do_verify_notify_request -> ok"
 2946: 	      "~n   AR: ~p~n", [AR]),
 2947:     {Cid, CR} =
 2948: 	case AR of
 2949: 	    #'ActionRequest'{contextId       = CtxID, 
 2950: 			     commandRequests = [CmdReq]} when (CtxID == 1) or
 2951: 							      (CtxID == 2) ->
 2952: 		{CtxID, CmdReq};
 2953: 	    _ ->
 2954:                 Err1      = {invalid_action_request, AR},
 2955:                 ED1       = cre_ErrDesc(AR),
 2956:                 ErrReply1 = {discard_ack, ED1},
 2957:                 throw({error, Err1, ErrReply1})
 2958:         end,
 2959:     Cmd =
 2960: 	case CR of
 2961: 	    #'CommandRequest'{command = Command} ->
 2962: 		Command;
 2963: 	    _ ->
 2964:                 Err2      = {invalid_command_request, CR},
 2965:                 ED2       = cre_ErrDesc(CR),
 2966:                 ErrReply2 = {discard_ack, ED2},
 2967:                 throw({error, Err2, ErrReply2})
 2968:         end,
 2969:     NR =
 2970:         case Cmd of
 2971: 	    {notifyReq, NotifReq} ->
 2972: 		NotifReq;
 2973: 	    _ ->
 2974:                 Err3      = {invalid_command, Cmd},
 2975:                 ED3       = cre_ErrDesc(Cmd),
 2976:                 ErrReply3 = {discard_ack, ED3},
 2977:                 throw({error, Err3, ErrReply3})
 2978:         end,
 2979:     {Tid, OED} =
 2980:         case NR of
 2981:             #'NotifyRequest'{terminationID            = [TermID],
 2982:                              observedEventsDescriptor = ObsEvsDesc,
 2983:                              errorDescriptor          = asn1_NOVALUE} ->
 2984:                 {TermID, ObsEvsDesc};
 2985:             _ ->
 2986:                 Err4      = {invalid_NR, NR},
 2987:                 ED4       = cre_ErrDesc(NR),
 2988:                 ErrReply4 = {discard_ack, ED4},
 2989:                 throw({error, Err4, ErrReply4})
 2990:         end,
 2991:     OE =
 2992: 	case OED of
 2993: 	    #'ObservedEventsDescriptor'{observedEventLst = [ObsEvLst]} ->
 2994: 		ObsEvLst;
 2995:             _ ->
 2996:                 Err5      = {invalid_OED, OED},
 2997:                 ED5       = cre_ErrDesc(NR),
 2998:                 ErrReply5 = {discard_ack, ED5},
 2999:                 throw({error, Err5, ErrReply5})
 3000:         end,
 3001:     case OE of
 3002: 	#'ObservedEvent'{eventName = "al/of"} ->
 3003:             Replies = [straro_mgc_notify_reply_ar(Cid, Tid)],
 3004: 	    SendOpts = [{protocol_version, 99}],
 3005:             Reply   = {{handle_ack, get(tc)}, Replies, SendOpts},
 3006:             {ok, AR, Reply};
 3007:         _ ->
 3008:             Err6      = {invalid_OE, OE},
 3009:             ED6       = cre_ErrDesc(OE),
 3010:             ErrReply6 = {discard_ack, ED6},
 3011:             {error, Err6, ErrReply6}
 3012:     end.
 3013:

 3104: straro_mg_event_sequence(text, tcp) ->
 3105:     Mid = {deviceName, "mg"},
 3106:     RI = [
 3107: 	  {port,             2944},
 3108: 	  {encoding_module,  megaco_pretty_text_encoder},
 3109: 	  {encoding_config,  []},
 3110: 	  {transport_module, megaco_tcp}
 3111: 	 ],
 3112:     ServiceChangeReq = [straro_mg_service_change_request_ar(Mid, 1)],
 3113:     Tid = #megaco_term_id{id = ["00000000","00000000","01101101"]},
 3114:     NR = fun(Cid, Rid) ->
 3115: 		 [straro_mg_notify_request_ar(Rid, Tid, Cid)]
 3116: 	 end,
 3117:     ConnectVerify            = ?straro_mg_verify_handle_connect_fun(), 
 3118:     ServiceChangeReplyVerify = ?straro_mg_verify_service_change_reply_fun(), 
 3119:     DiscoVerify              = ?straro_mg_verify_handle_disconnect_fun(), 
 3120: %%     ConnectVerify            = straro_mg_verify_handle_connect_fun(), 
 3121: %%     DiscoVerify              = fun straro_mg_verify_handle_disconnect/1,
 3122: %%     ServiceChangeReplyVerify = straro_mg_verify_service_change_reply_fun(), 
 3123:     EvSeq = [
 3124: 	     {debug, true},
 3125: 	     megaco_start,
 3126: 	     {megaco_start_user, Mid, RI, []},
 3127: 	     start_transport,
 3128: 	     {megaco_trace, disable},
 3129: 	     {megaco_system_info, users},
 3130: 	     {megaco_system_info, connections},
 3131: 	     connect,
 3132: 	     {megaco_callback, handle_connect, ConnectVerify},
 3133: 	     megaco_connect,
 3134: 	     {megaco_cast, ServiceChangeReq, []},
 3135: 	     {megaco_callback, handle_connect, ConnectVerify}, 
 3136: 	     {megaco_callback, handle_trans_reply, ServiceChangeReplyVerify},
 3137: 	     {sleep, 1000},
 3138: 	     {megaco_system_info, users},
 3139: 	     {megaco_system_info, connections},
 3140: 	     {sleep, 1000},
 3141: 	     {megaco_conn_info, all},
 3142: 	     {megaco_cast, NR(1,1), []},
 3143: 	     {megaco_callback, handle_disconnect, DiscoVerify}, 
 3144: 	     megaco_stop_user,
 3145: 	     megaco_stop,
 3146: 	     {sleep, 1000}
 3147: 	    ],
 3148:     EvSeq.

 3185: straro_mg_verify_service_change_reply(
 3186:   {handle_trans_reply, _CH, ?VERSION, {ok, [AR]}, _}) ->
 3187:     (catch straro_mg_do_verify_service_change_reply(AR));
 3188: straro_mg_verify_service_change_reply(Crap) ->
 3189:     {error, Crap, ok}.
 3190: 
 3191: straro_mg_do_verify_service_change_reply(AR) ->
 3192:     io:format("straro_mg_verify_service_change_reply -> ok"
 3193: 	      "~n   AR: ~p~n", [AR]),
 3194:     CR = 
 3195: 	case AR of
 3196: 	    #'ActionReply'{commandReply = [CmdRep]} ->
 3197: 		CmdRep;
 3198: 	    _ ->
 3199: 		Reason1 = {invalid_action_reply, AR},
 3200: 		throw({error, Reason1, ok})
 3201: 	end,
 3202:     SCR = 
 3203: 	case CR of
 3204: 	    {serviceChangeReply, ServChRep} ->
 3205: 		ServChRep;
 3206: 	    _ ->
 3207: 		Reason2 = {invalid_command_reply, CR},
 3208: 		throw({error, Reason2, ok})
 3209: 	end,
 3210:     {Tid, SCRes} = 
 3211: 	case SCR of
 3212: 	    #'ServiceChangeReply'{terminationID       = [TermID],
 3213: 				  serviceChangeResult = Res} ->
 3214: 		{TermID, Res};
 3215: 	    _ ->
 3216: 		Reason3 = {invalid_service_change_reply, SCR},
 3217: 		throw({error, Reason3, ok})
 3218: 	end,
 3219:     case Tid of
 3220: 	#megaco_term_id{contains_wildcards = false, id = ["root"]} ->
 3221: 	    ok;
 3222: 	_ ->
 3223: 	    Reason4 = {invalid_termination_id, Tid},
 3224: 	    throw({error, Reason4, ok})
 3225:     end,
 3226:     SCRParm = 
 3227: 	case SCRes of
 3228: 	    {serviceChangeResParms, ServChResParms} ->
 3229: 		ServChResParms;
 3230: 	    _ ->
 3231: 		Reason5 = {invalid_serviceChangeResult, SCRes},
 3232: 		throw({error, Reason5, ok})
 3233: 	end,
 3234:     case SCRParm of
 3235: 	#'ServiceChangeResParm'{serviceChangeMgcId = _RemoteMid} ->
 3236: 	    {ok, AR, ok};
 3237: 	_ ->
 3238: 	    Reason6 = {invalid_service_change_result, SCRParm},
 3239: 	    {error, Reason6, ok}
 3240:     end.
 3241:

 3259: straro_mg_service_change_request_ar(_Mid, Cid) ->
 3260:     Prof  = cre_serviceChangeProf("resgw", 1),
 3261:     SCP   = cre_serviceChangeParm(restart, ["901 mg col boot"], Prof),
 3262:     Root  = #megaco_term_id{id = ["root"]},
 3263:     SCR   = cre_serviceChangeReq([Root], SCP),
 3264:     CMD   = cre_command(SCR),
 3265:     CR    = cre_cmdReq(CMD),
 3266:     cre_actionReq(Cid, [CR]).
 3267: 
 3268: straro_mg_notify_request_ar(Rid, Tid, Cid) ->
 3269:     TT      = cre_timeNotation("19990729", "22000000"),
 3270:     Ev      = cre_obsEvent("al/of", TT),
 3271:     EvsDesc = cre_obsEvsDesc(Rid, [Ev]),
 3272:     NR      = cre_notifyReq([Tid], EvsDesc),
 3273:     CMD     = cre_command(NR),
 3274:     CR      = cre_cmdReq(CMD),
 3275:     cre_actionReq(Cid, [CR]).

 3279: 
 3280: request_and_reply_and_ack(suite) ->
 3281:     [];
 3282: request_and_reply_and_ack(doc) ->
 3283:     ["This test case tests that megaco correctly handles three-way-handshake"];
 3284: request_and_reply_and_ack(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 3285:     Pre = fun() ->
 3286:                   MgcNode = make_node_name(mgc),
 3287:                   MgNode  = make_node_name(mg),
 3288:                   d("start nodes: "
 3289:                     "~n   MgcNode: ~p"
 3290:                     "~n   MgNode:  ~p",
 3291:                     [MgcNode, MgNode]),
 3292:                   Nodes = [MgcNode, MgNode],
 3293:                   ok = ?START_NODES(Nodes, true),
 3294:                   Nodes
 3295:           end,
 3296:     Case = fun(Nodes) ->
 3297:                    do_request_and_reply_and_ack(Config, Nodes)
 3298:            end,
 3299:     Post = fun(Nodes) ->
 3300:                    d("stop nodes"),
 3301:                    ?STOP_NODES(lists:reverse(Nodes))
 3302:            end,
 3303:     try_tc(raraa, Pre, Case, Post).     
 3304: 
 3305: do_request_and_reply_and_ack(Config,
 3306:                              [MgcNode, MgNode]) ->
 3307:     d("[MGC] start the simulator "),
 3308:     {ok, Mgc} = megaco_test_megaco_generator:start_link("MGC", MgcNode),
 3309: 
 3310:     d("[MGC] create the event sequence"),
 3311:     MgcEvSeq = raraa_mgc_event_sequence(Config,
 3312:                                         text, tcp),
 3313: 
 3314:     i("wait some time before starting the MGC simulation"),
 3315:     sleep(1000),
 3316: 
 3317:     d("[MGC] start the simulation"),
 3318:     {ok, MgcId} = megaco_test_megaco_generator:exec(Mgc, MgcEvSeq),
 3319: 
 3320:     %% i("wait some time before starting the MG simulator"),
 3321:     %% sleep(1000),
 3322: 
 3323:     i("await MGC ready announcement"),
 3324:     receive
 3325:         announce_mgc ->
 3326:             i("received MGC ready announcement"),
 3327:             ok
 3328:     end,
 3329: 
 3330:     d("[MG] start the simulator (generator)"),
 3331:     {ok, Mg} = megaco_test_tcp_generator:start_link("MG", MgNode),
 3332: 
 3333:     d("[MG] create the event sequence"),
 3334:     MgEvSeq = raraa_mg_event_sequence(text, tcp),
 3335: 
 3336:     i("wait some time before starting the MG simulation"),
 3337:     sleep(1000),
 3338: 
 3339:     d("[MG] start the simulation"),
 3340:     {ok, MgId} = megaco_test_tcp_generator:exec(Mg, MgEvSeq),
 3341: 
 3342:     d("await the generator reply(s)"),
 3343:     await_completion([MgcId, MgId]),
 3344: 
 3345:     %% Tell Mgc to stop
 3346:     i("[MGC] stop generator"),
 3347:     megaco_test_megaco_generator:stop(Mgc),
 3348: 
 3349:     %% Tell Mg to stop
 3350:     i("[MG] stop generator"),
 3351:     megaco_test_tcp_generator:stop(Mg),
 3352: 
 3353:     i("done", []),
 3354:     ok.
 3355:

 3385: raraa_mgc_event_sequence(Config,
 3386:                          text, tcp) ->
 3387:     CTRL = self(),
 3388:     Mid = {deviceName,"ctrl"},
 3389:     RI = [
 3390:           {port,             2944},
 3391:           {encoding_module,  megaco_pretty_text_encoder},
 3392:           {encoding_config,  []},
 3393:           {transport_module, megaco_tcp}
 3394:          ],
 3395:     ConnectVerify = ?raraa_mgc_verify_handle_connect_fun(), 
 3396:     ScrVerify     = ?raraa_mgc_verify_service_change_req_fun(Mid),
 3397:     NrVerify      = ?raraa_mgc_verify_notify_req_fun(),
 3398:     AckVerify     = ?raraa_mgc_verify_handle_trans_ack_fun(),
 3399:     DiscoVerify   = ?raraa_mgc_verify_handle_disconnect_fun(), 
 3400:     EvSeq = [
 3401:              {debug, true},
 3402:              {megaco_trace, disable},
 3403:              ?MEGACO_TRACE(Config, max), % {megaco_trace, max},
 3404:              megaco_start,
 3405:              {megaco_start_user, Mid, RI, []},
 3406:              {megaco_update_user_info, sent_pending_limit, 100},
 3407:              start_transport,
 3408:              listen,
 3409: 
 3410:              %% ANNOUNCE READY
 3411:              {trigger, fun() -> CTRL ! announce_mgc end}, 
 3412: 
 3413:              {megaco_callback, handle_connect,           ConnectVerify},
 3414:              {megaco_conn_info, all},
 3415:              {megaco_callback, handle_trans_request,     ScrVerify},
 3416: 	     {megaco_callback, handle_trans_request,     NrVerify},
 3417: 	     {megaco_callback, handle_trans_ack,         AckVerify},
 3418:              {megaco_callback, handle_disconnect,        DiscoVerify},
 3419:              megaco_stop_user,
 3420:              megaco_stop
 3421:             ],
 3422:     EvSeq.

 3438: raraa_mgc_verify_service_change_req(
 3439:   {handle_trans_request, _, ?VERSION, [AR]}, Mid) ->
 3440:     (catch raraa_do_verify_service_change_req(AR, Mid));
 3441: raraa_mgc_verify_service_change_req(Crap, _Mid) ->
 3442:     ED       = cre_ErrDesc(Crap),
 3443:     ErrReply = {discard_ack, ED},
 3444:     {error, Crap, ErrReply}.
 3445: 
 3446: raraa_do_verify_service_change_req(AR, Mid) ->
 3447:     io:format("raraa_mgc_verify_service_change_req -> entry with"
 3448: 	      "~n   AR: ~p"
 3449: 	      "~n   Mid: ~p"
 3450: 	      "~n", [AR, Mid]),
 3451:     CR = 
 3452: 	case AR of
 3453: 	    #'ActionRequest'{commandRequests = [CmdReq]} ->
 3454: 		CmdReq;
 3455: 	    _ ->
 3456: 		Err1      = {invalid_action_request, AR},
 3457: 		ED1       = cre_ErrDesc(AR),
 3458: 		ErrReply1 = {discard_ack, ED1},
 3459: 		throw({error, Err1, ErrReply1})
 3460: 	end,
 3461:     Cmd = 
 3462: 	case CR of
 3463: 	    #'CommandRequest'{command = Command} ->
 3464: 		Command; 
 3465: 	    _ ->
 3466: 		Err2      = {invalid_command_request, CR},
 3467: 		ED2       = cre_ErrDesc(CR),
 3468: 		ErrReply2 = {discard_ack, ED2},
 3469: 		throw({error, Err2, ErrReply2})
 3470: 	end,
 3471:     {Tid, Parms} = 
 3472: 	case Cmd of
 3473: 	    {serviceChangeReq, 
 3474: 	     #'ServiceChangeRequest'{terminationID = [TermID],
 3475: 				     serviceChangeParms = ServChParms}} ->
 3476: 		{TermID, ServChParms};
 3477: 	    _ ->
 3478: 		Err3      = {invalid_command, Cmd},
 3479: 		ED3       = cre_ErrDesc(Cmd),
 3480: 		ErrReply3 = {discard_ack, ED3},
 3481: 		throw({error, Err3, ErrReply3})
 3482: 	end,
 3483:     case Tid of
 3484: 	#megaco_term_id{contains_wildcards = false, id = ["root"]} ->
 3485: 	    ok;
 3486: 	_ ->
 3487: 	    Err4      = {invalid_termination_id, Tid},
 3488: 	    ED4       = cre_ErrDesc(Tid),
 3489: 	    ErrReply4 = {discard_ack, ED4},
 3490: 	    throw({error, Err4, ErrReply4})
 3491:     end,
 3492:     case Parms of
 3493: 	#'ServiceChangeParm'{serviceChangeMethod = restart,
 3494: 			     serviceChangeReason = [[$9,$0,$1|_]]} ->
 3495: 	    AckData = [raraa_mgc_service_change_reply_ar(Mid, 1)], 
 3496: 	    Reply   = {discard_ack, AckData},
 3497: 	    {ok, AR, Reply};
 3498: 	_ ->
 3499: 	    Err5      = {invalid_SCP, Parms},
 3500: 	    ED5       = cre_ErrDesc(Parms),
 3501: 	    ErrReply5 = {discard_ack, ED5},
 3502: 	    {error, Err5, ErrReply5}
 3503:     end.
 3504:

 3514: raraa_mgc_verify_notify_req({handle_trans_request, _, ?VERSION, [AR]}) ->
 3515:     (catch raraa_mgc_do_verify_notify_req(AR));
 3516: raraa_mgc_verify_notify_req(Crap) ->
 3517:     ED       = cre_ErrDesc(Crap),
 3518:     ErrReply = {discard_ack, ED},
 3519:     {error, Crap, ErrReply}.
 3520: 
 3521: raraa_mgc_do_verify_notify_req(AR) ->
 3522:     io:format("raraa_mgc_verify_notify_req -> entry with"
 3523: 	      "~n   AR: ~p"
 3524: 	      "~n", [AR]),
 3525:     {Cid, CR} = 
 3526: 	case AR of
 3527: 	    #'ActionRequest'{contextId       = CtxID,
 3528: 			     commandRequests = [CmdReq]} ->
 3529: 		{CtxID, CmdReq};
 3530: 	    _ ->
 3531: 		Err1      = {invalid_action_request, AR},
 3532: 		ED1       = cre_ErrDesc(AR),
 3533: 		ErrReply1 = {discard_ack, ED1},
 3534: 		throw({error, Err1, ErrReply1})
 3535: 	end,
 3536:     Cmd = 
 3537: 	case CR of
 3538: 	    #'CommandRequest'{command = Command} ->
 3539: 		Command;
 3540: 	    _ ->
 3541: 		Err2      = {invalid_command_request, CR},
 3542: 		ED2       = cre_ErrDesc(CR),
 3543: 		ErrReply2 = {discard_ack, ED2},
 3544: 		throw({error, Err2, ErrReply2})
 3545: 	end,
 3546:     NR = 
 3547: 	case Cmd of
 3548: 	    {notifyReq, NotifReq} ->
 3549: 		NotifReq;
 3550: 	    _ ->
 3551: 		Err3      = {invalid_command, Cmd},
 3552: 		ED3       = cre_ErrDesc(Cmd),
 3553: 		ErrReply3 = {discard_ack, ED3},
 3554: 		throw({error, Err3, ErrReply3})
 3555: 	end,
 3556:     {Tid, OED} = 
 3557: 	case NR of
 3558: 	    #'NotifyRequest'{terminationID            = [TermID],
 3559: 			     observedEventsDescriptor = ObsEvsDesc,
 3560: 			     errorDescriptor          = asn1_NOVALUE} ->
 3561: 		{TermID, ObsEvsDesc};
 3562: 	    _ ->
 3563: 		Err4      = {invalid_NR, NR},
 3564: 		ED4       = cre_ErrDesc(NR),
 3565: 		ErrReply4 = {discard_ack, ED4},
 3566: 		throw({error, Err4, ErrReply4})
 3567: 	end,
 3568:     OE = 
 3569: 	case OED of 
 3570: 	    #'ObservedEventsDescriptor'{observedEventLst = [ObsEvLst]} ->
 3571: 		ObsEvLst;
 3572: 	    _ ->
 3573: 		Err5      = {invalid_OED, OED},
 3574: 		ED5       = cre_ErrDesc(NR),
 3575: 		ErrReply5 = {discard_ack, ED5},
 3576: 		throw({error, Err5, ErrReply5})
 3577: 	end,
 3578:     case OE of
 3579: 	#'ObservedEvent'{eventName = "al/of"} ->
 3580: 	    AckData = raraa, 
 3581: 	    Replies = [raraa_mgc_notify_reply_ar(Cid, Tid)],
 3582: 	    Reply   = {{handle_ack, AckData}, Replies},
 3583: 	    {ok, AR, Reply};
 3584: 	_ ->
 3585: 	    Err6      = {invalid_OE, OE},
 3586: 	    ED6       = cre_ErrDesc(OE),
 3587: 	    ErrReply6 = {discard_ack, ED6},
 3588: 	    throw({error, Err6, ErrReply6})
 3589:     end.
 3590:

 3603:               "~n", [CH]),
 3604:     {ok, CH, ok};
 3605: raraa_mgc_verify_handle_trans_ack(Crap) ->
 3606:     io:format("raraa_mgc_verify_handle_trans_ack -> unknown"
 3607:               "~n   Crap: ~p~n", [Crap]),
 3608:     {error, Crap, ok}.

 3617: raraa_mgc_service_change_reply_ar(Mid, Cid) ->
 3618:     SCRP  = cre_serviceChangeResParm(Mid),
 3619:     SCRes = cre_serviceChangeResult(SCRP),
 3620:     Root  = #megaco_term_id{id = ["root"]},
 3621:     SCR   = cre_serviceChangeReply([Root], SCRes),
 3622:     CR    = cre_cmdReply(SCR),
 3623:     AR    = cre_actionReply(Cid, [CR]),
 3624:     AR.

 3627:     NR    = cre_notifyReply([TermId]),
 3628:     CR    = cre_cmdReply(NR),
 3629:     cre_actionReply(Cid, [CR]).

 3655: raraa_mg_event_sequence(text, tcp) ->
 3656:     DecodeFun = ?raraa_mg_decode_msg_fun(megaco_pretty_text_encoder, []),
 3657:     EncodeFun = ?raraa_mg_encode_msg_fun(megaco_pretty_text_encoder, []),
 3658:     Mid       = {deviceName,"mg"},
 3659:     ServiceChangeReq = raraa_mg_service_change_request_msg(Mid, 1, 0),
 3660:     TermId  = #megaco_term_id{id = ["00000000","00000000","01101101"]},
 3661:     TransId = 2,
 3662:     ReqId   = 1,
 3663:     CtxId   = 1, 
 3664:     NotifyReq = raraa_mg_notify_request_msg(Mid, TermId, 
 3665: 					    TransId, ReqId, CtxId),
 3666:     TransAck = raraa_mg_trans_ack_msg(Mid, TransId),
 3667:     ScrVerifyFun = ?raraa_mg_verify_service_change_rep_msg_fun(),
 3668:     NrVerifyFun  = ?raraa_mg_verify_notify_rep_msg_fun(TermId, 
 3669: 						       TransId, ReqId, CtxId),
 3670:     EvSeq = [{debug,  true},
 3671:              {decode, DecodeFun},
 3672:              {encode, EncodeFun},
 3673:              {connect, 2944},
 3674:              {send, "service-change-request", ServiceChangeReq},
 3675:              {expect_receive, "service-change-reply", {ScrVerifyFun, 10000}},
 3676:              {send, "notify request", NotifyReq},
 3677:              {expect_receive, "notify-reply", {NrVerifyFun, 10000}},
 3678:              {send, "transaction-ack", TransAck},
 3679:              {expect_nothing, 11000},
 3680:              disconnect
 3681:             ],
 3682:     EvSeq.

 3705: raraa_mg_verify_service_change_rep_msg(#'MegacoMessage'{mess = Mess} = M) ->
 3706:     Body = 
 3707: 	case Mess of 
 3708: 	    #'Message'{version     = _V,
 3709:                        mId         = _MgMid,
 3710:                        messageBody = MsgBody} ->
 3711: 		MsgBody;
 3712: 	    _ ->
 3713: 		throw({error, {invalid_Message, Mess}})
 3714: 	end,
 3715:     Trans = 
 3716: 	case Body of
 3717:             {transactions, [Transactions]} ->
 3718: 		Transactions;
 3719: 	    _ ->
 3720: 		throw({error, {invalid_messageBody, Body}})
 3721: 	end,
 3722:     TR = 
 3723: 	case Trans of
 3724:             {transactionReply, TransReply} ->
 3725: 		TransReply;
 3726: 	    _ ->
 3727: 		throw({error, {invalid_transactions, Trans}})
 3728: 	end,
 3729:     TRes = 
 3730: 	case TR of
 3731:             #'TransactionReply'{transactionId = _Tid,
 3732:                                 immAckRequired = asn1_NOVALUE,
 3733:                                 transactionResult = TransRes} ->
 3734: 		TransRes;
 3735: 	    _ ->
 3736: 		throw({error, {invalid_transactionReply, TR}})
 3737: 	end,
 3738:     AR = 
 3739: 	case TRes of
 3740:             {actionReplies, [ActRes]} ->
 3741: 		ActRes;
 3742: 	    _ ->
 3743: 		throw({error, {invalid_transactionResult, TRes}})
 3744: 	end,
 3745:     CR = 
 3746: 	case AR of
 3747:             #'ActionReply'{contextId       = _Cid,
 3748:                            errorDescriptor = asn1_NOVALUE,
 3749:                            contextReply    = _CtxReq,
 3750:                            commandReply    = [CmdRep]} ->
 3751: 		CmdRep;
 3752: 	    _ ->
 3753: 		throw({error, {invalid_actionReplies, AR}})
 3754: 	end,
 3755:     SCR = 
 3756: 	case CR of
 3757:             {serviceChangeReply, ServChRep} ->
 3758: 		ServChRep;
 3759: 	    _ ->
 3760: 		throw({error, {invalid_commandReply, CR}})
 3761: 	end,
 3762:     SCRes = 
 3763: 	case SCR of
 3764:             #'ServiceChangeReply'{terminationID       = _TermID,
 3765:                                   serviceChangeResult = ServChRes} ->
 3766: 		ServChRes;
 3767: 	    _ ->
 3768: 		throw({error, {invalid_serviceChangeReply, SCR}})
 3769: 	end,
 3770:     SCRP = 
 3771: 	case SCRes of
 3772:             {serviceChangeResParms, Parms} ->
 3773: 		Parms;
 3774: 	    _ ->
 3775: 		throw({error, {invalid_serviceChangeResult, SCRes}})
 3776: 	end,
 3777:     case SCRP of
 3778: 	#'ServiceChangeResParm'{serviceChangeMgcId = _MgcMid} ->
 3779:             {ok, M};
 3780: 	_ ->
 3781: 	    {error, {invalid_serviceChangeResParms, SCRP}}
 3782:     end;
 3783: raraa_mg_verify_service_change_rep_msg(Crap) ->
 3784:     {error, {invalid_message, Crap}}.
 3785:

 3787: raraa_mg_verify_notify_rep_msg_fun(TermId, TransId, Rid, Cid) ->

 3789: 	    (catch raraa_mg_verify_notify_rep_msg(Msg, 
 3790: 						  TermId, TransId, Rid, Cid)) 
 3791:     end.

 3794: raraa_mg_verify_notify_rep_msg(#'MegacoMessage'{mess = Mess} = M,
 3795: 			   TermId, TransId, Rid, Cid) ->
 3796:     io:format("raraa_mg_verify_notify_rep_msg -> entry with"
 3797: 	      "~n   M:       ~p"
 3798: 	      "~n   TermId:  ~p"
 3799: 	      "~n   TransId: ~p"
 3800: 	      "~n   Rid:     ~p"
 3801: 	      "~n   Cid:     ~p"
 3802: 	      "~n", [M, TermId, TransId, Rid, Cid]),
 3803:     Body = 
 3804: 	case Mess of 
 3805: 	    #'Message'{version     = ?VERSION,
 3806:                        mId         = _Mid,
 3807:                        messageBody = MsgBody} ->
 3808: 		MsgBody;
 3809: 	    _ ->
 3810: 		throw({error, {invalid_Message, Mess}})
 3811: 	end,
 3812:     Trans = 
 3813: 	case Body of
 3814:             {transactions, [Transactions]} ->
 3815: 		Transactions;
 3816: 	    _ ->
 3817: 		throw({error, {invalid_messageBody, Body}})
 3818: 	end,
 3819:     TR = 
 3820: 	case Trans of
 3821:             {transactionReply, TransReply} ->
 3822: 		TransReply;
 3823: 	    _ ->
 3824: 		throw({error, {invalid_transactions, Trans}})
 3825: 	end,
 3826:     TRes = 
 3827: 	case TR of
 3828:             #'TransactionReply'{transactionId     = TransId,
 3829:                                 immAckRequired    = 'NULL',
 3830:                                 transactionResult = TransRes} ->
 3831: 		TransRes;
 3832: 	    _ ->
 3833: 		throw({error, {invalid_transactionReply, TR}})
 3834: 	end,
 3835:     AR = 
 3836: 	case TRes of
 3837:             {actionReplies, [ActRes]} ->
 3838: 		ActRes;
 3839: 	    _ ->
 3840: 		throw({error, {invalid_transactionResult, TRes}})
 3841: 	end,
 3842:     CR = 
 3843: 	case AR of
 3844:             #'ActionReply'{contextId       = Cid,
 3845:                            errorDescriptor = asn1_NOVALUE,
 3846:                            contextReply    = _CtxReq,
 3847:                            commandReply    = [CmdRep]} ->
 3848: 		CmdRep;
 3849: 	    _ ->
 3850: 		throw({error, {invalid_actionReplies, AR}})
 3851: 	end,
 3852:     NR = 
 3853: 	case CR of
 3854:             {notifyReply, NotifyReply} ->
 3855: 		NotifyReply;
 3856: 	    _ ->
 3857: 		throw({error, {invalid_commandReply, CR}})
 3858: 	end,
 3859:     case NR of
 3860: 	#'NotifyReply'{terminationID   = [TermId],
 3861: 		       errorDescriptor = asn1_NOVALUE} ->
 3862: 	    {ok, M};
 3863: 	_ ->
 3864: 	    {error, {invalid_notifyReply, NR}}
 3865:     end;
 3866: raraa_mg_verify_notify_rep_msg(Crap, _TermId, _TransId, _Rid, _Cid) ->
 3867:     {error, {invalid_message, Crap}}.

 3869: raraa_mg_service_change_request_ar(_Mid, Cid) ->
 3870:     Prof  = cre_serviceChangeProf("resgw", 1),
 3871:     SCP   = cre_serviceChangeParm(restart, ["901 mg col boot"], Prof),
 3872:     Root  = #megaco_term_id{id = ["root"]},
 3873:     SCR   = cre_serviceChangeReq([Root], SCP),
 3874:     CMD   = cre_command(SCR),
 3875:     CR    = cre_cmdReq(CMD),
 3876:     cre_actionReq(Cid, [CR]).
 3877: 
 3878: raraa_mg_service_change_request_msg(Mid, TransId, Cid) ->
 3879:     AR    = raraa_mg_service_change_request_ar(Mid, Cid),
 3880:     TR    = cre_transReq(TransId, [AR]),
 3881:     Trans = cre_transaction(TR),
 3882:     Mess  = cre_message(?VERSION, Mid, cre_transactions([Trans])),
 3883:     cre_megacoMessage(Mess).
 3884: 
 3885: raraa_mg_notify_request_ar(Rid, Tid, Cid) ->
 3886:     TT      = cre_timeNotation("19990729", "22000000"),
 3887:     Ev      = cre_obsEvent("al/of", TT),
 3888:     EvsDesc = cre_obsEvsDesc(Rid, [Ev]),
 3889:     NR      = cre_notifyReq([Tid], EvsDesc),
 3890:     CMD     = cre_command(NR),
 3891:     CR      = cre_cmdReq(CMD),
 3892:     cre_actionReq(Cid, [CR]).
 3893: 
 3894: raraa_mg_notify_request_msg(Mid, TermId, TransId, Rid, Cid) ->
 3895:     AR      = raraa_mg_notify_request_ar(Rid, TermId, Cid),
 3896:     TR      = cre_transReq(TransId, [AR]),
 3897:     Trans   = cre_transaction(TR),
 3898:     Mess    = cre_message(?VERSION, Mid, cre_transactions([Trans])),
 3899:     cre_megacoMessage(Mess).
 3900: 
 3901: raraa_mg_trans_ack_msg(Mid, TransId) ->
 3902:     TR    = cre_transRespAck(cre_transAck(TransId)),
 3903:     Trans = cre_transaction(TR),
 3904:     Mess  = cre_message(?VERSION, Mid, cre_transactions([Trans])),
 3905:     cre_megacoMessage(Mess).

 3911: request_and_reply_and_no_ack(suite) ->
 3912:     [];
 3913: request_and_reply_and_no_ack(doc) ->
 3914:     ["This test case tests that megaco handles a failed three-way-handshake,"
 3915:      " i.e. when the ack never arrives"];
 3916: request_and_reply_and_no_ack(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 3917:     Pre = fun() ->
 3918:                   MgcNode = make_node_name(mgc),
 3919:                   MgNode  = make_node_name(mg),
 3920:                   d("start nodes: "
 3921:                     "~n      MgcNode: ~p"
 3922:                     "~n      MgNode:  ~p",
 3923:                     [MgcNode, MgNode]),
 3924:                   Nodes = [MgcNode, MgNode],
 3925:                   ok = ?START_NODES(Nodes, true),
 3926:                   Nodes
 3927:           end,
 3928:     Case = fun(Nodes) ->
 3929:                    do_request_and_reply_and_no_ack(Config, Nodes)
 3930:            end,
 3931:     Post = fun(Nodes) ->
 3932:                    d("stop nodes"),
 3933:                    ?STOP_NODES(lists:reverse(Nodes))
 3934:            end,
 3935:     try_tc(rarana, Pre, Case, Post).
 3936: 
 3937: 
 3938: do_request_and_reply_and_no_ack(Config,
 3939:                                 [MgcNode, MgNode]) ->
 3940:     d("[MGC] start the simulator "),
 3941:     {ok, Mgc} = megaco_test_megaco_generator:start_link("MGC", MgcNode),
 3942: 
 3943:     d("[MGC] create the event sequence"),
 3944:     MgcEvSeq = rarana_mgc_event_sequence(Config,
 3945:                                          text, tcp),
 3946: 
 3947:     i("wait some time before starting the MGC simulation"),
 3948:     sleep(1000),
 3949: 
 3950:     d("[MGC] start the simulation"),
 3951:     {ok, MgcId} = megaco_test_megaco_generator:exec(Mgc, MgcEvSeq),
 3952: 
 3953:     %% i("wait some time before starting the MG simulator"),
 3954:     %% sleep(1000),
 3955: 
 3956:     i("await MGC ready announcement"),
 3957:     receive
 3958:         announce_mgc ->
 3959:             i("received MGC ready announcement"),
 3960:             ok
 3961:     end,
 3962: 
 3963:     d("[MG] start the simulator (generator)"),
 3964:     {ok, Mg} = megaco_test_tcp_generator:start_link("MG", MgNode),
 3965: 
 3966:     d("[MG] create the event sequence"),
 3967:     MgEvSeq = rarana_mg_event_sequence(text, tcp),
 3968: 
 3969:     i("wait some time before starting the MG simulation"),
 3970:     sleep(1000),
 3971: 
 3972:     d("[MG] start the simulation"),
 3973:     {ok, MgId} = megaco_test_tcp_generator:exec(Mg, MgEvSeq),
 3974: 
 3975:     d("await the generator reply(s)"),
 3976:     await_completion([MgcId, MgId]), 
 3977: 
 3978:     %% Tell Mgc to stop
 3979:     i("[MGC] stop generator"),
 3980:     megaco_test_megaco_generator:stop(Mgc),
 3981: 
 3982:     %% Tell Mg to stop
 3983:     i("[MG] stop generator"),
 3984:     megaco_test_tcp_generator:stop(Mg),
 3985: 
 3986:     i("done", []),
 3987:     ok.
 3988:

 4018: rarana_mgc_event_sequence(Config,
 4019:                           text, tcp) ->
 4020:     CTRL = self(),
 4021:     Mid = {deviceName,"ctrl"},
 4022:     RI = [
 4023:           {port,             2944},
 4024:           {encoding_module,  megaco_pretty_text_encoder},
 4025:           {encoding_config,  []},
 4026:           {transport_module, megaco_tcp}
 4027:          ],
 4028:     ConnectVerify = ?rarana_mgc_verify_handle_connect_fun(), 
 4029:     ScrVerify     = ?rarana_mgc_verify_service_change_req_fun(Mid),
 4030:     NrVerify      = ?rarana_mgc_verify_notify_req_fun(),
 4031:     AckVerify     = ?rarana_mgc_verify_handle_trans_ack_fun(),
 4032:     DiscoVerify   = ?rarana_mgc_verify_handle_disconnect_fun(), 
 4033:     EvSeq = [
 4034:              {debug, true},
 4035:              {megaco_trace, disable},
 4036:              ?MEGACO_TRACE(Config, max), % {megaco_trace, max},
 4037:              megaco_start,
 4038:              {megaco_start_user, Mid, RI, []},
 4039:              {megaco_update_user_info, sent_pending_limit, 100},
 4040:              {megaco_update_user_info, reply_timer,        9000},
 4041:              start_transport,
 4042:              listen,
 4043: 
 4044:              %% ANNOUNCE READY
 4045:              {trigger, fun() -> CTRL ! announce_mgc end}, 
 4046: 
 4047:              {megaco_callback, handle_connect,           ConnectVerify},
 4048:              {megaco_conn_info, all},
 4049:              {megaco_callback, handle_trans_request,     ScrVerify},
 4050: 	     {megaco_callback, handle_trans_request,     NrVerify},
 4051: 	     {megaco_callback, handle_trans_ack,         AckVerify},
 4052: 	     %% {megaco_callback, nocall,                   8000},
 4053:              {megaco_callback, handle_disconnect,        DiscoVerify},
 4054:              megaco_stop_user,
 4055:              megaco_stop
 4056:             ],
 4057:     EvSeq.
 4058: 
 4059: %% Connect verification
 4060: rarana_mgc_verify_handle_connect({handle_connect, CH, ?VERSION}) ->
 4061:     {ok, CH, ok};
 4062: rarana_mgc_verify_handle_connect(Else) ->
 4063:     {error, Else, ok}.
 4064: 
 4065: %% Service Change verification
 4066: -ifndef(megaco_hipe_special).
 4067: rarana_mgc_verify_service_change_req_fun(Mid) ->
 4068:     fun(Req) -> 
 4069: 	    rarana_mgc_verify_service_change_req(Req, Mid) 
 4070:     end.
 4071: -endif.
 4072: 
 4073: rarana_mgc_verify_service_change_req(
 4074:   {handle_trans_request, _, ?VERSION, [AR]}, Mid) ->
 4075:     (catch rarana_do_verify_service_change_req(AR, Mid));
 4076: rarana_mgc_verify_service_change_req(Crap, _Mid) ->
 4077:     ED       = cre_ErrDesc(Crap),
 4078:     ErrReply = {discard_ack, ED},
 4079:     {error, Crap, ErrReply}.
 4080: 
 4081: rarana_do_verify_service_change_req(AR, Mid) ->
 4082:     CR = 
 4083: 	case AR of
 4084: 	    #'ActionRequest'{commandRequests = [CmdReq]} ->
 4085: 		CmdReq;
 4086: 	    _ ->
 4087: 		Err1      = {invalid_action_request, AR},
 4088: 		ED1       = cre_ErrDesc(AR),
 4089: 		ErrReply1 = {discard_ack, ED1},
 4090: 		throw({error, Err1, ErrReply1})
 4091: 	end,
 4092:     Cmd = 
 4093: 	case CR of
 4094: 	    #'CommandRequest'{command = Command} ->
 4095: 		Command; 
 4096: 	    _ ->
 4097: 		Err2      = {invalid_command_request, CR},
 4098: 		ED2       = cre_ErrDesc(CR),
 4099: 		ErrReply2 = {discard_ack, ED2},
 4100: 		throw({error, Err2, ErrReply2})
 4101: 	end,
 4102:     {Tid, Parms} = 
 4103: 	case Cmd of
 4104: 	    {serviceChangeReq, 
 4105: 	     #'ServiceChangeRequest'{terminationID = [TermID],
 4106: 				     serviceChangeParms = ServChParms}} ->
 4107: 		{TermID, ServChParms};
 4108: 	    _ ->
 4109: 		Err3      = {invalid_command, Cmd},
 4110: 		ED3       = cre_ErrDesc(Cmd),
 4111: 		ErrReply3 = {discard_ack, ED3},
 4112: 		throw({error, Err3, ErrReply3})
 4113: 	end,
 4114:     case Tid of
 4115: 	#megaco_term_id{contains_wildcards = false, id = ["root"]} ->
 4116: 	    ok;
 4117: 	_ ->
 4118: 	    Err4      = {invalid_termination_id, Tid},
 4119: 	    ED4       = cre_ErrDesc(Tid),
 4120: 	    ErrReply4 = {discard_ack, ED4},
 4121: 	    throw({error, Err4, ErrReply4})
 4122:     end,
 4123:     case Parms of
 4124: 	#'ServiceChangeParm'{serviceChangeMethod = restart,
 4125: 			     serviceChangeReason = [[$9,$0,$1|_]]} ->
 4126: 	    AckData = [rarana_mgc_service_change_reply_ar(Mid, 1)], 
 4127: 	    Reply   = {discard_ack, AckData},
 4128: 	    {ok, AR, Reply};
 4129: 	_ ->
 4130: 	    Err5      = {invalid_SCP, Parms},
 4131: 	    ED5       = cre_ErrDesc(Parms),
 4132: 	    ErrReply5 = {discard_ack, ED5},
 4133: 	    {error, Err5, ErrReply5}
 4134:     end.
 4135:

 4137: %% Notify Request verification
 4138: -ifndef(megaco_hipe_special).
 4139: rarana_mgc_verify_notify_req_fun() ->
 4140:     fun(Req) -> 
 4141: 	    rarana_mgc_verify_notify_req(Req) 
 4142:     end.
 4143: -endif.
 4144: 
 4145: rarana_mgc_verify_notify_req({handle_trans_request, _, ?VERSION, [AR]}) ->
 4146:     (catch rarana_mgc_do_verify_notify_req(AR));
 4147: rarana_mgc_verify_notify_req(Crap) ->
 4148:     ED       = cre_ErrDesc(Crap),
 4149:     ErrReply = {discard_ack, ED},
 4150:     {error, Crap, ErrReply}.
 4151: 
 4152: rarana_mgc_do_verify_notify_req(AR) ->
 4153:     {Cid, CR} = 
 4154: 	case AR of
 4155: 	    #'ActionRequest'{contextId       = CtxID,
 4156: 			     commandRequests = [CmdReq]} ->
 4157: 		{CtxID, CmdReq};
 4158: 	    _ ->
 4159: 		Err1      = {invalid_action_request, AR},
 4160: 		ED1       = cre_ErrDesc(AR),
 4161: 		ErrReply1 = {discard_ack, ED1},
 4162: 		throw({error, Err1, ErrReply1})
 4163: 	end,
 4164:     Cmd = 
 4165: 	case CR of
 4166: 	    #'CommandRequest'{command = Command} ->
 4167: 		Command;
 4168: 	    _ ->
 4169: 		Err2      = {invalid_command_request, CR},
 4170: 		ED2       = cre_ErrDesc(CR),
 4171: 		ErrReply2 = {discard_ack, ED2},
 4172: 		throw({error, Err2, ErrReply2})
 4173: 	end,
 4174:     NR = 
 4175: 	case Cmd of
 4176: 	    {notifyReq, NotifReq} ->
 4177: 		NotifReq;
 4178: 	    _ ->
 4179: 		Err3      = {invalid_command, Cmd},
 4180: 		ED3       = cre_ErrDesc(Cmd),
 4181: 		ErrReply3 = {discard_ack, ED3},
 4182: 		throw({error, Err3, ErrReply3})
 4183: 	end,
 4184:     {Tid, OED} = 
 4185: 	case NR of
 4186: 	    #'NotifyRequest'{terminationID            = [TermID],
 4187: 			     observedEventsDescriptor = ObsEvsDesc,
 4188: 			     errorDescriptor          = asn1_NOVALUE} ->
 4189: 		{TermID, ObsEvsDesc};
 4190: 	    _ ->
 4191: 		Err4      = {invalid_NR, NR},
 4192: 		ED4       = cre_ErrDesc(NR),
 4193: 		ErrReply4 = {discard_ack, ED4},
 4194: 		throw({error, Err4, ErrReply4})
 4195: 	end,
 4196:     OE = 
 4197: 	case OED of 
 4198: 	    #'ObservedEventsDescriptor'{observedEventLst = [ObsEvLst]} ->
 4199: 		ObsEvLst;
 4200: 	    _ ->
 4201: 		Err5      = {invalid_OED, OED},
 4202: 		ED5       = cre_ErrDesc(NR),
 4203: 		ErrReply5 = {discard_ack, ED5},
 4204: 		throw({error, Err5, ErrReply5})
 4205: 	end,
 4206:     case OE of
 4207: 	#'ObservedEvent'{eventName = "al/of"} ->
 4208: 	    AckData = rarana, 
 4209: 	    Replies = [rarana_mgc_notify_reply_ar(Cid, Tid)],
 4210: 	    Reply   = {{handle_ack, AckData}, Replies},
 4211: 	    {ok, AR, Reply};
 4212: 	_ ->
 4213: 	    Err6      = {invalid_OE, OE},
 4214: 	    ED6       = cre_ErrDesc(OE),
 4215: 	    ErrReply6 = {discard_ack, ED6},
 4216: 	    throw({error, Err6, ErrReply6})
 4217:     end.
 4218:

 4222:     fun(Ack) -> 
 4223: 	    rarana_mgc_verify_handle_trans_ack(Ack) 
 4224:     end.
 4225: -endif.

 4245: rarana_mgc_service_change_reply_ar(Mid, Cid) ->
 4246:     SCRP  = cre_serviceChangeResParm(Mid),
 4247:     SCRes = cre_serviceChangeResult(SCRP),

 4249:     SCR   = cre_serviceChangeReply([Root], SCRes),
 4250:     CR    = cre_cmdReply(SCR),
 4251:     AR    = cre_actionReply(Cid, [CR]),
 4252:     AR.

 4257:     cre_actionReply(Cid, [CR]).

 4283: rarana_mg_event_sequence(text, tcp) ->
 4284:     DecodeFun = ?rarana_mg_decode_msg_fun(megaco_pretty_text_encoder, []),
 4285:     EncodeFun = ?rarana_mg_encode_msg_fun(megaco_pretty_text_encoder, []),
 4286:     Mid       = {deviceName,"mg"},
 4287:     ServiceChangeReq = rarana_mg_service_change_request_msg(Mid, 1, 0),
 4288:     TermId  = #megaco_term_id{id = ["00000000","00000000","01101101"]},
 4289:     TransId = 2,
 4290:     ReqId   = 1,
 4291:     CtxId   = 1, 
 4292:     NotifyReq = rarana_mg_notify_request_msg(Mid, TermId, 
 4293: 					    TransId, ReqId, CtxId),
 4294:     ScrVerifyFun = ?rarana_mg_verify_service_change_rep_msg_fun(),
 4295:     NrVerifyFun  = ?rarana_mg_verify_notify_rep_msg_fun(TermId, 
 4296: 							TransId, ReqId, CtxId),
 4297:     EvSeq = [{debug,  true},
 4298:              {decode, DecodeFun},
 4299:              {encode, EncodeFun},
 4300:              {connect, 2944},
 4301:              {send, "service-change-request", ServiceChangeReq},
 4302:              {expect_receive, "service-change-reply", {ScrVerifyFun, 10000}},
 4303:              {send, "notify request", NotifyReq},
 4304:              {expect_receive, "notify-reply", {NrVerifyFun, 10000}},
 4305:              {expect_nothing, 11000},
 4306:              disconnect
 4307:             ],
 4308:     EvSeq.

 4331: rarana_mg_verify_service_change_rep_msg(#'MegacoMessage'{mess = Mess} = M) ->
 4332:     Body = 
 4333: 	case Mess of 
 4334: 	    #'Message'{version     = _V,
 4335:                        mId         = _MgMid,
 4336:                        messageBody = MsgBody} ->
 4337: 		MsgBody;
 4338: 	    _ ->
 4339: 		throw({error, {invalid_Message, Mess}})
 4340: 	end,
 4341:     Trans = 
 4342: 	case Body of
 4343:             {transactions, [Transactions]} ->
 4344: 		Transactions;
 4345: 	    _ ->
 4346: 		throw({error, {invalid_messageBody, Body}})
 4347: 	end,
 4348:     TR = 
 4349: 	case Trans of
 4350:             {transactionReply, TransReply} ->
 4351: 		TransReply;
 4352: 	    _ ->
 4353: 		throw({error, {invalid_transactions, Trans}})
 4354: 	end,
 4355:     TRes = 
 4356: 	case TR of
 4357:             #'TransactionReply'{transactionId = _Tid,
 4358:                                 immAckRequired = asn1_NOVALUE,
 4359:                                 transactionResult = TransRes} ->
 4360: 		TransRes;
 4361: 	    _ ->
 4362: 		throw({error, {invalid_transactionReply, TR}})
 4363: 	end,
 4364:     AR = 
 4365: 	case TRes of
 4366:             {actionReplies, [ActRes]} ->
 4367: 		ActRes;
 4368: 	    _ ->
 4369: 		throw({error, {invalid_transactionResult, TRes}})
 4370: 	end,
 4371:     CR = 
 4372: 	case AR of
 4373:             #'ActionReply'{contextId       = _Cid,
 4374:                            errorDescriptor = asn1_NOVALUE,
 4375:                            contextReply    = _CtxReq,
 4376:                            commandReply    = [CmdRep]} ->
 4377: 		CmdRep;
 4378: 	    _ ->
 4379: 		throw({error, {invalid_actionReplies, AR}})
 4380: 	end,
 4381:     SCR = 
 4382: 	case CR of
 4383:             {serviceChangeReply, ServChRep} ->
 4384: 		ServChRep;
 4385: 	    _ ->
 4386: 		throw({error, {invalid_commandReply, CR}})
 4387: 	end,
 4388:     SCRes = 
 4389: 	case SCR of
 4390:             #'ServiceChangeReply'{terminationID       = _TermID,
 4391:                                   serviceChangeResult = ServChRes} ->
 4392: 		ServChRes;
 4393: 	    _ ->
 4394: 		throw({error, {invalid_serviceChangeReply, SCR}})
 4395: 	end,
 4396:     SCRP = 
 4397: 	case SCRes of
 4398:             {serviceChangeResParms, Parms} ->
 4399: 		Parms;
 4400: 	    _ ->
 4401: 		throw({error, {invalid_serviceChangeResult, SCRes}})
 4402: 	end,
 4403:     case SCRP of
 4404: 	#'ServiceChangeResParm'{serviceChangeMgcId = _MgcMid} ->
 4405:             {ok, M};
 4406: 	_ ->
 4407: 	    {error, {invalid_serviceChangeResParms, SCRP}}
 4408:     end;
 4409: rarana_mg_verify_service_change_rep_msg(Crap) ->
 4410:     {error, {invalid_message, Crap}}.
 4411:

 4413: rarana_mg_verify_notify_rep_msg_fun(TermId, TransId, Rid, Cid) ->

 4420: rarana_mg_verify_notify_rep_msg(#'MegacoMessage'{mess = Mess} = M,
 4421: 				TermId, TransId, Rid, Cid) ->
 4422:     io:format("rarana_mg_verify_notify_rep_msg -> entry with"
 4423: 	      "~n   M:       ~p"
 4424: 	      "~n   TermId:  ~p"
 4425: 	      "~n   TransId: ~p"
 4426: 	      "~n   Rid:     ~p"
 4427: 	      "~n   Cid:     ~p"
 4428: 	      "~n", [M, TermId, TransId, Rid, Cid]),
 4429:     Body = 
 4430: 	case Mess of 
 4431: 	    #'Message'{version     = ?VERSION,
 4432:                        mId         = _Mid,
 4433:                        messageBody = MsgBody} ->
 4434: 		MsgBody;
 4435: 	    _ ->
 4436: 		throw({error, {invalid_Message, Mess}})
 4437: 	end,
 4438:     Trans = 
 4439: 	case Body of
 4440:             {transactions, [Transactions]} ->
 4441: 		Transactions;
 4442: 	    _ ->
 4443: 		throw({error, {invalid_messageBody, Body}})
 4444: 	end,
 4445:     TR = 
 4446: 	case Trans of
 4447:             {transactionReply, TransReply} ->
 4448: 		TransReply;
 4449: 	    _ ->
 4450: 		throw({error, {invalid_transactions, Trans}})
 4451: 	end,
 4452:     TRes = 
 4453: 	case TR of
 4454:             #'TransactionReply'{transactionId     = TransId,
 4455:                                 immAckRequired    = 'NULL',
 4456:                                 transactionResult = TransRes} ->
 4457: 		TransRes;
 4458: 	    _ ->
 4459: 		throw({error, {invalid_transactionReply, TR}})
 4460: 	end,
 4461:     AR = 
 4462: 	case TRes of
 4463:             {actionReplies, [ActRes]} ->
 4464: 		ActRes;
 4465: 	    _ ->
 4466: 		throw({error, {invalid_transactionResult, TRes}})
 4467: 	end,
 4468:     CR = 
 4469: 	case AR of
 4470:             #'ActionReply'{contextId       = Cid,
 4471:                            errorDescriptor = asn1_NOVALUE,
 4472:                            contextReply    = _CtxReq,
 4473:                            commandReply    = [CmdRep]} ->
 4474: 		CmdRep;
 4475: 	    _ ->
 4476: 		throw({error, {invalid_actionReplies, AR}})
 4477: 	end,
 4478:     NR = 
 4479: 	case CR of
 4480:             {notifyReply, NotifyReply} ->
 4481: 		NotifyReply;
 4482: 	    _ ->
 4483: 		throw({error, {invalid_commandReply, CR}})
 4484: 	end,
 4485:     case NR of
 4486: 	#'NotifyReply'{terminationID   = [TermId],
 4487: 		       errorDescriptor = asn1_NOVALUE} ->
 4488: 	    {ok, M};
 4489: 	_ ->
 4490: 	    {error, {invalid_notifyReply, NR}}
 4491:     end;
 4492: rarana_mg_verify_notify_rep_msg(Crap, _TermId, _TransId, _Rid, _Cid) ->
 4493:     {error, {invalid_message, Crap}}.

 4495: rarana_mg_service_change_request_ar(_Mid, Cid) ->
 4496:     Prof  = cre_serviceChangeProf("resgw", 1),
 4497:     SCP   = cre_serviceChangeParm(restart, ["901 mg col boot"], Prof),
 4498:     Root  = #megaco_term_id{id = ["root"]},
 4499:     SCR   = cre_serviceChangeReq([Root], SCP),
 4500:     CMD   = cre_command(SCR),
 4501:     CR    = cre_cmdReq(CMD),
 4502:     cre_actionReq(Cid, [CR]).
 4503: 
 4504: rarana_mg_service_change_request_msg(Mid, TransId, Cid) ->
 4505:     AR    = rarana_mg_service_change_request_ar(Mid, Cid),
 4506:     TR    = cre_transReq(TransId, [AR]),
 4507:     Trans = cre_transaction(TR),
 4508:     Mess  = cre_message(?VERSION, Mid, cre_transactions([Trans])),
 4509:     cre_megacoMessage(Mess).
 4510: 
 4511: rarana_mg_notify_request_ar(Rid, Tid, Cid) ->
 4512:     TT      = cre_timeNotation("19990729", "22000000"),
 4513:     Ev      = cre_obsEvent("al/of", TT),
 4514:     EvsDesc = cre_obsEvsDesc(Rid, [Ev]),
 4515:     NR      = cre_notifyReq([Tid], EvsDesc),
 4516:     CMD     = cre_command(NR),
 4517:     CR      = cre_cmdReq(CMD),
 4518:     cre_actionReq(Cid, [CR]).
 4519: 
 4520: rarana_mg_notify_request_msg(Mid, TermId, TransId, Rid, Cid) ->
 4521:     AR      = rarana_mg_notify_request_ar(Rid, TermId, Cid),
 4522:     TR      = cre_transReq(TransId, [AR]),
 4523:     Trans   = cre_transaction(TR),
 4524:     Mess    = cre_message(?VERSION, Mid, cre_transactions([Trans])),
 4525:     cre_megacoMessage(Mess).

 4530: request_and_reply_and_late_ack(suite) ->
 4531:     [];
 4532: request_and_reply_and_late_ack(doc) ->
 4533:     ["This test case tests that megaco handles three-way-handshake "
 4534:      "when the ack is late (and requeire a retransmission)"];
 4535: request_and_reply_and_late_ack(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 4536:     Pre = fun() ->
 4537:                   MgcNode = make_node_name(mgc),
 4538:                   MgNode  = make_node_name(mg),
 4539:                   d("start nodes: "
 4540:                     "~n   MgcNode: ~p"
 4541:                     "~n   MgNode:  ~p",
 4542:                     [MgcNode, MgNode]),
 4543:                   Nodes = [MgcNode, MgNode], 
 4544:                   ok = ?START_NODES(Nodes, true),
 4545:                   Nodes
 4546:           end,
 4547:     Case = fun(Nodes) ->
 4548:                    do_request_and_reply_and_late_ack(Config, Nodes)
 4549:            end,
 4550:     Post = fun(Nodes) ->
 4551:                    d("stop nodes"),
 4552:                    ?STOP_NODES(lists:reverse(Nodes))
 4553:            end,
 4554:     try_tc(rarala, Pre, Case, Post).
 4555: 
 4556: do_request_and_reply_and_late_ack(Config,
 4557:                                   [MgcNode, MgNode]) ->
 4558:     d("[MGC] start the simulator "),
 4559:     {ok, Mgc} = megaco_test_megaco_generator:start_link("MGC", MgcNode),
 4560: 
 4561:     d("[MGC] create the event sequence"),
 4562:     MgcEvSeq = rarala_mgc_event_sequence(Config,
 4563:                                          text, tcp),
 4564: 
 4565:     i("wait some time before starting the MGC simulation"),
 4566:     sleep(1000),
 4567: 
 4568:     d("[MGC] start the simulation"),
 4569:     {ok, MgcId} = megaco_test_megaco_generator:exec(Mgc, MgcEvSeq),
 4570: 
 4571:     %% i("wait some time before starting the MG simulator"),
 4572:     %% sleep(1000),
 4573: 
 4574:     i("await MGC ready announcement"),
 4575:     receive
 4576:         announce_mgc ->
 4577:             i("received MGC ready announcement"),
 4578:             ok
 4579:     end,
 4580: 
 4581:     d("[MG] start the simulator (generator)"),
 4582:     {ok, Mg} = megaco_test_tcp_generator:start_link("MG", MgNode),
 4583: 
 4584:     d("[MG] create the event sequence"),
 4585:     MgEvSeq = rarala_mg_event_sequence(text, tcp),
 4586: 
 4587:     i("wait some time before starting the MG simulation"),
 4588:     sleep(1000),
 4589: 
 4590:     d("[MG] start the simulation"),
 4591:     {ok, MgId} = megaco_test_tcp_generator:exec(Mg, MgEvSeq),
 4592: 
 4593:     d("await the generator reply(s)"),
 4594:     await_completion([MgcId, MgId]), 
 4595: 
 4596:     %% Tell Mgc to stop
 4597:     i("[MGC] stop generator"),
 4598:     megaco_test_megaco_generator:stop(Mgc),
 4599: 
 4600:     %% Tell Mg to stop
 4601:     i("[MG] stop generator"),
 4602:     megaco_test_tcp_generator:stop(Mg),
 4603: 
 4604:     i("done", []),
 4605:     ok.
 4606:

 4636: rarala_mgc_event_sequence(Config,
 4637:                           text, tcp) ->
 4638:     CTRL = self(),
 4639:     Mid = {deviceName,"ctrl"},
 4640:     RI = [
 4641:           {port,             2944},
 4642:           {encoding_module,  megaco_pretty_text_encoder},
 4643:           {encoding_config,  []},
 4644:           {transport_module, megaco_tcp}
 4645:          ],
 4646:     RepTmr = #megaco_incr_timer{wait_for    = 3000,
 4647: 				factor      = 1, 
 4648: 				incr        = 0,
 4649: 				max_retries = 2
 4650: 			       },    
 4651:     ConnectVerify = ?rarala_mgc_verify_handle_connect_fun(), 
 4652:     ScrVerify     = ?rarala_mgc_verify_service_change_req_fun(Mid),
 4653:     NrVerify      = ?rarala_mgc_verify_notify_req_fun(),
 4654:     AckVerify     = ?rarala_mgc_verify_handle_trans_ack_fun(),
 4655:     DiscoVerify   = ?rarala_mgc_verify_handle_disconnect_fun(), 
 4656:     EvSeq = [
 4657:              {debug, true},
 4658:              {megaco_trace, disable},
 4659:              ?MEGACO_TRACE(Config, max), % {megaco_trace, max},
 4660:              megaco_start,
 4661:              {megaco_start_user, Mid, RI, []},
 4662:              {megaco_update_user_info, sent_pending_limit, 100},
 4663:              {megaco_update_user_info, reply_timer,        RepTmr},
 4664:              start_transport,
 4665:              listen,
 4666: 
 4667:              %% ANNOUNCE READY
 4668:              {trigger, fun() -> CTRL ! announce_mgc end}, 
 4669: 
 4670:              {megaco_callback, handle_connect,           ConnectVerify},
 4671:              {megaco_conn_info, all},
 4672:              {megaco_callback, handle_trans_request,     ScrVerify},
 4673: 	     {megaco_callback, handle_trans_request,     NrVerify},

 4675:              {megaco_callback, handle_disconnect,        DiscoVerify},

 4695: rarala_mgc_verify_service_change_req(
 4696:   {handle_trans_request, _, ?VERSION, [AR]}, Mid) ->
 4697:     (catch rarala_do_verify_service_change_req(AR, Mid));
 4698: rarala_mgc_verify_service_change_req(Crap, _Mid) ->
 4699:     ED       = cre_ErrDesc(Crap),
 4700:     ErrReply = {discard_ack, ED},
 4701:     {error, Crap, ErrReply}.
 4702: 
 4703: rarala_do_verify_service_change_req(AR, Mid) ->
 4704:     io:format("rarala_mgc_do_verify_service_change_req -> entry with"
 4705: 	      "~n   AR:  ~p"
 4706: 	      "~n   Mid: ~p"
 4707: 	      "~n", [AR, Mid]),
 4708:     CR = 
 4709: 	case AR of
 4710: 	    #'ActionRequest'{commandRequests = [CmdReq]} ->
 4711: 		CmdReq;
 4712: 	    _ ->
 4713: 		Err1      = {invalid_action_request, AR},
 4714: 		ED1       = cre_ErrDesc(AR),
 4715: 		ErrReply1 = {discard_ack, ED1},
 4716: 		throw({error, Err1, ErrReply1})
 4717: 	end,
 4718:     Cmd = 
 4719: 	case CR of
 4720: 	    #'CommandRequest'{command = Command} ->
 4721: 		Command; 
 4722: 	    _ ->
 4723: 		Err2      = {invalid_command_request, CR},
 4724: 		ED2       = cre_ErrDesc(CR),
 4725: 		ErrReply2 = {discard_ack, ED2},
 4726: 		throw({error, Err2, ErrReply2})
 4727: 	end,
 4728:     {Tid, Parms} = 
 4729: 	case Cmd of
 4730: 	    {serviceChangeReq, 
 4731: 	     #'ServiceChangeRequest'{terminationID = [TermID],
 4732: 				     serviceChangeParms = ServChParms}} ->
 4733: 		{TermID, ServChParms};
 4734: 	    _ ->
 4735: 		Err3      = {invalid_command, Cmd},
 4736: 		ED3       = cre_ErrDesc(Cmd),
 4737: 		ErrReply3 = {discard_ack, ED3},
 4738: 		throw({error, Err3, ErrReply3})
 4739: 	end,
 4740:     case Tid of
 4741: 	#megaco_term_id{contains_wildcards = false, id = ["root"]} ->
 4742: 	    ok;
 4743: 	_ ->
 4744: 	    Err4      = {invalid_termination_id, Tid},
 4745: 	    ED4       = cre_ErrDesc(Tid),
 4746: 	    ErrReply4 = {discard_ack, ED4},
 4747: 	    throw({error, Err4, ErrReply4})
 4748:     end,
 4749:     case Parms of
 4750: 	#'ServiceChangeParm'{serviceChangeMethod = restart,
 4751: 			     serviceChangeReason = [[$9,$0,$1|_]]} ->
 4752: 	    AckData = [rarala_mgc_service_change_reply_ar(Mid, 1)], 
 4753: 	    Reply   = {discard_ack, AckData},
 4754: 	    {ok, AR, Reply};
 4755: 	_ ->
 4756: 	    Err5      = {invalid_SCP, Parms},
 4757: 	    ED5       = cre_ErrDesc(Parms),
 4758: 	    ErrReply5 = {discard_ack, ED5},
 4759: 	    {error, Err5, ErrReply5}
 4760:     end.
 4761:

 4771: rarala_mgc_verify_notify_req({handle_trans_request, _, ?VERSION, [AR]}) ->
 4772:     (catch rarala_mgc_do_verify_notify_req(AR));
 4773: rarala_mgc_verify_notify_req(Crap) ->
 4774:     ED       = cre_ErrDesc(Crap),

 4776:     {error, Crap, ErrReply}.
 4777: 
 4778: rarala_mgc_do_verify_notify_req(AR) ->
 4779:     io:format("rarala_mgc_do_verify_notify_req -> entry with"
 4780: 	      "~n   AR: ~p"
 4781: 	      "~n", [AR]),
 4782:     {Cid, CR} = 
 4783: 	case AR of
 4784: 	    #'ActionRequest'{contextId       = CtxID,
 4785: 			     commandRequests = [CmdReq]} ->
 4786: 		{CtxID, CmdReq};
 4787: 	    _ ->
 4788: 		Err1      = {invalid_action_request, AR},
 4789: 		ED1       = cre_ErrDesc(AR),
 4790: 		ErrReply1 = {discard_ack, ED1},
 4791: 		throw({error, Err1, ErrReply1})
 4792: 	end,
 4793:     Cmd = 
 4794: 	case CR of
 4795: 	    #'CommandRequest'{command = Command} ->
 4796: 		Command;
 4797: 	    _ ->
 4798: 		Err2      = {invalid_command_request, CR},
 4799: 		ED2       = cre_ErrDesc(CR),
 4800: 		ErrReply2 = {discard_ack, ED2},
 4801: 		throw({error, Err2, ErrReply2})
 4802: 	end,
 4803:     NR = 
 4804: 	case Cmd of
 4805: 	    {notifyReq, NotifReq} ->
 4806: 		NotifReq;
 4807: 	    _ ->
 4808: 		Err3      = {invalid_command, Cmd},
 4809: 		ED3       = cre_ErrDesc(Cmd),
 4810: 		ErrReply3 = {discard_ack, ED3},
 4811: 		throw({error, Err3, ErrReply3})
 4812: 	end,
 4813:     {Tid, OED} = 
 4814: 	case NR of
 4815: 	    #'NotifyRequest'{terminationID            = [TermID],
 4816: 			     observedEventsDescriptor = ObsEvsDesc,
 4817: 			     errorDescriptor          = asn1_NOVALUE} ->
 4818: 		{TermID, ObsEvsDesc};
 4819: 	    _ ->
 4820: 		Err4      = {invalid_NR, NR},
 4821: 		ED4       = cre_ErrDesc(NR),
 4822: 		ErrReply4 = {discard_ack, ED4},
 4823: 		throw({error, Err4, ErrReply4})
 4824: 	end,
 4825:     OE = 
 4826: 	case OED of 
 4827: 	    #'ObservedEventsDescriptor'{observedEventLst = [ObsEvLst]} ->
 4828: 		ObsEvLst;
 4829: 	    _ ->
 4830: 		Err5      = {invalid_OED, OED},
 4831: 		ED5       = cre_ErrDesc(NR),
 4832: 		ErrReply5 = {discard_ack, ED5},
 4833: 		throw({error, Err5, ErrReply5})
 4834: 	end,
 4835:     case OE of
 4836: 	#'ObservedEvent'{eventName = "al/of"} ->
 4837: 	    AckData = rarala, 
 4838: 	    Replies = [rarala_mgc_notify_reply_ar(Cid, Tid)],
 4839: 	    Reply   = {{handle_ack, AckData}, Replies},
 4840: 	    {ok, AR, Reply};
 4841: 	_ ->
 4842: 	    Err6      = {invalid_OE, OE},
 4843: 	    ED6       = cre_ErrDesc(OE),
 4844: 	    ErrReply6 = {discard_ack, ED6},
 4845: 	    throw({error, Err6, ErrReply6})
 4846:     end.

 4874: rarala_mgc_service_change_reply_ar(Mid, Cid) ->
 4875:     SCRP  = cre_serviceChangeResParm(Mid),
 4876:     SCRes = cre_serviceChangeResult(SCRP),
 4877:     Root  = #megaco_term_id{id = ["root"]},
 4878:     SCR   = cre_serviceChangeReply([Root], SCRes),
 4879:     CR    = cre_cmdReply(SCR),
 4880:     AR    = cre_actionReply(Cid, [CR]),
 4881:     AR.
 4882: 
 4883: rarala_mgc_notify_reply_ar(Cid, TermId) ->
 4884:     NR    = cre_notifyReply([TermId]),
 4885:     CR    = cre_cmdReply(NR),
 4886:     cre_actionReply(Cid, [CR]).

 4912: rarala_mg_event_sequence(text, tcp) ->
 4913:     DecodeFun = ?rarala_mg_decode_msg_fun(megaco_pretty_text_encoder, []),
 4914:     EncodeFun = ?rarala_mg_encode_msg_fun(megaco_pretty_text_encoder, []),
 4915:     Mid       = {deviceName,"mg"},
 4916:     ServiceChangeReq = rarala_mg_service_change_request_msg(Mid, 1, 0),
 4917:     TermId  = #megaco_term_id{id = ["00000000","00000000","01101101"]},
 4918:     TransId = 2,
 4919:     ReqId   = 1,
 4920:     CtxId   = 1, 
 4921:     NotifyReq = rarala_mg_notify_request_msg(Mid, TermId, 
 4922: 					    TransId, ReqId, CtxId),
 4923:     TransAck = rarala_mg_trans_ack_msg(Mid, TransId),
 4924:     ScrVerifyFun = ?rarala_mg_verify_service_change_rep_msg_fun(),
 4925:     NrVerifyFun  = ?rarala_mg_verify_notify_rep_msg_fun(TermId, 
 4926: 							TransId, ReqId, CtxId),
 4927:     EvSeq = [{debug,  true},
 4928:              {decode, DecodeFun},
 4929:              {encode, EncodeFun},
 4930:              {connect, 2944},
 4931:              {send, "service-change-request", ServiceChangeReq},
 4932:              {expect_receive, "service-change-reply", {ScrVerifyFun, 10000}},
 4933:              {send, "notify request", NotifyReq},
 4934:              {expect_receive, "notify-reply", {NrVerifyFun, 4000}},
 4935:              {expect_receive, "notify-reply", {NrVerifyFun, 4000}},
 4936:              {expect_receive, "notify-reply", {NrVerifyFun, 4000}},
 4937:              {send, "transaction-ack", TransAck},
 4938:              {expect_nothing, 11000},
 4939:              disconnect
 4940:             ],
 4941:     EvSeq.

 4964: rarala_mg_verify_service_change_rep_msg(#'MegacoMessage'{mess = Mess} = M) ->
 4965:     Body = 
 4966: 	case Mess of 
 4967: 	    #'Message'{version     = _V,
 4968:                        mId         = _MgMid,
 4969:                        messageBody = MsgBody} ->
 4970: 		MsgBody;
 4971: 	    _ ->
 4972: 		throw({error, {invalid_Message, Mess}})
 4973: 	end,
 4974:     Trans = 
 4975: 	case Body of
 4976:             {transactions, [Transactions]} ->
 4977: 		Transactions;
 4978: 	    _ ->
 4979: 		throw({error, {invalid_messageBody, Body}})
 4980: 	end,
 4981:     TR = 
 4982: 	case Trans of
 4983:             {transactionReply, TransReply} ->
 4984: 		TransReply;
 4985: 	    _ ->
 4986: 		throw({error, {invalid_transactions, Trans}})
 4987: 	end,
 4988:     TRes = 
 4989: 	case TR of
 4990:             #'TransactionReply'{transactionId = _Tid,
 4991:                                 immAckRequired = asn1_NOVALUE,
 4992:                                 transactionResult = TransRes} ->
 4993: 		TransRes;
 4994: 	    _ ->
 4995: 		throw({error, {invalid_transactionReply, TR}})
 4996: 	end,
 4997:     AR = 
 4998: 	case TRes of
 4999:             {actionReplies, [ActRes]} ->
 5000: 		ActRes;
 5001: 	    _ ->
 5002: 		throw({error, {invalid_transactionResult, TRes}})
 5003: 	end,
 5004:     CR = 
 5005: 	case AR of
 5006:             #'ActionReply'{contextId       = _Cid,
 5007:                            errorDescriptor = asn1_NOVALUE,
 5008:                            contextReply    = _CtxReq,
 5009:                            commandReply    = [CmdRep]} ->
 5010: 		CmdRep;
 5011: 	    _ ->
 5012: 		throw({error, {invalid_actionReplies, AR}})
 5013: 	end,
 5014:     SCR = 
 5015: 	case CR of
 5016:             {serviceChangeReply, ServChRep} ->
 5017: 		ServChRep;
 5018: 	    _ ->
 5019: 		throw({error, {invalid_commandReply, CR}})
 5020: 	end,
 5021:     SCRes = 
 5022: 	case SCR of
 5023:             #'ServiceChangeReply'{terminationID       = _TermID,
 5024:                                   serviceChangeResult = ServChRes} ->
 5025: 		ServChRes;
 5026: 	    _ ->
 5027: 		throw({error, {invalid_serviceChangeReply, SCR}})
 5028: 	end,
 5029:     SCRP = 
 5030: 	case SCRes of
 5031:             {serviceChangeResParms, Parms} ->
 5032: 		Parms;
 5033: 	    _ ->
 5034: 		throw({error, {invalid_serviceChangeResult, SCRes}})
 5035: 	end,
 5036:     case SCRP of
 5037: 	#'ServiceChangeResParm'{serviceChangeMgcId = _MgcMid} ->
 5038:             {ok, M};
 5039: 	_ ->
 5040: 	    {error, {invalid_serviceChangeResParms, SCRP}}
 5041:     end;
 5042: rarala_mg_verify_service_change_rep_msg(Crap) ->
 5043:     {error, {invalid_message, Crap}}.
 5044:

 5056: 	      "~n   M:       ~p"

 5061: 	      "~n", [M, TermId, TransId, Rid, Cid]),
 5062:     Body = 
 5063: 	case Mess of 
 5064: 	    #'Message'{version     = ?VERSION,
 5065:                        mId         = _Mid,
 5066:                        messageBody = MsgBody} ->
 5067: 		MsgBody;
 5068: 	    _ ->
 5069: 		throw({error, {invalid_Message, Mess}})
 5070: 	end,
 5071:     Trans = 
 5072: 	case Body of
 5073:             {transactions, [Transactions]} ->
 5074: 		Transactions;
 5075: 	    _ ->
 5076: 		throw({error, {invalid_messageBody, Body}})
 5077: 	end,
 5078:     TR = 
 5079: 	case Trans of
 5080:             {transactionReply, TransReply} ->
 5081: 		TransReply;
 5082: 	    _ ->
 5083: 		throw({error, {invalid_transactions, Trans}})
 5084: 	end,
 5085:     TRes =

 5087:             #'TransactionReply'{transactionId     = TransId,
 5088:                                 immAckRequired    = 'NULL',
 5089:                                 transactionResult = TransRes} ->
 5090: 		TransRes;
 5091: 	    _ ->
 5092: 		throw({error, {invalid_transactionReply, TR}})
 5093: 	end,
 5094:     AR = 
 5095: 	case TRes of
 5096:             {actionReplies, [ActRes]} ->
 5097: 		ActRes;
 5098: 	    _ ->
 5099: 		throw({error, {invalid_transactionResult, TRes}})
 5100: 	end,
 5101:     CR =

 5103:             #'ActionReply'{contextId       = Cid,
 5104:                            errorDescriptor = asn1_NOVALUE,
 5105:                            contextReply    = _CtxReq,
 5106:                            commandReply    = [CmdRep]} ->
 5107: 		CmdRep;
 5108: 	    _ ->
 5109: 		throw({error, {invalid_actionReplies, AR}})
 5110: 	end,
 5111:     NR = 
 5112: 	case CR of
 5113:             {notifyReply, NotifyReply} ->
 5114: 		NotifyReply;
 5115: 	    _ ->
 5116: 		throw({error, {invalid_commandReply, CR}})
 5117: 	end,
 5118:     case NR of
 5119: 	#'NotifyReply'{terminationID   = [TermId],
 5120: 		       errorDescriptor = asn1_NOVALUE} ->
 5121: 	    {ok, M};
 5122: 	_ ->
 5123: 	    {error, {invalid_notifyReply, NR}}
 5124:     end;
 5125: rarala_mg_verify_notify_rep_msg(Crap, _TermId, _TransId, _Rid, _Cid) ->
 5126:     {error, {invalid_message, Crap}}.

 5128: rarala_mg_service_change_request_ar(_Mid, Cid) ->
 5129:     Prof  = cre_serviceChangeProf("resgw", 1),
 5130:     SCP   = cre_serviceChangeParm(restart, ["901 mg col boot"], Prof),
 5131:     Root  = #megaco_term_id{id = ["root"]},
 5132:     SCR   = cre_serviceChangeReq([Root], SCP),
 5133:     CMD   = cre_command(SCR),
 5134:     CR    = cre_cmdReq(CMD),
 5135:     cre_actionReq(Cid, [CR]).
 5136: 
 5137: rarala_mg_service_change_request_msg(Mid, TransId, Cid) ->
 5138:     AR    = rarala_mg_service_change_request_ar(Mid, Cid),
 5139:     TR    = cre_transReq(TransId, [AR]),
 5140:     Trans = cre_transaction(TR),
 5141:     Mess  = cre_message(?VERSION, Mid, cre_transactions([Trans])),
 5142:     cre_megacoMessage(Mess).
 5143: 
 5144: rarala_mg_notify_request_ar(Rid, Tid, Cid) ->
 5145:     TT      = cre_timeNotation("19990729", "22000000"),
 5146:     Ev      = cre_obsEvent("al/of", TT),
 5147:     EvsDesc = cre_obsEvsDesc(Rid, [Ev]),
 5148:     NR      = cre_notifyReq([Tid], EvsDesc),
 5149:     CMD     = cre_command(NR),
 5150:     CR      = cre_cmdReq(CMD),
 5151:     cre_actionReq(Cid, [CR]).
 5152: 
 5153: rarala_mg_notify_request_msg(Mid, TermId, TransId, Rid, Cid) ->
 5154:     AR      = rarala_mg_notify_request_ar(Rid, TermId, Cid),
 5155:     TR      = cre_transReq(TransId, [AR]),
 5156:     Trans   = cre_transaction(TR),
 5157:     Mess    = cre_message(?VERSION, Mid, cre_transactions([Trans])),
 5158:     cre_megacoMessage(Mess).
 5159: 
 5160: rarala_mg_trans_ack_msg(Mid, TransId) ->
 5161:     TR    = cre_transRespAck(cre_transAck(TransId)),
 5162:     Trans = cre_transaction(TR),
 5163:     Mess  = cre_message(?VERSION, Mid, cre_transactions([Trans])),
 5164:     cre_megacoMessage(Mess).

 5170: trans_req_and_reply_and_req(suite) ->
 5171:     [];
 5172: trans_req_and_reply_and_req(doc) ->
 5173:     ["Receive a transaction request, send a reply (discard ack)"
 5174:      "then receive the same reply again after the timeout. "
 5175:      "The MGC is a megaco instance (megaco event sequence) and the "
 5176:      "MG is emulated (tcp event sequence)"];
 5177: trans_req_and_reply_and_req(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 5178:     Pre = fun() ->
 5179:                   %% <CONDITIONAL-SKIP>
 5180:                   Skippable = [{unix, [darwin, linux]}],
 5181:                   Condition = fun() -> ?OS_BASED_SKIP(Skippable) end,
 5182:                   ?NON_PC_TC_MAYBE_SKIP(Config, Condition),
 5183:                   %% </CONDITIONAL-SKIP>
 5184: 
 5185:                   MgcNode = make_node_name(mgc),
 5186:                   MgNode  = make_node_name(mg),
 5187:                   d("start nodes: "
 5188:                     "~n      MgcNode: ~p"
 5189:                     "~n      MgNode:  ~p", 
 5190:                     [MgcNode, MgNode]),
 5191:                   Nodes = [MgcNode, MgNode], 
 5192:                   ok = ?START_NODES(Nodes, true),
 5193:                   Nodes
 5194:           end,
 5195:     Case = fun do_trans_req_and_reply_and_req/1,
 5196:     Post = fun(Nodes) ->
 5197:                    d("stop nodes"),
 5198:                    ?STOP_NODES(lists:reverse(Nodes))
 5199:            end,
 5200:     try_tc(request_and_no_reply, Pre, Case, Post).
 5201: 
 5202: do_trans_req_and_reply_and_req([MgcNode, MgNode]) ->
 5203:     d("[MGC] start the simulator "),
 5204:     {ok, Mgc} = megaco_test_megaco_generator:start_link("MGC", MgcNode),
 5205: 
 5206:     d("[MGC] create the event sequence"),
 5207:     MgcEvSeq = trarar_mgc_event_sequence(text, tcp),
 5208: 
 5209:     i("wait some time before starting the MGC simulation"),
 5210:     sleep(1000),
 5211: 
 5212:     d("[MGC] start the simulation"),
 5213:     {ok, MgcId} = megaco_test_megaco_generator:exec(Mgc, MgcEvSeq),
 5214: 
 5215:     %% i("wait some time before starting the MG simulator"),
 5216:     %% sleep(1000),
 5217: 
 5218:     i("await MGC ready announcement"),
 5219:     receive
 5220:         announce_mgc ->
 5221:             i("received MGC ready announcement"),
 5222:             ok
 5223:     end,
 5224: 
 5225:     d("[MG] start the simulator (generator)"),
 5226:     {ok, Mg} = megaco_test_tcp_generator:start_link("MG", MgNode),
 5227: 
 5228:     d("[MG] create the event sequence"),
 5229:     MgEvSeq = trarar_mg_event_sequence(text, tcp),
 5230: 
 5231:     i("wait some time before starting the MG simulation"),
 5232:     sleep(1000),
 5233: 
 5234:     d("[MG] start the simulation"),
 5235:     {ok, MgId} = megaco_test_tcp_generator:exec(Mg, MgEvSeq),
 5236: 
 5237:     d("await the generator reply(s)"),
 5238:     await_completion([MgcId, MgId], 60000),
 5239: 
 5240:     %% Tell Mgc to stop
 5241:     i("[MGC] stop generator"),
 5242:     megaco_test_megaco_generator:stop(Mgc),
 5243: 
 5244:     %% Tell Mg to stop
 5245:     i("[MG] stop generator"),
 5246:     megaco_test_tcp_generator:stop(Mg),
 5247: 
 5248:     i("done", []),
 5249:     ok.
 5250: 
 5251: 
 5252: %%
 5253: %% MGC generator stuff
 5254: %% 
 5255: -ifdef(megaco_hipe_special).
 5256: -define(trarar_mgc_verify_handle_connect_fun(), 
 5257:         {?MODULE, trarar_mgc_verify_handle_connect, []}).
 5258: -define(trarar_mgc_verify_service_change_req_fun(Mid),
 5259:         {?MODULE, trarar_mgc_verify_service_change_req, [Mid]}).
 5260: -define(trarar_mgc_verify_notify_req_fun(Cid),
 5261:         {?MODULE, trarar_mgc_verify_notify_req, [Cid]}).
 5262: -define(trarar_mgc_verify_handle_disconnect_fun(),
 5263:         {?MODULE, trarar_mgc_verify_handle_disconnect, []}).
 5264: -else.
 5265: -define(trarar_mgc_verify_handle_connect_fun(), 
 5266:         fun trarar_mgc_verify_handle_connect/1).
 5267: -define(trarar_mgc_verify_service_change_req_fun(Mid),
 5268:         trarar_mgc_verify_service_change_req_fun(Mid)).
 5269: -define(trarar_mgc_verify_notify_req_fun(Cid),
 5270: 	trarar_mgc_verify_notify_req_fun(Cid)).
 5271: -define(trarar_mgc_verify_handle_disconnect_fun(),
 5272: 	fun trarar_mgc_verify_handle_disconnect/1).
 5273: -endif.
