 5275: trarar_mgc_event_sequence(text, tcp) ->
 5276:     CTRL = self(),
 5277:     Mid = {deviceName,"ctrl"},
 5278:     RI = [
 5279: 	  {port,             2944},
 5280: 	  {encoding_module,  megaco_pretty_text_encoder},
 5281: 	  {encoding_config,  []},
 5282: 	  {transport_module, megaco_tcp}
 5283: 	 ],
 5284:     ConnectVerify          = ?trarar_mgc_verify_handle_connect_fun(), 
 5285:     ServiceChangeReqVerify = ?trarar_mgc_verify_service_change_req_fun(Mid),
 5286:     NotifyReqVerify1       = ?trarar_mgc_verify_notify_req_fun(1),
 5287:     NotifyReqVerify2       = ?trarar_mgc_verify_notify_req_fun(2),
 5288:     NotifyReqVerify3       = ?trarar_mgc_verify_notify_req_fun(3),
 5289:     NotifyReqVerify4       = ?trarar_mgc_verify_notify_req_fun(4),
 5290:     DiscoVerify            = ?trarar_mgc_verify_handle_disconnect_fun(), 
 5291:     EvSeq = [
 5292: 	     {debug, true},
 5293: 	     {megaco_trace, disable},
 5294: 	     megaco_start,
 5295: 	     {megaco_start_user, Mid, RI, []},
 5296:              {megaco_update_user_info, reply_timer, 2000},
 5297: 	     start_transport,
 5298: 	     listen,
 5299: 
 5300:              %% ANNOUNCE READY
 5301:              {trigger, fun() -> CTRL ! announce_mgc end}, 
 5302: 
 5303: 	     {megaco_callback, handle_connect,       ConnectVerify},
 5304: 	     {megaco_callback, handle_trans_request, ServiceChangeReqVerify},
 5305: 	     {megaco_callback, handle_trans_request, NotifyReqVerify1},
 5306: 	     {megaco_callback, handle_trans_request, NotifyReqVerify2},
 5307:              {megaco_update_conn_info, reply_timer,  4000},
 5308: 	     {megaco_callback, handle_trans_request, NotifyReqVerify3},
 5309: 	     {megaco_callback, handle_trans_request, NotifyReqVerify4},
 5310: 	     {megaco_callback, handle_disconnect,    DiscoVerify},
 5311: 	     {sleep, 1000},
 5312: 	     megaco_stop_user,
 5313: 	     megaco_stop
 5314: 	    ],
 5315:     EvSeq.
 5316: 
 5317: 
 5318: trarar_mgc_verify_handle_connect({handle_connect, CH, ?VERSION}) -> 
 5319:     io:format("trarar_mgc_verify_handle_connect -> ok"
 5320: 	      "~n   CH: ~p~n", [CH]),
 5321:     {ok, CH, ok};
 5322: trarar_mgc_verify_handle_connect(Else) ->
 5323:     io:format("trarar_mgc_verify_handle_connect -> unknown"
 5324: 	      "~n   Else: ~p~n", [Else]),
 5325:     {error, Else, ok}.
 5326: 
 5327: -ifndef(megaco_hipe_special).
 5328: trarar_mgc_verify_service_change_req_fun(Mid) ->
 5329:     fun(Req) -> 
 5330: 	    trarar_mgc_verify_service_change_req(Req, Mid) 
 5331:     end.
 5332: -endif.
 5333: 
 5334: trarar_mgc_verify_service_change_req(
 5335:   {handle_trans_request, _, ?VERSION, [AR]}, Mid) ->
 5336:     (catch trarar_mgc_do_verify_service_change_req(AR, Mid));
 5337: trarar_mgc_verify_service_change_req(Crap, _Mid) ->
 5338:     ED = cre_ErrDesc(Crap),
 5339:     ErrReply = {discard_ack, ED},
 5340:     {error, Crap, ErrReply}.
 5341: 
 5342: trarar_mgc_do_verify_service_change_req(AR, Mid) ->
 5343:     io:format("trarar_mgc_verify_service_change_req -> ok"
 5344: 	      "~n   AR:  ~p"
 5345: 	      "~n   Mid: ~p"
 5346: 	      "~n", [AR, Mid]),
 5347:     CR = 
 5348: 	case AR of
 5349: 	    #'ActionRequest'{commandRequests = [CmdReq]} ->
 5350: 		CmdReq;
 5351: 	    _ ->
 5352:                 Err1      = {invalid_action_request, AR},
 5353:                 ED1       = cre_ErrDesc(AR),
 5354:                 ErrReply1 = {discard_ack, ED1},
 5355:                 throw({error, Err1, ErrReply1})
 5356: 	end,
 5357:     Cmd =
 5358:         case CR of
 5359:             #'CommandRequest'{command = Command} ->
 5360:                 Command;
 5361:             _ ->
 5362:                 Err2      = {invalid_command_request, CR},
 5363:                 ED2       = cre_ErrDesc(CR),
 5364:                 ErrReply2 = {discard_ack, ED2},
 5365:                 throw({error, Err2, ErrReply2})
 5366:         end,
 5367:     {Tid, Parms} =
 5368:         case Cmd of
 5369:             {serviceChangeReq,
 5370:              #'ServiceChangeRequest'{terminationID = [TermID],
 5371:                                      serviceChangeParms = ServChParms}} ->
 5372:                 {TermID, ServChParms};
 5373:             _ ->
 5374:                 Err3      = {invalid_command, Cmd},
 5375:                 ED3       = cre_ErrDesc(Cmd),
 5376:                 ErrReply3 = {discard_ack, ED3},
 5377:                 throw({error, Err3, ErrReply3})
 5378:         end,
 5379:     case Tid of
 5380:         #megaco_term_id{contains_wildcards = false, id = ["root"]} ->
 5381:             ok;
 5382:         _ ->
 5383:             Err4      = {invalid_termination_id, Tid},
 5384:             ED4       = cre_ErrDesc(Tid),
 5385:             ErrReply4 = {discard_ack, ED4},
 5386:             throw({error, Err4, ErrReply4})
 5387:     end,
 5388:     case Parms of
 5389:         #'ServiceChangeParm'{serviceChangeMethod = restart,
 5390:                              serviceChangeReason = [[$9,$0,$1|_]]} ->
 5391:             AckData = [trarar_mgc_service_change_reply_ar(Mid, 1)],
 5392:             Reply   = {discard_ack, AckData},
 5393:             {ok, AR, Reply};
 5394:         _ ->
 5395:             Err5      = {invalid_SCP, Parms},
 5396:             ED5       = cre_ErrDesc(Parms),
 5397:             ErrReply5 = {discard_ack, ED5},
 5398:             {error, Err5, ErrReply5}
 5399:     end.
 5400: 
 5401: -ifndef(megaco_hipe_special).
 5402: trarar_mgc_verify_notify_req_fun(Cid) ->
 5403:     fun(Req) -> 
 5404: 	    trarar_mgc_verify_notify_req(Req, Cid) 
 5405:     end.
 5406: -endif.
 5407: 
 5408: trarar_mgc_verify_notify_req({handle_trans_request, _, ?VERSION, [AR]}, Cid) ->
 5409:     (catch trarar_mgc_do_verify_notify_req(AR, Cid));
 5410: trarar_mgc_verify_notify_req(Crap, _Cid) ->
 5411:     ED       = cre_ErrDesc(Crap),
 5412:     ErrReply = {discard_ack, ED},
 5413:     {error, Crap, ErrReply}.
 5414:     
 5415: trarar_mgc_do_verify_notify_req(AR, Cid) ->
 5416:     io:format("trarar_mgc_do_verify_notify_req -> entry with"
 5417: 	      "~n   AR:  ~p"
 5418: 	      "~n   Cid: ~p"
 5419: 	      "~n", [AR, Cid]),
 5420:     {ContextID, CR} =
 5421: 	case AR of
 5422: 	    #'ActionRequest'{contextId       = CtxID, 
 5423: 			     commandRequests = [CmdReq]} when (CtxID == Cid) ->
 5424: 		{CtxID, CmdReq};
 5425: 	    _ ->
 5426:                 Err1      = {invalid_action_request, AR},
 5427:                 ED1       = cre_ErrDesc(AR),
 5428:                 ErrReply1 = {discard_ack, ED1},
 5429:                 throw({error, Err1, ErrReply1})
 5430:         end,
 5431:     Cmd =
 5432: 	case CR of
 5433: 	    #'CommandRequest'{command = Command} ->
 5434: 		Command;
 5435: 	    _ ->
 5436:                 Err2      = {invalid_command_request, CR},
 5437:                 ED2       = cre_ErrDesc(CR),
 5438:                 ErrReply2 = {discard_ack, ED2},
 5439:                 throw({error, Err2, ErrReply2})
 5440:         end,
 5441:     NR =
 5442:         case Cmd of
 5443: 	    {notifyReq, NotifReq} ->
 5444: 		NotifReq;
 5445: 	    _ ->
 5446:                 Err3      = {invalid_command, Cmd},
 5447:                 ED3       = cre_ErrDesc(Cmd),
 5448:                 ErrReply3 = {discard_ack, ED3},
 5449:                 throw({error, Err3, ErrReply3})
 5450:         end,
 5451:     {Tid, OED} =
 5452:         case NR of
 5453:             #'NotifyRequest'{terminationID            = [TermID],
 5454:                              observedEventsDescriptor = ObsEvsDesc,
 5455:                              errorDescriptor          = asn1_NOVALUE} ->
 5456:                 {TermID, ObsEvsDesc};
 5457:             _ ->
 5458:                 Err4      = {invalid_NR, NR},
 5459:                 ED4       = cre_ErrDesc(NR),
 5460:                 ErrReply4 = {discard_ack, ED4},
 5461:                 throw({error, Err4, ErrReply4})
 5462:         end,
 5463:     OE =
 5464: 	case OED of
 5465: 	    #'ObservedEventsDescriptor'{observedEventLst = [ObsEvLst]} ->
 5466: 		ObsEvLst;
 5467:             _ ->
 5468:                 Err5      = {invalid_OED, OED},
 5469:                 ED5       = cre_ErrDesc(NR),
 5470:                 ErrReply5 = {discard_ack, ED5},
 5471:                 throw({error, Err5, ErrReply5})
 5472:         end,
 5473:     case OE of
 5474: 	#'ObservedEvent'{eventName = "al/of"} ->
 5475:             Replies = [trarar_mgc_notify_reply_ar(ContextID, Tid)],
 5476:             Reply   = {discard_ack, Replies},
 5477:             {ok, AR, Reply};
 5478:         _ ->
 5479:             Err6      = {invalid_OE, OE},
 5480:             ED6       = cre_ErrDesc(OE),
 5481:             ErrReply6 = {discard_ack, ED6},
 5482:             {error, Err6, ErrReply6}
 5483:     end.
 5484: 
 5485: trarar_mgc_verify_handle_disconnect({handle_disconnect, CH, ?VERSION, R}) -> 
 5486:     io:format("trarar_mgc_verify_handle_disconnect -> ok"
 5487: 	      "~n   CH: ~p"
 5488: 	      "~n   R:  ~p"
 5489: 	      "~n", [CH, R]),
 5490:     {ok, CH, ok};
 5491: trarar_mgc_verify_handle_disconnect(Else) ->
 5492:     io:format("trarar_mgc_verify_handle_disconnect -> unknown"
 5493: 	      "~n   Else: ~p~n", [Else]),
 5494:     {error, Else, ok}.
 5495: 
 5496: 
 5497: trarar_mgc_service_change_reply_ar(Mid, Cid) ->
 5498:     SCRP  = cre_serviceChangeResParm(Mid),
 5499:     SCRes = cre_serviceChangeResult(SCRP),
 5500:     Root  = #megaco_term_id{id = ["root"]},
 5501:     SCR   = cre_serviceChangeReply([Root], SCRes),
 5502:     CR    = cre_cmdReply(SCR),
 5503:     cre_actionReply(Cid, [CR]).
 5504: 
 5505: trarar_mgc_notify_reply_ar(Cid, TermId) ->
 5506:     NR    = cre_notifyReply([TermId]),
 5507:     CR    = cre_cmdReply(NR),
 5508:     cre_actionReply(Cid, [CR]).
 5509: 
 5510: %% trarar_mgc_notify_reply(Mid, TransId, Cid, TermId) ->
 5511: %%     AR    = trarar_mgc_notify_reply_ar(Cid, TermId),
 5512: %%     TRes  = cre_transResult([AR]),
 5513: %%     TR    = cre_transReply(TransId, TRes),
 5514: %%     Trans = cre_transaction(TR),
 5515: %%     Mess  = cre_message(?VERSION, Mid, cre_transactions([Trans])),
 5516: %%     cre_megacoMessage(Mess).
 5517: 
 5518: 
 5519: %%
 5520: %% MG generator stuff
 5521: %%
 5522: -ifdef(megaco_hipe_special).
 5523: -define(trarar_mg_decode_msg_fun(Mod, Conf),
 5524: 	{?MODULE, decode_msg, [Mod, Conf]}).
 5525: -define(trarar_mg_encode_msg_fun(Mod, Conf),
 5526: 	{?MODULE, encode_msg, [Mod, Conf]}).
 5527: -define(trarar_mg_verify_service_change_rep_msg_fun(),
 5528: 	{?MODULE, trarar_mg_verify_service_change_rep_msg, []}).
 5529: -define(trarar_mg_verify_notify_rep_msg_fun(TermId, TransId, ReqId, CtxId),
 5530: 	{?MODULE, trarar_mg_verify_notify_rep_msg, [TermId, TransId, ReqId, CtxId]}).
 5531: -else.
 5532: -define(trarar_mg_decode_msg_fun(Mod, Conf),
 5533: 	trarar_mg_decode_msg_fun(Mod, Conf)).
 5534: -define(trarar_mg_encode_msg_fun(Mod, Conf),
 5535: 	trarar_mg_encode_msg_fun(Mod, Conf)).
 5536: -define(trarar_mg_verify_service_change_rep_msg_fun(),
 5537: 	trarar_mg_verify_service_change_rep_msg_fun()).
 5538: -define(trarar_mg_verify_notify_rep_msg_fun(TermId, TransId, ReqId, CtxId),
 5539: 	trarar_mg_verify_notify_rep_msg_fun(TermId, TransId, ReqId, CtxId)).
 5540: -endif.
 5541: 
 5542: trarar_mg_event_sequence(text, tcp) ->
 5543:     DecodeFun = ?trarar_mg_decode_msg_fun(megaco_pretty_text_encoder, []),
 5544:     EncodeFun = ?trarar_mg_encode_msg_fun(megaco_pretty_text_encoder, []),
 5545:     Mid       = {deviceName,"mg"},
 5546:     ServiceChangeReq = trarar_mg_service_change_request_msg(Mid, 1, 0),
 5547:     TermId  = #megaco_term_id{id = ["00000000","00000000","01101101"]},
 5548:     NotifyReq1 = 
 5549: 	trarar_mg_notify_request_msg(Mid, TermId, 2, 1, 1),
 5550:     NotifyReq2 = 
 5551: 	trarar_mg_notify_request_msg(Mid, TermId, 2, 2, 2),
 5552:     NotifyReq3 = 
 5553: 	trarar_mg_notify_request_msg(Mid, TermId, 2, 3, 3),
 5554:     NotifyReq4 = 
 5555: 	trarar_mg_notify_request_msg(Mid, TermId, 2, 4, 4),
 5556:     ScrVerifyFun = ?trarar_mg_verify_service_change_rep_msg_fun(),
 5557:     NrVerifyFun1 = 
 5558: 	?trarar_mg_verify_notify_rep_msg_fun(TermId, 2, 1, 1),
 5559:     NrVerifyFun2 = 
 5560: 	?trarar_mg_verify_notify_rep_msg_fun(TermId, 2, 2, 2),
 5561:     NrVerifyFun3 = 
 5562: 	?trarar_mg_verify_notify_rep_msg_fun(TermId, 2, 3, 3),
 5563:     NrVerifyFun4 = 
 5564: 	?trarar_mg_verify_notify_rep_msg_fun(TermId, 2, 4, 4),
 5565:     EvSeq = [{debug,  true},
 5566:              {decode, DecodeFun},
 5567:              {encode, EncodeFun},
 5568:              {connect, 2944},
 5569: 	     
 5570:              {send, "service-change-request", ServiceChangeReq},
 5571:              {expect_receive, "service-change-reply", {ScrVerifyFun, 10000}},
 5572: 
 5573: 	     %% the original setting for reply timer is 2000
 5574:              {send, "notify request 1", NotifyReq1},
 5575:              {expect_receive, "notify-reply 1", {NrVerifyFun1, 2500}},
 5576: 	     {sleep, 1000}, 
 5577:              {send, "notify request 2", NotifyReq2},
 5578:              {expect_receive, "notify-reply 2 (resend of 1)", {NrVerifyFun1, 2500}},
 5579: 	     {sleep, 3000}, % reply timer is set to 2000
 5580:              {send, "notify request 3 (same as 2)", NotifyReq2},
 5581:              {expect_receive, "notify-reply 3", {NrVerifyFun2, 2500}},
 5582: 
 5583: 	     %% reply timer is now set to 4000 but previous was 2000
 5584: 	     %% so, 3000 is enough to let the timer running with the
 5585: 	     %% previous settings (2000) to time out
 5586: 	     {sleep, 3000}, 
 5587:              {send, "notify request 4", NotifyReq3},
 5588:              {expect_receive, "notify-reply 4", {NrVerifyFun3, 4500}},
 5589: 	     {sleep, 5000}, 
 5590:              {send, "notify request 5", NotifyReq4},
 5591:              {expect_receive, "notify-reply 5", {NrVerifyFun4, 4500}},
 5592: 
 5593:              {expect_nothing, 5000},
 5594:              disconnect
 5595:             ],
 5596:     EvSeq.
 5597: 
 5598: -ifndef(megaco_hipe_special).
 5599: trarar_mg_encode_msg_fun(Mod, Conf) ->
 5600:     fun(M) ->
 5601:             encode_msg(M, Mod, Conf)
 5602:     end.
 5603: -endif.
 5604: 
 5605: -ifndef(megaco_hipe_special).
 5606: trarar_mg_decode_msg_fun(Mod, Conf) ->
 5607:     fun(M) ->
 5608:             decode_msg(M, Mod, Conf)
 5609:     end.
 5610: -endif.
 5611: 
 5612: -ifndef(megaco_hipe_special).
 5613: trarar_mg_verify_service_change_rep_msg_fun() ->
 5614:     fun(Msg) -> 
 5615: 	    (catch trarar_mg_verify_service_change_rep_msg(Msg)) 
 5616:     end.
 5617: -endif.
 5618: 
 5619: trarar_mg_verify_service_change_rep_msg(#'MegacoMessage'{mess = Mess} = M) ->
 5620:     Body = 
 5621: 	case Mess of 
 5622: 	    #'Message'{version     = _V,
 5623:                        mId         = _MgMid,
 5624:                        messageBody = MsgBody} ->
 5625: 		MsgBody;
 5626: 	    _ ->
 5627: 		throw({error, {invalid_Message, Mess}})
 5628: 	end,
 5629:     Trans = 
 5630: 	case Body of
 5631:             {transactions, [Transactions]} ->
 5632: 		Transactions;
 5633: 	    _ ->
 5634: 		throw({error, {invalid_messageBody, Body}})
 5635: 	end,
 5636:     TR = 
 5637: 	case Trans of
 5638:             {transactionReply, TransReply} ->
 5639: 		TransReply;
 5640: 	    _ ->
 5641: 		throw({error, {invalid_transactions, Trans}})
 5642: 	end,
 5643:     TRes = 
 5644: 	case TR of
 5645:             #'TransactionReply'{transactionId = _Tid,
 5646:                                 immAckRequired = asn1_NOVALUE,
 5647:                                 transactionResult = TransRes} ->
 5648: 		TransRes;
 5649: 	    _ ->
 5650: 		throw({error, {invalid_transactionReply, TR}})
 5651: 	end,
 5652:     AR = 
 5653: 	case TRes of
 5654:             {actionReplies, [ActRes]} ->
 5655: 		ActRes;
 5656: 	    _ ->
 5657: 		throw({error, {invalid_transactionResult, TRes}})
 5658: 	end,
 5659:     CR = 
 5660: 	case AR of
 5661:             #'ActionReply'{contextId       = _Cid,
 5662:                            errorDescriptor = asn1_NOVALUE,
 5663:                            contextReply    = _CtxReq,
 5664:                            commandReply    = [CmdRep]} ->
 5665: 		CmdRep;
 5666: 	    _ ->
 5667: 		throw({error, {invalid_actionReplies, AR}})
 5668: 	end,
 5669:     SCR = 
 5670: 	case CR of
 5671:             {serviceChangeReply, ServChRep} ->
 5672: 		ServChRep;
 5673: 	    _ ->
 5674: 		throw({error, {invalid_commandReply, CR}})
 5675: 	end,
 5676:     SCRes = 
 5677: 	case SCR of
 5678:             #'ServiceChangeReply'{terminationID       = _TermID,
 5679:                                   serviceChangeResult = ServChRes} ->
 5680: 		ServChRes;
 5681: 	    _ ->
 5682: 		throw({error, {invalid_serviceChangeReply, SCR}})
 5683: 	end,
 5684:     SCRP = 
 5685: 	case SCRes of
 5686:             {serviceChangeResParms, Parms} ->
 5687: 		Parms;
 5688: 	    _ ->
 5689: 		throw({error, {invalid_serviceChangeResult, SCRes}})
 5690: 	end,
 5691:     case SCRP of
 5692: 	#'ServiceChangeResParm'{serviceChangeMgcId = _MgcMid} ->
 5693:             {ok, M};
 5694: 	_ ->
 5695: 	    {error, {invalid_serviceChangeResParms, SCRP}}
 5696:     end;
 5697: trarar_mg_verify_service_change_rep_msg(Crap) ->
 5698:     {error, {invalid_message, Crap}}.
 5699: 
 5700: -ifndef(megaco_hipe_special).
 5701: trarar_mg_verify_notify_rep_msg_fun(TermId, TransId, Rid, Cid) ->
 5702:     fun(Msg) -> 
 5703: 	    (catch trarar_mg_verify_notify_rep_msg(Msg, 
 5704: 						   TermId, TransId, Rid, Cid)) 
 5705:     end.
 5706: -endif.
 5707: 
 5708: trarar_mg_verify_notify_rep_msg(#'MegacoMessage'{mess = Mess} = M,
 5709: 				TermId, TransId, Rid, Cid) ->
 5710:     io:format("trarar_mg_verify_notify_rep_msg -> entry with"
 5711: 	      "~n   M:       ~p"
 5712: 	      "~n   TermId:  ~p"
 5713: 	      "~n   TransId: ~p"
 5714: 	      "~n   Rid:     ~p"
 5715: 	      "~n   Cid:     ~p"
 5716: 	      "~n", [M, TermId, TransId, Rid, Cid]),
 5717:     Body = 
 5718: 	case Mess of 
 5719: 	    #'Message'{version     = ?VERSION,
 5720:                        mId         = _Mid,
 5721:                        messageBody = MsgBody} ->
 5722: 		MsgBody;
 5723: 	    _ ->
 5724: 		throw({error, {invalid_Message, Mess}})
 5725: 	end,
 5726:     io:format("trarar_mg_verify_notify_rep_msg -> "
 5727: 	      "~n   Body: ~p"
 5728: 	      "~n", [Body]),
 5729:     Trans = 
 5730: 	case Body of
 5731:             {transactions, [Transactions]} ->
 5732: 		Transactions;
 5733: 	    _ ->
 5734: 		throw({error, {invalid_messageBody, Body}})
 5735: 	end,
 5736:     io:format("trarar_mg_verify_notify_rep_msg -> "
 5737: 	      "~n   Trans: ~p"
 5738: 	      "~n", [Trans]),
 5739:     TR = 
 5740: 	case Trans of
 5741:             {transactionReply, TransReply} ->
 5742: 		TransReply;
 5743: 	    _ ->
 5744: 		throw({error, {invalid_transactions, Trans}})
 5745: 	end,
 5746:     io:format("trarar_mg_verify_notify_rep_msg -> "
 5747: 	      "~n   TR: ~p"
 5748: 	      "~n", [TR]),
 5749:     TRes = 
 5750: 	case TR of
 5751:             #'TransactionReply'{transactionId     = TransId,
 5752:                                 immAckRequired    = asn1_NOVALUE,
 5753:                                 transactionResult = TransRes} ->
 5754: 		TransRes;
 5755: 	    _ ->
 5756: 		throw({error, {invalid_transactionReply, TR}})
 5757: 	end,
 5758:     io:format("trarar_mg_verify_notify_rep_msg -> "
 5759: 	      "~n   TRes: ~p"
 5760: 	      "~n", [TRes]),
 5761:     AR = 
 5762: 	case TRes of
 5763:             {actionReplies, [ActRes]} ->
 5764: 		ActRes;
 5765: 	    _ ->
 5766: 		throw({error, {invalid_transactionResult, TRes}})
 5767: 	end,
 5768:     io:format("trarar_mg_verify_notify_rep_msg -> "
 5769: 	      "~n   AR: ~p"
 5770: 	      "~n", [AR]),
 5771:     CR = 
 5772: 	case AR of
 5773:             #'ActionReply'{contextId       = Cid,
 5774:                            errorDescriptor = asn1_NOVALUE,
 5775:                            contextReply    = _CtxReq,
 5776:                            commandReply    = [CmdRep]} ->
 5777: 		CmdRep;
 5778: 	    _ ->
 5779: 		throw({error, {invalid_actionReplies, AR}})
 5780: 	end,
 5781:     NR = 
 5782: 	case CR of
 5783:             {notifyReply, NotifyReply} ->
 5784: 		NotifyReply;
 5785: 	    _ ->
 5786: 		throw({error, {invalid_commandReply, CR}})
 5787: 	end,
 5788:     case NR of
 5789: 	#'NotifyReply'{terminationID   = [TermId],
 5790: 		       errorDescriptor = asn1_NOVALUE} ->
 5791: 	    {ok, M};
 5792: 	_ ->
 5793: 	    {error, {invalid_notifyReply, NR}}
 5794:     end;
 5795: trarar_mg_verify_notify_rep_msg(Crap, _TermId, _TransId, _Rid, _Cid) ->
 5796:     {error, {invalid_message, Crap}}.
 5797: 
 5798: trarar_mg_service_change_request_ar(_Mid, Cid) ->
 5799:     Prof  = cre_serviceChangeProf("resgw", 1),
 5800:     SCP   = cre_serviceChangeParm(restart, ["901 mg col boot"], Prof),
 5801:     Root  = #megaco_term_id{id = ["root"]},
 5802:     SCR   = cre_serviceChangeReq([Root], SCP),
 5803:     CMD   = cre_command(SCR),
 5804:     CR    = cre_cmdReq(CMD),
 5805:     cre_actionReq(Cid, [CR]).
 5806: 
 5807: trarar_mg_service_change_request_msg(Mid, TransId, Cid) ->
 5808:     AR    = trarar_mg_service_change_request_ar(Mid, Cid),
 5809:     TR    = cre_transReq(TransId, [AR]),
 5810:     Trans = cre_transaction(TR),
 5811:     Mess  = cre_message(?VERSION, Mid, cre_transactions([Trans])),
 5812:     cre_megacoMessage(Mess).
 5813: 
 5814: trarar_mg_notify_request_ar(Rid, Tid, Cid) ->
 5815:     TT      = cre_timeNotation("19990729", "22000000"),
 5816:     Ev      = cre_obsEvent("al/of", TT),
 5817:     EvsDesc = cre_obsEvsDesc(Rid, [Ev]),
 5818:     NR      = cre_notifyReq([Tid], EvsDesc),
 5819:     CMD     = cre_command(NR),
 5820:     CR      = cre_cmdReq(CMD),
 5821:     cre_actionReq(Cid, [CR]).
 5822: 
 5823: trarar_mg_notify_request_msg(Mid, TermId, TransId, Rid, Cid) ->
 5824:     AR      = trarar_mg_notify_request_ar(Rid, TermId, Cid),
 5825:     TR      = cre_transReq(TransId, [AR]),
 5826:     Trans   = cre_transaction(TR),
 5827:     Mess    = cre_message(?VERSION, Mid, cre_transactions([Trans])),
 5828:     cre_megacoMessage(Mess).

 5838: 
 5839: pending_ack_plain(suite) ->
 5840:     [];
 5841: pending_ack_plain(doc) ->
 5842:     ["Receive a request and handle it as a long request, "
 5843:      "i.e. return with {pending, _} and expect a call to the "
 5844:      "long request function"];
 5845: pending_ack_plain(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 5846:     Pre = fun() ->
 5847:                   MgcNode = make_node_name(mgc),
 5848:                   MgNode  = make_node_name(mg),
 5849:                   d("start nodes: "
 5850:                     "~n      MgcNode: ~p"
 5851:                     "~n      MgNode:  ~p",
 5852:                     [MgcNode, MgNode]),
 5853:                   Nodes = [MgcNode, MgNode], 
 5854:                   ok = ?START_NODES(Nodes, true),
 5855:                   Nodes
 5856:           end,
 5857:     Case = fun(Nodes) -> do_pending_ack_plain(Config, Nodes) end,
 5858:     Post = fun(Nodes) ->
 5859:                    d("stop nodes"),
 5860:                    ?STOP_NODES(lists:reverse(Nodes))
 5861:            end,
 5862:     try_tc(pap, Pre, Case, Post).
 5863: 
 5864: do_pending_ack_plain(Config,
 5865:                      [MgcNode, MgNode]) ->
 5866:     d("[MGC] start the simulator "),
 5867:     {ok, Mgc} = megaco_test_megaco_generator:start_link("MGC", MgcNode),
 5868: 
 5869:     d("[MGC] create the event sequence"),
 5870:     MgcEvSeq = pap_mgc_event_sequence(Config,
 5871:                                       text, tcp),
 5872: 
 5873:     i("wait some time before starting the MGC simulation"),
 5874:     sleep(1000),
 5875: 
 5876:     d("[MGC] start the simulation"),
 5877:     {ok, MgcId} = megaco_test_megaco_generator:exec(Mgc, MgcEvSeq),
 5878: 
 5879:     %% i("wait some time before starting the MG simulator"),
 5880:     %% sleep(1000),
 5881: 
 5882:     i("await MGC ready announcement"),
 5883:     receive
 5884:         announce_mgc ->
 5885:             i("received MGC ready announcement"),
 5886:             ok
 5887:     end,
 5888: 
 5889:     d("[MG] start the simulator (generator)"),
 5890:     {ok, Mg} = megaco_test_tcp_generator:start_link("MG", MgNode),
 5891: 
 5892:     d("[MG] create the event sequence"),
 5893:     MgEvSeq = pap_mg_event_sequence(text, tcp),
 5894: 
 5895:     i("wait some time before starting the MG simulation"),
 5896:     sleep(1000),
 5897: 
 5898:     d("[MG] start the simulation"),
 5899:     {ok, MgId} = megaco_test_tcp_generator:exec(Mg, MgEvSeq),
 5900: 
 5901:     d("await the generator reply(s)"),
 5902:     await_completion([MgcId, MgId]), 
 5903: 
 5904:     %% Tell Mgc to stop
 5905:     i("[MGC] stop generator"),
 5906:     megaco_test_megaco_generator:stop(Mgc),
 5907: 
 5908:     %% Tell Mg to stop
 5909:     i("[MG] stop generator"),
 5910:     megaco_test_tcp_generator:stop(Mg),
 5911: 
 5912:     i("done", []),
 5913:     ok.
 5914:

 5928:         {?MODULE, pap_mgc_verify_notify_req_long, []}).
 5929: -define(pap_mgc_verify_handle_trans_ack_fun(),
 5930: 	{?MODULE, pap_mgc_verify_handle_trans_ack, []}).
 5931: -define(pap_mgc_verify_handle_disconnect_fun(),
 5932:         {?MODULE, pap_mgc_verify_handle_disconnect, []}).
 5933: -else.

 5935:         fun pap_mgc_verify_handle_connect/1).
 5936: -define(pap_mgc_verify_service_change_req_fun(Mid),
 5937:         pap_mgc_verify_service_change_req_fun(Mid)).
 5938: -define(pap_mgc_verify_notify_req_fun(),
 5939: 	pap_mgc_verify_notify_req_fun()).
 5940: -define(pap_mgc_verify_notify_req_long_fun(),
 5941: 	pap_mgc_verify_notify_req_long_fun()).

 5943: 	pap_mgc_verify_handle_trans_ack_fun()).

 5948: pap_mgc_event_sequence(Config,
 5949:                        text, tcp) ->
 5950:     CTRL = self(),
 5951:     Mid = {deviceName,"ctrl"},
 5952:     RI = [
 5953:           {port,             2944},
 5954:           {encoding_module,  megaco_pretty_text_encoder},
 5955:           {encoding_config,  []},
 5956:           {transport_module, megaco_tcp}
 5957:          ],
 5958:     ConnectVerify = ?pap_mgc_verify_handle_connect_fun(), 
 5959:     ScrVerify     = ?pap_mgc_verify_service_change_req_fun(Mid),
 5960:     NrVerify1     = ?pap_mgc_verify_notify_req_fun(),
 5961:     NrVerify2     = ?pap_mgc_verify_notify_req_long_fun(),
 5962:     AckVerify     = ?pap_mgc_verify_handle_trans_ack_fun(),
 5963:     DiscoVerify   = ?pap_mgc_verify_handle_disconnect_fun(), 
 5964:     EvSeq = [
 5965:              {debug, true},
 5966:              {megaco_trace, disable},
 5967:              ?MEGACO_TRACE(Config, max), % {megaco_trace, max},
 5968:              megaco_start,
 5969:              {megaco_start_user, Mid, RI, []},
 5970:              {megaco_update_user_info, sent_pending_limit, 100},
 5971:              start_transport,
 5972:              listen,
 5973: 
 5974:              %% ANNOUNCE READY
 5975:              {trigger, fun() -> CTRL ! announce_mgc end}, 
 5976: 
 5977:              {megaco_callback, handle_connect,            ConnectVerify},
 5978:              {megaco_conn_info, all},
 5979:              {megaco_callback, handle_trans_request,      ScrVerify},
 5980: 	     {megaco_callback, handle_trans_request,      NrVerify1},
 5981: 	     {megaco_callback, handle_trans_long_request, NrVerify2},
 5982: 	     {megaco_callback, handle_trans_ack,          AckVerify},
 5983:              {megaco_callback, handle_disconnect,         DiscoVerify},
 5984:              megaco_stop_user,
 5985:              megaco_stop
 5986:             ],
 5987:     EvSeq.
 5988: 
 5989: %% Connect verification
 5990: pap_mgc_verify_handle_connect({handle_connect, CH, ?VERSION}) ->
 5991:     {ok, CH, ok};
 5992: pap_mgc_verify_handle_connect(Else) ->
 5993:     {error, Else, ok}.

 5995: %% Service Change verification
 5996: -ifndef(megaco_hipe_special).
 5997: pap_mgc_verify_service_change_req_fun(Mid) ->
 5998:     fun(Req) -> 
 5999: 	    pap_mgc_verify_service_change_req(Req, Mid) 
 6000:     end.
 6001: -endif.
 6002: 
 6003: pap_mgc_verify_service_change_req(
 6004:   {handle_trans_request, _, ?VERSION, [AR]}, Mid) ->
 6005:     (catch pap_do_verify_service_change_req(AR, Mid));
 6006: pap_mgc_verify_service_change_req(Crap, _Mid) ->
 6007:     ED       = cre_ErrDesc(Crap),
 6008:     ErrReply = {discard_ack, ED},
 6009:     {error, Crap, ErrReply}.
 6010: 
 6011: pap_do_verify_service_change_req(AR, Mid) ->
 6012:     CR = 
 6013: 	case AR of
 6014: 	    #'ActionRequest'{commandRequests = [CmdReq]} ->
 6015: 		CmdReq;
 6016: 	    _ ->
 6017: 		Err1      = {invalid_action_request, AR},
 6018: 		ED1       = cre_ErrDesc(AR),
 6019: 		ErrReply1 = {discard_ack, ED1},
 6020: 		throw({error, Err1, ErrReply1})
 6021: 	end,
 6022:     Cmd = 
 6023: 	case CR of
 6024: 	    #'CommandRequest'{command = Command} ->
 6025: 		Command; 
 6026: 	    _ ->
 6027: 		Err2      = {invalid_command_request, CR},
 6028: 		ED2       = cre_ErrDesc(CR),
 6029: 		ErrReply2 = {discard_ack, ED2},
 6030: 		throw({error, Err2, ErrReply2})
 6031: 	end,
 6032:     {Tid, Parms} = 
 6033: 	case Cmd of
 6034: 	    {serviceChangeReq, 
 6035: 	     #'ServiceChangeRequest'{terminationID = [TermID],
 6036: 				     serviceChangeParms = ServChParms}} ->
 6037: 		{TermID, ServChParms};
 6038: 	    _ ->
 6039: 		Err3      = {invalid_command, Cmd},
 6040: 		ED3       = cre_ErrDesc(Cmd),
 6041: 		ErrReply3 = {discard_ack, ED3},
 6042: 		throw({error, Err3, ErrReply3})
 6043: 	end,
 6044:     case Tid of
 6045: 	#megaco_term_id{contains_wildcards = false, id = ["root"]} ->
 6046: 	    ok;
 6047: 	_ ->
 6048: 	    Err4      = {invalid_termination_id, Tid},
 6049: 	    ED4       = cre_ErrDesc(Tid),
 6050: 	    ErrReply4 = {discard_ack, ED4},
 6051: 	    throw({error, Err4, ErrReply4})
 6052:     end,
 6053:     case Parms of
 6054: 	#'ServiceChangeParm'{serviceChangeMethod = restart,
 6055: 			     serviceChangeReason = [[$9,$0,$1|_]]} ->
 6056: 	    AckData = [pap_mgc_service_change_reply_ar(Mid, 1)], 
 6057: 	    Reply   = {discard_ack, AckData},
 6058: 	    {ok, AR, Reply};
 6059: 	_ ->
 6060: 	    Err5      = {invalid_SCP, Parms},
 6061: 	    ED5       = cre_ErrDesc(Parms),
 6062: 	    ErrReply5 = {discard_ack, ED5},
 6063: 	    {error, Err5, ErrReply5}
 6064:     end.
 6065:

 6072:     end.

 6078: 	      "~n", [AR]),

 6080:     {ok, AR, Reply};

 6091:     end.
 6092: -endif.

 6094: pap_mgc_verify_notify_req_long(
 6095:   {handle_trans_long_request, _, ?VERSION, AR}) ->
 6096:     (catch pap_mgc_do_verify_notify_req_long(AR));
 6097: pap_mgc_verify_notify_req_long(Crap) ->
 6098:     ED       = cre_ErrDesc(Crap),
 6099:     ErrReply = {discard_ack, ED},
 6100:     {error, Crap, ErrReply}.
 6101: 
 6102: pap_mgc_do_verify_notify_req_long(AR) ->
 6103:     io:format("pap_mgc_do_verify_notify_req_long -> entry with"
 6104: 	      "~n   AR: ~p"
 6105: 	      "~n", [AR]),
 6106:     {Cid, CR} = 
 6107: 	case AR of
 6108: 	    #'ActionRequest'{contextId       = CtxID,
 6109: 			     commandRequests = [CmdReq]} ->
 6110: 		{CtxID, CmdReq};
 6111: 	    _ ->
 6112: 		Err1      = {invalid_action_request, AR},
 6113: 		ED1       = cre_ErrDesc(AR),
 6114: 		ErrReply1 = {discard_ack, ED1},
 6115: 		throw({error, Err1, ErrReply1})
 6116: 	end,
 6117:     Cmd = 
 6118: 	case CR of
 6119: 	    #'CommandRequest'{command = Command} ->
 6120: 		Command;
 6121: 	    _ ->
 6122: 		Err2      = {invalid_command_request, CR},
 6123: 		ED2       = cre_ErrDesc(CR),
 6124: 		ErrReply2 = {discard_ack, ED2},
 6125: 		throw({error, Err2, ErrReply2})
 6126: 	end,
 6127:     NR = 
 6128: 	case Cmd of
 6129: 	    {notifyReq, NotifReq} ->
 6130: 		NotifReq;
 6131: 	    _ ->
 6132: 		Err3      = {invalid_command, Cmd},
 6133: 		ED3       = cre_ErrDesc(Cmd),
 6134: 		ErrReply3 = {discard_ack, ED3},
 6135: 		throw({error, Err3, ErrReply3})
 6136: 	end,
 6137:     {Tid, OED} = 
 6138: 	case NR of
 6139: 	    #'NotifyRequest'{terminationID            = [TermID],
 6140: 			     observedEventsDescriptor = ObsEvsDesc,
 6141: 			     errorDescriptor          = asn1_NOVALUE} ->
 6142: 		{TermID, ObsEvsDesc};
 6143: 	    _ ->
 6144: 		Err4      = {invalid_NR, NR},
 6145: 		ED4       = cre_ErrDesc(NR),
 6146: 		ErrReply4 = {discard_ack, ED4},
 6147: 		throw({error, Err4, ErrReply4})
 6148: 	end,
 6149:     OE = 
 6150: 	case OED of 
 6151: 	    #'ObservedEventsDescriptor'{observedEventLst = [ObsEvLst]} ->
 6152: 		ObsEvLst;
 6153: 	    _ ->
 6154: 		Err5      = {invalid_OED, OED},
 6155: 		ED5       = cre_ErrDesc(NR),
 6156: 		ErrReply5 = {discard_ack, ED5},
 6157: 		throw({error, Err5, ErrReply5})
 6158: 	end,
 6159:     case OE of
 6160: 	#'ObservedEvent'{eventName = "al/of"} ->
 6161: 	    AckData = pap, 
 6162: 	    Replies = [pap_mgc_notify_reply_ar(Cid, Tid)],
 6163: 	    Reply   = {{handle_ack, AckData}, Replies},
 6164: 	    {ok, AR, Reply};
 6165: 	_ ->
 6166: 	    Err6      = {invalid_OE, OE},
 6167: 	    ED6       = cre_ErrDesc(OE),
 6168: 	    ErrReply6 = {discard_ack, ED6},
 6169: 	    throw({error, Err6, ErrReply6})
 6170:     end.

 6197: pap_mgc_service_change_reply_ar(Mid, Cid) ->
 6198:     SCRP  = cre_serviceChangeResParm(Mid),
 6199:     SCRes = cre_serviceChangeResult(SCRP),
 6200:     Root  = #megaco_term_id{id = ["root"]},
 6201:     SCR   = cre_serviceChangeReply([Root], SCRes),
 6202:     CR    = cre_cmdReply(SCR),
 6203:     AR    = cre_actionReply(Cid, [CR]),
 6204:     AR.
 6205: 
 6206: pap_mgc_notify_reply_ar(Cid, TermId) ->
 6207:     NR    = cre_notifyReply([TermId]),
 6208:     CR    = cre_cmdReply(NR),
 6209:     cre_actionReply(Cid, [CR]).

 6216: -define(pap_mg_decode_msg_fun(Mod, Conf),
 6217: 	{?MODULE, decode_msg, [Mod, Conf]}).
 6218: -define(pap_mg_encode_msg_fun(Mod, Conf),
 6219: 	{?MODULE, encode_msg, [Mod, Conf]}).
 6220: -define(pap_mg_verify_service_change_rep_msg_fun(),
 6221: 	{?MODULE, pap_mg_verify_service_change_rep_msg, []}).
 6222: -define(pap_mg_verify_pending_msg_fun(TransId),
 6223: 	{?MODULE, pap_mg_verify_pending_msg, [TransId]}).
 6224: -define(pap_mg_verify_notify_rep_msg_fun(TermId, TransId, ReqId, CtxId),
 6225: 	{?MODULE, pap_mg_verify_notify_rep_msg, [TermId, TransId, ReqId, CtxId]}).
 6226: -else.
 6227: -define(pap_mg_decode_msg_fun(Mod, Conf),
 6228: 	pap_mg_decode_msg_fun(Mod, Conf)).
 6229: -define(pap_mg_encode_msg_fun(Mod, Conf),
 6230: 	pap_mg_encode_msg_fun(Mod, Conf)).
 6231: -define(pap_mg_verify_service_change_rep_msg_fun(),
 6232: 	pap_mg_verify_service_change_rep_msg_fun()).
 6233: -define(pap_mg_verify_pending_msg_fun(TransId),
 6234: 	pap_mg_verify_pending_msg_fun(TransId)).
 6235: -define(pap_mg_verify_notify_rep_msg_fun(TermId, TransId, ReqId, CtxId),
 6236: 	pap_mg_verify_notify_rep_msg_fun(TermId, TransId, ReqId, CtxId)).
 6237: -endif.
 6238: 
 6239: pap_mg_event_sequence(text, tcp) ->
 6240:     DecodeFun = ?pap_mg_decode_msg_fun(megaco_pretty_text_encoder, []),
 6241:     EncodeFun = ?pap_mg_encode_msg_fun(megaco_pretty_text_encoder, []),
 6242:     Mid       = {deviceName,"mg"},
 6243:     ServiceChangeReq = pap_mg_service_change_request_msg(Mid, 1, 0),
 6244:     TermId  = #megaco_term_id{id = ["00000000","00000000","01101101"]},
 6245:     TransId = 2,
 6246:     ReqId   = 1,
 6247:     CtxId   = 1, 
 6248:     NotifyReq = 
 6249: 	pap_mg_notify_request_msg(Mid, TermId, TransId, ReqId, CtxId),
 6250:     TransAck = pap_mg_trans_ack_msg(Mid, TransId),
 6251:     ScrVerifyFun = ?pap_mg_verify_service_change_rep_msg_fun(),
 6252:     PendingVerifyFun = 
 6253: 	?pap_mg_verify_pending_msg_fun(TransId),
 6254:     NrVerifyFun = 
 6255: 	?pap_mg_verify_notify_rep_msg_fun(TermId, TransId, ReqId, CtxId),
 6256:     EvSeq = [{debug,  true},
 6257:              {decode, DecodeFun},
 6258:              {encode, EncodeFun},
 6259:              {connect, 2944},
 6260:              {send, "service-change-request", ServiceChangeReq},
 6261:              {expect_receive, "service-change-reply", {ScrVerifyFun, 10000}},
 6262:              {send, "notify request", NotifyReq},
 6263:              {expect_receive, "pending",      {PendingVerifyFun, 4000}},
 6264:              {expect_receive, "notify-reply", {NrVerifyFun, 4000}},
 6265:              {send, "transaction-ack", TransAck},
 6266:              {expect_nothing, 11000},
 6267:              disconnect
 6268:             ],
 6269:     EvSeq.
 6270: 
 6271: -ifndef(megaco_hipe_special).
 6272: pap_mg_encode_msg_fun(Mod, Conf) ->
 6273:     fun(M) ->
 6274:             encode_msg(M, Mod, Conf)
 6275:     end.
 6276: -endif.
 6277: 
 6278: -ifndef(megaco_hipe_special).
 6279: pap_mg_decode_msg_fun(Mod, Conf) ->
 6280:     fun(M) ->
 6281:             decode_msg(M, Mod, Conf)
 6282:     end.
 6283: -endif.
 6284: 
 6285: -ifndef(megaco_hipe_special).
 6286: pap_mg_verify_service_change_rep_msg_fun() ->
 6287:     fun(Msg) -> 
 6288: 	    (catch pap_mg_verify_service_change_rep_msg(Msg)) 
 6289:     end.
 6290: -endif.
 6291: 
 6292: pap_mg_verify_service_change_rep_msg(#'MegacoMessage'{mess = Mess} = M) ->
 6293:     Body = 
 6294: 	case Mess of 
 6295: 	    #'Message'{version     = _V,
 6296:                        mId         = _MgMid,
 6297:                        messageBody = MsgBody} ->
 6298: 		MsgBody;
 6299: 	    _ ->
 6300: 		throw({error, {invalid_Message, Mess}})
 6301: 	end,
 6302:     Trans = 
 6303: 	case Body of
 6304:             {transactions, [Transactions]} ->
 6305: 		Transactions;
 6306: 	    _ ->
 6307: 		throw({error, {invalid_messageBody, Body}})
 6308: 	end,
 6309:     TR = 
 6310: 	case Trans of
 6311:             {transactionReply, TransReply} ->
 6312: 		TransReply;
 6313: 	    _ ->
 6314: 		throw({error, {invalid_transactions, Trans}})
 6315: 	end,
 6316:     TRes = 
 6317: 	case TR of
 6318:             #'TransactionReply'{transactionId = _Tid,
 6319:                                 immAckRequired = asn1_NOVALUE,
 6320:                                 transactionResult = TransRes} ->
 6321: 		TransRes;
 6322: 	    _ ->
 6323: 		throw({error, {invalid_transactionReply, TR}})
 6324: 	end,
 6325:     AR = 
 6326: 	case TRes of
 6327:             {actionReplies, [ActRes]} ->
 6328: 		ActRes;
 6329: 	    _ ->
 6330: 		throw({error, {invalid_transactionResult, TRes}})
 6331: 	end,
 6332:     CR = 
 6333: 	case AR of
 6334:             #'ActionReply'{contextId       = _Cid,
 6335:                            errorDescriptor = asn1_NOVALUE,
 6336:                            contextReply    = _CtxReq,
 6337:                            commandReply    = [CmdRep]} ->
 6338: 		CmdRep;
 6339: 	    _ ->
 6340: 		throw({error, {invalid_actionReplies, AR}})
 6341: 	end,
 6342:     SCR = 
 6343: 	case CR of
 6344:             {serviceChangeReply, ServChRep} ->
 6345: 		ServChRep;
 6346: 	    _ ->
 6347: 		throw({error, {invalid_commandReply, CR}})
 6348: 	end,
 6349:     SCRes = 
 6350: 	case SCR of
 6351:             #'ServiceChangeReply'{terminationID       = _TermID,
 6352:                                   serviceChangeResult = ServChRes} ->
 6353: 		ServChRes;
 6354: 	    _ ->
 6355: 		throw({error, {invalid_serviceChangeReply, SCR}})
 6356: 	end,
 6357:     SCRP = 
 6358: 	case SCRes of
 6359:             {serviceChangeResParms, Parms} ->
 6360: 		Parms;
 6361: 	    _ ->
 6362: 		throw({error, {invalid_serviceChangeResult, SCRes}})
 6363: 	end,
 6364:     case SCRP of
 6365: 	#'ServiceChangeResParm'{serviceChangeMgcId = _MgcMid} ->
 6366:             {ok, M};
 6367: 	_ ->
 6368: 	    {error, {invalid_serviceChangeResParms, SCRP}}
 6369:     end;
 6370: pap_mg_verify_service_change_rep_msg(Crap) ->
 6371:     {error, {invalid_message, Crap}}.
 6372: 
 6373: -ifndef(megaco_hipe_special).
 6374: pap_mg_verify_pending_msg_fun(TransId) ->
 6375:     fun(Msg) -> 
 6376: 	    (catch pap_mg_verify_pending_msg(Msg, TransId)) 
 6377:     end.
 6378: -endif.
 6379: 
 6380: pap_mg_verify_pending_msg(#'MegacoMessage'{mess = Mess} = M, TransId) ->
 6381:     io:format("pap_mg_verify_pending_msg -> entry with"
 6382: 	      "~n   M:       ~p"
 6383: 	      "~n   TransId: ~p"
 6384: 	      "~n", [M, TransId]),
 6385:     Body = 
 6386: 	case Mess of 
 6387: 	    #'Message'{version     = ?VERSION,
 6388:                        mId         = _Mid,
 6389:                        messageBody = MsgBody} ->
 6390: 		MsgBody;
 6391: 	    _ ->
 6392: 		throw({error, {invalid_Message, Mess}})
 6393: 	end,
 6394:     Trans = 
 6395: 	case Body of
 6396:             {transactions, [Transactions]} ->
 6397: 		Transactions;
 6398: 	    _ ->
 6399: 		throw({error, {invalid_messageBody, Body}})
 6400: 	end,
 6401:     TP = 
 6402: 	case Trans of
 6403:             {transactionPending, TransPending} ->
 6404: 		TransPending;
 6405: 	    _ ->
 6406: 		throw({error, {invalid_transactions, Trans}})
 6407: 	end,
 6408:     case TP of
 6409: 	#'TransactionPending'{transactionId = TransId} ->
 6410: 	    {ok, M};
 6411: 	_ ->
 6412: 	    {error, {invalid_transactionPending, TP}}
 6413:     end;
 6414: pap_mg_verify_pending_msg(Crap, _TransId) ->
 6415:     {error, {invalid_message, Crap}}.
 6416: 
 6417: -ifndef(megaco_hipe_special).
 6418: pap_mg_verify_notify_rep_msg_fun(TermId, TransId, Rid, Cid) ->
 6419:     fun(Msg) -> 
 6420: 	    (catch pap_mg_verify_notify_rep_msg(Msg, 
 6421: 						TermId, TransId, Rid, Cid)) 
 6422:     end.
 6423: -endif.
 6424: 
 6425: pap_mg_verify_notify_rep_msg(#'MegacoMessage'{mess = Mess} = M,
 6426: 			   TermId, TransId, Rid, Cid) ->
 6427:     io:format("pap_mg_verify_notify_rep_msg -> entry with"
 6428: 	      "~n   M:       ~p"
 6429: 	      "~n   TermId:  ~p"
 6430: 	      "~n   TransId: ~p"
 6431: 	      "~n   Rid:     ~p"
 6432: 	      "~n   Cid:     ~p"
 6433: 	      "~n", [M, TermId, TransId, Rid, Cid]),
 6434:     Body = 
 6435: 	case Mess of 
 6436: 	    #'Message'{version     = ?VERSION,
 6437:                        mId         = _Mid,
 6438:                        messageBody = MsgBody} ->
 6439: 		MsgBody;
 6440: 	    _ ->
 6441: 		throw({error, {invalid_Message, Mess}})
 6442: 	end,
 6443:     Trans = 
 6444: 	case Body of
 6445:             {transactions, [Transactions]} ->
 6446: 		Transactions;
 6447: 	    _ ->
 6448: 		throw({error, {invalid_messageBody, Body}})
 6449: 	end,
 6450:     TR = 
 6451: 	case Trans of
 6452:             {transactionReply, TransReply} ->
 6453: 		TransReply;
 6454: 	    _ ->
 6455: 		throw({error, {invalid_transactions, Trans}})
 6456: 	end,
 6457:     TRes = 
 6458: 	case TR of
 6459:             #'TransactionReply'{transactionId     = TransId,
 6460:                                 immAckRequired    = 'NULL',
 6461:                                 transactionResult = TransRes} ->
 6462: 		TransRes;
 6463: 	    _ ->
 6464: 		throw({error, {invalid_transactionReply, TR}})
 6465: 	end,
 6466:     AR = 
 6467: 	case TRes of
 6468:             {actionReplies, [ActRes]} ->
 6469: 		ActRes;
 6470: 	    _ ->
 6471: 		throw({error, {invalid_transactionResult, TRes}})
 6472: 	end,
 6473:     CR = 
 6474: 	case AR of
 6475:             #'ActionReply'{contextId       = Cid,
 6476:                            errorDescriptor = asn1_NOVALUE,
 6477:                            contextReply    = _CtxReq,
 6478:                            commandReply    = [CmdRep]} ->
 6479: 		CmdRep;
 6480: 	    _ ->
 6481: 		throw({error, {invalid_actionReplies, AR}})
 6482: 	end,
 6483:     NR = 
 6484: 	case CR of
 6485:             {notifyReply, NotifyReply} ->
 6486: 		NotifyReply;
 6487: 	    _ ->
 6488: 		throw({error, {invalid_commandReply, CR}})
 6489: 	end,
 6490:     case NR of
 6491: 	#'NotifyReply'{terminationID   = [TermId],
 6492: 		       errorDescriptor = asn1_NOVALUE} ->
 6493: 	    {ok, M};
 6494: 	_ ->
 6495: 	    {error, {invalid_notifyReply, NR}}
 6496:     end;
 6497: pap_mg_verify_notify_rep_msg(Crap, _TermId, _TransId, _Rid, _Cid) ->
 6498:     {error, {invalid_message, Crap}}.
 6499: 
 6500: pap_mg_service_change_request_ar(_Mid, Cid) ->
 6501:     Prof  = cre_serviceChangeProf("resgw", 1),
 6502:     SCP   = cre_serviceChangeParm(restart, ["901 mg col boot"], Prof),
 6503:     Root  = #megaco_term_id{id = ["root"]},
 6504:     SCR   = cre_serviceChangeReq([Root], SCP),
 6505:     CMD   = cre_command(SCR),
 6506:     CR    = cre_cmdReq(CMD),
 6507:     cre_actionReq(Cid, [CR]).
 6508: 
 6509: pap_mg_service_change_request_msg(Mid, TransId, Cid) ->
 6510:     AR    = pap_mg_service_change_request_ar(Mid, Cid),
 6511:     TR    = cre_transReq(TransId, [AR]),
 6512:     Trans = cre_transaction(TR),
 6513:     Mess  = cre_message(?VERSION, Mid, cre_transactions([Trans])),
 6514:     cre_megacoMessage(Mess).
 6515: 
 6516: pap_mg_notify_request_ar(Rid, Tid, Cid) ->
 6517:     TT      = cre_timeNotation("19990729", "22000000"),
 6518:     Ev      = cre_obsEvent("al/of", TT),
 6519:     EvsDesc = cre_obsEvsDesc(Rid, [Ev]),
 6520:     NR      = cre_notifyReq([Tid], EvsDesc),
 6521:     CMD     = cre_command(NR),
 6522:     CR      = cre_cmdReq(CMD),
 6523:     cre_actionReq(Cid, [CR]).
 6524: 
 6525: pap_mg_notify_request_msg(Mid, TermId, TransId, Rid, Cid) ->
 6526:     AR      = pap_mg_notify_request_ar(Rid, TermId, Cid),
 6527:     TR      = cre_transReq(TransId, [AR]),
 6528:     Trans   = cre_transaction(TR),
 6529:     Mess    = cre_message(?VERSION, Mid, cre_transactions([Trans])),
 6530:     cre_megacoMessage(Mess).
 6531: 
 6532: pap_mg_trans_ack_msg(Mid, TransId) ->
 6533:     TR    = cre_transRespAck(cre_transAck(TransId)),
 6534:     Trans = cre_transaction(TR),
 6535:     Mess  = cre_message(?VERSION, Mid, cre_transactions([Trans])),
 6536:     cre_megacoMessage(Mess).
 6537:

 6540: 
 6541: request_and_pending_and_late_reply(suite) ->
 6542:     [];
 6543: request_and_pending_and_late_reply(doc) ->
 6544:     ["Receive a request and handle it as a long request, "
 6545:      "i.e. return with {pending, _}. Then, expect the sender "
 6546:      "to keep re-sending the request until the reply is sent."];
 6547: request_and_pending_and_late_reply(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 6548:     Pre = fun() ->
 6549:                   MgcNode = make_node_name(mgc),
 6550:                   MgNode  = make_node_name(mg),
 6551:                   d("start nodes: "
 6552:                     "~n      MgcNode: ~p"
 6553:                     "~n      MgNode:  ~p",
 6554:                     [MgcNode, MgNode]),
 6555:                   Nodes = [MgcNode, MgNode], 
 6556:                   ok = ?START_NODES(Nodes, true),
 6557:                   Nodes
 6558:           end,
 6559:     Case = fun do_request_and_pending_and_late_reply/1,
 6560:     Post = fun(Nodes) ->
 6561:                    d("stop nodes"),
 6562:                    ?STOP_NODES(lists:reverse(Nodes))
 6563:            end,
 6564:     try_tc(rapalr, Pre, Case, Post).
 6565: 
 6566: do_request_and_pending_and_late_reply([MgcNode, MgNode]) ->
 6567:     d("[MGC] start the simulator "),
 6568:     {ok, Mgc} = megaco_test_tcp_generator:start_link("MGC", MgcNode),
 6569: 
 6570:     d("[MGC] create the event sequence"),
 6571:     MgcEvSeq = rapalr_mgc_event_sequence(text, tcp),
 6572: 
 6573:     i("wait some time before starting the MGC simulation"),
 6574:     sleep(1000),
 6575: 
 6576:     d("[MGC] start the simulation"),
 6577:     {ok, MgcId} = megaco_test_tcp_generator:exec(Mgc, MgcEvSeq),
 6578: 
 6579:     %% i("wait some time before starting the MG simulator"),
 6580:     %% sleep(1000),
 6581: 
 6582:     i("await MGC ready announcement"),
 6583:     receive
 6584:         announce_mgc ->
 6585:             i("received MGC ready announcement"),
 6586:             ok
 6587:     end,
 6588: 
 6589:     d("[MG] start the simulator (generator)"),
 6590:     {ok, Mg} = megaco_test_megaco_generator:start_link("MG", MgNode),
 6591: 
 6592:     d("[MG] create the event sequence"),
 6593:     MgEvSeq = rapalr_mg_event_sequence(text, tcp),
 6594: 
 6595:     i("wait some time before starting the MG simulation"),
 6596:     sleep(1000),
 6597: 
 6598:     d("[MG] start the simulation"),
 6599:     {ok, MgId} = megaco_test_megaco_generator:exec(Mg, MgEvSeq),
 6600: 
 6601:     d("await the generator reply(s)"),
 6602:     await_completion([MgcId, MgId]), 
 6603: 
 6604:     %% Tell Mgc to stop
 6605:     i("[MGC] stop generator"),
 6606:     megaco_test_tcp_generator:stop(Mgc),
 6607: 
 6608:     %% Tell Mg to stop
 6609:     i("[MG] stop generator"),
 6610:     megaco_test_megaco_generator:stop(Mg),
 6611: 
 6612:     i("done", []),
 6613:     ok.
 6614:

 6624: 	{?MODULE, encode_msg, [Mod, Conf]}).
 6625: -define(rapalr_mgc_verify_service_change_req_msg_fun(),
 6626: 	{?MODULE, rapalr_mgc_verify_service_change_req_msg, []}).
 6627: -define(rapalr_mgc_verify_notify_req_msg_fun(TermId, TransId, ReqId, CtxId),
 6628: 	{?MODULE, rapalr_mgc_verify_notify_req_msg, [TermId, TransId, ReqId, CtxId]}).
 6629: -define(rapalr_mgc_verify_trans_ack_msg_fun(TransId),
 6630: 	{?MODULE, rapalr_mgc_verify_trans_ack_msg, [TransId]}).
 6631: -else.
 6632: -define(rapalr_mgc_decode_msg_fun(Mod, Conf),
 6633: 	rapalr_mgc_decode_msg_fun(Mod, Conf)).
 6634: -define(rapalr_mgc_encode_msg_fun(Mod, Conf),
 6635: 	rapalr_mgc_encode_msg_fun(Mod, Conf)).

 6644: rapalr_mgc_event_sequence(text, tcp) ->
 6645:     CTRL = self(),
 6646:     DecodeFun = ?rapalr_mgc_decode_msg_fun(megaco_pretty_text_encoder, []),
 6647:     EncodeFun = ?rapalr_mgc_encode_msg_fun(megaco_pretty_text_encoder, []),
 6648:     Mid       = {deviceName,"mgc"},
 6649:     ServiceChangeRep = rapalr_mgc_service_change_reply_msg(Mid, 1),
 6650:     TermId           = 
 6651: 	#megaco_term_id{id = ["00000000","00000000","01101101"]},
 6652:     TransId   = 2,
 6653:     ReqId     = 1,
 6654:     CtxId     = 1, 
 6655:     Pending      = rapalr_mgc_trans_pending_msg(Mid, TransId),
 6656:     NotifyRep    = rapalr_mgc_notify_reply_msg(Mid, TransId, 
 6657: 					       CtxId, TermId),
 6658:     ScrVerifyFun = ?rapalr_mgc_verify_service_change_req_msg_fun(),
 6659:     NrVerifyFun  = 
 6660: 	?rapalr_mgc_verify_notify_req_msg_fun(TermId, TransId, ReqId, CtxId),
 6661:     AckVerifyFun = ?rapalr_mgc_verify_trans_ack_msg_fun(TransId),
 6662:     EvSeq = [{debug,  false},
 6663:              {decode, DecodeFun},
 6664:              {encode, EncodeFun},
 6665:              {listen, 2944},
 6666: 
 6667:              %% ANNOUNCE READY
 6668:              {trigger, "announce ready", fun() -> CTRL ! announce_mgc end}, 
 6669: 
 6670: 	     {expect_accept, any},
 6671:              {expect_receive, "service-change-request", {ScrVerifyFun, 5000}},
 6672:              {send, "service-change-reply", ServiceChangeRep},
 6673:              {expect_receive, "notify-request(1)", {NrVerifyFun, 4000}},
 6674:              {send, "pending", Pending},
 6675:              {expect_receive, "notify-request(2)", {NrVerifyFun, 4000}},
 6676:              {expect_receive, "notify-request(3)", {NrVerifyFun, 4000}},
 6677:              {send, "notify reply", NotifyRep},
 6678:              {expect_receive, "ack", {AckVerifyFun, 4000}},
 6679:              {sleep, 1000},
 6680:              disconnect
 6681:             ],
 6682:     EvSeq.
 6683: 
 6684: -ifndef(megaco_hipe_special).
 6685: rapalr_mgc_encode_msg_fun(Mod, Conf) ->
 6686:     fun(M) ->
 6687:             encode_msg(M, Mod, Conf)
 6688:     end.
 6689: -endif.
 6690: 
 6691: -ifndef(megaco_hipe_special).
 6692: rapalr_mgc_decode_msg_fun(Mod, Conf) ->
 6693:     fun(M) ->
 6694:             decode_msg(M, Mod, Conf)
 6695:     end.
 6696: -endif.
 6697: 
 6698: -ifndef(megaco_hipe_special).
 6699: rapalr_mgc_verify_service_change_req_msg_fun() ->
 6700:     fun(Msg) -> 
 6701: 	    (catch rapalr_mgc_verify_service_change_req_msg(Msg)) 
 6702:     end.
 6703: -endif.

 6705: rapalr_mgc_verify_service_change_req_msg(#'MegacoMessage'{mess = Mess} = M) ->
 6706:     Body = 
 6707: 	case Mess of 
 6708: 	    #'Message'{version     = ?VERSION,
 6709:                        mId         = _MgMid,
 6710:                        messageBody = MsgBody} ->
 6711: 		MsgBody;
 6712: 	    _ ->
 6713: 		throw({error, {invalid_Message, Mess}})
 6714: 	end,
 6715:     Trans = 
 6716: 	case Body of
 6717:             {transactions, [Transactions]} ->
 6718: 		Transactions;
 6719: 	    _ ->
 6720: 		throw({error, {invalid_messageBody, Body}})
 6721: 	end,
 6722:     TR = 
 6723: 	case Trans of
 6724:             {transactionRequest, TransRequest} ->
 6725: 		TransRequest;
 6726: 	    _ ->
 6727: 		throw({error, {invalid_transactions, Trans}})
 6728: 	end,
 6729:     AR = 
 6730: 	case TR of
 6731:             #'TransactionRequest'{transactionId = _TransId,
 6732: 				  actions       = [ActionReq]} ->
 6733: 		ActionReq;
 6734: 	    _ ->
 6735: 		throw({error, {invalid_transactionRequest, TR}})
 6736: 	end,
 6737:     CR = 
 6738: 	case AR of
 6739: 	    #'ActionRequest'{contextId       = _Cid, 
 6740: 			     commandRequests = [CmdReq]} ->
 6741: 		CmdReq;
 6742: 	    _ ->
 6743: 		throw({error, {invalid_action, AR}})
 6744: 	end,
 6745:     Cmd = 
 6746: 	case CR of
 6747: 	    #'CommandRequest'{command = Command} ->
 6748: 		Command; 
 6749: 	    _ ->
 6750: 		throw({error, {invalid_commandRequest, CR}})
 6751: 	end,
 6752:     {Tid, Parms} = 
 6753: 	case Cmd of
 6754: 	    {serviceChangeReq, 
 6755: 	     #'ServiceChangeRequest'{terminationID      = [TermID],
 6756: 				     serviceChangeParms = ServChParms}} ->
 6757: 		{TermID, ServChParms};
 6758: 	    _ ->
 6759: 		throw({error, {invalid_command, Cmd}})
 6760: 	end,
 6761:     case Tid of
 6762: 	#megaco_term_id{contains_wildcards = false, id = ["root"]} ->
 6763: 	    ok;
 6764: 	_ ->
 6765: 	    throw({error, {invalid_terminationID, Tid}})
 6766:     end,
 6767:     case Parms of
 6768: 	#'ServiceChangeParm'{serviceChangeMethod = restart,
 6769: 			     serviceChangeReason = [[$9,$0,$1|_]]} ->
 6770: 	    {ok, M};
 6771: 	_ ->
 6772: 	    {error, {invalid_serviceChangeParms, Parms}}
 6773:     end.
 6774: 
 6775: -ifndef(megaco_hipe_special).
 6776: rapalr_mgc_verify_notify_req_msg_fun(TermId, TransId, Rid, Cid) ->
 6777:     fun(Msg) -> 
 6778: 	    (catch rapalr_mgc_verify_notify_req_msg(Msg, 
 6779: 						    TermId, 
 6780: 						    TransId, Rid, Cid)) 
 6781:     end.
 6782: -endif.
 6783: 
 6784: rapalr_mgc_verify_notify_req_msg(#'MegacoMessage'{mess = Mess} = M,
 6785: 			     TermId, TransId, Rid, Cid) ->
 6786:     io:format("rapalr_mgc_verify_notify_req_msg -> entry with"
 6787: 	      "~n   M:       ~p"
 6788: 	      "~n   TermId:  ~p"
 6789: 	      "~n   TransId: ~p"
 6790: 	      "~n   Rid:     ~p"
 6791: 	      "~n   Cid:     ~p"
 6792: 	      "~n", [M, TermId, TransId, Rid, Cid]),
 6793:     Body = 
 6794: 	case Mess of 
 6795: 	    #'Message'{version     = ?VERSION,
 6796:                        mId         = _Mid,
 6797:                        messageBody = MsgBody} ->
 6798: 		MsgBody;
 6799: 	    _ ->
 6800: 		throw({error, {invalid_Message, Mess}})
 6801: 	end,
 6802:     Trans = 
 6803: 	case Body of
 6804:             {transactions, [Transactions]} ->
 6805: 		Transactions;
 6806: 	    _ ->
 6807: 		throw({error, {invalid_messageBody, Body}})
 6808: 	end,
 6809:     TR = 
 6810: 	case Trans of
 6811:             {transactionRequest, TransRequest} ->
 6812: 		TransRequest;
 6813: 	    _ ->
 6814: 		throw({error, {invalid_transactions, Trans}})
 6815: 	end,
 6816:     AR = 
 6817: 	case TR of
 6818:             #'TransactionRequest'{transactionId = TransId,
 6819: 				  actions       = [ActReq]} ->
 6820: 		ActReq;
 6821: 	    _ ->
 6822: 		throw({error, {invalid_transactionRequest, TR}})
 6823: 	end,
 6824:     CR = 
 6825: 	case AR of
 6826: 	    #'ActionRequest'{contextId       = Cid,
 6827: 			     commandRequests = [CmdReq]} ->
 6828: 		CmdReq;
 6829: 	    _ ->
 6830: 		throw({error, {invalid_actions, AR}})
 6831: 	end,
 6832:     Cmd = 
 6833: 	case CR of
 6834: 	    #'CommandRequest'{command = Command} ->
 6835: 		Command;
 6836: 	    _ ->
 6837: 		throw({error, {invalid_commandRequests, CR}})
 6838: 	end,
 6839:     NR = 
 6840: 	case Cmd of
 6841: 	    {notifyReq, NotifReq} ->
 6842: 		NotifReq;
 6843: 	    _ ->
 6844: 		throw({error, {invalid_command, Cmd}})
 6845: 	end,
 6846:     OED = 
 6847: 	case NR of
 6848: 	    #'NotifyRequest'{terminationID            = [TermId],
 6849: 			     observedEventsDescriptor = ObsEvsDesc,
 6850: 			     errorDescriptor          = asn1_NOVALUE} ->
 6851: 		ObsEvsDesc;
 6852: 	    _ ->
 6853: 		throw({error, {invalid_notifyReq, NR}})
 6854: 	end,
 6855:     OE = 
 6856: 	case OED of 
 6857: 	    #'ObservedEventsDescriptor'{observedEventLst = [ObsEvLst]} ->
 6858: 		ObsEvLst;
 6859: 	    _ ->
 6860: 		throw({error, {invalid_observedEventsDescriptor, OED}})
 6861: 	end,
 6862:     case OE of
 6863: 	#'ObservedEvent'{eventName = "al/of"} ->
 6864: 	    {ok, M};
 6865: 	_ ->
 6866: 	    throw({error, {invalid_observedEventLst, OE}})
 6867:     end;
 6868: rapalr_mgc_verify_notify_req_msg(Crap, _TermId, _TransId, _Rid, _Cid) ->
 6869:     {error, {invalid_MegacoMessage, Crap}}.
 6870: 
 6871: -ifndef(megaco_hipe_special).
 6872: rapalr_mgc_verify_trans_ack_msg_fun(TransId) ->
 6873:     fun(Msg) -> 
 6874: 	    (catch rapalr_mgc_verify_trans_ack_msg(Msg, TransId)) 
 6875:     end.
 6876: -endif.
 6877: 
 6878: rapalr_mgc_verify_trans_ack_msg(#'MegacoMessage'{mess = Mess} = M, 
 6879: 				TransId) ->
 6880:     io:format("rapalr_mgc_verify_trans_ack_msg -> entry with"
 6881: 	      "~n   M:       ~p"
 6882: 	      "~n   TransId: ~p"
 6883: 	      "~n", [M, TransId]),
 6884:     Body = 
 6885: 	case Mess of 
 6886: 	    #'Message'{version     = ?VERSION,
 6887:                        mId         = _Mid,
 6888:                        messageBody = MsgBody} ->
 6889: 		MsgBody;
 6890: 	    _ ->
 6891: 		throw({error, {invalid_Message, Mess}})
 6892: 	end,
 6893:     Trans = 
 6894: 	case Body of
 6895:             {transactions, [Transactions]} ->
 6896: 		Transactions;
 6897: 	    _ ->
 6898: 		throw({error, {invalid_messageBody, Body}})
 6899: 	end,
 6900:     TA = 
 6901: 	case Trans of
 6902:             {transactionResponseAck, [TransAck]} ->
 6903: 		TransAck;
 6904: 	    _ ->
 6905: 		throw({error, {invalid_transactions, Trans}})
 6906: 	end,
 6907:     case TA of
 6908:             #'TransactionAck'{firstAck = TransId,
 6909: 			      lastAck  = asn1_NOVALUE} ->
 6910: 		{ok, M};
 6911: 	    _ ->
 6912: 		throw({error, {invalid_transactionResponseAck, TA}})
 6913:     end;
 6914: rapalr_mgc_verify_trans_ack_msg(Crap, _TransId) ->
 6915:     {error, {invalid_MegacoMessage, Crap}}.
 6916: 
 6917: rapalr_mgc_service_change_reply_msg(Mid, Cid) ->
 6918:     SCRP  = cre_serviceChangeResParm(Mid),
 6919:     SCRes = cre_serviceChangeResult(SCRP),
 6920:     Root  = #megaco_term_id{id = ["root"]},
 6921:     SCR   = cre_serviceChangeReply([Root], SCRes),
 6922:     CR    = cre_cmdReply(SCR),
 6923:     AR    = cre_actionReply(Cid, [CR]),
 6924:     TRes  = cre_transResult([AR]),
 6925:     TR    = cre_transReply(1, TRes),
 6926:     Trans = cre_transaction(TR),
 6927:     Mess  = cre_message(?VERSION, Mid, cre_transactions([Trans])),
 6928:     cre_megacoMessage(Mess).
 6929: 
 6930: rapalr_mgc_notify_reply_ar(Cid, TermId) ->
 6931:     NR    = cre_notifyReply([TermId]),
 6932:     CR    = cre_cmdReply(NR),
 6933:     cre_actionReply(Cid, [CR]).
 6934: 
 6935: rapalr_mgc_notify_reply_msg(Mid, TransId, Cid, TermId) ->
 6936:     AR    = rapalr_mgc_notify_reply_ar(Cid, TermId),
 6937:     TRes  = cre_transResult([AR]),
 6938:     TR    = cre_transReply(TransId, 'NULL', TRes),
 6939:     Trans = cre_transaction(TR),
 6940:     Mess  = cre_message(?VERSION, Mid, cre_transactions([Trans])),
 6941:     cre_megacoMessage(Mess).
 6942: 
 6943: rapalr_mgc_trans_pending_msg(Mid, TransId) ->
 6944:     TP   = #'TransactionPending'{transactionId = TransId},
 6945:     Body = {transactions, [{transactionPending, TP}]},
 6946:     Mess = #'Message'{version     = 1,
 6947: 		      mId         = Mid,
 6948: 		      messageBody = Body},
 6949:     #'MegacoMessage'{mess = Mess}.
 6950:

 6988:     ConnectVerify            = ?rapalr_mg_verify_handle_connect_fun(),
 6989:     ServiceChangeReplyVerify = ?rapalr_mg_verify_service_change_rep_fun(),
 6990:     NotifyReplyVerify        = ?rapalr_mg_verify_notify_rep_fun(),
 6991: %%     ConnectVerify            = rapalr_mg_verify_handle_connect_fun(),
 6992: %%     ServiceChangeReplyVerify = rapalr_mg_verify_service_change_reply_fun(),

 6994:     EvSeq = [
 6995:              {debug, false},
 6996:              megaco_start,
 6997:              {megaco_start_user, Mid, RI, []},
 6998:              start_transport,
 6999:              {megaco_trace, disable},
 7000:              {megaco_system_info, users},

 7010:              {sleep, 1000},

 7013:              {sleep, 1000},

 7028: rapalr_mg_verify_handle_connect({handle_connect, CH, ?VERSION}) ->

 7030: 	      "~n   CH: ~p~n", [CH]),
 7031:     {ok, CH, ok};
 7032: rapalr_mg_verify_handle_connect(Else) ->
 7033:     io:format("rapalr_mg_verify_handle_connect -> unknown"
 7034: 	      "~n   Else: ~p~n", [Else]),

 7039: rapalr_mg_verify_service_change_rep_fun() ->
 7040:     fun(Rep) -> 
 7041: 	    rapalr_mg_verify_service_change_rep(Rep) 
 7042:     end.
 7043: -endif.
 7044: 
 7045: rapalr_mg_verify_service_change_rep(
 7046:   {handle_trans_reply, _CH, ?VERSION, {ok, [AR]}, _}) ->
 7047:     (catch rapalr_mg_do_verify_service_change_rep(AR));
 7048: rapalr_mg_verify_service_change_rep(Crap) ->
 7049:     {error, Crap, ok}.
 7050: 
 7051: rapalr_mg_do_verify_service_change_rep(AR) ->
 7052:     io:format("rapalr_mg_verify_service_change_rep -> ok"
 7053: 	      "~n   AR: ~p~n", [AR]),
 7054:     CR = 
 7055: 	case AR of
 7056: 	    #'ActionReply'{commandReply = [CmdRep]} ->
 7057: 		CmdRep;
 7058: 	    _ ->
 7059: 		Reason1 = {invalid_action_reply, AR},
 7060: 		throw({error, Reason1, ok})
 7061: 	end,
 7062:     SCR = 
 7063: 	case CR of
 7064: 	    {serviceChangeReply, ServChRep} ->
 7065: 		ServChRep;
 7066: 	    _ ->
 7067: 		Reason2 = {invalid_command_reply, CR},
 7068: 		throw({error, Reason2, ok})
 7069: 	end,
 7070:     {Tid, SCRes} = 
 7071: 	case SCR of
 7072: 	    #'ServiceChangeReply'{terminationID       = [TermID],
 7073: 				  serviceChangeResult = Res} ->
 7074: 		{TermID, Res};
 7075: 	    _ ->
 7076: 		Reason3 = {invalid_service_change_reply, SCR},
 7077: 		throw({error, Reason3, ok})
 7078: 	end,
 7079:     case Tid of
 7080: 	#megaco_term_id{contains_wildcards = false, id = ["root"]} ->
 7081: 	    ok;
 7082: 	_ ->
 7083: 	    Reason4 = {invalid_termination_id, Tid},
 7084: 	    throw({error, Reason4, ok})
 7085:     end,
 7086:     SCRParm = 
 7087: 	case SCRes of
 7088: 	    {serviceChangeResParms, ServChResParms} ->
 7089: 		ServChResParms;
 7090: 	    _ ->
 7091: 		Reason5 = {invalid_serviceChangeResult, SCRes},
 7092: 		throw({error, Reason5, ok})
 7093: 	end,
 7094:     case SCRParm of
 7095: 	#'ServiceChangeResParm'{serviceChangeMgcId = _RemoteMid} ->
 7096: 	    {ok, AR, ok};
 7097: 	_ ->
 7098: 	    Reason6 = {invalid_service_change_result, SCRParm},
 7099: 	    {error, Reason6, ok}
 7100:     end.
 7101: 
 7102: -ifndef(megaco_hipe_special).
 7103: rapalr_mg_verify_notify_rep_fun() ->
 7104:     fun(Rep) -> 
 7105: 	    rapalr_mg_verify_notify_rep(Rep) 
 7106:     end.
 7107: -endif.
 7108: 	     
 7109: rapalr_mg_verify_notify_rep({handle_trans_reply, _CH, ?VERSION,

 7112: 	      "~n   AR: ~p~n", [AR]),
 7113:     {ok, AR, ok};

 7115:     io:format("rapalr_mg_verify_notify_rep -> unknown"
 7116: 	      "~n   Else: ~p~n", [Else]),
 7117:     {error, Else, ok}.

 7120: rapalr_mg_service_change_request_ar(_Mid, Cid) ->
 7121:     Prof  = cre_serviceChangeProf("resgw", 1),
 7122:     SCP   = cre_serviceChangeParm(restart, ["901 mg col boot"], Prof),
 7123:     Root  = #megaco_term_id{id = ["root"]},
 7124:     SCR   = cre_serviceChangeReq([Root], SCP),
 7125:     CMD   = cre_command(SCR),
 7126:     CR    = cre_cmdReq(CMD),
 7127:     cre_actionReq(Cid, [CR]).
 7128: 
 7129: rapalr_mg_notify_request_ar(Rid, Tid, Cid) ->
 7130:     TT      = cre_timeNotation("19990729", "22000000"),
 7131:     Ev      = cre_obsEvent("al/of", TT),
 7132:     EvsDesc = cre_obsEvsDesc(Rid, [Ev]),
 7133:     NR      = cre_notifyReq([Tid], EvsDesc),
 7134:     CMD     = cre_command(NR),
 7135:     CR      = cre_cmdReq(CMD),
 7136:     cre_actionReq(Cid, [CR]).

 7142: dist(suite) ->
 7143:     [];
 7144: dist(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 7145:     ?SKIP("Needs a re-write..."),
 7146:     [_Local, Dist] = ?ACQUIRE_NODES(2, Config),
 7147:     d("dist -> start proxy",[]),
 7148:     ?USER_MOD:start_proxy(),
 7149: 
 7150:     PrelMid = preliminary_mid,
 7151:     MgMid   = ipv4_mid(4711),
 7152:     MgcMid  = ipv4_mid(),
 7153:     UserMod = ?USER_MOD,
 7154:     d("dist -> start megaco app",[]),
 7155:     ?VERIFY(ok, application:start(megaco)),
 7156:     UserConfig = [{user_mod, UserMod}, {send_mod, UserMod},
 7157: 		  {request_timer, infinity}, {reply_timer, infinity}],
 7158: 
 7159:     d("dist -> start megaco user MG (~p)",[MgMid]),
 7160:     ?VERIFY(ok,	megaco:start_user(MgMid, UserConfig)),
 7161: 
 7162:     d("dist -> start megaco user MGC (~p)",[MgcMid]),
 7163:     ?VERIFY(ok,	megaco:start_user(MgcMid, UserConfig)),
 7164: 
 7165:     d("dist -> retrieve (user info) receive_handle for MG",[]),
 7166:     MgRH = user_info(MgMid, receive_handle),
 7167: 
 7168:     d("dist -> retrieve (user info) receive_handle for MGC",[]),
 7169:     MgcRH = user_info(MgcMid, receive_handle), 
 7170: 
 7171:     d("dist -> start transport",[]),
 7172:     {ok, MgPid, MgSH} =
 7173: 	?VERIFY({ok, _, _}, UserMod:start_transport(MgRH, MgcRH)),
 7174:     PrelMgCH = #megaco_conn_handle{local_mid = MgMid,
 7175: 				   remote_mid = preliminary_mid},
 7176:     MgCH  = #megaco_conn_handle{local_mid = MgMid,
 7177: 				remote_mid = MgcMid},
 7178:     MgcCH = #megaco_conn_handle{local_mid = MgcMid,
 7179: 				remote_mid = MgMid},
 7180: 
 7181:     d("dist -> (MG) connect",[]),
 7182:     ?SEND(megaco:connect(MgRH, PrelMid, MgSH, MgPid)), % Mg prel
 7183: 
 7184:     d("dist -> (MG) await connect",[]),
 7185:     ?USER({connect, PrelMgCH, _V, []}, ok),
 7186:     ?RECEIVE([{res, _, {ok, PrelMgCH}}]),
 7187: 
 7188:     d("dist -> (MG) send service change request",[]),
 7189:     Req = service_change_request(),
 7190:     ?SEND(megaco:call(PrelMgCH, [Req], [])),
 7191: 
 7192:     d("dist -> (MGC) await auto-connect",[]),
 7193:     ?USER({connect, MgcCH, _V, []}, ok), % Mgc auto
 7194: 
 7195: 
 7196:     Rep = service_change_reply(MgcMid),
 7197:     d("dist -> (MGC) "
 7198:       "await service change request and send reply when received",[]),
 7199:     ?USER({request, MgcCH, _V, [[Req]]}, {discard_ack, [Rep]}),
 7200: 
 7201:     d("dist -> (MG) await connect",[]),
 7202:     ?USER({connect, MgCH, _V, []}, ok), % Mg confirm
 7203: 
 7204:     d("dist -> (MG) await service change reply",[]),
 7205:     ?RECEIVE([{res, _, {1, {ok, [Rep]}}}]),
 7206: 
 7207:     %% Dist
 7208:     d("dist -> start megaco on ~p", [Dist]),
 7209:     ?VERIFY(ok,	rpc:call(Dist, megaco, start, [])),
 7210: 
 7211:     d("dist -> start megaco user on ~p", [Dist]),
 7212:     ?VERIFY(ok,	rpc:call(Dist, megaco, start_user, [MgcMid, UserConfig])),
 7213: 
 7214:     d("dist -> (MG) connect to MGC", []),
 7215:     MgcPid = self(),
 7216:     MgcSH  = {element(2, MgSH), element(1, MgSH)},
 7217:     ?SEND(rpc:call(Dist, megaco, connect, [MgcRH, MgMid, MgcSH, MgcPid])), % Mgc dist
 7218: 
 7219:     d("dist -> (MGC) await auto-connect (from MG on ~p)", [Dist]),
 7220:     ?USER({connect, MgcCH, _V, []}, ok), % Mgc dist auto
 7221:     ?RECEIVE([{res, _, {ok, MgcCH}}]),
 7222: 
 7223:     d("dist -> (~p:MG) send service change request",[Dist]),
 7224:     ?SEND(rpc:call(Dist, megaco, call, [MgcCH, [Req], []])),
 7225: 
 7226:     d("dist -> (MG????????) "
 7227:       "await service change request and send reply when received",[]),
 7228:     ?USER({request, MgCH, _V, [[Req]]}, {discard_ack, [Rep]}),
 7229:     ?RECEIVE([{res, _, {1, {ok, [Rep]}}}]),
 7230: 
 7231:     d("dist -> retreive some info",[]),
 7232:     connections([MgCH, MgcCH]),
 7233:     ?VERIFY([MgCH], megaco:user_info(MgMid, connections)),
 7234:     ?VERIFY([MgcCH], megaco:user_info(MgcMid, connections)),
 7235: 
 7236:     ?VERIFY([MgcCH], rpc:call(Dist, megaco, system_info, [connections])),
 7237:     ?VERIFY([], rpc:call(Dist, megaco, user_info, [MgMid, connections])),
 7238:     ?VERIFY([MgcCH], rpc:call(Dist, megaco, user_info, [MgcMid, connections])),
 7239: 
 7240:     %% Shutdown
 7241: 
 7242:     d("dist -> close down the shop...",[]),
 7243:     Reason = shutdown,
 7244:     ?SEND(megaco:disconnect(MgCH, Reason)),
 7245:     ?USER({disconnect, MgCH, _V, [{user_disconnect, Reason}]}, ok),
 7246:     ?RECEIVE([{res, _, ok}]),
 7247:     ?VERIFY(ok,	megaco:stop_user(MgMid)),
 7248: 
 7249:     ?SEND(megaco:disconnect(MgcCH, Reason)),
 7250:     ?USER({disconnect, MgcCH, _V, [{user_disconnect, Reason}]}, ok),
 7251:     ?USER({disconnect, MgcCH, _V, [{user_disconnect, Reason}]}, ok),
 7252:     ?RECEIVE([{res, _, ok}]),
 7253:     ?VERIFY(ok,	megaco:stop_user(MgcMid)),
 7254: 
 7255:     ?VERIFY(ok, application:stop(megaco)),
 7256:     ?RECEIVE([]),
 7257: 
 7258:     d("dist -> stop proxy",[]),
 7259:     ?USER_MOD:stop_proxy(),
 7260: 
 7261:     d("dist -> done", []),
 7262:     ok.
 7263: 
 7264:

 7266: 
 7267: otp_4359(suite) ->
 7268:     [];
 7269: otp_4359(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 7270:     ?ACQUIRE_NODES(1, Config),
 7271:     Mid = {deviceName, "dummy_mid"},
 7272: 
 7273:     io:format("otp_4359 -> start megaco application~n", []),
 7274:     ?VERIFY(ok, application:start(megaco)),
 7275: 
 7276:     %% megaco:enable_trace(max, io),
 7277:     io:format("otp_4359 -> start and configure megaco user~n", []),
 7278:     ?VERIFY(ok,	megaco:start_user(Mid, [{send_mod,      ?MODULE},
 7279: 					{request_timer, infinity},
 7280: 					{reply_timer,   infinity}])),
 7281: 
 7282:     io:format("otp_4359 -> update user info: user_mod -> ~p~n", [?MODULE]),
 7283:     ?VERIFY(ok, megaco:update_user_info(Mid, user_mod,  ?MODULE)),
 7284:     io:format("otp_4359 -> update user info: user_args -> ~p~n", [self()]),
 7285:     ?VERIFY(ok, megaco:update_user_info(Mid, user_args, [self()])),
 7286:     io:format("otp_4359 -> retreive receive_handle~n", []),
 7287:     RH0 = user_info(Mid, receive_handle),
 7288:     io:format("otp_4359 -> RH0: ~p~n", [RH0]),
 7289:     RH1 = RH0#megaco_receive_handle{send_mod        = ?MODULE,
 7290: 				    encoding_mod    = megaco_compact_text_encoder,
 7291: 				    encoding_config = []},
 7292: 
 7293:     %% First an erroneous transaction (missing the transaction id number)
 7294:     %% then an valid transaction.
 7295:     M = "!/1 ml2 "
 7296: 	"T={C=${A=${M{O {MO=SR,RG=OFF,RV=OFF}}}}}"
 7297: 	"T=1{C=${A=${M{O {MO=SR,RG=OFF,RV=OFF}}}}}",
 7298: 
 7299:     %% Simulate incomming message
 7300:     %% Will result in an (auto) connect first
 7301:     io:format("otp_4359 -> simulate receive message~n", []),
 7302:     megaco:receive_message(RH1, self(), self(), list_to_binary(M)),
 7303:     io:format("otp_4359 -> await actions~n", []),
 7304:     Actions = otp_4359_await_actions([{handle_connect, ignore}, 
 7305: 				      {send_message, ?megaco_bad_request}, 
 7306: 				      {handle_trans_request, ignore}, 
 7307: 				      {send_message, ?megaco_not_implemented}]), 
 7308:     io:format("otp_4359 -> analyze actions~n", []),
 7309:     otp_4359_analyze_result(RH1, Actions),
 7310: 
 7311:     Conns = megaco:system_info(connections),
 7312:     io:format("otp_4359 -> connections~n~p~n", [Conns]),
 7313:     OKs   = lists:duplicate(length(Conns),ok),
 7314:     io:format("otp_4359 -> verify (all) connection disconnect~n", []),
 7315:     ?VERIFY(OKs, [megaco:disconnect(CH, test_complete) || CH <- Conns]),
 7316:     io:format("otp_4359 -> stop user (~p)~n", [Mid]),
 7317:     stop_user(Mid),
 7318:     io:format("otp_4359 -> stop megaco application~n", []),
 7319:     ?VERIFY(ok, application:stop(megaco)),
 7320:     io:format("otp_4359 -> make sure we have nothing in the message queue~n", []),
 7321:     ?RECEIVE([]),
 7322:     io:format("otp_4359 -> done~n", []),
 7323:     ok.
 7324: 
 7325: 
 7326: otp_4359_await_actions(Exp) ->
 7327:     otp_4359_await_actions(Exp, []).
 7328: 
 7329: otp_4359_await_actions([], Rep) ->
 7330:     lists:reverse(Rep);
 7331: otp_4359_await_actions([{M,I}|R] = _All, Rep) ->
 7332:     receive
 7333: 	{M, Info} ->
 7334: 	    io:format("otp_4359 -> received expected event [~w]~n", [M]),
 7335: 	    otp_4359_await_actions(R, [{M, I, Info}|Rep])
 7336: %% 	Else ->
 7337: %% 	    exit({received_unexpected_message, M, Else})
 7338: %% 	    %% io:format("received unexpected: ~p~n", [Else]),
 7339: %% 	    %% otp_4359_await_actions(All, Rep)
 7340:     after 10000 ->
 7341: 	    exit({timeout,megaco_test_lib:flush()} )
 7342:     end.
 7343: 
 7344: otp_4359_analyze_result(_RH, []) ->
 7345:     ok;
 7346: otp_4359_analyze_result(RH, 
 7347: 			[{send_message, ExpErrorCode, EncodedMessage}|L]) ->
 7348:     io:format("otp_4359_analyze_result -> send_message: ", []),
 7349:     otp_4359_analyze_encoded_message(RH, ExpErrorCode, EncodedMessage),
 7350:     otp_4359_analyze_result(RH,L);
 7351: otp_4359_analyze_result(RH, [{M,ignore,_}|T]) ->
 7352:     io:format("otp_4359_analyze_result -> ignoring ~p~n", [M]),
 7353:     otp_4359_analyze_result(RH,T).
 7354: 
 7355: otp_4359_analyze_encoded_message(RH, ExpErrorCode, M) 
 7356:   when is_record(RH, megaco_receive_handle) andalso is_binary(M) ->
 7357:     #megaco_receive_handle{encoding_mod    = Mod,
 7358: 			   encoding_config = Conf} = RH,
 7359:     case (catch Mod:decode_message(Conf, M)) of
 7360: 	{ok, #'MegacoMessage'{mess = #'Message'{messageBody = Body}}} ->
 7361: 	    case Body of
 7362: 		{transactions, [{transactionReply,Reply}]} ->
 7363: 		    case Reply of
 7364: 			#'TransactionReply'{transactionResult = Result} ->
 7365: 			    case Result of
 7366: 				{transactionError,ED} when is_record(ED, 'ErrorDescriptor') ->
 7367: 				    case ED#'ErrorDescriptor'.errorCode of
 7368: 					ExpErrorCode ->
 7369: 					    io:format("error code ~p ok~n", [ExpErrorCode]),
 7370: 					    ok;
 7371: 					Code ->
 7372: 					    io:format("error code ~p erroneous~n", [Code]),
 7373: 					    exit({unexpected_error_code, ExpErrorCode, Code})
 7374: 				    end;
 7375: 				_ ->
 7376: 				    io:format("unexpected trans result~n", []),
 7377: 				    exit({unexpected_trans_result, Result})
 7378: 			    end;
 7379: 			_ ->
 7380: 			    io:format("unexpected trans reply~n", []),
 7381: 			    exit({unexpected_trans_reply, Reply})
 7382: 		    end;
 7383: 		_ ->
 7384: 		    io:format("unexpected body~n", []),
 7385: 		    exit({unexpected_body, Body})
 7386: 	    end;
 7387: 
 7388: 	Else ->
 7389: 	    io:format("unexpected decode result~n", []),
 7390: 	    exit({unexpected_decode_result, Else})
 7391:     end.
 7392: 	    
 7393:     
 7394:

 7397: otp_4836(suite) ->
 7398:     [];
 7399: otp_4836(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 7400:     Pre = fun() ->
 7401:                   MgcNode = make_node_name(mgc),
 7402:                   MgNode  = make_node_name(mg),
 7403:                   d("start nodes: "
 7404:                     "~n      MgcNode: ~p"
 7405:                     "~n      MgNode:  ~p", 
 7406:                     [MgcNode, MgNode]),
 7407:                   Nodes = [MgcNode, MgNode], 
 7408:                   ok = ?START_NODES(Nodes, true),
 7409:                   Nodes
 7410:           end,
 7411:     Case = fun do_otp_4836/1,
 7412:     Post = fun(Nodes) ->
 7413:                    d("stop nodes"),
 7414:                    ?STOP_NODES(lists:reverse(Nodes))
 7415:            end,
 7416:     try_tc(otp_4836, Pre, Case, Post).
 7417: 
 7418: do_otp_4836([MgcNode, MgNode]) ->
 7419:     d("start the MGC simulator (generator)"),
 7420:     {ok, Mgc} = megaco_test_tcp_generator:start_link("MGC", MgcNode),
 7421: 
 7422:     d("create the MGC event sequence"),
 7423:     MgcEvSeq = otp_4836_mgc_event_sequence(text, tcp),
 7424: 
 7425:     d("start the MGC simulation"),
 7426:     {ok, MgcId} = megaco_test_tcp_generator:exec(Mgc, MgcEvSeq),
 7427: 
 7428:     i("await MGC ready announcement"),
 7429:     receive
 7430:         announce_mgc ->
 7431:             i("received MGC ready announcement"),
 7432:             ok
 7433:     end,
 7434: 
 7435:     i("[MG] start"),    
 7436:     MgMid = {deviceName, "mg"},
 7437:     ReqTmr = #megaco_incr_timer{wait_for    = 3000,
 7438:                                 factor      = 1, 
 7439:                                 incr        = 0,
 7440:                                 max_retries = 3},
 7441:     %% 5000,  %% Does not matter since we will not use this anyway...
 7442:     LongReqTmr = #megaco_incr_timer{wait_for    = 3000,
 7443:                                     factor      = 1, 
 7444:                                     incr        = 0,
 7445:                                     max_retries = 3},
 7446:     PendingTmr = 10000,
 7447:     ReplyTmr = 16000,
 7448:     MgConfig = [{request_timer,      ReqTmr}, 
 7449:                 {long_request_timer, LongReqTmr}, 
 7450:                 {pending_timer,      PendingTmr},
 7451:                 {reply_timer,        ReplyTmr}],
 7452:     {ok, Mg} = ?MG_START(MgNode, MgMid, text, tcp, MgConfig, ?MG_VERBOSITY),
 7453: 
 7454:     i("[MG] connect to the MGC (service change)"),    
 7455:     ServChRes = ?MG_SERV_CHANGE(Mg),
 7456:     d("service change result: ~p", [ServChRes]),
 7457: 
 7458:     d("[MG] send the notify"),
 7459:     {ok, Reply} = (catch ?MG_NOTIF_RAR(Mg)),
 7460:     {1, {ok, [AR]}} = Reply,
 7461:     d("[MG] ActionReply: ~p", [AR]),
 7462: 
 7463:     d("await the generator reply"),
 7464:     await_completion([MgcId]),
 7465: 
 7466:     %% Tell MG to stop
 7467:     i("[MG] stop"),
 7468:     ?MG_STOP(Mg),
 7469: 
 7470:     %% Tell Mgc to stop
 7471:     i("[MGC] stop generator"),
 7472:     megaco_test_tcp_generator:stop(Mgc),
 7473: 
 7474:     i("done", []),
 7475:     ok.
