 7498: otp_4836_mgc_event_sequence(text, tcp) ->
 7499:     CTRL = self(),
 7500:     DecodeFun = ?otp_4836_mgc_decode_msg_fun(megaco_pretty_text_encoder, []),
 7501:     EncodeFun = ?otp_4836_mgc_encode_msg_fun(megaco_pretty_text_encoder, []),
 7502:     Mid = {deviceName,"ctrl"},
 7503:     ServiceChangeReply = otp_4836_service_change_reply_msg(Mid, 1, 0),
 7504:     TermId = #megaco_term_id{id = ["00000000","00000000","01101101"]},
 7505:     NotifyReply = otp_4836_notify_reply_msg(Mid, 2, 0, TermId),
 7506:     Pending = otp_4836_pending_msg(Mid,2),
 7507:     ServiceChangeVerifyFun = ?otp_4836_mgc_verify_service_change_req_msg_fun(),
 7508:     NotifyReqVerifyFun     = ?otp_4836_mgc_verify_notify_req_msg_fun(),
 7509:     MgcEvSeq = [{debug,  true},
 7510: 		{decode, DecodeFun},
 7511: 		{encode, EncodeFun},
 7512: 		{listen, 2944},
 7513: 
 7514:                 %% ANNOUNCE READY
 7515:                 {trigger, "announce ready", fun() -> CTRL ! announce_mgc end}, 
 7516: 
 7517: 		{expect_accept, any},
 7518: 		{expect_receive, "service-change-request", {ServiceChangeVerifyFun, 10000}}, 
 7519: 		{send, "service-change-reply", ServiceChangeReply}, 
 7520: 		{expect_receive, "notify-request", {NotifyReqVerifyFun, 10000}},
 7521: 		{send, "pending 1", Pending}, 
 7522: 		{sleep, 100},
 7523: 		{send, "pending 2", Pending}, 
 7524: 		{sleep, 500},
 7525:   		{send, "notify-reply", NotifyReply}, 
 7526: 		{sleep, 2000}
 7527: 	       ],
 7528:     MgcEvSeq.
 7529: 
 7530: otp_4836_service_change_reply_msg(Mid, TransId, Cid) ->
 7531:     SCRP  = #'ServiceChangeResParm'{serviceChangeMgcId = Mid},
 7532:     SCRPs = {serviceChangeResParms,SCRP},
 7533:     Root  = #megaco_term_id{id = ["root"]},
 7534:     SCR   = #'ServiceChangeReply'{terminationID       = [Root],
 7535: 				  serviceChangeResult = SCRPs},
 7536:     CR    = {serviceChangeReply, SCR},
 7537:     otp_4836_msg(Mid, TransId, CR, Cid).
 7538: 
 7539: otp_4836_notify_reply_msg(Mid, TransId, Cid, TermId) ->
 7540:     NR  = #'NotifyReply'{terminationID = [TermId]},
 7541:     CR  = {notifyReply, NR},
 7542:     otp_4836_msg(Mid, TransId, CR, Cid).
 7543: 
 7544: otp_4836_msg(Mid, TransId, CR, Cid) ->
 7545:     AR  = #'ActionReply'{contextId    = Cid,
 7546: 			 commandReply = [CR]},
 7547:     ARs  = {actionReplies, [AR]},
 7548:     TR   = #'TransactionReply'{transactionId     = TransId,
 7549: 			       transactionResult = ARs},
 7550:     Body = {transactions, [{transactionReply, TR}]},
 7551:     Mess = #'Message'{version     = 1,
 7552: 		      mId         = Mid,
 7553: 		      messageBody = Body},
 7554:     #'MegacoMessage'{mess = Mess}.
 7555: 
 7556: 
 7557: otp_4836_pending_msg(Mid, TransId) ->
 7558:     TP   = #'TransactionPending'{transactionId = TransId},
 7559:     Body = {transactions, [{transactionPending, TP}]},
 7560:     Mess = #'Message'{version     = 1,
 7561: 		      mId         = Mid,
 7562: 		      messageBody = Body},
 7563:     #'MegacoMessage'{mess = Mess}.
 7564:

 7570:     end.

 7600: otp_4836_mgc_verify_service_change_req_msg(
 7601:   #'MegacoMessage'{mess = Mess} = M) -> 
 7602:     #'Message'{version     = _V,
 7603: 	       mId         = _Mid,
 7604: 	       messageBody = Body} = Mess,
 7605:     {transactions, [Trans]} = Body,
 7606:     {transactionRequest, TR} = Trans,
 7607:     #'TransactionRequest'{transactionId = _Tid,
 7608: 			  actions = [AR]} = TR,
 7609:     #'ActionRequest'{contextId = _Cid,
 7610: 		     contextRequest = _CtxReq,
 7611: 		     contextAttrAuditReq = _CtxAar,
 7612: 		     commandRequests = [CR]} = AR,
 7613:     #'CommandRequest'{command = Cmd,
 7614: 		      optional = _Opt,
 7615: 		      wildcardReturn = _WR} = CR,
 7616:     {serviceChangeReq, SCR} = Cmd,
 7617: 	    #'ServiceChangeRequest'{terminationID = _TermID,
 7618: 				    serviceChangeParms = SCP} = SCR,
 7619:     #'ServiceChangeParm'{serviceChangeMethod = restart,
 7620: 			 serviceChangeReason = [[$9,$0,$1|_]]} = SCP,
 7621:     {ok, M};
 7622: otp_4836_mgc_verify_service_change_req_msg(M) ->
 7623:     {error, {invalid_message, M}}.
 7624: 
 7625: -ifndef(megaco_hipe_special).
 7626: otp_4836_mgc_verify_notify_req_msg_fun() ->
 7627:     fun(M) ->
 7628: 	    otp_4836_mgc_verify_notify_req_msg(M)
 7629:     end.
 7630: -endif.
 7631: 
 7632: otp_4836_mgc_verify_notify_req_msg(#'MegacoMessage'{mess = Mess} = M) -> 
 7633:     #'Message'{messageBody = Body} = Mess,
 7634:     {transactions, [Trans]} = Body,
 7635:     {transactionRequest, TR} = Trans,
 7636:     #'TransactionRequest'{actions = [AR]} = TR,
 7637:     #'ActionRequest'{commandRequests = [CR1,CR2]} = AR,
 7638:     #'CommandRequest'{command = Cmd1} = CR1,
 7639:     {notifyReq, NR1} = Cmd1,
 7640:     #'NotifyRequest'{observedEventsDescriptor = OED1} = NR1,
 7641:     #'ObservedEventsDescriptor'{observedEventLst = [OE1]} = OED1,
 7642:     #'ObservedEvent'{eventName = "al/of"} = OE1,
 7643:     #'CommandRequest'{command = Cmd2} = CR2,
 7644:     {notifyReq, NR2} = Cmd2,
 7645:     #'NotifyRequest'{observedEventsDescriptor = OED2} = NR2,
 7646:     #'ObservedEventsDescriptor'{observedEventLst = [OE2]} = OED2,
 7647:     #'ObservedEvent'{eventName = "al/of"} = OE2,
 7648:     {ok, M};
 7649: otp_4836_mgc_verify_notify_req_msg(M) ->
 7650:     {error, {invalid_message, M}}.

 7712: 
 7713:     d("await the generator reply(s)"),
 7714:     await_completion([MgcId, MgId]), 
 7715:

 7717:     i("[MGC] stop generator"),
 7718:     megaco_test_megaco_generator:stop(Mgc),
 7719:

 7722:     megaco_test_tcp_generator:stop(Mg),

 7725:     ok.

 7748: otp_5805_mg_event_sequence(text, tcp) ->
 7749:     DecodeFun = ?otp_5805_mg_decode_msg_fun(megaco_pretty_text_encoder, []),
 7750:     EncodeFun = ?otp_5805_mg_encode_msg_fun(megaco_pretty_text_encoder, []),
 7751:     Mid = {deviceName,"mg"},
 7752:     ServiceChangeReq = otp_5805_mg_service_change_request_msg(Mid, 1, 0),
 7753:     NotifyReqNNV = otp_5805_mg_notify_request_msg("1"),
 7754:     NotifyReqUV = otp_5805_mg_notify_request_msg("4"),
 7755:     ServiceChangeReplyVerifyFun = 
 7756: 	?otp_5805_mg_verify_service_change_rep_msg_fun(),
 7757:     EDVerify = 
 7758: 	?otp_5805_mg_verify_error_descriptor_msg_fun(),
 7759:     MgEvSeq = [{debug,  true},
 7760: 	       {decode, DecodeFun},
 7761: 	       {encode, EncodeFun},
 7762: 	       {connect, 2944},
 7763: 
 7764: 	       {send, "service-change-request", ServiceChangeReq}, 
 7765: 	       {expect_receive, "service-change-reply", {ServiceChangeReplyVerifyFun, 5000}}, 
 7766: 	       {sleep, 1000},
 7767: 	       {send, "notify request (not negotiated version)", NotifyReqNNV}, 
 7768: 	       {expect_receive, "error-descriptor", EDVerify}, 
 7769: 	       {sleep, 1000},
 7770:  	       {send, "notify request (unsupported version)", NotifyReqUV}, 
 7771: 	       {expect_receive, "error-descriptor", EDVerify}, 
 7772: 
 7773: 	       {expect_nothing, 4000},
 7774: 	       disconnect
 7775: 	      ],
 7776:     MgEvSeq.
 7777:

 7780:     fun(M) -> 
 7781:             encode_msg(M, Mod, Conf)
 7782:     end.
 7783: -endif.

 7793: otp_5805_mg_verify_service_change_rep_msg_fun() ->
 7794:     fun(M) ->
 7795: 	    otp_5805_mg_verify_service_change_rep_msg(M)
 7796:     end.

 7799: otp_5805_mg_verify_service_change_rep_msg(#'MegacoMessage'{mess = Mess} = M) -> 
 7800:     case Mess of
 7801: 	#'Message'{version     = 1,
 7802: 		   mId         = _MgMid,
 7803: 		   messageBody = Body} ->
 7804: 	    case Body of
 7805: 		{transactions, [Trans]} ->
 7806: 		    case Trans of
 7807: 			{transactionReply, TR} ->
 7808: 			    case TR of
 7809: 				#'TransactionReply'{transactionId = _Tid,
 7810: 						    immAckRequired = asn1_NOVALUE,
 7811: 						    transactionResult = Res} ->
 7812: 				    case Res of
 7813: 					{actionReplies, [AR]} ->
 7814: 					    case AR of
 7815: 						#'ActionReply'{contextId = _Cid,
 7816: 							       errorDescriptor = asn1_NOVALUE,
 7817: 							       contextReply    = _CtxReq,
 7818: 							       commandReply    = [CR]} ->
 7819: 						    case CR of
 7820: 							{serviceChangeReply, SCR} ->
 7821: 							    case SCR of
 7822: 								#'ServiceChangeReply'{
 7823: 								       terminationID       = _TermID,
 7824: 								       serviceChangeResult = SCRes} ->
 7825: 								    case SCRes of
 7826: 									{serviceChangeResParms, SCRP} ->
 7827: 									    case SCRP of
 7828: 										#'ServiceChangeResParm'{
 7829: 											serviceChangeMgcId   = _MgcMid,
 7830: 											serviceChangeVersion = 2} ->
 7831: 										    {ok, M};
 7832: 										_ ->
 7833: 										    {error, {invalid_scrp, SCRP}}
 7834: 									    end;
 7835: 									_ ->
 7836: 									    {error, {invalid_scres, SCRes}}
 7837: 								    end;
 7838: 								_ ->
 7839: 								    {error, {invalid_scr, SCR}}
 7840: 							    end;
 7841: 							_ ->
 7842: 							    {error, {invalid_cr, CR}}
 7843: 						    end;
 7844: 						_ ->
 7845: 						    {error, {invalid_ar, AR}}
 7846: 					    end;
 7847: 					_ ->
 7848: 					    {error, {invalid_tres, Res}}
 7849: 				    end;
 7850: 				_ ->
 7851: 				    {error, {invalid_tr, TR}}
 7852: 			    end;
 7853: 			_ ->
 7854: 			    {error, {invalid_trans, Trans}}
 7855: 		    end;
 7856: 		_ ->
 7857: 		    {error, {invalid_body, Body}}
 7858: 	    end;
 7859: 	_ ->
 7860: 	    {error, {invalid_mess, Mess}}
 7861:     end;
 7862: otp_5805_mg_verify_service_change_rep_msg(M) ->
 7863:     {error, {invalid_message, M}}.
 7864: 
 7865: 
 7866: -ifndef(megaco_hipe_special).
 7867: otp_5805_mg_verify_error_descriptor_msg_fun() ->
 7868:     fun(M) ->
 7869: 	    otp_5805_mg_verify_error_descriptor_msg(M)
 7870:     end.
 7871: -endif.

 7873: otp_5805_mg_verify_error_descriptor_msg(#'MegacoMessage'{mess = Mess} = M) -> 
 7874:     case Mess of
 7875: 	#'Message'{version     = 2,
 7876: 		   mId         = _MgMid,
 7877: 		   messageBody = Body} ->
 7878: 	    io:format("otp_5805_mg_verify_error_descriptor_msg_fun -> ok"
 7879: 		      "~n   Body:  ~p"
 7880: 		      "~n", [Body]),
 7881: 	    case Body of
 7882: 		{messageError, ED} ->
 7883: 		    case ED of
 7884: 			#'ErrorDescriptor'{
 7885: 			      errorCode = ?megaco_version_not_supported} ->
 7886: 			    {ok, M};
 7887: 			_ ->
 7888: 			    {error, {invalid_ed, ED}}
 7889: 		    end;
 7890: 		_ ->
 7891: 		    {error, {invalid_body, Body}}
 7892: 	    end;
 7893: 	_ ->
 7894: 	    {error, {invalid_mess, Mess}}
 7895:     end;
 7896: otp_5805_mg_verify_error_descriptor_msg(M) ->
 7897:     {error, {invalid_message, M}}.
 7898: 
 7899: otp_5805_mg_service_change_request_ar(_Mid, Cid) ->
 7900:     Prof  = cre_serviceChangeProf("resgw", 1),
 7901:     SCP   = cre_serviceChangeParm(restart, 2, ["901 mg col boot"], Prof),
 7902:     Root  = #megaco_term_id{id = ["root"]},
 7903:     SCR   = cre_serviceChangeReq([Root], SCP),
 7904:     CMD   = cre_command(SCR),
 7905:     CR    = cre_cmdReq(CMD),
 7906:     cre_actionReq(Cid, [CR]).
 7907: 
 7908: otp_5805_mg_service_change_request_msg(Mid, TransId, Cid) ->
 7909:     AR    = otp_5805_mg_service_change_request_ar(Mid, Cid),
 7910:     TR    = cre_transReq(TransId, [AR]),
 7911:     Trans = cre_transaction(TR),
 7912:     Mess  = cre_message(1, Mid, cre_transactions([Trans])),
 7913:     cre_megacoMessage(Mess).

 7919: %%     NR      = cre_notifyReq([Tid], EvsDesc),

 7924: otp_5805_mg_notify_request_msg(V) ->
 7925:     M = 
 7926: "MEGACO/" ++ V ++ " mg
 7927: Transaction = 2 {
 7928: 	Context = 1 {
 7929: 		Notify = 00000000/00000000/01101101 {
 7930: 			ObservedEvents = 1 {
 7931: 				19990729T22000000:al/of
 7932: 			}
 7933: 		}
 7934: 	}
 7935: }",
 7936:     list_to_binary(M).

 7963: otp_5805_mgc_event_sequence(Config,
 7964:                             text, tcp) ->
 7965:     CTRL = self(),
 7966:     Mid = {deviceName,"ctrl"},
 7967:     RI = [
 7968:           {port,             2944},
 7969:           {encoding_module,  megaco_pretty_text_encoder},
 7970:           {encoding_config,  []},
 7971:           {transport_module, megaco_tcp}
 7972:          ],
 7973:     ConnectVerify          = ?otp_5805_mgc_verify_handle_connect_fun(), 
 7974:     ServiceChangeReqVerify = ?otp_5805_mgc_verify_service_change_req_fun(Mid),
 7975:     SyntaxErrorVerify1     = ?otp_5805_mgc_verify_handle_syntax_error_fun(), 
 7976:     SyntaxErrorVerify2     = ?otp_5805_mgc_verify_handle_syntax_error_fun(),
 7977:     DiscoVerify            = ?otp_5805_mgc_verify_handle_disconnect_fun(), 
 7978:     EvSeq = [
 7979:              {debug, true},
 7980: 	     {megaco_trace, disable},
 7981: 	     ?MEGACO_TRACE(Config, max), % {megaco_trace, max},
 7982:              megaco_start,
 7983:              {megaco_start_user, Mid, RI, []},
 7984:              start_transport,
 7985:              listen,
 7986: 
 7987:              %% ANNOUNCE READY
 7988:              {trigger, fun() -> CTRL ! announce_mgc end}, 
 7989: 
 7990:              {megaco_callback, handle_connect, ConnectVerify},
 7991: 	     {megaco_conn_info, all},
 7992:              {megaco_callback, handle_trans_request_sc, ServiceChangeReqVerify},
 7993: 	     {megaco_update_conn_info, protocol_version, 2}, 
 7994:              {megaco_callback, handle_syntax_error, SyntaxErrorVerify1},
 7995:              {megaco_callback, handle_syntax_error, SyntaxErrorVerify2},
 7996:              {megaco_callback, handle_disconnect, DiscoVerify},
 7997:              megaco_stop_user,
 7998:              megaco_stop
 7999:             ],
 8000:     EvSeq.
 8001: 
 8002: otp_5805_mgc_verify_handle_connect({handle_connect, CH, 1}) -> 
 8003:     io:format("otp_5805_mgc_verify_handle_connect -> ok"
 8004: 	      "~n   CH:  ~p"
 8005: 	      "~n", [CH]),
 8006:     {ok, CH, ok};
 8007: otp_5805_mgc_verify_handle_connect({handle_connect, CH, V}) -> 
 8008:     io:format("otp_5805_mgc_verify_handle_connect -> unexpected version"
 8009: 	      "~n   CH:  ~p"
 8010: 	      "~n   V:   ~p"
 8011: 	      "~n", [CH, V]),
 8012:     {error, {unexpected_version, V}, ok};
 8013: otp_5805_mgc_verify_handle_connect(Else) ->
 8014:     {error, Else, ok}.

 8024: otp_5805_mgc_verify_service_change_req({handle_trans_request, _, V, [AR]}, 
 8025: 				       Mid) ->
 8026:     io:format("otp_5805_mgc_verify_service_change_req -> ok so far"
 8027: 	      "~n   V:   ~p"
 8028: 	      "~n", [V]),
 8029:     case AR of
 8030: 	#'ActionRequest'{commandRequests = [CR]} ->
 8031: 	    case CR of
 8032: 		#'CommandRequest'{command = Cmd} ->
 8033: 		    case Cmd of
 8034: 			{serviceChangeReq, 
 8035: 			 #'ServiceChangeRequest'{terminationID = [Tid],
 8036: 						 serviceChangeParms = Parms}} ->
 8037: 			    case Tid of
 8038: 				#megaco_term_id{contains_wildcards = false, 
 8039: 						id = ["root"]} ->
 8040: 				    case Parms of
 8041: 					#'ServiceChangeParm'{
 8042: 						 serviceChangeMethod = restart,
 8043: 						 serviceChangeVersion = 2, 
 8044: 						 serviceChangeReason = [[$9,$0,$1|_]]} ->
 8045: 					    Reply = 
 8046: 						{discard_ack, 
 8047: 						 [otp_5805_mgc_service_change_reply_ar(Mid, 1)]},
 8048: 					    {ok, AR, Reply};
 8049: 					_ ->
 8050: 					    Err = {invalid_SCP, Parms},
 8051: 					    ED = otp_5805_err_desc(Parms),
 8052: 					    ErrReply = 
 8053: 						{discard_ack, ED},
 8054: 					    {error, Err, ErrReply}
 8055: 				    end;
 8056: 				_ ->
 8057: 				    Err = {invalid_termination_id, Tid},
 8058: 				    ED = otp_5805_err_desc(Tid),
 8059: 				    ErrReply = {discard_ack, ED},
 8060: 				    {error, Err, ErrReply}
 8061: 			    end;
 8062: 			_ ->
 8063: 			    Err = {invalid_command, Cmd},
 8064: 			    ED = otp_5805_err_desc(Cmd),
 8065: 			    ErrReply = {discard_ack, ED},
 8066: 			    {error, Err, ErrReply}
 8067: 		    end;
 8068: 		_ ->
 8069: 		    Err = {invalid_command_request, CR},
 8070: 		    ED = otp_5805_err_desc(CR),
 8071: 		    ErrReply = {discard_ack, ED},
 8072: 		    {error, Err, ErrReply}
 8073: 	    end;
 8074: 	_ ->
 8075: 	    Err = {invalid_action_request, AR},
 8076: 	    ED = otp_5805_err_desc(AR),
 8077: 	    ErrReply = {discard_ack, ED},
 8078: 	    {error, Err, ErrReply}
 8079:     end;
 8080: otp_5805_mgc_verify_service_change_req(Else, _Mid) ->
 8081:     ED       = otp_5805_err_desc(Else),
 8082:     ErrReply = {discard_ack, ED},
 8083:     {error, Else, ErrReply}.
 8084: 
 8085: otp_5805_mgc_verify_handle_syntax_error({handle_syntax_error, CH, _, ED}) 
 8086:   when is_record(ED, 'ErrorDescriptor') -> 
 8087:     io:format("otp_5805_mgc_verify_handle_syntax_error -> ok so far"
 8088: 	      "~n   CH: ~p"
 8089: 	      "~n   ED:  ~p"
 8090: 	      "~n", [CH, ED]),
 8091:     case ED of
 8092: 	#'ErrorDescriptor'{errorCode = ?megaco_version_not_supported} ->
 8093: 	    {ok, CH, reply};
 8094: 	#'ErrorDescriptor'{errorCode = Code} ->
 8095: 	    {error, {invalid_errorCode, Code}, ok}
 8096:     end;
 8097: otp_5805_mgc_verify_handle_syntax_error(Else) ->
 8098:     io:format("otp_5805_mgc_verify_handle_syntax_error -> unknown"
 8099: 	      "~n   Else: ~p~n", [Else]),
 8100:     {error, Else, ok}.
 8101: 
 8102: otp_5805_mgc_verify_handle_disconnect({handle_disconnect, CH, V, _R}) -> 
 8103:     io:format("otp_5805_mgc_verify_handle_disconnect -> ok"
 8104: 	      "~n   CH: ~p"
 8105: 	      "~n   V:  ~p"
 8106: 	      "~n   _R:  ~p"
 8107: 	      "~n", [CH, V, _R]),
 8108:     {ok, CH, ok};
 8109: otp_5805_mgc_verify_handle_disconnect(Else) ->
 8110:     io:format("otp_5805_mgc_verify_handle_disconnect -> unknown"
 8111: 	      "~n   Else: ~p~n", [Else]),
 8112:     {error, Else, ok}.

 8114: otp_5805_mgc_service_change_reply_ar(Mid, Cid) ->
 8115:     SCRP  = cre_serviceChangeResParm(Mid, 2),
 8116:     SCRes = cre_serviceChangeResult(SCRP),
 8117:     Root  = #megaco_term_id{id = ["root"]},
 8118:     SCR   = cre_serviceChangeReply([Root], SCRes),
 8119:     CR    = cre_cmdReply(SCR),
 8120:     cre_actionReply(Cid, [CR]).

 8125: %%     cre_actionReply(Cid, [CR]).

 8127: 
 8128: otp_5805_err_desc(T) ->
 8129:     EC = ?megaco_internal_gateway_error,
 8130:     ET = lists:flatten(io_lib:format("~w",[T])),
 8131:     #'ErrorDescriptor'{errorCode = EC, errorText = ET}.

 8136: otp_5881(suite) ->
 8137:     [];
 8138: otp_5881(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 8139:     ?SKIP("deprecated by OTP-5887"),
 8140:     put(verbosity, ?TEST_VERBOSITY),
 8141:     put(sname,     "TEST"),
 8142:     put(tc,        otp_5881),
 8143:     i("starting"),
 8144: 
 8145:     MgcNode = make_node_name(mgc),
 8146:     MgNode  = make_node_name(mg),
 8147:     d("start nodes: "
 8148:       "~n   MgcNode: ~p"
 8149:       "~n   MgNode:  ~p", 
 8150:       [MgcNode, MgNode]),
 8151:     Nodes = [MgcNode, MgNode], 
 8152:     ok = ?START_NODES(Nodes, true),
 8153: 
 8154:     d("start the MGC simulator (generator)"),
 8155:     {ok, Mgc} = megaco_test_tcp_generator:start_link("MGC", MgcNode),
 8156: 
 8157:     d("create the MGC event sequence"),
 8158:     MgcEvSeq = otp_5881_mgc_event_sequence(text, tcp),
 8159: 
 8160:     d("start the MGC simulation"),
 8161:     {ok, MgcId} = megaco_test_tcp_generator:exec(Mgc, MgcEvSeq),
 8162: 
 8163:     i("await MGC ready announcement"),
 8164:     receive
 8165:         announce_mgc ->
 8166:             i("received MGC ready announcement"),
 8167:             ok
 8168:     end,
 8169: 
 8170:     i("[MG] start"),    
 8171:     MgMid = {deviceName, "mg"},
 8172:     ReqTmr = #megaco_incr_timer{wait_for    = 3000,
 8173:                                 factor      = 1, 
 8174:                                 incr        = 0,
 8175:                                 max_retries = 3},
 8176:     %% 5000,  %% Does not matter since we will not use this anyway...
 8177:     LongReqTmr = #megaco_incr_timer{wait_for    = 3000,
 8178:                                     factor      = 1, 
 8179:                                     incr        = 0,
 8180:                                     max_retries = 3},
 8181:     PendingTmr = 10000,
 8182:     ReplyTmr = 16000,
 8183:     MgConfig = [{request_timer,      ReqTmr}, 
 8184:                 {long_request_timer, LongReqTmr}, 
 8185:                 {pending_timer,      PendingTmr},
 8186:                 {reply_timer,        ReplyTmr}],
 8187:     {ok, Mg} = ?MG_START(MgNode, MgMid, text, tcp, MgConfig, ?MG_VERBOSITY),
 8188: 
 8189:     i("[MG] verify transaction-id: undefined_serial"),    
 8190:     otp_5881_verify_trans_id(Mg, undefined_serial),
 8191:     
 8192:     i("[MG] connect to the MGC (service change)"),    
 8193:     ServChRes = ?MG_SERV_CHANGE(Mg),
 8194:     d("service change result: ~p", [ServChRes]),
 8195: 
 8196:     i("[MG] verify transaction-id: 1"),    
 8197:     otp_5881_verify_trans_id(Mg, 1),
 8198:     
 8199:     d("[MG] send the notify"),
 8200:     {ok, Reply} = (catch ?MG_NOTIF_RAR(Mg)),
 8201:     {1, {ok, [AR]}} = Reply,
 8202:     d("[MG] ActionReply: ~p", [AR]),
 8203: 
 8204:     i("[MG] verify transaction-id: 2"),    
 8205:     otp_5881_verify_trans_id(Mg, 2),
 8206:     
 8207:     d("await the generator reply"),
 8208:     await_completion([MgcId]),
 8209: 
 8210:     %% Tell MG to stop
 8211:     i("[MG] stop"),
 8212:     ?MG_STOP(Mg),
 8213: 
 8214:     %% Tell Mgc to stop
 8215:     i("[MGC] stop generator"),
 8216:     megaco_test_tcp_generator:stop(Mgc),
 8217: 
 8218:     %% Cleanup
 8219:     d("stop nodes"),
 8220:     ?STOP_NODES(lists:reverse(Nodes)),
 8221: 
 8222:     i("done", []),
 8223:     ok.
 8224: 
 8225: otp_5881_verify_trans_id(Mg, Expected) ->
 8226:     case ?MG_CONN_INFO(Mg, trans_id) of
 8227: 	Expected -> 
 8228: 	    ok;
 8229: 	ErroneousValue ->
 8230: 	    throw({unexpected_transaction_id_value, ErroneousValue, Expected})
 8231:     end.
 8232:

 8237: -define(otp_5881_mgc_encode_msg_fun(Mod, Conf),
 8238: 	{?MODULE, encode_msg, [Mod, Conf]}).

 8241: -define(otp_5881_mgc_verify_notify_req_msg_fun(),

 8243: -else.

 8245: 	otp_5881_mgc_decode_msg_fun(Mod, Conf)).
 8246: -define(otp_5881_mgc_encode_msg_fun(Mod, Conf),
 8247: 	otp_5881_mgc_encode_msg_fun(Mod, Conf)).
 8248: -define(otp_5881_mgc_verify_service_change_req_msg_fun(),
 8249: 	otp_5881_mgc_verify_service_change_req_msg_fun()).
 8250: -define(otp_5881_mgc_verify_notify_req_msg_fun(),
 8251: 	otp_5881_mgc_verify_notify_req_msg_fun()).
 8252: -endif.

 8254: otp_5881_mgc_event_sequence(text, tcp) ->
 8255:     CTRL = self(),
 8256:     DecodeFun = ?otp_5881_mgc_decode_msg_fun(megaco_pretty_text_encoder, []),
 8257:     EncodeFun = ?otp_5881_mgc_encode_msg_fun(megaco_pretty_text_encoder, []),
 8258:     Mid = {deviceName,"ctrl"},
 8259:     ServiceChangeReply = otp_5881_service_change_reply_msg(Mid, 1, 0),
 8260:     TermId = #megaco_term_id{id = ["00000000","00000000","01101101"]},
 8261:     NotifyReply = otp_5881_notify_reply_msg(Mid, 2, 0, TermId),
 8262:     %% Pending = otp_5881_pending_msg(Mid,2),
 8263:     ServiceChangeVerifyFun = ?otp_5881_mgc_verify_service_change_req_msg_fun(),
 8264:     NotifyReqVerifyFun     = ?otp_5881_mgc_verify_notify_req_msg_fun(),
 8265:     MgcEvSeq = [{debug,  true},
 8266: 		{decode, DecodeFun},
 8267: 		{encode, EncodeFun},
 8268: 		{listen, 2944},
 8269: 
 8270:                 %% ANNOUNCE READY
 8271:                 {trigger, "announce ready", fun() -> CTRL ! announce_mgc end}, 
 8272: 
 8273: 		{expect_accept, any},
 8274: 		{expect_receive, "service-change-request", {ServiceChangeVerifyFun, 10000}}, 
 8275: 		{send, "service-change-reply", ServiceChangeReply}, 
 8276: 		{expect_receive, "notify-request", {NotifyReqVerifyFun, 10000}},
 8277:   		{send, "notify-reply", NotifyReply},
 8278: 		{sleep, 2000}
 8279: 	       ],
 8280:     MgcEvSeq.

 8296: otp_5881_service_change_reply_msg(Mid, TransId, Cid) ->
 8297:     SCRP  = #'ServiceChangeResParm'{serviceChangeMgcId = Mid},
 8298:     SCRPs = {serviceChangeResParms,SCRP},
 8299:     Root  = #megaco_term_id{id = ["root"]},
 8300:     SCR   = #'ServiceChangeReply'{terminationID       = [Root],
 8301: 				  serviceChangeResult = SCRPs},
 8302:     CR    = {serviceChangeReply, SCR},
 8303:     otp_5881_msg(Mid, TransId, CR, Cid).
 8304: 
 8305: otp_5881_notify_reply_msg(Mid, TransId, Cid, TermId) ->
 8306:     NR  = #'NotifyReply'{terminationID = [TermId]},
 8307:     CR  = {notifyReply, NR},
 8308:     otp_5881_msg(Mid, TransId, CR, Cid).
 8309: 
 8310: otp_5881_msg(Mid, TransId, CR, Cid) ->
 8311:     AR  = #'ActionReply'{contextId    = Cid,
 8312: 			 commandReply = [CR]},
 8313:     ARs  = {actionReplies, [AR]},
 8314:     TR   = #'TransactionReply'{transactionId     = TransId,
 8315: 			       transactionResult = ARs},
 8316:     Body = {transactions, [{transactionReply, TR}]},
 8317:     Mess = #'Message'{version     = 1,
 8318: 		      mId         = Mid,
 8319: 		      messageBody = Body},
 8320:     #'MegacoMessage'{mess = Mess}.
 8321:

 8339: otp_5881_mgc_verify_service_change_req_msg(
 8340:   #'MegacoMessage'{mess = Mess} = M) -> 
 8341:     #'Message'{version     = _V,
 8342: 	       mId         = _Mid,
 8343: 	       messageBody = Body} = Mess,
 8344:     {transactions, [Trans]} = Body,
 8345:     {transactionRequest, TR} = Trans,
 8346:     #'TransactionRequest'{transactionId = _Tid,
 8347: 			  actions = [AR]} = TR,
 8348:     #'ActionRequest'{contextId = _Cid,
 8349: 		     contextRequest = _CtxReq,
 8350: 		     contextAttrAuditReq = _CtxAar,
 8351: 		     commandRequests = [CR]} = AR,
 8352:     #'CommandRequest'{command = Cmd,
 8353: 		      optional = _Opt,
 8354: 		      wildcardReturn = _WR} = CR,
 8355:     {serviceChangeReq, SCR} = Cmd,
 8356:     #'ServiceChangeRequest'{terminationID = _TermID,
 8357: 			    serviceChangeParms = SCP} = SCR,
 8358:     #'ServiceChangeParm'{serviceChangeMethod = restart,
 8359: 			 serviceChangeReason = [[$9,$0,$1|_]]} = SCP,
 8360:     {ok, M};
 8361: otp_5881_mgc_verify_service_change_req_msg(M) ->
 8362:     {error, {invalid_message, M}}.
 8363: 
 8364: -ifndef(megaco_hipe_special).
 8365: otp_5881_mgc_verify_notify_req_msg_fun() ->
 8366:     fun(M) ->
 8367: 	    otp_5881_mgc_verify_notify_req_msg(M)
 8368:     end.
 8369: -endif.

 8371: otp_5881_mgc_verify_notify_req_msg(#'MegacoMessage'{mess = Mess} = M) -> 
 8372:     #'Message'{messageBody = Body} = Mess,
 8373:     {transactions, [Trans]} = Body,
 8374:     {transactionRequest, TR} = Trans,
 8375:     #'TransactionRequest'{actions = [AR]} = TR,
 8376:     #'ActionRequest'{commandRequests = [CR1,CR2]} = AR,
 8377:     #'CommandRequest'{command = Cmd1} = CR1,
 8378:     {notifyReq, NR1} = Cmd1,
 8379:     #'NotifyRequest'{observedEventsDescriptor = OED1} = NR1,
 8380:     #'ObservedEventsDescriptor'{observedEventLst = [OE1]} = OED1,
 8381:     #'ObservedEvent'{eventName = "al/of"} = OE1,
 8382:     #'CommandRequest'{command = Cmd2} = CR2,
 8383:     {notifyReq, NR2} = Cmd2,
 8384:     #'NotifyRequest'{observedEventsDescriptor = OED2} = NR2,
 8385:     #'ObservedEventsDescriptor'{observedEventLst = [OE2]} = OED2,
 8386:     #'ObservedEvent'{eventName = "al/of"} = OE2,
 8387:     {ok, M};
 8388: otp_5881_mgc_verify_notify_req_msg(M) ->
 8389:     {error, {invalid_message, M}}.

 8395: otp_5887(suite) ->
 8396:     [];
 8397: otp_5887(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 8398:     Pre = fun() ->
 8399:                   MgcNode = make_node_name(mgc),
 8400:                   MgNode  = make_node_name(mg),
 8401:                   d("start nodes: "
 8402:                     "~n      MgcNode: ~p"
 8403:                     "~n      MgNode:  ~p", 
 8404:                     [MgcNode, MgNode]),
 8405:                   Nodes = [MgcNode, MgNode], 
 8406:                   ok = ?START_NODES(Nodes, true),
 8407:                   Nodes
 8408:           end,
 8409:     Case = fun do_otp_5887/1,
 8410:     Post = fun(Nodes) ->
 8411:                    d("stop nodes"),
 8412:                    ?STOP_NODES(lists:reverse(Nodes))
 8413:            end,
 8414:     try_tc(otp_5887, Pre, Case, Post).
 8415: 
 8416: do_otp_5887([MgcNode, MgNode]) ->
 8417:     d("start the MGC simulator (generator)"),
 8418:     {ok, Mgc} = megaco_test_tcp_generator:start_link("MGC", MgcNode),
 8419: 
 8420:     d("create the MGC event sequence"),
 8421:     MgcEvSeq = otp_5887_mgc_event_sequence(text, tcp),
 8422: 
 8423:     d("start the MGC simulation"),
 8424:     {ok, MgcId} = megaco_test_tcp_generator:exec(Mgc, MgcEvSeq),
 8425: 
 8426:     i("await MGC ready announcement"),
 8427:     receive
 8428:         announce_mgc ->
 8429:             i("received MGC ready announcement"),
 8430:             ok
 8431:     end,
 8432: 
 8433:     i("[MG] start"),    
 8434:     MgMid = {deviceName, "mg"},
 8435:     ReqTmr = #megaco_incr_timer{wait_for    = 3000,
 8436:                                 factor      = 1, 
 8437:                                 incr        = 0,
 8438:                                 max_retries = 3},
 8439:     %% 5000,  %% Does not matter since we will not use this anyway...
 8440:     LongReqTmr = #megaco_incr_timer{wait_for    = 3000,
 8441:                                     factor      = 1, 
 8442:                                     incr        = 0,
 8443:                                     max_retries = 3},
 8444:     PendingTmr = 10000,
 8445:     ReplyTmr = 16000,
 8446:     MgConfig = [{request_timer,      ReqTmr}, 
 8447:                 {long_request_timer, LongReqTmr}, 
 8448:                 {pending_timer,      PendingTmr},
 8449:                 {reply_timer,        ReplyTmr}],
 8450:     {ok, Mg} = ?MG_START(MgNode, MgMid, text, tcp, MgConfig, ?MG_VERBOSITY),
 8451: 
 8452:     i("[MG] conn info: ~n~p", [?MG_CONN_INFO(Mg, all)]), 
 8453: 
 8454:     i("[MG] verify conn transaction-id: 1"),    
 8455:     otp_5887_verify_conn_trans_id(Mg, 1),
 8456: 
 8457:     i("[MG] user info: ~n~p", [?MG_USER_INFO(Mg, all)]), 
 8458: 
 8459:     i("[MG] verify user transaction-id: undefined_serial"),    
 8460:     otp_5887_verify_user_trans_id(Mg, undefined_serial),
 8461:     
 8462:     i("[MG] connect to the MGC (service change)"),    
 8463:     ServChRes = ?MG_SERV_CHANGE(Mg),
 8464:     d("service change result: ~p", [ServChRes]),
 8465: 
 8466:     i("[MG] conn info: ~n~p", [?MG_CONN_INFO(Mg, all)]), 
 8467: 
 8468:     i("[MG] verify conn transaction-id: 2"),    
 8469:     otp_5887_verify_conn_trans_id(Mg, 2),
 8470: 
 8471:     i("[MG] user info: ~n~p", [?MG_USER_INFO(Mg, all)]), 
 8472: 
 8473:     i("[MG] verify user transaction-id: 1"),    
 8474:     otp_5887_verify_user_trans_id(Mg, 1),
 8475:     
 8476:     d("[MG] send the notify"),
 8477:     {ok, Reply} = (catch ?MG_NOTIF_RAR(Mg)),
 8478:     {1, {ok, [AR]}} = Reply,
 8479:     d("[MG] ActionReply: ~p", [AR]),
 8480: 
 8481:     i("[MG] conn info: ~n~p", [?MG_CONN_INFO(Mg, all)]), 
 8482: 
 8483:     i("[MG] verify conn transaction-id: 3"),    
 8484:     otp_5887_verify_conn_trans_id(Mg, 3),
 8485: 
 8486:     i("[MG] user info: ~n~p", [?MG_USER_INFO(Mg, all)]), 
 8487: 
 8488:     i("[MG] verify user transaction-id: 2"),    
 8489:     otp_5887_verify_user_trans_id(Mg, 2),
 8490:     
 8491:     d("await the generator reply"),
 8492:     await_completion([MgcId]),
 8493: 
 8494:     %% Tell MG to stop
 8495:     i("[MG] stop"),
 8496:     ?MG_STOP(Mg),
 8497: 
 8498:     %% Tell Mgc to stop
 8499:     i("[MGC] stop generator"),
 8500:     megaco_test_tcp_generator:stop(Mgc),
 8501: 
 8502:     i("done", []),
 8503:     ok.
 8504: 
 8505: 
 8506: otp_5887_verify_conn_trans_id(Mg, Expected) ->
 8507:     F = fun() -> (catch ?MG_CONN_INFO(Mg, trans_id)) end,
 8508:     otp_5887_verify_trans_id(F, Expected).
 8509: 
 8510: otp_5887_verify_user_trans_id(Mg, Expected) ->
 8511:     F = fun() -> (catch ?MG_USER_INFO(Mg, trans_id)) end,
 8512:     otp_5887_verify_trans_id(F, Expected).
 8513: 
 8514: otp_5887_verify_trans_id(F, Expected) ->
 8515:     case F() of
 8516: 	Expected -> 
 8517: 	    ok;
 8518: 	ErroneousValue ->
 8519: 	    throw({unexpected_transaction_id_value, ErroneousValue, Expected})
 8520:     end.
 8521:

 8691: otp_6253(suite) ->
 8692:     [];
 8693: otp_6253(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 8694:     ?ACQUIRE_NODES(1, Config),
 8695: 
 8696:     put(verbosity, debug),
 8697:     put(tc, otp_6253),
 8698: 
 8699:     d("otp_6253 -> start test case controller",[]),
 8700:     ok = megaco_tc_controller:start_link(),
 8701: 
 8702:     PrelMid = preliminary_mid,
 8703:     MgMid   = ipv4_mid(4711),
 8704: 
 8705:     ?VERIFY(ok, application:start(megaco)),
 8706:     ?VERIFY(ok,	megaco:start_user(MgMid, [{send_mod, ?USER_MOD},
 8707: 	                                  {request_timer, infinity},
 8708: 	                                  {reply_timer, infinity}])),
 8709: 
 8710:     MgRH = user_info(MgMid, receive_handle),
 8711:     {ok, PrelCH} = ?VERIFY({ok, _}, megaco:connect(MgRH, PrelMid, sh, self())),
 8712: 
 8713:     connections([PrelCH]),
 8714:     ?VERIFY([PrelCH], megaco:user_info(MgMid, connections)),
 8715: 
 8716:     SC = service_change_request(),
 8717: 
 8718:     %% Instruct the transport module to fail all send_message
 8719:     d("otp_6253 -> instruct transport module to fail message send",[]),
 8720:     ok = megaco_tc_controller:insert(allow_send_message, {fail, otp_6253}),
 8721: 
 8722:     ?VERIFY({1, {error, {send_message_failed, otp_6253}}},
 8723: 	    megaco:call(PrelCH, [SC], [])),
 8724: 
 8725:     sleep(1000),
 8726: 
 8727:     %% Instruct the transport module to cancel all send_message
 8728:     d("otp_6253 -> instruct transport module to cancel message send",[]),
 8729:     ok = megaco_tc_controller:insert(allow_send_message, {cancel, otp_6253}),
 8730: 
 8731:     ?VERIFY({1, {error, {send_message_cancelled, otp_6253}}},
 8732: 	    megaco:call(PrelCH, [SC], [])),
 8733: 
 8734:     ?VERIFY(ok, megaco:disconnect(PrelCH, shutdown)),
 8735: 
 8736:     ?VERIFY(ok,	megaco:stop_user(MgMid)),
 8737:     ?VERIFY(ok, application:stop(megaco)),
 8738:     ?RECEIVE([]),
 8739:     ok.

 8744: otp_6275(suite) ->
 8745:     [];
 8746: otp_6275(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 8747:     Pre = fun() ->
 8748:                   MgcNode = make_node_name(mgc),
 8749:                   MgNode  = make_node_name(mg),
 8750:                   d("start nodes: "
 8751:                     "~n      MgcNode: ~p"
 8752:                     "~n      MgNode:  ~p", 
 8753:                     [MgcNode, MgNode]),
 8754:                   Nodes = [MgcNode, MgNode], 
 8755:                   ok = ?START_NODES(Nodes, true),
 8756:                   Nodes
 8757:           end,
 8758:     Case = fun do_otp_6275/1,
 8759:     Post = fun(Nodes) ->
 8760:                    d("stop nodes"),
 8761:                    ?STOP_NODES(lists:reverse(Nodes))
 8762:            end,
 8763:     try_tc(otp_6275, Pre, Case, Post).
 8764: 
 8765: do_otp_6275([MgcNode, MgNode]) ->
 8766:     d("start the MGC simulator (generator)"),
 8767:     {ok, Mgc} = megaco_test_tcp_generator:start_link("MGC", MgcNode),
 8768: 
 8769:     d("create the MGC event sequence"),
 8770:     MgcEvSeq = otp_6275_mgc_event_sequence(text, tcp),
 8771: 
 8772:     d("start the MGC simulation"),
 8773:     {ok, MgcId} = megaco_test_tcp_generator:exec(Mgc, MgcEvSeq),
 8774: 
 8775:     i("await MGC ready announcement"),
 8776:     receive
 8777:         announce_mgc ->
 8778:             i("received MGC ready announcement"),
 8779:             ok
 8780:     end,
 8781: 
 8782:     d("[MG] start the simulator (generator)"),
 8783:     {ok, Mg} = megaco_test_megaco_generator:start_link("MG", MgNode),
 8784: 
 8785:     d("[MG] create the event sequence"),
 8786:     MgEvSeq = otp_6275_mg_event_sequence(text, tcp),
 8787: 
 8788:     i("wait some time before starting the MG simulation"),
 8789:     sleep(1000),
 8790: 
 8791:     d("[MG] start the simulation"),
 8792:     {ok, MgId} = megaco_test_megaco_generator:exec(Mg, MgEvSeq),
 8793: 
 8794:     d("[MGC] await the generator reply"),
 8795:     await_completion([MgcId, MgId]), 
 8796: 
 8797:     %% Tell Mgc to stop
 8798:     i("[MGC] stop generator"),
 8799:     megaco_test_tcp_generator:stop(Mgc),
 8800: 
 8801:     %% Tell Mg to stop
 8802:     i("[MG] stop generator"),
 8803:     megaco_test_megaco_generator:stop(Mg),
 8804: 
 8805:     i("done", []),
 8806:     ok.
 8807:

 8893: otp_6275_mg_verify_notify_req(
 8894:   {handle_trans_request, _CH, ?VERSION, [AR]}) ->
 8895:     io:format("otp_6275_mg_verify_notify_req -> entry with"
 8896: 	      "~n   AR: ~p"
 8897: 	      "~n", [AR]),
 8898:     CR = 
 8899: 	case AR of
 8900: 	    #'ActionRequest'{commandRequests = [CmdReq]} ->
 8901: 		CmdReq;
 8902: 	    _ ->
 8903: 		ET1 = lists:flatten(
 8904: 		       io_lib:format("Invalid action request: ~w", [AR])), 
 8905: 		EC1 = ?megaco_internal_gateway_error, 
 8906: 		ED1 = #'ErrorDescriptor'{errorCode = EC1,
 8907: 					 errorText = ET1},
 8908: 		throw({error, {invalid_ActionRequest, AR}, {discard_ack, ED1}})
 8909: 	end,
 8910:     
 8911:     Cmd = 
 8912: 	case CR of
 8913: 	    #'CommandRequest'{command = Command} ->
 8914: 		Command;
 8915: 	    _ ->
 8916: 		ET2 = lists:flatten(
 8917: 			io_lib:format("Invalid command request: ~w", [CR])), 
 8918: 		EC2 = ?megaco_internal_gateway_error, 
 8919: 		ED2 = #'ErrorDescriptor'{errorCode = EC2,
 8920: 					 errorText = ET2},
 8921: 		throw({error, {invalid_CommandRequest, CR}, {discard_ack, ED2}})
 8922: 	end,
 8923: 
 8924:     case Cmd of
 8925: 	{notifyReq, NotifyReq} ->
 8926: 	    ET3 = "Unexpected request",
 8927: 	    EC3 = ?megaco_transaction_req_received_before_servicechange_reply, 
 8928: 	    ED3 = #'ErrorDescriptor'{errorCode = EC3,
 8929: 				     errorText = ET3},
 8930: 	    throw({ok, {ok, NotifyReq}, {discard_ack, ED3}});
 8931: 	_ ->
 8932: 	    ET4 = lists:flatten(
 8933: 		    io_lib:format("Invalid command: ~w", [Cmd])), 
 8934: 	    EC4 = ?megaco_internal_gateway_error, 
 8935: 	    ED4 = #'ErrorDescriptor'{errorCode = EC4,
 8936: 				     errorText = ET4},
 8937: 	    throw({error, {invalid_command, Cmd}, {discard_ack, ED4}})
 8938:     end;
 8939: otp_6275_mg_verify_notify_req({Tag, CH, Version, ARs}) ->
 8940:     io:format("otp_6275_mg_verify_notify_req -> ok"
 8941: 	      "~n   Tag:     ~p"
 8942: 	      "~n   CH:      ~p"
 8943: 	      "~n   Version: ~p"
 8944: 	      "~n   ARs:     ~p"
 8945: 	      "~n", [Tag, CH, Version, ARs]),
 8946:     {error, {invalid_event, {Tag, CH, Version, ARs}}, ok};
 8947: otp_6275_mg_verify_notify_req(Else) ->
 8948:     io:format("otp_6275_mg_verify_notify_req -> unknown"
 8949: 	      "~n   Else: ~p~n", [Else]),
 8950:     {error, Else, ok}.

 9014: otp_6275_mgc_event_sequence(text, tcp) ->
 9015:     CTRL = self(),
 9016:     DecodeFun = ?otp_6275_mgc_decode_msg_fun(megaco_pretty_text_encoder, []),
 9017:     EncodeFun = ?otp_6275_mgc_encode_msg_fun(megaco_pretty_text_encoder, []),
 9018:     Mid = {deviceName,"ctrl"},
 9019:     TermId = #megaco_term_id{id = ["00000000","00000000","01101101"]},
 9020:     NotifyReq = otp_6275_mgc_notify_request_msg(Mid, 2, 1, TermId, 1),
 9021:     SCRVerifyFun         = ?otp_6275_mgc_verify_service_change_req_msg_fun(),
 9022:     NotifyReplyVerifyFun = ?otp_6275_mgc_verify_notify_rep_msg_fun(),
 9023:     MgcEvSeq = 
 9024: 	[{debug,  true},
 9025: 	 {decode, DecodeFun},
 9026: 	 {encode, EncodeFun},
 9027: 	 {listen, 2944},
 9028: 	 
 9029:          %% ANNOUNCE READY
 9030:          {trigger, "announce ready", fun() -> CTRL ! announce_mgc end}, 
 9031: 
 9032: 	 {expect_accept, any},
 9033: 	 {expect_receive, "service-change-request", {SCRVerifyFun, 5000}}, 
 9034: 	 {sleep, 1000}, %% Do _not_ send SC reply
 9035: 	 {send, "notify-request", NotifyReq},
 9036: 	 {expect_receive, "request before sc reply", {NotifyReplyVerifyFun, 5000}},
 9037: 	 {sleep, 2000}
 9038: 	],
 9039:     MgcEvSeq.

 9072: otp_6275_mgc_verify_service_change_req_msg(
 9073:   #'MegacoMessage'{mess = Mess} = M) ->
 9074:     io:format("otp_6275_mgc_verify_service_change_req_msg -> entry with"
 9075: 	      "~n   M: ~p"
 9076: 	      "~n", [M]),
 9077:     Body = 
 9078: 	case Mess of
 9079: 	    #'Message'{messageBody = MB} ->
 9080: 		MB;
 9081: 	    _ ->
 9082: 		throw({error, {invalid_mess, Mess}})
 9083: 	end,
 9084: 
 9085:     Trans = 
 9086: 	case Body of
 9087: 	    {transactions, [Transaction]} ->
 9088: 		Transaction;
 9089: 	    _ ->
 9090: 		throw({error, {invalid_messageBody, Body}})
 9091: 	end,
 9092: 
 9093:     TR = 
 9094: 	case Trans of
 9095: 	    {transactionRequest, TransReq} ->
 9096: 		TransReq;
 9097: 	    _ ->
 9098: 		throw({error, {invalid_transaction, Trans}})
 9099: 	end,
 9100: 
 9101:     AR = 
 9102: 	case TR of
 9103: 	    #'TransactionRequest'{actions = [ActionReq]} ->
 9104: 		ActionReq;
 9105: 	    _ ->
 9106: 		throw({error, {invalid_transactionRequest, TR}})
 9107: 	end,
 9108: 
 9109:     CR = 
 9110: 	case AR of
 9111: 	    #'ActionRequest'{commandRequests = [CmdReq]} ->
 9112: 		CmdReq;
 9113: 	    _ ->
 9114: 		throw({error, {invalid_TransactionRequest, AR}})
 9115: 	end,
 9116: 
 9117:     Cmd = 
 9118: 	case CR of
 9119: 	    #'CommandRequest'{command = Command} ->
 9120: 		Command;
 9121: 	    _ ->
 9122: 		throw({error, {invalid_ActionRequest, CR}})
 9123: 	end,
 9124: 
 9125:     SCR = 
 9126: 	case Cmd of
 9127: 	    {serviceChangeReq, ServiceChangeReq} ->
 9128: 		ServiceChangeReq;
 9129: 	    _ ->
 9130: 		throw({error, {invalid_command, Cmd}})
 9131: 	end,
 9132: 
 9133:     SCP = 
 9134: 	case SCR of
 9135: 	    #'ServiceChangeRequest'{serviceChangeParms = ServiceChangeParms} ->
 9136: 		ServiceChangeParms;
 9137: 	    _ ->
 9138: 		throw({error, {invalid_serviceChangeReq, SCR}})
 9139: 	end,
 9140: 
 9141:     case SCP of
 9142: 	#'ServiceChangeParm'{serviceChangeMethod = restart,
 9143: 			     serviceChangeReason = [[$9,$0,$1|_]]} ->
 9144: 	    {ok, M};
 9145:        _ ->
 9146: 	    {error, {invalid_serviceChangeParms, SCP}}
 9147:     end;
 9148: otp_6275_mgc_verify_service_change_req_msg(Crap) ->
 9149:     {error, {invalid_MegacoMessage, Crap}}.
 9150: 
 9151: -ifndef(megaco_hipe_special).
 9152: otp_6275_mgc_verify_notify_rep_msg_fun() ->
 9153:     fun(M) ->
 9154: 	    (catch otp_6275_mgc_verify_notify_rep_msg(M))
 9155:     end.
 9156: -endif.

 9158: otp_6275_mgc_verify_notify_rep_msg(#'MegacoMessage'{mess = Mess} = M) ->
 9159:     io:format("otp_6275_mgc_verify_notify_rep_msg -> entry with"
 9160: 	      "~n   M: ~p"
 9161: 	      "~n", [M]),
 9162:     Body = 
 9163: 	case Mess of
 9164: 	    #'Message'{messageBody = MB} ->
 9165: 		MB;
 9166: 	    _ ->
 9167: 		throw({error, {invalid_mess, Mess}})
 9168: 	end,
 9169: 
 9170:     Trans = 
 9171: 	case Body of
 9172: 	    {transactions, [Transaction]} ->
 9173: 		Transaction;
 9174: 	    _ ->
 9175: 		throw({error, {invalid_messageBody, Body}})
 9176: 	end,
 9177: 
 9178:     TR = 
 9179: 	case Trans of
 9180: 	    {transactionReply, TransReply} ->
 9181: 		TransReply;
 9182: 	    _ ->
 9183: 		throw({error, {invalid_transaction, Trans}})
 9184: 	end,
 9185: 
 9186:     Res = 
 9187: 	case TR of
 9188: 	    #'TransactionReply'{transactionResult = TransRes} ->
 9189: 		TransRes;
 9190: 	    _ ->
 9191: 		throw({error, {invalid_transactionReply, TR}})
 9192: 	end,
 9193: 
 9194:     ED = 
 9195: 	case Res of
 9196: 	    {transactionError, ErrorDesc} ->
 9197: 		ErrorDesc;
 9198: 	    _ ->
 9199: 		throw({error, {invalid_TransactionReply, Res}})
 9200: 	end,
 9201: 
 9202:     case ED of
 9203: 	#'ErrorDescriptor'{errorCode = ?megaco_transaction_req_received_before_servicechange_reply} ->
 9204: 	    ok;
 9205: 	_ ->
 9206: 	    throw({error, {invalid_transactionError, ED}})
 9207:     end,
 9208:     {ok, M};
 9209: otp_6275_mgc_verify_notify_rep_msg(Crap) ->
 9210:     {error, {invalid_MegacoMessage, Crap}}.

 9213: otp_6275_mgc_notify_request_ar(Rid, Tid, Cid) ->
 9214:     TT      = cre_timeNotation("19990729", "22000000"),
 9215:     Ev      = cre_obsEvent("al/of", TT),
 9216:     EvsDesc = cre_obsEvsDesc(Rid, [Ev]),
 9217:     NR      = cre_notifyReq([Tid], EvsDesc),
 9218:     CMD     = cre_command(NR),
 9219:     CR      = cre_cmdReq(CMD),
 9220:     cre_actionReq(Cid, [CR]).
 9221: 
 9222: otp_6275_mgc_notify_request_msg(Mid, TransId, Cid, TermId, Rid) ->
 9223:     AR = otp_6275_mgc_notify_request_ar(Rid, TermId, Cid),
 9224:     otp_6275_msg(Mid, TransId, AR).
 9225:

 9229: otp_6275_msg(Mid, TransId, AR) ->
 9230:     TR    = cre_transReq(TransId, [AR]),
 9231:     Trans = cre_transaction(TR),
 9232:     Mess  = cre_message(1, Mid, cre_transactions([Trans])),
 9233:     cre_megacoMessage(Mess).

 9236: 
 9237: %% This test case can only be run with the stack compiled with
 9238: %% the MEGACO_TEST_CODE flag. Therefor there is no point in
 9239: %% including this test case in the usual test suite
 9240: -ifdef(MEGACO_TEST_CODE).
 9241: otp_6276(suite) ->
 9242:     [];
 9243: otp_6276(doc) ->
 9244:     "OTP-6276: Cancel when receiving reply raise condition";
 9245: otp_6276(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 9246:     Pre = fun() ->
 9247:                   MgcNode = make_node_name(mgc),
 9248:                   MgNode  = make_node_name(mg),
 9249:                   d("start nodes: "
 9250:                     "~n      MgcNode: ~p"
 9251:                     "~n      MgNode:  ~p", 
 9252:                     [MgcNode, MgNode]),
 9253:                   Nodes = [MgcNode, MgNode], 
 9254:                   ok = ?START_NODES(Nodes, true),
 9255:                   Nodes
 9256:           end,
 9257:     Case = fun do_otp_6276/1,
 9258:     Post = fun(Nodes) ->
 9259:                    d("stop nodes"),
 9260:                    ?STOP_NODES(lists:reverse(Nodes))
 9261:            end,
 9262:     try_tc(otp_6276, Pre, Case, Post).
 9263: 
 9264: do_otp_6276([MgcNode, MgNode]) ->
 9265:     d("create sequence controller"),
 9266:     CtrlPid = otp_6276_sequence_controller_start(),
 9267: 
 9268:     d("[MGC] start the simulator "),
 9269:     {ok, Mgc} = megaco_test_tcp_generator:start_link("MGC", MgcNode),
 9270: 
 9271:     d("[MGC] create the event sequence"),
 9272:     MgcEvSeq = otp_6276_mgc_event_sequence(text, tcp, CtrlPid),
 9273: 
 9274:     i("wait some time before starting the MGC simulation"),
 9275:     sleep(1000),
 9276: 
 9277:     d("[MGC] start the tcp-simulation"),
 9278:     {ok, MgcId} = megaco_test_tcp_generator:exec(Mgc, MgcEvSeq),
 9279: 
 9280:     %% i("wait some time before starting the MG simulator"),
 9281:     %% sleep(1000),
 9282: 
 9283:     i("await MGC ready announcement"),
 9284:     receive
 9285:         announce_mgc ->
 9286:             i("received MGC ready announcement"),
 9287:             ok
 9288:     end,
 9289: 
 9290:     d("[MG] start the simulator (generator)"),
 9291:     {ok, Mg} = megaco_test_megaco_generator:start_link("MG", MgNode),
 9292: 
 9293:     d("send start order to sequence controller"),
 9294:     CtrlPid ! {start, self(), Mgc, Mg},
 9295: 
 9296:     d("[MG] create the event sequence"),
 9297:     MgEvSeq = otp_6276_mg_event_sequence(text, tcp, CtrlPid),
 9298: 
 9299:     i("wait some time before starting the MG simulation"),
 9300:     sleep(1000),
 9301: 
 9302:     d("[MG] start the megaco-simulation"),
 9303:     {ok, MgId} = megaco_test_megaco_generator:exec(Mg, MgEvSeq),
 9304: 
 9305:     d("await the generator reply(s)"),
 9306:     await_completion([MgcId, MgId]),
 9307: 
 9308:     %% Tell Mgc to stop
 9309:     i("[MGC] stop generator"),
 9310:     megaco_test_tcp_generator:stop(Mgc),
 9311: 
 9312:     %% Tell Mg to stop
 9313:     i("[MG] stop generator"),
 9314:     megaco_test_megaco_generator:stop(Mg),
 9315: 
 9316:     i("done", []),
 9317:     ok.
 9318: 
 9319: 
 9320: otp_6276_sequence_controller_start() ->
 9321:     Self = self(),
 9322:     erlang:spawn(fun() -> otp_6276_sequence_controller(Self) end).
 9323: 			  
 9324: otp_6276_sequence_controller(Parent) ->
 9325:     io:format("otp_6276_sequence_controller -> entry with"
 9326: 	      "~n   Parent: ~p"
 9327: 	      "~n   self(): ~p"
 9328: 	      "~n", [Parent, self()]),
 9329: 
 9330:     d("start tc controller"),
 9331:     put(dbg,true),
 9332:     ok = megaco_tc_controller:start_link(),
 9333: 
 9334:     
 9335:     %% Await MGC announcement
 9336:     Mgc = 
 9337: 	receive
 9338: 	    {announce_mgc, MgcPid} ->
 9339: 		MgcPid
 9340: 	end,
 9341:     io:format("otp_6276_sequence_controller -> MGC announced: "
 9342: 	      "~n   Mgc: ~p"
 9343: 	      "~n", [Mgc]),
 9344: 
 9345:     %% Await MG announcement
 9346:     Mg = 
 9347: 	receive
 9348: 	    {announce_mg, MgPid} ->
 9349: 		MgPid
 9350: 	end,
 9351:     io:format("otp_6276_sequence_controller -> MG announced: "
 9352: 	      "~n   Mg: ~p"
 9353: 	      "~n", [Mg]),
 9354: 
 9355:     %% Await request_received notification
 9356:     receive
 9357: 	{notify_request_received, Mgc} ->
 9358: 	    io:format("otp_6276_sequence_controller -> "
 9359: 		      "request received from MGC (~p)"
 9360: 		      "~n", [Mgc]),
 9361: 	    ok
 9362:     end,
 9363: 
 9364:     %% Make sure the cancel operation gets blocked midway:
 9365:     megaco_tc_controller:insert(block_on_cancel, {cancel_block, self()}),
 9366: 
 9367:     %% Send start cancel order
 9368:     io:format("otp_6276_sequence_controller -> "
 9369: 	      "send cancel start order to MG (~p)"
 9370: 	      "~n", [Mg]),
 9371:     Mg ! {start_cancel, self()},
 9372:     receive
 9373: 	{started_cancel, Mg} ->
 9374: 	    ok
 9375:     end,
 9376:     io:format("otp_6276_sequence_controller -> "
 9377: 	      "cancel started - now await blocked"
 9378: 	      "~n", []),
 9379: 
 9380:     receive
 9381: 	{cancel_block, Mg} ->
 9382: 	    ok
 9383:     end,
 9384:     io:format("otp_6276_sequence_controller -> "
 9385: 	      "cancel blocked - now instruct MGC to send notify reply"
 9386: 	      "~n", []),
 9387: 
 9388:     %% Make sure the cancel operation gets blocked midway:
 9389:     megaco_tc_controller:insert(block_on_reply, {reply_block, self()}),
 9390: 
 9391:     %% Send NR-send order
 9392:     Mgc ! {notify_reply_send, self()},
 9393:     io:format("otp_6276_sequence_controller -> "
 9394: 	      "NR-send order sent - now await notify reply blocked received"
 9395: 	      "~n", []),
 9396: 
 9397:     ReplyPid = 
 9398: 	receive
 9399: 	    {reply_block, Pid, true} ->
 9400: 		io:format("otp_6276_sequence_controller -> "
 9401: 			  "notify reply blocked received from ~p (true) - "
 9402: 			  "now unblock cancel"
 9403: 			  "~n", [Pid]),
 9404: 		%% Pid ! {reply_block, self()},
 9405: 		Pid;
 9406: 	    {reply_block, Pid, Info} ->
 9407: 		io:format("otp_6276_sequence_controller -> "
 9408: 			  "notify reply blocked received from ~p: ~p"
 9409: 			  "~n", [Pid, Info]),
 9410: 		Pid ! {reply_block, self()},
 9411: 		exit({unexpected_reply_block_info, Info})
 9412: 	end,
 9413: 
 9414:     %% Send cancel continue (unblock) order
 9415:     Mg ! {cancel_block, self()},
 9416:     io:format("otp_6276_sequence_controller -> "
 9417: 	      "cancel unblocked - now await notify-request cancelled"
 9418: 	      "~n", []),
 9419: 
 9420:     %% Await request cancelled
 9421:     receive
 9422: 	{notify_request_cancelled, Mg} ->
 9423: 	    ok;
 9424: 	{notify_request_cancelled, Pid} ->
 9425: 	    io:format("otp_6276_sequence_controller -> "
 9426: 		      "notify-request cancelled - from ~p"
 9427: 		      "~n", [Pid]),
 9428: 	    ok
 9429:     end,
 9430:     io:format("otp_6276_sequence_controller -> "
 9431: 	      "notify-request cancelled - now unblock notify-reply"
 9432: 	      "~n", []),
 9433:     
 9434:     %% await notify reply result
 9435:     ReplyPid ! {reply_block, self()},
 9436:     io:format("otp_6276_sequence_controller -> "
 9437: 	      "notify-reply unblocked - now await unexpected trans"
 9438: 	      "~n", []),
 9439:     
 9440:     %% Await unexpected trans
 9441:     receive
 9442: 	{unexpected_trans, Mg, _Trans} ->
 9443: 	    ok;
 9444: 	{unexpected_trans, Pid, _Trans} ->
 9445: 	    io:format("otp_6276_sequence_controller -> "
 9446: 		      "unexpected_trans - from ~p"
 9447: 		      "~n", [Pid]),
 9448: 	    ok
 9449:     end,
 9450:     io:format("otp_6276_sequence_controller -> "
 9451: 	      "unexpected transaction received"
 9452: 	      "~n", []),
 9453: 
 9454:     %% Await unexpected trans
 9455:     Mgc ! {done, self()},
 9456:     receive
 9457: 	{done, Mgc} ->
 9458: 	    ok
 9459:     end,
 9460:     io:format("otp_6276_sequence_controller -> MGC instructed we are done"
 9461: 	      "~n", []),
 9462: 
 9463:     d("stop tc controller"),
 9464:     megaco_tc_controller:stop(),
 9465: 
 9466:     io:format("otp_6276_sequence_controller -> done~n", []),
 9467: 
 9468:     exit(normal).
 9469: 			     
 9470: 	 
 9471: %%
 9472: %% MGC generator stuff
 9473: %% 
 9474: otp_6276_mgc_event_sequence(text, tcp, Ctrl) ->
 9475:     Mid = {deviceName,"ctrl"},
 9476:     EM  = megaco_pretty_text_encoder,
 9477:     EC  = [],
 9478:     otp_6276_mgc_event_sequence2(Mid, EM, EC, Ctrl).
 9479: 
 9480: otp_6276_mgc_event_sequence2(Mid, EM, EC, Ctrl) ->
 9481:     CTRL = self(),
 9482:     DecodeFun = otp_6276_mgc_decode_msg_fun(EM, EC),
 9483:     EncodeFun = otp_6276_mgc_encode_msg_fun(EM, EC),
 9484:     AnnounceMe = otp_6276_mgc_announce_fun(Ctrl),
 9485:     ServiceChangeReqVerify = 
 9486: 	otp_6276_mgc_verify_service_change_req_fun(Mid),
 9487:     ServiceChangeReply = 
 9488: 	otp_6276_mgc_service_change_reply_msg(Mid, 1, 0),
 9489:     NotifyReqVerify = otp_6276_mgc_verify_notify_request_fun(Ctrl),
 9490:     TermId = #megaco_term_id{id = ["00000000","00000000","01101101"]},
 9491:     AwaitNrSendOrder = otp_6276_mgc_await_notify_reply_send_order_fun(Ctrl),
 9492:     NotifyReply = otp_6276_mgc_notify_reply_msg(Mid, 2, 0, TermId),
 9493:     AwaitDoneOrder = otp_6276_mgc_await_done_order_fun(Ctrl),
 9494:     EvSeq = 
 9495: 	[
 9496: 	 {trigger, AnnounceMe}, 
 9497: 	 {debug,  true},
 9498: 	 {decode, DecodeFun},
 9499: 	 {encode, EncodeFun},
 9500: 	 {listen, 2944},
 9501: 
 9502:          %% ANNOUNCE READY
 9503:          {trigger, fun() -> CTRL ! announce_mgc end}, 
 9504: 
 9505: 	 {expect_accept, any},
 9506: 	 {expect_receive, "service-change-req", 
 9507: 	  {ServiceChangeReqVerify, 10000}}, 
 9508: 	 {send, "service-change-reply", ServiceChangeReply}, 
 9509: 	 {expect_receive, "notify-request", {NotifyReqVerify, 5000}},
 9510: 	 
 9511: 	 {trigger, AwaitNrSendOrder}, 
 9512: 
 9513: 	 {send, "notify-reply", NotifyReply}, 
 9514: 
 9515: 	 {trigger, AwaitDoneOrder}, 
 9516: 
 9517: 	 disconnect
 9518: 	 ],
 9519:     EvSeq.
 9520: 
 9521: otp_6276_mgc_announce_fun(Pid) ->
 9522:     fun() ->
 9523: 	    Pid ! {announce_mgc, self()}
 9524:     end.
 9525:     
 9526: otp_6276_mgc_await_notify_reply_send_order_fun(Pid) ->
 9527:     fun() ->
 9528: 	    receive
 9529: 		{notify_reply_send, Pid} ->
 9530: 		    Pid ! {notify_reply_send, self()}
 9531: 	    end
 9532:     end.
 9533: 
 9534: otp_6276_mgc_await_done_order_fun(Pid) ->
 9535:     fun() ->
 9536: 	    receive
 9537: 		{done, Pid} ->
 9538: 		    Pid ! {done, self()}
 9539: 	    end
 9540:     end.
 9541: 
 9542: otp_6276_mgc_encode_msg_fun(Mod, Conf) ->
 9543:     fun(M) ->
 9544:             Mod:encode_message(Conf, M)
 9545:     end.
 9546: 
 9547: otp_6276_mgc_decode_msg_fun(Mod, Conf) ->
 9548:     fun(M) ->
 9549:             Mod:decode_message(Conf, M)
 9550:     end.
 9551: 
 9552: otp_6276_mgc_service_change_reply_msg(Mid, TransId, Cid) ->
 9553:     SCRP  = #'ServiceChangeResParm'{serviceChangeMgcId = Mid},
 9554:     SCRPs = {serviceChangeResParms,SCRP},
 9555:     Root  = #megaco_term_id{id = ["root"]},
 9556:     SCR   = #'ServiceChangeReply'{terminationID       = [Root],
 9557:                                   serviceChangeResult = SCRPs},
 9558:     CR    = {serviceChangeReply, SCR},
 9559:     otp_6276_mgc_msg(Mid, TransId, CR, Cid).
 9560:      
 9561: otp_6276_mgc_notify_reply_msg(Mid, TransId, Cid, TermId) ->
 9562:     NR  = #'NotifyReply'{terminationID = [TermId]},
 9563:     CR  = {notifyReply, NR},
 9564:     otp_6276_mgc_msg(Mid, TransId, CR, Cid).
 9565: 
 9566: otp_6276_mgc_msg(Mid, TransId, CR, Cid) ->
 9567:     AR  = #'ActionReply'{contextId    = Cid,
 9568:                          commandReply = [CR]},
 9569:     ARs  = {actionReplies, [AR]},
 9570:     TR   = #'TransactionReply'{transactionId     = TransId,
 9571:                                transactionResult = ARs},
 9572:     Body = {transactions, [{transactionReply, TR}]},
 9573:     Mess = #'Message'{version     = 1,
 9574:                       mId         = Mid,
 9575:                       messageBody = Body},
 9576:     #'MegacoMessage'{mess = Mess}.
 9577:      
 9578: otp_6276_mgc_pending_msg(Mid, TransId) ->
 9579:     TP   = #'TransactionPending'{transactionId = TransId},
 9580:     Body = {transactions, [{transactionPending, TP}]},
 9581:     Mess = #'Message'{version     = 1,
 9582:                       mId         = Mid,
 9583:                       messageBody = Body},
 9584:     #'MegacoMessage'{mess = Mess}.
 9585: 
 9586: otp_6276_mgc_verify_service_change_req_fun(_) ->
 9587:     fun(#'MegacoMessage'{mess = Mess} = M) ->
 9588:             #'Message'{version     = _V,
 9589:                        mId         = _Mid,
 9590:                        messageBody = Body} = Mess,
 9591:             {transactions, [Trans]} = Body,
 9592:             {transactionRequest, TR} = Trans,
 9593:             #'TransactionRequest'{transactionId = _Tid,
 9594:                                   actions = [AR]} = TR,
 9595:             #'ActionRequest'{contextId = _Cid,
 9596:                              contextRequest = _CtxReq,
 9597:                              contextAttrAuditReq = _CtxAar,
 9598:                              commandRequests = [CR]} = AR,
 9599:             #'CommandRequest'{command = Cmd,
 9600:                               optional = _Opt,
 9601:                               wildcardReturn = _WR} = CR,
 9602:             {serviceChangeReq, SCR} = Cmd,
 9603:             #'ServiceChangeRequest'{terminationID = _TermID,
 9604:                                     serviceChangeParms = SCP} = SCR,
 9605:             #'ServiceChangeParm'{serviceChangeMethod = restart,
 9606:                                  serviceChangeReason = [[$9,$0,$1|_]]} = SCP,
 9607:             {ok, M};
 9608:        (M) ->
 9609:             {error, {invalid_message, M}}
 9610:     end.
 9611: 
 9612: otp_6276_mgc_verify_notify_request_fun(Pid) ->
 9613:     fun(M) ->
 9614: 	    (catch otp_6276_mgc_verify_notify_request(M, Pid))
 9615:     end.
 9616: 
 9617: otp_6276_mgc_verify_notify_request(#'MegacoMessage'{mess = Mess} = M, 
 9618: 				   Pid) ->
 9619:     io:format("otp_6276_mgc_verify_notify_request -> entry with"
 9620: 	      "~n   M: ~p"
 9621: 	      "~n", [M]),
 9622:     Body = 
 9623: 	case Mess of
 9624: 	    #'Message'{messageBody = MessageBody} ->
 9625: 		MessageBody;
 9626: 	    _ ->
 9627: 		throw({error, {invalid_mess, Mess}})
 9628: 	end,
 9629: 
 9630:     Trans = 
 9631: 	case Body of
 9632:             {transactions, [Transaction]} ->
 9633: 		Transaction;
 9634: 	    _ ->
 9635: 		throw({error, {invalid_messageBody, Body}})
 9636: 	end,
 9637: 
 9638:     TR = 
 9639: 	case Trans of
 9640:             {transactionRequest, TransReq} ->
 9641: 		TransReq;
 9642: 	    _ ->
 9643: 		throw({error, {invalid_transaction, Trans}})
 9644: 	end,
 9645: 
 9646:     AR = 
 9647: 	case TR of
 9648:             #'TransactionRequest'{actions = [Action]} ->
 9649: 		Action;
 9650: 	    _ ->
 9651: 		throw({error, {invalid_transactionRequest, TR}})
 9652: 	end,
 9653: 
 9654:     io:format("otp_6276_mgc_verify_notify_request -> "
 9655: 	      "~n   AR: ~p"
 9656: 	      "~n", [AR]),
 9657: 
 9658:     CR = 
 9659: 	case AR of
 9660:             #'ActionRequest'{commandRequests = [CommandReq]} ->
 9661: 		CommandReq;
 9662: 	    _ ->
 9663: 		throw({error, {invalid_TransactionRequest, AR}})
 9664: 	end,
 9665: 
 9666:     Cmd = 
 9667: 	case CR of
 9668:             #'CommandRequest'{command = Command} ->
 9669: 		Command;
 9670: 	    _ ->
 9671: 		throw({error, {invalid_ActionRequest, CR}})
 9672: 	end,
 9673: 
 9674:     NR = 
 9675: 	case Cmd of
 9676:             {notifyReq, NotifReq} ->
 9677: 		NotifReq;
 9678: 	    _ ->
 9679: 		throw({error, {invalid_CommandRequest, Cmd}})
 9680: 	end,
 9681: 
 9682:     OED = 
 9683: 	case NR of
 9684:             #'NotifyRequest'{observedEventsDescriptor = ObsEvDesc} ->
 9685: 		ObsEvDesc;
 9686: 	    _ ->
 9687: 		throw({error, {invalid_notifyReq, NR}})
 9688: 	end,
 9689: 
 9690:     OE = 
 9691: 	case OED of
 9692:             #'ObservedEventsDescriptor'{observedEventLst = [ObsEv]} ->
 9693: 		ObsEv;
 9694: 	    _ ->
 9695: 		throw({error, {invalid_NotifyRequest, OED}})
 9696: 	end,
 9697: 
 9698:     case OE of
 9699: 	#'ObservedEvent'{eventName = "al/of"} ->
 9700:             ok;
 9701: 	_ ->
 9702: 	    throw({error, {invalid_ObservedEventsDescriptor, OE}})
 9703:     end,
 9704:     io:format("otp_6276_mgc_verify_notify_request -> "
 9705: 	      "send notify_request received to "
 9706: 	      "~n   Pid:    ~p"
 9707: 	      "~n   self(): ~p"
 9708: 	      "~n", [Pid, self()]),
 9709:     Pid ! {notify_request_received, self()},
 9710:     {ok, M};
 9711: otp_6276_mgc_verify_notify_request(M, _Pid) ->
 9712:     {error, {invalid_message, M}}.
 9713: 
 9714:     
 9715: %%
 9716: %% MG generator stuff
 9717: %% 
 9718: otp_6276_mg_event_sequence(text, tcp, Ctrl) ->
 9719:     Mid = {deviceName,"mg"},
 9720:     RI = [
 9721:           {port,             2944},
 9722:           {encoding_module,  megaco_pretty_text_encoder},
 9723:           {encoding_config,  []},
 9724:           {transport_module, megaco_tcp}
 9725:          ],
 9726:     otp_6276_mg_event_sequence2(Mid, RI, Ctrl).
 9727: 
 9728: otp_6276_mg_event_sequence2(Mid, RI, Ctrl) ->
 9729:     AnnounceMe = otp_6276_mg_announce_fun(Ctrl),
 9730:     ServiceChangeReq = [otp_6276_mg_service_change_request_ar(Mid, 1)],
 9731:     ConnectVerify = fun otp_6276_mg_verify_handle_connect/1,
 9732:     ServiceChangeReplyVerify = 
 9733: 	fun otp_6276_mg_verify_service_change_reply/1,
 9734:     Tid = #megaco_term_id{id = ["00000000","00000000","01101101"]},
 9735:     NotifyReq = [otp_6276_mg_notify_request_ar(1, Tid, 1)],
 9736:     AwaitCancelOrder = otp_6276_mg_await_cancel_order_fun(Ctrl),
 9737:     TransReplyVerify = otp_6276_mg_verify_trans_reply_fun(Ctrl),
 9738:     UnexpTransVerify = otp_6276_mg_verify_unexpected_trans_fun(Ctrl),
 9739:     EvSeq = [
 9740: 	     {trigger, AnnounceMe}, 
 9741:              {debug, true},
 9742:              megaco_start,
 9743:              {megaco_start_user, Mid, RI, []},
 9744: 	     {megaco_update_user_info, recv_pending_limit, 4},
 9745:              start_transport,
 9746:              {megaco_trace, disable}, %%100},
 9747:              {megaco_system_info, users},
 9748:              {megaco_system_info, connections},
 9749:              connect,
 9750:              {megaco_callback, handle_connect, ConnectVerify},
 9751:              megaco_connect,
 9752:              {megaco_cast, ServiceChangeReq, []},
 9753:              {megaco_callback, handle_connect, ConnectVerify},
 9754:              {megaco_callback, handle_trans_reply, ServiceChangeReplyVerify},
 9755:              {sleep, 1000},
 9756:              {megaco_cast, NotifyReq, []},
 9757: 
 9758: 	     {trigger, AwaitCancelOrder},
 9759: 
 9760: 	     {megaco_cancel, otp_6276},
 9761: 
 9762:              {megaco_callback, handle_trans_reply, TransReplyVerify},
 9763:              {megaco_callback, handle_unexpected_trans,  UnexpTransVerify},
 9764:              {sleep, 1000},
 9765:              megaco_stop_user,
 9766:              megaco_stop,
 9767:              {sleep, 1000}
 9768:             ],
 9769:     EvSeq.
 9770: 
 9771: otp_6276_mg_announce_fun(Pid) ->
 9772:     fun() ->
 9773: 	    Pid ! {announce_mg, self()}
 9774:     end.
 9775:     
 9776: otp_6276_mg_await_cancel_order_fun(Pid) ->
 9777:     fun() ->
 9778: 	    io:format("otp_6276_mg_await_cancel_order_fun -> entry with"
 9779: 		      "~n   Pid:    ~p"
 9780: 		      "~n   self(): ~p"
 9781: 		      "~n", [Pid, self()]),
 9782: 	    receive
 9783: 		{start_cancel, Pid} ->
 9784: 		    io:format("otp_6276_mg_await_cancel_order_fun -> "
 9785: 			      "received cancel start order"
 9786: 			      "~n   Pid:    ~p"
 9787: 			      "~n   self(): ~p"
 9788: 			      "~n", [Pid, self()]),
 9789: 		    Pid ! {started_cancel, self()}
 9790: 	    end
 9791:     end.
 9792: 
 9793: otp_6276_mg_verify_handle_connect({handle_connect, CH, ?VERSION}) -> 
 9794:     io:format("otp_6276_mg_verify_handle_connect -> ok"
 9795: 	      "~n   CH: ~p~n", [CH]),
 9796:     {ok, CH, ok};
 9797: otp_6276_mg_verify_handle_connect(Else) ->
 9798:     io:format("otp_6276_mg_verify_handle_connect -> unknown"
 9799: 	      "~n   Else: ~p~n", [Else]),
 9800:     {error, Else, ok}.
 9801: 
 9802: otp_6276_mg_verify_service_change_reply({handle_trans_reply, _CH, 
 9803: 					       ?VERSION, 
 9804: 					       {ok, [AR]}, _}) ->
 9805:     io:format("otp_6276_mg_verify_service_change_reply -> ok"
 9806: 	      "~n   AR: ~p~n", [AR]),
 9807:     case AR of
 9808: 	#'ActionReply'{commandReply = [SCR]} ->
 9809: 	    case SCR of
 9810: 		{serviceChangeReply,
 9811: 		 #'ServiceChangeReply'{terminationID = [Tid],
 9812: 				       serviceChangeResult = Res}} ->
 9813: 		    case Tid of
 9814: 			#megaco_term_id{contains_wildcards = false, 
 9815: 					id = ["root"]} ->
 9816: 			    case Res of
 9817: 				{serviceChangeResParms,
 9818: 				 #'ServiceChangeResParm'{
 9819: 				   serviceChangeMgcId = _RemoteMid}} ->
 9820: 				    {ok, AR, ok};
 9821: 				{Tag, Val} ->
 9822: 				    Err = {invalid_service_change_result, 
 9823: 					   Tag, Val},
 9824: 				    {error, Err, ok}
 9825: 			    end;
 9826: 			_ ->
 9827: 			    Err = {invalid_termination_id, Tid},
 9828: 			    {error, Err, ok}
 9829: 		    end;
 9830: 		{Tag, Val} ->
 9831: 		    Err = {invalid_command_reply, Tag, Val},
 9832: 		    {error, Err, ok}
 9833: 	    end;
 9834: 	_ ->
 9835: 	    Err = {invalid_action_reply, AR},
 9836: 	    {error, Err, ok}
 9837:     end;
 9838: otp_6276_mg_verify_service_change_reply(Else) ->
 9839:     io:format("otp_6276_mg_verify_service_change_reply -> unknown"
 9840: 	      "~n   Else: ~p~n", [Else]),
 9841:     {error, Else, ok}.
 9842: 
 9843: otp_6276_mg_verify_trans_reply_fun(Pid) ->
 9844:     fun(Event) ->
 9845: 	    otp_6276_mg_verify_trans_reply(Pid, Event)
 9846:     end.
 9847: 
 9848: otp_6276_mg_verify_trans_reply(Pid, 
 9849:   {handle_trans_reply, _CH, ?VERSION, 
 9850:    {error, {user_cancel, otp_6276}} = E, _}) ->
 9851:     io:format("otp_6276_mg_verify_trans_reply -> expected error"
 9852: 	      "~n", []),
 9853:     Pid ! {notify_request_cancelled, self()},
 9854:     {ok, E, error};
 9855: otp_6276_mg_verify_trans_reply(_Pid, 
 9856:   {handle_trans_reply, _CH, ?VERSION, 
 9857:    {error, Reason} = E, _}) ->
 9858:     io:format("otp_6276_mg_verify_trans_reply -> unexpected error"
 9859: 	      "~n   Reason: ~p"
 9860: 	      "~n", [Reason]),
 9861:     {error, E, error};
 9862: otp_6276_mg_verify_trans_reply(_Pid, 
 9863:   {handle_trans_reply, _CH, ?VERSION, Result, _}) ->
 9864:     io:format("otp_6276_mg_verify_trans_reply -> unexpected result"
 9865: 	      "~n   Result: ~p"
 9866: 	      "~n", [Result]),
 9867:     {error, Result, error};
 9868: otp_6276_mg_verify_trans_reply(_Pid, Else) ->
 9869:     io:format("otp_6276_mg_verify_trans_reply -> unknown event"
 9870: 	      "~n   Else: ~p"
 9871: 	      "~n", [Else]),
 9872:     {error, Else, error}.
 9873: 
 9874: otp_6276_mg_verify_unexpected_trans_fun(Pid) ->
 9875:     fun(Event) ->
 9876: 	    otp_6276_mg_verify_unexpected_trans(Pid, Event)
 9877:     end.
 9878: 
 9879: otp_6276_mg_verify_unexpected_trans(Pid, 
 9880:   {handle_unexpected_trans, RH, ?VERSION, Trans}) ->
 9881:     io:format("otp_6276_mg_verify_unexpected_trans -> expected event"
 9882: 	      "~n   RH:    ~p"
 9883: 	      "~n   Trans: ~p"
 9884: 	      "~n", [RH, Trans]),
 9885:     Pid ! {unexpected_trans, self(), Trans},
 9886:     {ok, Trans, error};
 9887: otp_6276_mg_verify_unexpected_trans(_Pid, Else) ->
 9888:     io:format("otp_6276_mg_verify_unexpected_trans -> unknown event"
 9889: 	      "~n   Else: ~p"
 9890: 	      "~n", [Else]),
 9891:     {error, Else, error}.
 9892: 
 9893: otp_6276_mg_service_change_request_ar(_Mid, Cid) ->
 9894:     Prof  = cre_serviceChangeProf("resgw", 1),
 9895:     SCP   = cre_serviceChangeParm(restart, ["901 mg col boot"], Prof),
 9896:     Root  = #megaco_term_id{id = ["root"]},
 9897:     SCR   = cre_serviceChangeReq([Root], SCP),
 9898:     CMD   = cre_command(SCR),
 9899:     CR    = cre_cmdReq(CMD),
 9900:     cre_actionReq(Cid, [CR]).
 9901: 
 9902: otp_6276_mg_notify_request_ar(Rid, Tid, Cid) ->
 9903:     TT      = cre_timeNotation("19990729", "22000000"),
 9904:     Ev      = cre_obsEvent("al/of", TT),
 9905:     EvsDesc = cre_obsEvsDesc(Rid, [Ev]),
 9906:     NR      = cre_notifyReq([Tid], EvsDesc),
 9907:     CMD     = cre_command(NR),
 9908:     CR      = cre_cmdReq(CMD),
 9909:     cre_actionReq(Cid, [CR]).
 9910: 
 9911: 
 9912: -else.  % -ifdef(MEGACO_TEST_CODE).

 9915:     [];
 9916: otp_6276(doc) ->
 9917:     "OTP-6276";
 9918: otp_6276(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 9919: 
 9920:     ?SKIP("included only if compiled with USE_MEGACO_TEST_CODE=true").
 9921: 
 9922: -endif. % -ifdef(MEGACO_TEST_CODE).

 9928: otp_6442_resend_request1(suite) ->
 9929:     [];
 9930: otp_6442_resend_request1(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 9931:     Pre = fun() ->
 9932:                   put(verbosity, debug),
 9933:                   put(tc, ?FUNCTION_NAME),
 9934: 
 9935:                   MgNode = make_node_name(mg),
 9936:                   d("start (MG) node: ~p", [MgNode]),
 9937:                   Nodes = [MgNode],
 9938:                   ok = ?START_NODES(Nodes, true),
 9939:                   Nodes
 9940:           end,
 9941:     Case = fun do_otp_6442_resend_request1/1,
 9942:     Post = fun(Nodes) ->
 9943:                    d("stop nodes"),
 9944:                    ?STOP_NODES(lists:reverse(Nodes))
 9945:            end,
 9946:     try_tc(otp6442rreq1, Pre, Case, Post).
 9947: 
 9948: do_otp_6442_resend_request1([MgNode]) ->
 9949:     d("[MG] start the simulator"),
 9950:     {ok, Mg} = megaco_test_megaco_generator:start_link("MG", MgNode),
 9951: 
 9952:     d("[MG] create the event sequence (~p)", [Mg]),
 9953:     MgMid = {deviceName,"mg"},
 9954:     MgEvSeq = otp_6442_resend_request1_mg_event_sequence(MgMid),
 9955: 
 9956:     i("wait some time before starting the MG simulation"),
 9957:     sleep(1000),
 9958: 
 9959:     d("[MG] start the simulation"),
 9960:     {ok, MgId} = megaco_test_megaco_generator:exec(Mg, MgEvSeq),
 9961: 
 9962:     i("await the transport module service change send_message event"),
 9963:     Pid = otp_6442_expect(fun otp_6442_rsrq1_verify_scr_msg/1, 5000),
 9964: 
 9965:     i("wait some before issuing the service change reply"),
 9966:     sleep(500),
 9967: 
 9968:     i("send the service change reply"),
 9969:     MgcMid = {deviceName,"mgc"},
 9970:     ServiceChangeReply = otp_6442_mgc_service_change_reply_msg(MgcMid, 1, 1),
 9971:     megaco_test_generic_transport:incomming_message(Pid, ServiceChangeReply),
 9972: 
 9973:     i("await the transport module "
 9974:       "notify-request send_message event from MG: "
 9975:       "ignore"),
 9976:     ok = otp_6442_expect(fun otp_6442_rsrq1_verify_first_nr_msg/1, 5000),
 9977: 
 9978:     i("await the transport module "
 9979:       "notify-request resend_message event from MG: "
 9980:       "reply"),
 9981:     {TransId2, Cid2, TermId2} = 
 9982: 	otp_6442_expect(fun otp_6442_rsrq1_verify_second_nr_msg/1, 10000),
 9983: 
 9984:     i("wait some before issuing the notify reply"),
 9985:     sleep(500),
 9986: 
 9987:     i("send the notify reply"),
 9988:     NotifyReply = 
 9989: 	otp_6442_mgc_notify_reply_msg(MgcMid, TransId2, Cid2, TermId2),
 9990:     megaco_test_generic_transport:incomming_message(Pid, NotifyReply),
 9991: 
 9992:     d("await the generator reply"),
 9993:     await_completion([MgId]), 
 9994: 
 9995:     %% Tell Mg to stop
 9996:     i("[MG] stop generator"),
 9997:     megaco_test_megaco_generator:stop(Mg),
 9998: 
 9999:     i("done", []),
10000:     ok.
10001: 
10002: 
10003: otp_6442_expect(Verify, Timeout) when (Timeout > 0) ->
10004:     T = mtime(),
10005:     receive
10006: 	Msg ->
10007: 	    case (catch Verify(Msg)) of
10008: 		{ok, Result} ->
10009: 		    d("verified after ~p msec", [mtime() - T]),
10010: 		    Result;
10011: 		skip ->
10012: 		    otp_6442_expect(Verify, to(Timeout, T));
10013: 		{error, Reason} ->
10014: 		    exit({verification_failed, Reason})
10015: 	    end
10016:     after Timeout ->
10017: 	    exit(timeout)
10018:     end;
10019: otp_6442_expect(_, _Timeout) ->
10020:     exit(timeout).
10021: 
10022: otp_6442_rsrq1_verify_scr_msg(
10023:   {transport_event, {send_message, _SH, {message, Msg}}, Pid}) 
10024:   when is_record(Msg, 'MegacoMessage') ->
10025:     d("received expected service change request message: "
10026:       "~n   Msg: ~p", [Msg]),
10027:     Reply = ok, 
10028:     Pid ! {transport_reply, Reply, self()},
10029:     {ok, Pid};
10030: otp_6442_rsrq1_verify_scr_msg(
10031:   {transport_event, {send_message, _SH, BadMsg}, _Pid}) ->
10032:     io:format("otp_6442_rsrq1_verify_scr_msg -> error: "
10033: 	      "~n   BadMsg: ~p"
10034: 	      "~n", [BadMsg]),
10035:     {error, {invalid_message, BadMsg}};
10036: otp_6442_rsrq1_verify_scr_msg({transport_event, BadEvent, _Pid}) ->
10037:     io:format("otp_6442_rsrq1_verify_scr_msg -> error: "
10038: 	      "~n   BadEvent: ~p"
10039: 	      "~n", [BadEvent]),
10040:     {error, {invalid_message, BadEvent}};
10041: otp_6442_rsrq1_verify_scr_msg(Msg) ->
10042:     io:format("otp_6442_rsrq1_verify_scr_msg -> error: "
10043: 	      "~n   Msg: ~p"
10044: 	      "~n", [Msg]),
10045:     {error, {invalid_message, Msg}}.

10047: otp_6442_rsrq1_verify_first_nr_msg(
10048:   {transport_event, {send_message, _SH, {message, Msg}}, Pid}) 
10049:   when is_record(Msg, 'MegacoMessage') ->
10050:     d("received expected first notify request send message: "
10051:       "~n   Msg: ~p", [Msg]),
10052:     Reply = ok, 
10053:     Pid ! {transport_reply, Reply, self()},
10054:     {ok, ok};
10055: otp_6442_rsrq1_verify_first_nr_msg(Msg) ->
10056:     io:format("otp_6442_rsrq1_verify_nr_msg -> error: "
10057: 	      "~n   Msg: ~p"

10061: otp_6442_rsrq1_verify_second_nr_msg(
10062:   {transport_event, {send_message, _SH, {message, Msg}}, Pid}) 
10063:   when is_record(Msg, 'MegacoMessage') ->
10064:     io:format("otp_6442_rsrq1_verify_second_nr_msg -> "
10065: 	      "entry when received expected message with"
10066: 	      "~n   Msg: ~p"
10067: 	      "~n", [Msg]),
10068:     Reply = ok, 
10069:     Pid ! {transport_reply, Reply, self()},
10070:     #'MegacoMessage'{mess = Mess} = Msg,
10071:     #'Message'{mId         = _Mid,
10072: 	       messageBody = Body} = Mess, 
10073:     {transactions, Transactions} = Body,
10074:     [Transaction] = Transactions,
10075:     {transactionRequest, TransReq} = Transaction,
10076:     #'TransactionRequest'{transactionId = TransId,
10077: 			  actions       = Actions} = TransReq,
10078:     [Action] = Actions,
10079:     #'ActionRequest'{contextId       = Cid,
10080: 		     commandRequests = CmdReqs} = Action,
10081:     [CmdReq] = CmdReqs,
10082:     #'CommandRequest'{command = Cmd} = CmdReq,
10083:     {notifyReq, NR} = Cmd,
10084:     #'NotifyRequest'{terminationID = [TermId]} = NR,
10085:     {ok, {TransId, Cid, TermId}};
10086: otp_6442_rsrq1_verify_second_nr_msg(Msg) ->
10087:     io:format("otp_6442_rsrq1_verify_second_nr_msg -> entry when error with"
10088: 	      "~n   Msg: ~p"
10089: 	      "~n", [Msg]),
10090:     {error, {invalid_message, Msg}}.

10093: otp_6442_mgc_service_change_reply_msg(Mid, TransId, Cid) ->
10094:     SCRP  = #'ServiceChangeResParm'{serviceChangeMgcId = Mid},
10095:     SCRPs = {serviceChangeResParms, SCRP},
10096:     Root  = #megaco_term_id{id = ["root"]},
10097:     SCR   = #'ServiceChangeReply'{terminationID       = [Root],
10098:                                   serviceChangeResult = SCRPs},
10099:     CR    = {serviceChangeReply, SCR},
10100:     otp_6442_mgc_reply_msg(Mid, TransId, CR, Cid).
10101: 
10102: otp_6442_mgc_notify_reply_msg(Mid, TransId, Cid, TermId) ->
10103:     NR  = #'NotifyReply'{terminationID = [TermId]},
10104:     CR  = {notifyReply, NR},
10105:     otp_6442_mgc_reply_msg(Mid, TransId, CR, Cid).
10106: 
10107: otp_6442_mgc_reply_msg(Mid, TransId, CR, Cid) ->
10108:     AR  = #'ActionReply'{contextId    = Cid,
10109:                          commandReply = [CR]},
10110:     ARs  = {actionReplies, [AR]},
10111:     TR   = #'TransactionReply'{transactionId     = TransId,
10112:                                transactionResult = ARs},
10113:     Body = {transactions, [{transactionReply, TR}]},
10114:     Mess = #'Message'{version     = 1,
10115:                       mId         = Mid,
10116:                       messageBody = Body},
10117:     #'MegacoMessage'{mess = Mess}.

10139: otp_6442_resend_request1_mg_event_sequence(Mid) ->
10140:     RI = [
10141:           {port,             self()}, % This is just a trick to get my pid to the transport module
10142:           {encoding_module,  megaco_pretty_text_encoder},
10143:           {encoding_config,  []},
10144:           {transport_module, megaco_test_generic_transport}
10145:          ],
10146:     ServiceChangeReq = 
10147: 	otp_6442_resend_request1_mg_service_change_request_ar(Mid, 1),
10148:     Tid = #megaco_term_id{id = ["00000000","00000000","01101101"]},
10149:     NotifyReq = otp_6442_resend_request1_mg_notify_request_ar(1, Tid, 1),
10150:     ConnectVerify = 
10151: 	?otp_6442_resend_request1_mg_verify_handle_connect_fun(),
10152:     ServiceChangeReplyVerify = 
10153: 	?otp_6442_resend_request1_mg_verify_service_change_rep_fun(),
10154:     NotifyReplyVerify = 
10155: 	?otp_6442_resend_request1_mg_verify_notify_rep_fun(),
10156:     EvSeq = [
10157:              {debug, false},
10158:              megaco_start,
10159:              {megaco_start_user, Mid, RI, []},
10160: 	     {megaco_update_user_info, resend_indication, false},
10161:              start_transport,
10162:              {megaco_trace, disable},
10163:              {megaco_system_info, users},
10164:              {megaco_system_info, connections},
10165:              connect,
10166:              {megaco_callback, handle_connect, ConnectVerify},
10167:              megaco_connect,
10168:              {megaco_cast,     [ServiceChangeReq], []},
10169:              {megaco_callback, handle_connect,     ConnectVerify},
10170:              {megaco_callback, handle_trans_reply, ServiceChangeReplyVerify},
10171:              {sleep, 1000},
10172:              {megaco_cast,     [NotifyReq],        []},
10173:              {megaco_callback, handle_trans_reply, NotifyReplyVerify},
10174:              {sleep, 1000},
10175:              megaco_stop_user,
10176:              megaco_stop,
10177:              {sleep, 1000}
10178:             ],
10179:     EvSeq.
