10205: otp_6442_resend_request1_mg_verify_service_change_rep(
10206:   {handle_trans_reply, _CH, ?VERSION, {ok, [AR]}, _}) ->
10207:     (catch otp_6442_resend_request1_mg_do_verify_service_change_rep(AR));
10208: otp_6442_resend_request1_mg_verify_service_change_rep(Crap) ->
10209:     {error, Crap, ok}.
10210: 
10211: otp_6442_resend_request1_mg_do_verify_service_change_rep(AR) ->
10212:     io:format("otp_6442_resend_request1_mg_verify_service_change_rep -> ok"
10213: 	      "~n   AR: ~p~n", [AR]),
10214:     CR = 
10215: 	case AR of
10216: 	    #'ActionReply'{commandReply = [CmdRep]} ->
10217: 		CmdRep;
10218: 	    _ ->
10219: 		Reason1 = {invalid_action_reply, AR},
10220: 		throw({error, Reason1, ok})
10221: 	end,
10222:     SCR = 
10223: 	case CR of
10224: 	    {serviceChangeReply, ServChRep} ->
10225: 		ServChRep;
10226: 	    _ ->
10227: 		Reason2 = {invalid_command_reply, CR},
10228: 		throw({error, Reason2, ok})
10229: 	end,
10230:     {Tid, SCRes} = 
10231: 	case SCR of
10232: 	    #'ServiceChangeReply'{terminationID       = [TermID],
10233: 				  serviceChangeResult = Res} ->
10234: 		{TermID, Res};
10235: 	    _ ->
10236: 		Reason3 = {invalid_service_change_reply, SCR},
10237: 		throw({error, Reason3, ok})
10238: 	end,
10239:     case Tid of
10240: 	#megaco_term_id{contains_wildcards = false, id = ["root"]} ->
10241: 	    ok;
10242: 	_ ->
10243: 	    Reason4 = {invalid_termination_id, Tid},
10244: 	    throw({error, Reason4, ok})
10245:     end,
10246:     SCRParm = 
10247: 	case SCRes of
10248: 	    {serviceChangeResParms, ServChResParms} ->
10249: 		ServChResParms;
10250: 	    _ ->
10251: 		Reason5 = {invalid_serviceChangeResult, SCRes},
10252: 		throw({error, Reason5, ok})
10253: 	end,
10254:     case SCRParm of
10255: 	#'ServiceChangeResParm'{serviceChangeMgcId = _RemoteMid} ->
10256: 	    {ok, AR, ok};
10257: 	_ ->
10258: 	    Reason6 = {invalid_service_change_result, SCRParm},
10259: 	    {error, Reason6, ok}
10260:     end.
10261:

10266:     end.
10267: -endif.

10304: otp_6442_resend_request2(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
10305:     Pre = fun() ->
10306:                   put(verbosity, debug),
10307:                   put(tc, ?FUNCTION_NAME),
10308: 
10309:                   MgNode = make_node_name(mg),
10310:                   d("start (MG) node: ~p", [MgNode]),
10311:                   Nodes = [MgNode],
10312:                   ok = ?START_NODES(Nodes, true),
10313:                   Nodes
10314:           end,
10315:     Case = fun do_otp_6442_resend_request2/1,
10316:     Post = fun(Nodes) ->
10317:                    d("stop nodes"),
10318:                    ?STOP_NODES(lists:reverse(Nodes))
10319:            end,
10320:     try_tc(otp6442rreq2, Pre, Case, Post).
10321: 
10322: do_otp_6442_resend_request2([MgNode]) ->
10323:     d("[MG] start the simulator "),
10324:     {ok, Mg} = megaco_test_megaco_generator:start_link("MG", MgNode),
10325: 
10326:     d("[MG] create the event sequence"),
10327:     Mid = {deviceName,"mg"},
10328:     MgcMid = {deviceName,"mgc"},
10329:     MgEvSeq = otp_6442_resend_request2_mg_event_sequence(Mid),
10330: 
10331:     i("wait some time before starting the MG simulation"),
10332:     sleep(1000),
10333: 
10334:     d("[MG] start the simulation"),
10335:     {ok, MgId} = megaco_test_megaco_generator:exec(Mg, MgEvSeq),
10336: 
10337:     i("await the transport module service change send_message event"),
10338:     Pid = otp_6442_expect(fun otp_6442_rsrq2_verify_scr_msg/1, 5000),
10339: 
10340:     i("wait some before issuing the service change reply"),
10341:     sleep(500),
10342: 
10343:     i("send the service change reply"),
10344:     ServiceChangeReply = otp_6442_mgc_service_change_reply_msg(MgcMid, 1, 1),
10345:     megaco_test_generic_transport:incomming_message(Pid, ServiceChangeReply),
10346: 
10347:     i("await the transport module notify-request send_message event from MG: ignore"),
10348:     ok = otp_6442_expect(fun otp_6442_rsrq2_verify_first_nr_msg/1, 5000),
10349: 
10350:     i("await the transport module notify-request resend_message event from MG: reply"),
10351:     {TransId2, Cid2, TermId2} = 
10352: 	otp_6442_expect(fun otp_6442_rsrq2_verify_second_nr_msg/1, 10000),
10353: 
10354:     i("wait some before issuing the notify reply"),
10355:     sleep(500),
10356: 
10357:     i("send the notify reply"),
10358:     NotifyReply = otp_6442_mgc_notify_reply_msg(MgcMid, TransId2, Cid2, TermId2),
10359:     megaco_test_generic_transport:incomming_message(Pid, NotifyReply),
10360: 
10361:     d("await the generator reply"),
10362:     await_completion([MgId]), 
10363: 
10364:     %% Tell Mg to stop
10365:     i("[MG] stop generator"),
10366:     megaco_test_megaco_generator:stop(Mg),
10367: 
10368:     i("done", []),
10369:     ok.

10372: otp_6442_rsrq2_verify_scr_msg(
10373:   {transport_event, {send_message, _SH, {message, Msg}}, Pid}) 
10374:   when is_record(Msg, 'MegacoMessage') ->
10375:     d("received expected service change request message: "
10376:       "~n   Msg: ~p", [Msg]),
10377:     Reply = ok, 
10378:     Pid ! {transport_reply, Reply, self()},
10379:     {ok, Pid};
10380: otp_6442_rsrq2_verify_scr_msg(Msg) ->
10381:     io:format("otp_6442_rsrq2_verify_nr_msg -> error: "
10382: 	      "~n   Msg: ~p"
10383: 	      "~n", [Msg]),
10384:     {error, {invalid_message, Msg}}.
10385: 
10386: otp_6442_rsrq2_verify_first_nr_msg(
10387:   {transport_event, {send_message, _SH, {message, Msg}}, Pid}) 
10388:   when is_record(Msg, 'MegacoMessage') ->
10389:     d("received expected first notify request message: "
10390:       "~n   Msg: ~p", [Msg]),
10391:     Reply = ok, 
10392:     Pid ! {transport_reply, Reply, self()},
10393:     {ok, ok};
10394: otp_6442_rsrq2_verify_first_nr_msg(Msg) ->
10395:     {error, {invalid_message, Msg}}.
10396: 
10397: otp_6442_rsrq2_verify_second_nr_msg(
10398:   {transport_event, {resend_message, _SH, {message, Msg}}, Pid}) 
10399:   when is_record(Msg, 'MegacoMessage') ->
10400:     d("received expected second notify request message: "
10401:       "~n   Msg: ~p", [Msg]),
10402:     Reply = ok, 
10403:     Pid ! {transport_reply, Reply, self()},
10404:     #'MegacoMessage'{mess = Mess} = Msg,
10405:     #'Message'{mId         = _Mid,
10406: 	       messageBody = Body} = Mess, 
10407:     {transactions, Transactions} = Body,
10408:     [Transaction] = Transactions,
10409:     {transactionRequest, TransReq} = Transaction,
10410:     #'TransactionRequest'{transactionId = TransId,
10411: 			  actions       = Actions} = TransReq,
10412:     [Action] = Actions,
10413:     #'ActionRequest'{contextId       = Cid,
10414: 		     commandRequests = CmdReqs} = Action,
10415:     [CmdReq] = CmdReqs,
10416:     #'CommandRequest'{command = Cmd} = CmdReq,
10417:     {notifyReq, NR} = Cmd,
10418:     #'NotifyRequest'{terminationID = [TermId]} = NR,
10419:     {ok, {TransId, Cid, TermId}};
10420: otp_6442_rsrq2_verify_second_nr_msg(Msg) ->
10421:     {error, {invalid_message, Msg}}.
10422:

10438: 	otp_6442_resend_request2_mg_verify_service_change_rep_fun()).

10443: otp_6442_resend_request2_mg_event_sequence(Mid) ->
10444:     RI = [
10445:           {port,             self()}, % This is just a trick to get my pid to the transport module
10446:           {encoding_module,  megaco_pretty_text_encoder},
10447:           {encoding_config,  []},
10448:           {transport_module, megaco_test_generic_transport}
10449:          ],
10450:     Tid = #megaco_term_id{id = ["00000000","00000000","01101101"]},
10451:     NotifyReq = otp_6442_resend_request2_mg_notify_request_ar(1, Tid, 1),
10452:     ServiceChangeReq = 
10453: 	otp_6442_resend_request2_mg_service_change_request_ar(Mid, 1),
10454:     ConnectVerify = 
10455: 	?otp_6442_resend_request2_mg_verify_handle_connect_fun(),
10456:     ServiceChangeReplyVerify = 
10457: 	?otp_6442_resend_request2_mg_verify_service_change_rep_fun(),
10458:     NotifyReplyVerify = 
10459: 	?otp_6442_resend_request2_mg_verify_notify_rep_fun(),
10460: %%     ConnectVerify = 
10461: %% 	otp_6442_resend_request2_mg_verify_handle_connect_fun(),
10462: %%     ServiceChangeReplyVerify = 
10463: %% 	otp_6442_resend_request2_mg_verify_service_change_reply_fun(),
10464: %%     NotifyReplyVerify = otp_6442_resend_request2_mg_verify_notify_reply_fun(),
10465:     EvSeq = [
10466:              {debug, false},
10467:              megaco_start,
10468:              {megaco_start_user, Mid, RI, []},
10469: 	     {megaco_update_user_info, resend_indication, true},
10470:              start_transport,
10471:              {megaco_trace, disable},
10472:              {megaco_system_info, users},
10473:              {megaco_system_info, connections},
10474:              connect,
10475:              {megaco_callback, handle_connect, ConnectVerify},
10476:              megaco_connect,
10477:              {megaco_cast,     [ServiceChangeReq], []},
10478:              {megaco_callback, handle_connect,     ConnectVerify},
10479:              {megaco_callback, handle_trans_reply, ServiceChangeReplyVerify},
10480:              {sleep, 1000},
10481:              {megaco_cast,     [NotifyReq],        []},
10482:              {megaco_callback, handle_trans_reply, NotifyReplyVerify},
10483:              {sleep, 1000},
10484:              megaco_stop_user,
10485:              megaco_stop,
10486:              {sleep, 1000}
10487:             ],
10488:     EvSeq.

10498: otp_6442_resend_request2_mg_verify_handle_connect(
10499:   {handle_connect, CH, ?VERSION}) -> 
10500:     io:format("otp_6442_resend_request2_mg_verify_handle_connect -> ok"
10501: 	      "~n   CH: ~p~n", [CH]),
10502:     {ok, CH, ok};
10503: otp_6442_resend_request2_mg_verify_handle_connect(Else) ->
10504:     io:format("otp_6442_resend_request2_mg_verify_handle_connect -> unknown"
10505: 	      "~n   Else: ~p~n", [Else]),
10506:     {error, Else, ok}.

10509: -ifndef(megaco_hipe_special).
10510: otp_6442_resend_request2_mg_verify_service_change_rep_fun() ->
10511:     fun(Rep) -> 
10512: 	    otp_6442_resend_request2_mg_verify_service_change_rep(Rep) 
10513:     end.
10514: -endif.
10515: 
10516: otp_6442_resend_request2_mg_verify_service_change_rep(
10517:   {handle_trans_reply, _CH, ?VERSION, {ok, [AR]}, _}) ->
10518:     (catch otp_6442_resend_request2_mg_do_verify_service_change_rep(AR));
10519: otp_6442_resend_request2_mg_verify_service_change_rep(Crap) ->
10520:     {error, Crap, ok}.
10521: 
10522: otp_6442_resend_request2_mg_do_verify_service_change_rep(AR) ->
10523:     io:format("otp_6442_resend_request2_mg_verify_service_change_rep -> ok"
10524: 	      "~n   AR: ~p~n", [AR]),
10525:     CR = 
10526: 	case AR of
10527: 	    #'ActionReply'{commandReply = [CmdRep]} ->
10528: 		CmdRep;
10529: 	    _ ->
10530: 		Reason1 = {invalid_action_reply, AR},
10531: 		throw({error, Reason1, ok})
10532: 	end,
10533:     SCR = 
10534: 	case CR of
10535: 	    {serviceChangeReply, ServChRep} ->
10536: 		ServChRep;
10537: 	    _ ->
10538: 		Reason2 = {invalid_command_reply, CR},
10539: 		throw({error, Reason2, ok})
10540: 	end,
10541:     {Tid, SCRes} = 
10542: 	case SCR of
10543: 	    #'ServiceChangeReply'{terminationID       = [TermID],
10544: 				  serviceChangeResult = Res} ->
10545: 		{TermID, Res};
10546: 	    _ ->
10547: 		Reason3 = {invalid_service_change_reply, SCR},
10548: 		throw({error, Reason3, ok})
10549: 	end,
10550:     case Tid of
10551: 	#megaco_term_id{contains_wildcards = false, id = ["root"]} ->
10552: 	    ok;
10553: 	_ ->
10554: 	    Reason4 = {invalid_termination_id, Tid},
10555: 	    throw({error, Reason4, ok})
10556:     end,
10557:     SCRParm = 
10558: 	case SCRes of
10559: 	    {serviceChangeResParms, ServChResParms} ->
10560: 		ServChResParms;
10561: 	    _ ->
10562: 		Reason5 = {invalid_serviceChangeResult, SCRes},
10563: 		throw({error, Reason5, ok})
10564: 	end,
10565:     case SCRParm of
10566: 	#'ServiceChangeResParm'{serviceChangeMgcId = _RemoteMid} ->
10567: 	    {ok, AR, ok};
10568: 	_ ->
10569: 	    Reason6 = {invalid_service_change_result, SCRParm},
10570: 	    {error, Reason6, ok}
10571:     end.
10572: 
10573: -ifndef(megaco_hipe_special).
10574: otp_6442_resend_request2_mg_verify_notify_rep_fun() ->
10575:     fun(Rep) -> 
10576: 	    otp_6442_resend_request2_mg_verify_notify_rep(Rep) 
10577:     end.
10578: -endif.
10579: 
10580: otp_6442_resend_request2_mg_verify_notify_rep(
10581:   {handle_trans_reply, _CH, ?VERSION, {ok, [AR]}, _}) ->
10582:     io:format("otp_6442_resend_request2_mg_verify_notify_rep -> ok"
10583: 	      "~n   AR: ~p~n", [AR]),
10584:     {ok, AR, ok};
10585: otp_6442_resend_request2_mg_verify_notify_rep(Else) ->
10586:     io:format("otp_6442_resend_request2_mg_verify_notify_rep -> unknown"
10587: 	      "~n   Else: ~p~n", [Else]),
10588:     {error, Else, ok}.

10591: otp_6442_resend_request2_mg_service_change_request_ar(_Mid, Cid) ->
10592:     Prof  = cre_serviceChangeProf("resgw", 1),
10593:     SCP   = cre_serviceChangeParm(restart, ["901 mg col boot"], Prof),
10594:     Root  = #megaco_term_id{id = ["root"]},
10595:     SCR   = cre_serviceChangeReq([Root], SCP),
10596:     CMD   = cre_command(SCR),
10597:     CR    = cre_cmdReq(CMD),
10598:     cre_actionReq(Cid, [CR]).
10599: 
10600: otp_6442_resend_request2_mg_notify_request_ar(Rid, Tid, Cid) ->
10601:     TT      = cre_timeNotation("19990729", "22000000"),
10602:     Ev      = cre_obsEvent("al/of", TT),
10603:     EvsDesc = cre_obsEvsDesc(Rid, [Ev]),
10604:     NR      = cre_notifyReq([Tid], EvsDesc),
10605:     CMD     = cre_command(NR),
10606:     CR      = cre_cmdReq(CMD),
10607:     cre_actionReq(Cid, [CR]).
10608:

10613: otp_6442_resend_reply1(suite) ->
10614:     [];
10615: otp_6442_resend_reply1(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
10616:     Factor = ?config(megaco_factor, Config),
10617:     Pre = fun() ->
10618:                   put(verbosity, debug),
10619:                   put(tc, ?FUNCTION_NAME),
10620: 
10621:                   MgNode = make_node_name(mg),
10622:                   d("start (MG) node: ~p", [MgNode]),
10623:                   Nodes = [MgNode],
10624:                   ok = ?START_NODES(Nodes, true),
10625:                   Nodes
10626:           end,
10627:     Case = fun(Nodes) -> do_otp_6442_resend_reply1(Nodes, Factor) end,
10628:     Post = fun(Nodes) ->
10629:                    d("stop nodes"),
10630:                    ?STOP_NODES(lists:reverse(Nodes))
10631:            end,
10632:     try_tc(request_and_no_reply, Pre, Case, Post).
10633: 
10634: do_otp_6442_resend_reply1([MgNode], Factor) ->
10635:     d("[MG] start the simulator "),
10636:     {ok, Mg} = megaco_test_megaco_generator:start_link("MG", MgNode),
10637: 
10638:     d("[MG] create the event sequence"),
10639:     Mid     = {deviceName,"mg"},
10640:     MgcMid  = {deviceName,"mgc"},
10641:     TermId  = #megaco_term_id{id = ["00000000","00000000","01101101"]},
10642:     MgEvSeq = otp_6442_resend_reply1_mg_event_sequence(Mid, TermId),
10643: 
10644:     i("wait some time before starting the MG simulation"),
10645:     sleep(1000),
10646: 
10647:     d("[MG] start the simulation"),
10648:     {ok, MgId} = megaco_test_megaco_generator:exec(Mg, MgEvSeq),
10649: 
10650:     i("await the transport module service change send_message event"),
10651:     Pid = otp_6442_expect(fun otp_6442_rsrp1_verify_scr_msg/1, Factor * 5000),
10652: 
10653:     i("wait some before issuing the service change reply"),
10654:     sleep(500),
10655: 
10656:     i("simulate MGC sending the service change reply"),
10657:     ServiceChangeReply = otp_6442_mgc_service_change_reply_msg(MgcMid, 1, 1),
10658:     megaco_test_generic_transport:incomming_message(Pid, ServiceChangeReply),
10659: 
10660: 
10661:     i("wait some before issuing the notify request"),
10662:     sleep(500),
10663: 
10664:     i("simulate MGC sending the notify request"),
10665:     NotifyRequest = otp_6442_mgc_notify_request_msg(MgcMid, TermId, 2, 1),
10666:     megaco_test_generic_transport:incomming_message(Pid, NotifyRequest),
10667: 
10668:     i("await the transport module first notify-reply send_message event from MG: "
10669:       "ignore"),
10670:     otp_6442_expect(fun otp_6442_rsrp1_verify_first_nr_msg/1, Factor * 5000),
10671: 
10672:     i("await the transport module second notify-reply send_message event from MG: "
10673:       "ack"),
10674:     {TransId, _, _} = otp_6442_expect(fun otp_6442_rsrp1_verify_second_nr_msg/1, 10000),
10675: 
10676:     i("wait some before issuing the ack"),
10677:     sleep(500),
10678: 
10679:     i("simulate MGC sending the ack"),
10680:     Ack = otp_6442_mgc_ack_msg(MgcMid, TransId),
10681:     megaco_test_generic_transport:incomming_message(Pid, Ack),
10682: 
10683: 
10684:     d("await the generator reply"),
10685:     await_completion([MgId]),
10686: 
10687:     %% Tell Mg to stop
10688:     i("[MG] stop generator"),
10689:     megaco_test_megaco_generator:stop(Mg),
10690: 
10691:     i("done", []),
10692:     ok.
10693:

10695: otp_6442_rsrp1_verify_scr_msg(
10696:   {transport_event, {send_message, _SH, {message, Msg}}, Pid}) 
10697:   when is_record(Msg, 'MegacoMessage') ->
10698:     d("received expected service change request message: "
10699:       "~n   Msg: ~p", [Msg]),
10700:     Reply = ok, 
10701:     Pid ! {transport_reply, Reply, self()},
10702:     {ok, Pid};
10703: otp_6442_rsrp1_verify_scr_msg(Msg) ->
10704:     {error, {invalid_message, Msg}}.
10705: 
10706: otp_6442_rsrp1_verify_first_nr_msg(
10707:   {transport_event, {send_message, _SH, {message, Msg}}, Pid}) 
10708:   when is_record(Msg, 'MegacoMessage') ->
10709:     d("received expected first notify reply message: "
10710:       "~n   Msg: ~p", [Msg]),
10711:     Reply = ok, 
10712:     Pid ! {transport_reply, Reply, self()},
10713:     {ok, ok};
10714: otp_6442_rsrp1_verify_first_nr_msg(Msg) ->
10715:     {error, {invalid_message, Msg}}.
10716: 
10717: otp_6442_rsrp1_verify_second_nr_msg(
10718:   {transport_event, {send_message, _SH, {message, Msg}}, Pid}) 
10719:   when is_record(Msg, 'MegacoMessage') ->
10720:     d("received expected second notify reply message: "
10721:       "~n   Msg: ~p", [Msg]),
10722:     Reply = ok, 
10723:     Pid ! {transport_reply, Reply, self()},
10724:     #'MegacoMessage'{mess = Mess} = Msg,
10725:     #'Message'{mId         = _Mid,
10726: 	       messageBody = Body} = Mess, 
10727:     {transactions, Transactions} = Body,
10728:     [Transaction] = Transactions,
10729:     {transactionReply, TransRep} = Transaction,
10730:     #'TransactionReply'{transactionId     = TransId,
10731: 			immAckRequired    = 'NULL', 
10732: 			transactionResult = TransRes} = TransRep,
10733:     {actionReplies, ActReps} = TransRes,
10734:     [ActRep] = ActReps,
10735:     #'ActionReply'{contextId       = Cid,
10736: 		   errorDescriptor = asn1_NOVALUE, 
10737: 		   contextReply    = asn1_NOVALUE, 
10738: 		   commandReply    = CmdReps} = ActRep,
10739:     [CmdRep] = CmdReps,
10740:     {notifyReply, NR} = CmdRep, 
10741:     #'NotifyReply'{terminationID = TermId} = NR,
10742:     {ok, {TransId, Cid, TermId}};
10743: otp_6442_rsrp1_verify_second_nr_msg(Msg) ->
10744:     {error, {invalid_message, Msg}}.
10745: 
10746: 
10747: otp_6442_mgc_notify_request_msg(Mid, TermId, TransId, Cid) ->
10748:     TT      = cre_timeNotation("19990729", "22000000"),
10749:     Ev      = cre_obsEvent("al/of", TT),
10750:     EvsDesc = cre_obsEvsDesc(1, [Ev]),
10751:     NR      = cre_notifyReq([TermId], EvsDesc),
10752:     CMD     = cre_command(NR),
10753:     CR      = cre_cmdReq(CMD),
10754:     AR      = cre_actionReq(Cid, [CR]),
10755:     ARs     = [AR],
10756:     TR      = cre_transReq(TransId, ARs),
10757:     Trans   = cre_transaction(TR),
10758:     Mess    = cre_message(?VERSION, Mid, cre_transactions([Trans])),
10759:     cre_megacoMessage(Mess).
10760: 
10761: 
10762: otp_6442_mgc_ack_msg(Mid, TransId) ->
10763:     TR    = cre_transRespAck(cre_transAck(TransId)),
10764:     Trans = cre_transaction(TR),
10765:     Mess  = cre_message(?VERSION, Mid, cre_transactions([Trans])),
10766:     cre_megacoMessage(Mess).
10767:

10771: %% MG generator stuff
10772: %%
10773: -ifdef(megaco_hipe_special).
10774: -define(otp_6442_resend_reply1_mg_verify_handle_connect_fun(),
10775: 	{?MODULE, otp_6442_resend_reply1_mg_verify_handle_connect, []}).
10776: -define(otp_6442_resend_reply1_mg_verify_service_change_rep_fun(),
10777: 	{?MODULE, otp_6442_resend_reply1_mg_verify_service_change_rep, []}).
10778: -define(otp_6442_resend_reply1_mg_verify_notify_req_fun(TermId),
10779: 	{?MODULE, otp_6442_resend_reply1_mg_verify_notify_req, [TermId]}).
10780: -define(otp_6442_resend_reply1_mg_verify_ack_fun(),
10781: 	{?MODULE, otp_6442_resend_reply1_mg_verify_ack, []}).
10782: -else.
10783: -define(otp_6442_resend_reply1_mg_verify_handle_connect_fun(),
10784: 	otp_6442_resend_reply1_mg_verify_handle_connect_fun()).
10785: -define(otp_6442_resend_reply1_mg_verify_service_change_rep_fun(),
10786: 	otp_6442_resend_reply1_mg_verify_service_change_rep_fun()).
10787: -define(otp_6442_resend_reply1_mg_verify_notify_req_fun(TermId),
10788: 	otp_6442_resend_reply1_mg_verify_notify_req_fun(TermId)).
10789: -define(otp_6442_resend_reply1_mg_verify_ack_fun(),
10790: 	otp_6442_resend_reply1_mg_verify_ack_fun()).
10791: -endif.
10792: 
10793: otp_6442_resend_reply1_mg_event_sequence(Mid, TermId) ->
10794:     RI = [
10795:           {port,             self()}, % This is just a trick to get my pid to the transport module
10796:           {encoding_module,  megaco_pretty_text_encoder},
10797:           {encoding_config,  []},
10798:           {transport_module, megaco_test_generic_transport}
10799:          ],
10800:     ServiceChangeReq = 
10801: 	otp_6442_resend_reply1_mg_service_change_request_ar(Mid, 1),
10802:     RepTmr = #megaco_incr_timer{wait_for    = 2000,
10803:                                 factor      = 1,
10804:                                 max_retries = 1},
10805:     ConnectVerify = 
10806: 	?otp_6442_resend_reply1_mg_verify_handle_connect_fun(),
10807:     ServiceChangeReplyVerify = 
10808: 	?otp_6442_resend_reply1_mg_verify_service_change_rep_fun(),
10809:     NotifyReqVerify = 
10810: 	?otp_6442_resend_reply1_mg_verify_notify_req_fun(TermId),
10811:     AckVerify = 
10812: 	?otp_6442_resend_reply1_mg_verify_ack_fun(), 
10813: %%     ConnectVerify = 
10814: %% 	otp_6442_resend_reply1_mg_verify_handle_connect_fun(),
10815: %%     ServiceChangeReplyVerify = 
10816: %% 	otp_6442_resend_reply1_mg_verify_service_change_reply_fun(),
10817: %%     NotifyReqVerify = 
10818: %% 	otp_6442_resend_reply1_mg_verify_notify_request_fun(TermId),
10819: %%     AckVerify = 
10820: %% 	otp_6442_resend_reply1_mg_verify_ack_fun(), 
10821:     EvSeq = [
10822:              {debug, false},
10823:              megaco_start,
10824:              {megaco_start_user, Mid, RI, []},
10825: 	     {megaco_update_user_info, resend_indication, false},
10826: 	     {megaco_update_user_info, reply_timer,       RepTmr},
10827:              start_transport,
10828:              {megaco_trace, disable},
10829:              {megaco_system_info, users},
10830:              {megaco_system_info, connections},
10831:              connect,
10832:              {megaco_callback, handle_connect, ConnectVerify},
10833:              megaco_connect,
10834:              {megaco_cast,     [ServiceChangeReq], []},
10835:              {megaco_callback, handle_connect,     ConnectVerify},
10836:              {megaco_callback, handle_trans_reply, ServiceChangeReplyVerify},
10837:              {sleep, 1000},
10838: 
10839:              {megaco_callback, handle_trans_request, NotifyReqVerify},
10840:              {megaco_callback, handle_trans_ack,     AckVerify},
10841: 
10842:              {sleep, 1000},
10843:              megaco_stop_user,
10844:              megaco_stop,
10845:              {sleep, 1000}
10846:             ],
10847:     EvSeq.
10848:

10853: 	    otp_6442_resend_reply1_mg_verify_handle_connect(Ev)

10860:     {ok, CH, ok};

10868: otp_6442_resend_reply1_mg_verify_service_change_rep_fun() ->

10870: 	    otp_6442_resend_reply1_mg_verify_service_change_rep(Rep) 
10871:     end.

10873: 
10874: otp_6442_resend_reply1_mg_verify_service_change_rep(
10875:   {handle_trans_reply, _CH, ?VERSION, {ok, [AR]}, _}) ->
10876:     (catch otp_6442_resend_reply1_mg_do_verify_service_change_rep(AR));
10877: otp_6442_resend_reply1_mg_verify_service_change_rep(Crap) ->
10878:     {error, Crap, ok}.
10879: 
10880: otp_6442_resend_reply1_mg_do_verify_service_change_rep(AR) ->
10881:     io:format("otp_6442_resend_reply1_mg_verify_service_change_rep -> ok"
10882: 	      "~n   AR: ~p~n", [AR]),
10883:     CR = 
10884: 	case AR of
10885: 	    #'ActionReply'{commandReply = [CmdRep]} ->
10886: 		CmdRep;
10887: 	    _ ->
10888: 		Reason1 = {invalid_action_reply, AR},
10889: 		throw({error, Reason1, ok})
10890: 	end,
10891:     SCR = 
10892: 	case CR of
10893: 	    {serviceChangeReply, ServChRep} ->
10894: 		ServChRep;
10895: 	    _ ->
10896: 		Reason2 = {invalid_command_reply, CR},
10897: 		throw({error, Reason2, ok})
10898: 	end,
10899:     {Tid, SCRes} = 
10900: 	case SCR of
10901: 	    #'ServiceChangeReply'{terminationID       = [TermID],
10902: 				  serviceChangeResult = Res} ->
10903: 		{TermID, Res};
10904: 	    _ ->
10905: 		Reason3 = {invalid_service_change_reply, SCR},
10906: 		throw({error, Reason3, ok})
10907: 	end,
10908:     case Tid of
10909: 	#megaco_term_id{contains_wildcards = false, id = ["root"]} ->
10910: 	    ok;
10911: 	_ ->
10912: 	    Reason4 = {invalid_termination_id, Tid},
10913: 	    throw({error, Reason4, ok})
10914:     end,
10915:     SCRParm = 
10916: 	case SCRes of
10917: 	    {serviceChangeResParms, ServChResParms} ->
10918: 		ServChResParms;
10919: 	    _ ->
10920: 		Reason5 = {invalid_serviceChangeResult, SCRes},
10921: 		throw({error, Reason5, ok})
10922: 	end,
10923:     case SCRParm of
10924: 	#'ServiceChangeResParm'{serviceChangeMgcId = _RemoteMid} ->
10925: 	    {ok, AR, ok};
10926: 	_ ->
10927: 	    Reason6 = {invalid_service_change_result, SCRParm},
10928: 	    {error, Reason6, ok}
10929:     end.
10930: 
10931: -ifndef(megaco_hipe_special).
10932: otp_6442_resend_reply1_mg_verify_notify_req_fun(TermId) ->
10933:     fun(Req) ->
10934: 	    otp_6442_resend_reply1_mg_verify_notify_req(Req, TermId)
10935:     end.
10936: -endif.
10937: 
10938: otp_6442_resend_reply1_mg_verify_notify_req(
10939:   {handle_trans_request, _, ?VERSION, [AR]}, TermId) ->
10940:     io:format("otp_6442_resend_reply1_mg_verify_notify_req -> ok"
10941: 	      "~n   AR: ~p~n", [AR]),
10942:     case AR of
10943: 	#'ActionRequest'{contextId = 1 = Cid,
10944: 			 commandRequests = [CR]} ->
10945: 	    #'CommandRequest'{command = Cmd} = CR,
10946: 	    {notifyReq, NR} = Cmd,
10947: 	    #'NotifyRequest'{terminationID            = [TermId],
10948: 			     observedEventsDescriptor = OED,
10949: 			     errorDescriptor          = asn1_NOVALUE} = NR,
10950: 	    #'ObservedEventsDescriptor'{observedEventLst = [OE]} = OED,
10951: 	    #'ObservedEvent'{eventName = "al/of"} = OE,
10952: 	    HandleAck = {handle_ack, otp_6442_resend_reply1},
10953: 	    Reply = {HandleAck,
10954: 		     [otp_6442_resend_reply1_mg_notify_reply_ar(Cid, TermId)]},
10955: 	    {ok, AR, Reply};
10956: 	_ ->
10957: 	    ED = otp_6442_resend_reply1_err_desc(AR),
10958: 	    ErrReply = {discard_ack, ED},
10959: 	    {error, AR, ErrReply}
10960:     end;
10961: otp_6442_resend_reply1_mg_verify_notify_req(Else, TermId) ->
10962:     io:format("otp_6442_resend_reply1_mg_verify_notify_request -> unknown"
10963: 	      "~n   Else:   ~p"
10964: 	      "~n   TermId: ~p"
10965: 	      "~n", [Else, TermId]),
10966:     ED       = otp_6442_resend_reply1_err_desc(Else),
10967:     ErrReply = {discard_ack, ED},
10968:     {error, Else, ErrReply}.
10969: 
10970: otp_6442_resend_reply1_mg_notify_reply_ar(Cid, TermId) ->
10971:     NR = cre_notifyReply([TermId]),
10972:     CR = cre_cmdReply(NR),
10973:     cre_actionReply(Cid, [CR]).
10974: 
10975: -ifndef(megaco_hipe_special).
10976: otp_6442_resend_reply1_mg_verify_ack_fun() ->
10977:     fun(Ack) ->
10978: 	    otp_6442_resend_reply1_mg_verify_ack(Ack)
10979:     end.
10980: -endif.
10981: 
10982: otp_6442_resend_reply1_mg_verify_ack(
10983:   {handle_trans_ack, CH, ?VERSION, ok, otp_6442_resend_reply1}) ->
10984:     io:format("otp_6442_resend_reply1_verify_ack -> ok"
10985:               "~n   CH: ~p"
10986:               "~n", [CH]),
10987:     {ok, CH, ok};
10988: otp_6442_resend_reply1_mg_verify_ack(Else) ->
10989:     io:format("otp_6442_resend_reply1_verify_ack -> unknown"
10990:               "~n   Else: ~p~n", [Else]),
10991:     {error, Else, ok}.
10992: 
10993: 
10994: otp_6442_resend_reply1_mg_service_change_request_ar(_Mid, Cid) ->
10995:     Prof  = cre_serviceChangeProf("resgw", 1),
10996:     SCP   = cre_serviceChangeParm(restart, ["901 mg col boot"], Prof),
10997:     Root  = #megaco_term_id{id = ["root"]},
10998:     SCR   = cre_serviceChangeReq([Root], SCP),
10999:     CMD   = cre_command(SCR),
11000:     CR    = cre_cmdReq(CMD),
11001:     cre_actionReq(Cid, [CR]).
11002: 
11003: otp_6442_resend_reply1_err_desc(T) ->
11004:     EC = ?megaco_internal_gateway_error,
11005:     ET = lists:flatten(io_lib:format("~w",[T])),
11006:     #'ErrorDescriptor'{errorCode = EC, errorText = ET}.
11007:

11011: 
11012: otp_6442_resend_reply2(suite) ->
11013:     [];
11014: otp_6442_resend_reply2(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
11015:     Factor = ?config(megaco_factor, Config),
11016:     Pre = fun() ->
11017:                   MgNode = make_node_name(mg),
11018:                   d("start (MG) node: ~p", [MgNode]),
11019:                   Nodes = [MgNode],
11020:                   ok = ?START_NODES(Nodes, true),
11021:                   Nodes
11022:           end,
11023:     Case = fun(Nodes) -> do_otp_6442_resend_reply2(Nodes, Factor) end,
11024:     Post = fun(Nodes) ->
11025:                    d("stop nodes"),
11026:                    ?STOP_NODES(lists:reverse(Nodes))
11027:            end,
11028:     try_tc(otp6442rrep2, Pre, Case, Post).
11029: 
11030: do_otp_6442_resend_reply2([MgNode], Factor) ->
11031:     d("[MG] start the simulator "),
11032:     {ok, Mg} = megaco_test_megaco_generator:start_link("MG", MgNode),
11033: 
11034:     d("[MG] create the event sequence"),
11035:     Mid     = {deviceName,"mg"},
11036:     MgcMid  = {deviceName,"mgc"},
11037:     TermId  = #megaco_term_id{id = ["00000000","00000000","01101101"]},
11038:     MgEvSeq = otp_6442_resend_reply2_mg_event_sequence(Mid, TermId),
11039: 
11040:     i("wait some time before starting the MG simulation"),
11041:     sleep(1000),
11042: 
11043:     d("[MG] start the simulation"),
11044:     {ok, MgId} = megaco_test_megaco_generator:exec(Mg, MgEvSeq),
11045: 
11046:     i("await the transport module service change send_message event"),
11047:     Pid = otp_6442_expect(fun otp_6442_rsrp2_verify_scr_msg/1, Factor * 5000),
11048: 
11049:     i("wait some before issuing the service change reply"),
11050:     sleep(500),
11051: 
11052:     i("simulate MGC sending the service change reply"),
11053:     ServiceChangeReply = otp_6442_mgc_service_change_reply_msg(MgcMid, 1, 1),
11054:     megaco_test_generic_transport:incomming_message(Pid, ServiceChangeReply),
11055: 
11056: 
11057:     i("wait some before issuing the notify request"),
11058:     sleep(500),
11059: 
11060:     i("simulate MGC sending the notify request"),
11061:     NotifyRequest = otp_6442_mgc_notify_request_msg(MgcMid, TermId, 2, 1),
11062:     megaco_test_generic_transport:incomming_message(Pid, NotifyRequest),
11063: 
11064:     i("await the transport module notify-reply send_message event from MG: ignore"),
11065:     otp_6442_expect(otp_6442_rsrp2_verify_first_nr_msg_fun(), Factor * 5000),
11066: 
11067:     i("await the transport module notify-reply resend_message event from MG: ack"),
11068:     {TransId, _, _} = 
11069: 	otp_6442_expect(otp_6442_rsrp2_verify_second_nr_msg_fun(), 10000),
11070: 
11071:     i("wait some before issuing the ack"),
11072:     sleep(500),
11073: 
11074:     i("simulate MGC sending the ack"),
11075:     Ack = otp_6442_mgc_ack_msg(MgcMid, TransId),
11076:     megaco_test_generic_transport:incomming_message(Pid, Ack),
11077: 
11078: 
11079:     d("await the generator reply"),
11080:     await_completion([MgId]),
11081: 
11082:     %% Tell Mg to stop
11083:     i("[MG] stop generator"),
11084:     megaco_test_megaco_generator:stop(Mg),
11085: 
11086:     i("done", []),
11087:     ok.
11088: 
11089: 
11090: otp_6442_rsrp2_verify_scr_msg(
11091:   {transport_event, {send_message, _SH, {message, Msg}}, Pid}) 
11092:   when is_record(Msg, 'MegacoMessage') ->
11093:     d("received expected service change request message: "
11094:       "~n   Msg: ~p", [Msg]),
11095:     Reply = ok, 
11096:     Pid ! {transport_reply, Reply, self()},
11097:     {ok, Pid};
11098: otp_6442_rsrp2_verify_scr_msg(Msg) ->
11099:     {error, {invalid_message, Msg}}.
11100: 
11101: otp_6442_rsrp2_verify_first_nr_msg_fun() ->
11102:     fun(E) ->
11103: 	    otp_6442_rsrp2_verify_first_nr_msg(E)
11104:     end.
11105: 
11106: otp_6442_rsrp2_verify_first_nr_msg(
11107:   {transport_event, {send_message, _SH, {message, Msg}}, Pid}) 
11108:   when is_record(Msg, 'MegacoMessage') ->
11109:     d("received expected first notify reply message: "
11110:       "~n   Msg: ~p", [Msg]),
11111:     Reply = ok, 
11112:     Pid ! {transport_reply, Reply, self()},
11113:     {ok, ok};
11114: otp_6442_rsrp2_verify_first_nr_msg(Msg) ->
11115:     {error, {invalid_message, Msg}}.
11116: 
11117: otp_6442_rsrp2_verify_second_nr_msg_fun() ->
11118:     fun(E) ->
11119: 	    otp_6442_rsrp2_verify_second_nr_msg(E)
11120:     end.
11121: 
11122: otp_6442_rsrp2_verify_second_nr_msg(
11123:   {transport_event, {resend_message, _SH, {message, Msg}}, Pid}) 
11124:   when is_record(Msg, 'MegacoMessage') ->
11125:     d("received expected second notify reply message: "
11126:       "~n   Msg: ~p", [Msg]),
11127:     Reply = ok, 
11128:     Pid ! {transport_reply, Reply, self()},
11129:     #'MegacoMessage'{mess = Mess} = Msg,
11130:     #'Message'{mId         = _Mid,
11131: 	       messageBody = Body} = Mess, 
11132:     {transactions, Transactions} = Body,
11133:     [Transaction] = Transactions,
11134:     {transactionReply, TransRep} = Transaction,
11135:     #'TransactionReply'{transactionId     = TransId,
11136: 			immAckRequired    = 'NULL', 
11137: 			transactionResult = TransRes} = TransRep,
11138:     {actionReplies, ActReps} = TransRes,
11139:     [ActRep] = ActReps,
11140:     #'ActionReply'{contextId       = Cid,
11141: 		   errorDescriptor = asn1_NOVALUE, 
11142: 		   contextReply    = asn1_NOVALUE, 
11143: 		   commandReply    = CmdReps} = ActRep,
11144:     [CmdRep] = CmdReps,
11145:     {notifyReply, NR} = CmdRep, 
11146:     #'NotifyReply'{terminationID = TermId} = NR,
11147:     {ok, {TransId, Cid, TermId}};
11148: otp_6442_rsrp2_verify_second_nr_msg(Msg) ->
11149:     d("received expected bad second notify reply message: "
11150:       "~n   Msg: ~p", [Msg]),
11151:     {error, {invalid_message, Msg}}.
11152: 
11153:

11255:     fun(Rep) -> 
11256: 	    otp_6442_resend_reply2_mg_verify_service_change_rep(Rep) 
11257:     end.
11258: -endif.
11259: 
11260: otp_6442_resend_reply2_mg_verify_service_change_rep(
11261:   {handle_trans_reply, _CH, ?VERSION, {ok, [AR]}, _}) ->
11262:     (catch otp_6442_resend_reply2_mg_do_verify_service_change_rep(AR));
11263: otp_6442_resend_reply2_mg_verify_service_change_rep(Crap) ->
11264:     {error, Crap, ok}.
11265: 
11266: otp_6442_resend_reply2_mg_do_verify_service_change_rep(AR) ->
11267:     io:format("otp_6442_resend_reply2_mg_verify_service_change_rep -> ok"
11268: 	      "~n   AR: ~p~n", [AR]),
11269:     CR = 
11270: 	case AR of
11271: 	    #'ActionReply'{commandReply = [CmdRep]} ->
11272: 		CmdRep;
11273: 	    _ ->
11274: 		Reason1 = {invalid_action_reply, AR},
11275: 		throw({error, Reason1, ok})
11276: 	end,
11277:     SCR = 
11278: 	case CR of
11279: 	    {serviceChangeReply, ServChRep} ->
11280: 		ServChRep;
11281: 	    _ ->
11282: 		Reason2 = {invalid_command_reply, CR},
11283: 		throw({error, Reason2, ok})
11284: 	end,
11285:     {Tid, SCRes} = 
11286: 	case SCR of
11287: 	    #'ServiceChangeReply'{terminationID       = [TermID],
11288: 				  serviceChangeResult = Res} ->
11289: 		{TermID, Res};
11290: 	    _ ->
11291: 		Reason3 = {invalid_service_change_reply, SCR},
11292: 		throw({error, Reason3, ok})
11293: 	end,
11294:     case Tid of
11295: 	#megaco_term_id{contains_wildcards = false, id = ["root"]} ->
11296: 	    ok;
11297: 	_ ->
11298: 	    Reason4 = {invalid_termination_id, Tid},
11299: 	    throw({error, Reason4, ok})
11300:     end,
11301:     SCRParm = 
11302: 	case SCRes of
11303: 	    {serviceChangeResParms, ServChResParms} ->
11304: 		ServChResParms;
11305: 	    _ ->
11306: 		Reason5 = {invalid_serviceChangeResult, SCRes},
11307: 		throw({error, Reason5, ok})
11308: 	end,
11309:     case SCRParm of
11310: 	#'ServiceChangeResParm'{serviceChangeMgcId = _RemoteMid} ->
11311: 	    {ok, AR, ok};
11312: 	_ ->
11313: 	    Reason6 = {invalid_service_change_result, SCRParm},
11314: 	    {error, Reason6, ok}
11315:     end.
11316: 
11317: -ifndef(megaco_hipe_special).
11318: otp_6442_resend_reply2_mg_verify_notify_req_fun(TermId) ->
11319:     fun(Req) ->
11320: 	    otp_6442_resend_reply2_mg_verify_notify_req(Req, TermId)
11321:     end.
11322: -endif.
11323: 
11324: otp_6442_resend_reply2_mg_verify_notify_req(
11325:   {handle_trans_request, _, ?VERSION, [AR]}, TermId) ->
11326:     io:format("otp_6442_resend_reply2_mg_verify_notify_req -> ok"
11327: 	      "~n   AR: ~p~n", [AR]),
11328:     case AR of
11329: 	#'ActionRequest'{contextId = 1 = Cid,
11330: 			 commandRequests = [CR]} ->
11331: 	    #'CommandRequest'{command = Cmd} = CR,
11332: 	    {notifyReq, NR} = Cmd,
11333: 	    #'NotifyRequest'{terminationID            = [TermId],
11334: 			     observedEventsDescriptor = OED,
11335: 			     errorDescriptor          = asn1_NOVALUE} = NR,
11336: 	    #'ObservedEventsDescriptor'{observedEventLst = [OE]} = OED,
11337: 	    #'ObservedEvent'{eventName = "al/of"} = OE,
11338: 	    HandleAck = {handle_ack, otp_6442_resend_reply2},
11339: 	    Reply = {HandleAck,
11340: 		     [otp_6442_resend_reply2_mg_notify_reply_ar(Cid, TermId)]},
11341: 	    {ok, AR, Reply};
11342: 	_ ->
11343: 	    ED = otp_6442_resend_reply2_err_desc(AR),
11344: 	    ErrReply = {discard_ack, ED},
11345: 	    {error, AR, ErrReply}
11346:     end;
11347: otp_6442_resend_reply2_mg_verify_notify_req(Else, TermId) ->
11348:     io:format("otp_6442_resend_reply2_mg_verify_notify_req -> unknown"
11349: 	      "~n   Else:   ~p"
11350: 	      "~n   TermId: ~p"
11351: 	      "~n", [Else, TermId]),
11352:     ED       = otp_6442_resend_reply2_err_desc(Else),
11353:     ErrReply = {discard_ack, ED},
11354:     {error, Else, ErrReply}.
11355: 
11356: otp_6442_resend_reply2_mg_notify_reply_ar(Cid, TermId) ->
11357:     NR = cre_notifyReply([TermId]),
11358:     CR = cre_cmdReply(NR),
11359:     cre_actionReply(Cid, [CR]).

11365: 	    otp_6442_resend_reply2_mg_verify_ack(Ack)
11366:     end.
11367: -endif.

11373:               "~n", [CH]),
11374:     {ok, CH, ok};
11375: otp_6442_resend_reply2_mg_verify_ack(Else) ->
11376:     io:format("otp_6442_resend_reply2_verify_ack -> unknown"
11377:               "~n   Else: ~p~n", [Else]),
11378:     {error, Else, ok}.

11381: otp_6442_resend_reply2_mg_service_change_request_ar(_Mid, Cid) ->
11382:     Prof  = cre_serviceChangeProf("resgw", 1),
11383:     SCP   = cre_serviceChangeParm(restart, ["901 mg col boot"], Prof),
11384:     Root  = #megaco_term_id{id = ["root"]},
11385:     SCR   = cre_serviceChangeReq([Root], SCP),
11386:     CMD   = cre_command(SCR),
11387:     CR    = cre_cmdReq(CMD),
11388:     cre_actionReq(Cid, [CR]).

11394:     #'ErrorDescriptor'{errorCode = EC, errorText = ET}.

11400: otp_6865_request_and_reply_plain_extra1(suite) ->
11401:     [];
11402: otp_6865_request_and_reply_plain_extra1(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
11403:     Pre  = fun() -> undefined end,
11404:     Case = fun(X) -> do_otp_6865_request_and_reply_plain_extra1(X, Config) end,
11405:     Post = fun(_) -> ok end,
11406:     try_tc(otp6865e1, Pre, Case, Post).
11407: 
11408: do_otp_6865_request_and_reply_plain_extra1(_, Config) ->
11409:     ?ACQUIRE_NODES(1, Config),
11410: 
11411:     d("start test case controller",[]),
11412:     ok = megaco_tc_controller:start_link(),
11413: 
11414:     %% Instruct the transport module to fail all send_message
11415:     d("instruct transport module to provide extra info: ",[]),
11416:     ExtraInfo = otp_6865_extra_info, 
11417:     ok = megaco_tc_controller:insert(extra_transport_info, ExtraInfo),
11418: 
11419:     d("start proxy",[]),
11420:     ?USER_MOD:start_proxy(),
11421: 
11422:     PrelMid = preliminary_mid,
11423:     MgMid   = ipv4_mid(4711),
11424:     MgcMid  = ipv4_mid(),
11425:     UserMod = ?USER_MOD,
11426:     d("start megaco app",[]),
11427:     ?VERIFY(ok, application:start(megaco)),
11428:     UserConfig = [{user_mod, UserMod}, {send_mod, UserMod},
11429: 		  {request_timer, infinity}, {reply_timer, infinity}],
11430:     d("start (MG) user ~p",[MgMid]),
11431:     ?VERIFY(ok,	megaco:start_user(MgMid, UserConfig)),
11432: 
11433:     d("start (MGC) user ~p",[MgcMid]),
11434:     ?VERIFY(ok,	megaco:start_user(MgcMid, UserConfig)),
11435: 
11436:     d("get receive info for ~p",[MgMid]),
11437:     MgRH = user_info(MgMid, receive_handle),
11438:     d("get receive info for ~p",[MgcMid]),
11439:     MgcRH = user_info(MgcMid, receive_handle), 
11440:     d("start transport",[]),
11441:     {ok, MgPid, MgSH} =
11442: 	?VERIFY({ok, _, _}, UserMod:start_transport(MgRH, MgcRH)),
11443:     PrelMgCH = #megaco_conn_handle{local_mid = MgMid,
11444: 				   remote_mid = preliminary_mid},
11445:     MgCH  = #megaco_conn_handle{local_mid = MgMid,
11446: 				remote_mid = MgcMid},
11447:     MgcCH = #megaco_conn_handle{local_mid = MgcMid,
11448: 				remote_mid = MgMid},
11449:     d("(MG) try connect to MGC",[]),
11450:     ?SEND(megaco:connect(MgRH, PrelMid, MgSH, MgPid)), % Mg prel
11451:     d("await connect from MG",[]),
11452:     ?USER({connect, PrelMgCH, _V, []}, ok),
11453:     ?RECEIVE([{res, _, {ok, PrelMgCH}}]),
11454: 
11455:     d("(MG) send service change request",[]),
11456:     Req = service_change_request(),
11457:     ?SEND(megaco:call(PrelMgCH, [Req], [])),
11458: 
11459:     d("(MGC) send service change reply",[]),
11460:     ?USER({connect, MgcCH, _V, [ExtraInfo]}, ok), % Mgc auto
11461:     Rep = service_change_reply(MgcMid),
11462:     ?USER({request, MgcCH, _V, [[Req], ExtraInfo]}, {discard_ack, [Rep]}),
11463:     ?USER({connect, MgCH, _V, [ExtraInfo]}, ok), % Mg confirm
11464:     ?RECEIVE([{res, _, {1, {ok, [Rep], ExtraInfo}}}]),
11465: 
11466:     d("get (system info) connections",[]),
11467:     connections([MgCH, MgcCH]),
11468:     d("get (~p) connections",[MgMid]),
11469:     ?VERIFY([MgCH], megaco:user_info(MgMid, connections)),
11470:     d("get (~p) connections",[MgcMid]),
11471:     ?VERIFY([MgcCH], megaco:user_info(MgcMid, connections)),
11472: 
11473:     Reason = shutdown,
11474:     d("(MG) disconnect",[]),
11475:     ?SEND(megaco:disconnect(MgCH, Reason)),
11476:     ?USER({disconnect, MgCH, _V, [{user_disconnect, Reason}]}, ok),
11477:     ?RECEIVE([{res, _, ok}]),
11478:     ?VERIFY(ok,	megaco:stop_user(MgMid)),
11479: 
11480:     d("(MGC) disconnect",[]),
11481:     ?SEND(megaco:disconnect(MgcCH, Reason)),
11482:     ?USER({disconnect, MgcCH, _V, [{user_disconnect, Reason}]}, ok),
11483:     ?RECEIVE([{res, _, ok}]),
11484:     ?VERIFY(ok,	megaco:stop_user(MgcMid)),
11485: 
11486:     d("stop megaco app",[]),
11487:     ?VERIFY(ok, application:stop(megaco)),
11488:     ?RECEIVE([]),
11489: 
11490:     d("stop test case controller",[]),
11491:     ok = megaco_tc_controller:stop(),
11492: 
11493:     d("done",[]),
11494:     ok.
11495:

11539:

11542:

11545:         announce_mgc ->
11546:             i("received MGC ready announcement"),
11547:             ok
11548:     end,
11549: 
11550:     d("[MG] start the simulator (generator)"),
11551:     {ok, Mg} = megaco_test_tcp_generator:start_link("MG", MgNode),
11552:

11554:     MgEvSeq = otp6865e2_mg_event_sequence(text, tcp),
11555:

11560:     {ok, MgId} = megaco_test_tcp_generator:exec(Mg, MgEvSeq),
11561: 
11562:     d("await the generator reply(s)"),
11563:     await_completion([MgcId, MgId], 60000),
11564: 
11565:     %% Tell Mgc to stop
11566:     i("[MGC] stop generator"),
11567:     megaco_test_megaco_generator:stop(Mgc),
11568:

11571:     megaco_test_tcp_generator:stop(Mg),
11572:

11574:     ok = megaco_tc_controller:stop(),

11611: otp6865e2_mgc_event_sequence(ExtraInfo, text, tcp) ->
11612:     Mid  = {deviceName, "ctrl"},
11613:     CTRL = self(),
11614:     RI   = [
11615:             {port,             2944},
11616:             {encoding_module,  megaco_pretty_text_encoder},
11617:             {encoding_config,  []},
11618:             {transport_module, megaco_tcp}
11619:            ],
11620:     ConnectVerify          = 
11621: 	?otp6865e2_mgc_verify_handle_connect_fun(ExtraInfo), 
11622:     ServiceChangeReqVerify = 
11623: 	?otp6865e2_mgc_verify_service_change_req_fun(Mid, ExtraInfo),
11624:     NotifyReqVerify1       = 
11625: 	?otp6865e2_mgc_verify_notify_req_fun(1, ExtraInfo, false),
11626:     NotifyReqVerify2       = 
11627: 	?otp6865e2_mgc_verify_notify_req_fun(2, ExtraInfo, true),
11628:     AckVerify              = ?otp6865e2_mgc_verify_reply_ack_fun(ExtraInfo),
11629:     Tid = #megaco_term_id{id = ["00000000","00000000","01101101"]},
11630:     NotifyReq = [otp6865e2_mgc_notify_request_ar(1, Tid, 1)],
11631:     NotifyReplyVerify = ?otp6865e2_mgc_verify_notify_reply_fun(ExtraInfo), 
11632:     DiscoVerify            = 
11633: 	?otp6865e2_mgc_verify_handle_disconnect_fun(), 
11634:     EvSeq = [
11635: 	     {debug, true},
11636: 	     {megaco_trace, disable},
11637: 	     megaco_start,
11638: 	     {megaco_start_user, Mid, RI, []},
11639: 	     start_transport,
11640: 	     listen,
11641: 
11642:              %% ANNOUNCE READY
11643:              {trigger, fun() -> CTRL ! announce_mgc end}, 
11644: 
11645: 	     {megaco_callback, handle_connect,       ConnectVerify},
11646: 	     {megaco_callback, handle_trans_request, ServiceChangeReqVerify},
11647: 	     {megaco_callback, handle_trans_request, NotifyReqVerify1},
11648: 	     {megaco_callback, handle_trans_request, NotifyReqVerify2},
11649: 	     {megaco_callback, handle_trans_ack,     AckVerify},
11650: 	     {megaco_cast,     NotifyReq, []},
11651: 	     {megaco_callback, handle_trans_reply,   NotifyReplyVerify},
11652: 	     {megaco_callback, handle_disconnect,    DiscoVerify},
11653: 	     {sleep, 1000},
11654: 	     megaco_stop_user,
11655: 	     megaco_stop
11656: 	    ],
11657:     EvSeq.

11686: otp6865e2_mgc_verify_service_change_req(
11687:   {handle_trans_request, _, ?VERSION, [AR], ExtraInfo}, Mid, ExtraInfo) ->
11688:     (catch otp6865e2_mgc_do_verify_service_change_req(AR, Mid));
11689: otp6865e2_mgc_verify_service_change_req(Crap, _Mid, ExtraInfo) ->
11690:     ED = cre_ErrDesc({Crap, ExtraInfo}),
11691:     ErrReply = {discard_ack, ED},
11692:     {error, {Crap, ExtraInfo}, ErrReply}.
11693: 
11694: otp6865e2_mgc_do_verify_service_change_req(AR, Mid) ->
11695:     io:format("otp6865e2_mgc_verify_service_change_req -> ok"
11696: 	      "~n   AR:  ~p"
11697: 	      "~n   Mid: ~p"
11698: 	      "~n", [AR, Mid]),
11699:     CR = 
11700: 	case AR of
11701: 	    #'ActionRequest'{commandRequests = [CmdReq]} ->
11702: 		CmdReq;
11703: 	    _ ->
11704:                 Err1      = {invalid_action_request, AR},
11705:                 ED1       = cre_ErrDesc(AR),
11706:                 ErrReply1 = {discard_ack, ED1},
11707:                 throw({error, Err1, ErrReply1})
11708: 	end,
11709:     Cmd =
11710:         case CR of
11711:             #'CommandRequest'{command = Command} ->
11712:                 Command;
11713:             _ ->
11714:                 Err2      = {invalid_command_request, CR},
11715:                 ED2       = cre_ErrDesc(CR),
11716:                 ErrReply2 = {discard_ack, ED2},
11717:                 throw({error, Err2, ErrReply2})
11718:         end,
11719:     {Tid, Parms} =
11720:         case Cmd of
11721:             {serviceChangeReq,
11722:              #'ServiceChangeRequest'{terminationID = [TermID],
11723:                                      serviceChangeParms = ServChParms}} ->
11724:                 {TermID, ServChParms};
11725:             _ ->
11726:                 Err3      = {invalid_command, Cmd},
11727:                 ED3       = cre_ErrDesc(Cmd),
11728:                 ErrReply3 = {discard_ack, ED3},
11729:                 throw({error, Err3, ErrReply3})
11730:         end,
11731:     case Tid of
11732:         #megaco_term_id{contains_wildcards = false, id = ["root"]} ->
11733:             ok;
11734:         _ ->
11735:             Err4      = {invalid_termination_id, Tid},
11736:             ED4       = cre_ErrDesc(Tid),
11737:             ErrReply4 = {discard_ack, ED4},
11738:             throw({error, Err4, ErrReply4})
11739:     end,
11740:     case Parms of
11741:         #'ServiceChangeParm'{serviceChangeMethod = restart,
11742:                              serviceChangeReason = [[$9,$0,$1|_]]} ->
11743:             AckData = [otp6865e2_mgc_service_change_reply_ar(Mid, 1)],
11744:             Reply   = {discard_ack, AckData},
11745:             {ok, AR, Reply};
11746:         _ ->
11747:             Err5      = {invalid_SCP, Parms},
11748:             ED5       = cre_ErrDesc(Parms),
11749:             ErrReply5 = {discard_ack, ED5},
11750:             {error, Err5, ErrReply5}
11751:     end.
11752: 
11753: -ifndef(megaco_hipe_special).
11754: otp6865e2_mgc_verify_notify_req_fun(Cid, ExtraInfo, RequireAck) ->
11755:     fun(Req) -> 
11756: 	    otp6865e2_mgc_verify_notify_req(Req, Cid, ExtraInfo, RequireAck) 
11757:     end.
11758: -endif.
11759: 
11760: otp6865e2_mgc_verify_notify_req(
11761:   {handle_trans_request, _, ?VERSION, [AR], ExtraInfo}, 
11762:   Cid, ExtraInfo, RequireAck) ->
11763:     (catch otp6865e2_mgc_do_verify_notify_req(AR, Cid, RequireAck));
11764: otp6865e2_mgc_verify_notify_req(Crap, _Cid, ExtraInfo, _RequireAck) ->
11765:     ED       = cre_ErrDesc({Crap, ExtraInfo}),
11766:     ErrReply = {discard_ack, ED},
11767:     {error, {Crap, ExtraInfo}, ErrReply}.
11768:     
11769: otp6865e2_mgc_do_verify_notify_req(AR, Cid, RequireAck) ->
11770:     io:format("otp6865e2_mgc_do_verify_notify_req -> entry with"
11771: 	      "~n   AR:         ~p"
11772: 	      "~n   Cid:        ~p"
11773: 	      "~n   RequireAck: ~p"
11774: 	      "~n", [AR, Cid, RequireAck]),
11775:     {ContextID, CR} =
11776: 	case AR of
11777: 	    #'ActionRequest'{contextId       = CtxID, 
11778: 			     commandRequests = [CmdReq]} when (CtxID == Cid) ->
11779: 		{CtxID, CmdReq};
11780: 	    _ ->
11781:                 Err1      = {invalid_action_request, AR},
11782:                 ED1       = cre_ErrDesc(AR),
11783:                 ErrReply1 = {discard_ack, ED1},
11784:                 throw({error, Err1, ErrReply1})
11785:         end,
11786:     Cmd =
11787: 	case CR of
11788: 	    #'CommandRequest'{command = Command} ->
11789: 		Command;
11790: 	    _ ->
11791:                 Err2      = {invalid_command_request, CR},
11792:                 ED2       = cre_ErrDesc(CR),
11793:                 ErrReply2 = {discard_ack, ED2},
11794:                 throw({error, Err2, ErrReply2})
11795:         end,
11796:     NR =
11797:         case Cmd of
11798: 	    {notifyReq, NotifReq} ->
11799: 		NotifReq;
11800: 	    _ ->
11801:                 Err3      = {invalid_command, Cmd},
11802:                 ED3       = cre_ErrDesc(Cmd),
11803:                 ErrReply3 = {discard_ack, ED3},
11804:                 throw({error, Err3, ErrReply3})
11805:         end,
11806:     {Tid, OED} =
11807:         case NR of
11808:             #'NotifyRequest'{terminationID            = [TermID],
11809:                              observedEventsDescriptor = ObsEvsDesc,
11810:                              errorDescriptor          = asn1_NOVALUE} ->
11811:                 {TermID, ObsEvsDesc};
11812:             _ ->
11813:                 Err4      = {invalid_NR, NR},
11814:                 ED4       = cre_ErrDesc(NR),
11815:                 ErrReply4 = {discard_ack, ED4},
11816:                 throw({error, Err4, ErrReply4})
11817:         end,
11818:     OE =
11819: 	case OED of
11820: 	    #'ObservedEventsDescriptor'{observedEventLst = [ObsEvLst]} ->
11821: 		ObsEvLst;
11822:             _ ->
11823:                 Err5      = {invalid_OED, OED},
11824:                 ED5       = cre_ErrDesc(NR),
11825:                 ErrReply5 = {discard_ack, ED5},
11826:                 throw({error, Err5, ErrReply5})
11827:         end,
11828:     case OE of
11829: 	#'ObservedEvent'{eventName = "al/of"} ->
11830:             Replies = [otp6865e2_mgc_notify_reply_ar(ContextID, Tid)],
11831:             Reply   = 
11832: 		case RequireAck of
11833: 		    true ->
11834: 			{{handle_ack, otp6865e2}, Replies};
11835: 		    false ->
11836: 			{discard_ack, Replies}
11837: 		end,
11838:             {ok, AR, Reply};
11839:         _ ->
11840:             Err6      = {invalid_OE, OE},
11841:             ED6       = cre_ErrDesc(OE),
11842:             ErrReply6 = {discard_ack, ED6},
11843:             {error, Err6, ErrReply6}
11844:     end.
11845: 
11846: %% Ack verification
11847: -ifndef(megaco_hipe_special).
11848: otp6865e2_mgc_verify_reply_ack_fun(ExtraInfo) ->
11849:     fun(M) -> 
11850: 	    otp6865e2_mgc_verify_reply_ack(M, ExtraInfo) 
11851:     end.
11852: -endif.
11853: 
11854: otp6865e2_mgc_verify_reply_ack(
11855:   {handle_trans_ack, _, ?VERSION, ok, otp6865e2, ExtraInfo}, ExtraInfo) ->
11856:     io:format("otp6865e2_mgc_verify_reply_ack -> ok~n", []),
11857:     {ok, ok, ok};
11858: otp6865e2_mgc_verify_reply_ack(
11859:   {handle_trans_ack, _, ?VERSION, AS, AD, ExtraInfo1} = Crap, ExtraInfo2) ->
11860:     io:format("otp6865e2_mgc_verify_reply_ack -> incorrect ack-status:"
11861: 	      "~n   AS:         ~p"
11862: 	      "~n   AD:         ~p"
11863: 	      "~n   ExtraInfo1: ~p"
11864: 	      "~n   ExtraInfo2: ~p"
11865: 	      "~n", [AS, AD, ExtraInfo1, ExtraInfo2]),
11866:     ED       = cre_ErrDesc({invalid_ack_status, 
11867: 			    {AS, AD, ExtraInfo1, ExtraInfo2}}),
11868:     ErrReply = {discard_ack, ED},
11869:     {error, Crap, ErrReply};
11870: otp6865e2_mgc_verify_reply_ack(Crap, ExtraInfo) ->
11871:     io:format("otp6865e2_mgc_verify_reply_ack -> invalid ack:"
11872: 	      "~n   Crap:      ~p"
11873: 	      "~n   ExtraInfo: ~p"
11874: 	      "~n", [Crap, ExtraInfo]),
11875:     ED       = cre_ErrDesc({Crap, ExtraInfo}),
11876:     ErrReply = {discard_ack, ED},
11877:     {error, Crap, ErrReply}.
11878: 
11879: 
11880: %% Notify reply verification
11881: -ifndef(megaco_hipe_special).
11882: otp6865e2_mgc_verify_notify_reply_fun(ExtraInfo) ->
11883:     fun(Rep) -> 
11884: 	    otp6865e2_mgc_verify_notify_reply(Rep, ExtraInfo) 
11885:     end.
11886: -endif.
11887: 	     
11888: otp6865e2_mgc_verify_notify_reply(
11889:   {handle_trans_reply, _CH, ?VERSION, {ok, [AR]}, _, ExtraInfo}, ExtraInfo) ->
11890:     io:format("otp6865e2_mgc_verify_notify_reply -> ok"
11891: 	      "~n   AR:        ~p"
11892: 	      "~n   ExtraInfo: ~p"
11893: 	      "~n", [AR, ExtraInfo]),
11894:     {ok, AR, ok};
11895: otp6865e2_mgc_verify_notify_reply(Else, ExtraInfo) ->
11896:     io:format("otp6865e2_mgc_verify_notify_reply -> received unknown event"
11897: 	      "~n   Else:      ~p"
11898: 	      "~n   ExtraInfo: ~p"
11899: 	      "~n", [Else, ExtraInfo]),
11900:     {error, {Else, ExtraInfo}, ok}.

11907: 	      "~n   CH: ~p"
11908: 	      "~n   R:  ~p"
11909: 	      "~n", [CH, R]),
11910:     {ok, CH, ok};
11911: otp6865e2_mgc_verify_handle_disconnect(Else) ->
11912:     io:format("otp6865e2_mgc_verify_handle_disconnect -> unknown"
11913: 	      "~n   Else: ~p~n", [Else]),
11914:     {error, Else, ok}.

11917: otp6865e2_mgc_service_change_reply_ar(Mid, Cid) ->
11918:     SCRP  = cre_serviceChangeResParm(Mid),
11919:     SCRes = cre_serviceChangeResult(SCRP),
11920:     Root  = #megaco_term_id{id = ["root"]},
11921:     SCR   = cre_serviceChangeReply([Root], SCRes),
11922:     CR    = cre_cmdReply(SCR),
11923:     cre_actionReply(Cid, [CR]).
11924: 
11925: otp6865e2_mgc_notify_reply_ar(Cid, TermId) ->
11926:     NR    = cre_notifyReply([TermId]),
11927:     CR    = cre_cmdReply(NR),
11928:     cre_actionReply(Cid, [CR]).
11929: 
11930: otp6865e2_mgc_notify_request_ar(Rid, Tid, Cid) ->
11931:     TT      = cre_timeNotation("19990729", "22000000"),
11932:     Ev      = cre_obsEvent("al/of", TT),
11933:     EvsDesc = cre_obsEvsDesc(Rid, [Ev]),
11934:     NR      = cre_notifyReq([Tid], EvsDesc),
11935:     CMD     = cre_command(NR),
11936:     CR      = cre_cmdReq(CMD),
11937:     cre_actionReq(Cid, [CR]).
11938:

11945: 	{?MODULE, decode_msg, [Mod, Conf]}).
11946: -define(otp6865e2_mg_encode_msg_fun(Mod, Conf),
11947: 	{?MODULE, encode_msg, [Mod, Conf]}).
11948: -define(otp6865e2_mg_verify_service_change_rep_msg_fun(),
11949: 	{?MODULE, otp6865e2_mg_verify_service_change_rep_msg, []}).
11950: -define(otp6865e2_mg_verify_notify_rep_msg_fun(TermId, TransId, ReqId, CtxId, AckRequired),
11951: 	{?MODULE, otp6865e2_mg_verify_notify_rep_msg, [TermId, TransId, ReqId, CtxId, AckRequired]}).
11952: -define(otp6865e2_mg_verify_notify_req_msg_fun(),
11953: 	{?MODULE, otp6865e2_mg_verify_notify_req_msg, []}).
11954: -else.
11955: -define(otp6865e2_mg_decode_msg_fun(Mod, Conf),
11956: 	otp6865e2_mg_decode_msg_fun(Mod, Conf)).
11957: -define(otp6865e2_mg_encode_msg_fun(Mod, Conf),
11958: 	otp6865e2_mg_encode_msg_fun(Mod, Conf)).
11959: -define(otp6865e2_mg_verify_service_change_rep_msg_fun(),
11960: 	otp6865e2_mg_verify_service_change_rep_msg_fun()).
11961: -define(otp6865e2_mg_verify_notify_rep_msg_fun(TermId, TransId, ReqId, CtxId, AckRequired),
11962: 	otp6865e2_mg_verify_notify_rep_msg_fun(TermId, TransId, ReqId, CtxId, AckRequired)).
11963: -define(otp6865e2_mg_verify_notify_req_msg_fun(),
11964: 	otp6865e2_mg_verify_notify_req_msg_fun()).
11965: -endif.

11967: otp6865e2_mg_event_sequence(text, tcp) ->
11968:     DecodeFun = ?otp6865e2_mg_decode_msg_fun(megaco_pretty_text_encoder, []),
11969:     EncodeFun = ?otp6865e2_mg_encode_msg_fun(megaco_pretty_text_encoder, []),
11970:     Mid       = {deviceName,"mg"},
11971:     ServiceChangeReq = otp6865e2_mg_service_change_request_msg(Mid, 1, 0),
11972:     ScrVerifyFun = ?otp6865e2_mg_verify_service_change_rep_msg_fun(),
11973:     TermId1 = #megaco_term_id{id = ["00000000","00000000","01101101"]},
11974:     TermId2 = #megaco_term_id{id = ["00000000","00000000","10010010"]},
11975:     NotifyReq1 = 
11976: 	otp6865e2_mg_notify_request_msg(Mid, TermId1, 2, 1, 1),
11977:     NrVerifyFun1 = 
11978: 	?otp6865e2_mg_verify_notify_rep_msg_fun(TermId1, 2, 1, 1, false),
11979:     NotifyReq2 = 
11980: 	otp6865e2_mg_notify_request_msg(Mid, TermId2, 3, 2, 2),
11981:     NrVerifyFun2 = 
11982: 	?otp6865e2_mg_verify_notify_rep_msg_fun(TermId2, 3, 2, 2, true),
11983:     TransAck = otp6865e2_mg_trans_ack_msg(Mid, 3),
11984:     NotifyReqVerifyFun  = ?otp6865e2_mg_verify_notify_req_msg_fun(),
11985:     NotifyReply = otp6865e2_mg_notify_reply_msg(Mid, 1, 0, TermId1),
11986:     EvSeq = [{debug,  true},
11987:              {decode, DecodeFun},
11988:              {encode, EncodeFun},
11989:              {connect, 2944},
11990: 	     
11991:              {send, "service-change-request", ServiceChangeReq},
11992:              {expect_receive, "service-change-reply", {ScrVerifyFun, 10000}},
11993: 
11994: 	     %% the original setting for reply timer is 2000
11995:              {send, "notify request 1", NotifyReq1},
11996:              {expect_receive, "notify-reply 1", {NrVerifyFun1, 2500}},
11997: 	     {sleep, 1000}, 
11998:              {send, "notify request 2", NotifyReq2},
11999:              {expect_receive, "notify-reply 2", {NrVerifyFun2, 2500}},
12000: 	     {sleep, 100}, 
12001:              {send, "transacktion-ack", TransAck},
12002:              {expect_receive, "notify-request", {NotifyReqVerifyFun, 2500}},
12003: 	     {sleep, 100}, 
12004:              {send, "notify-reply", NotifyReply},
12005: 
12006:              {expect_nothing, 5000},
12007:              disconnect
12008:             ],
12009:     EvSeq.

12032: otp6865e2_mg_verify_service_change_rep_msg(#'MegacoMessage'{mess = Mess} = M) ->
12033:     Body = 
12034: 	case Mess of 
12035: 	    #'Message'{version     = _V,
12036:                        mId         = _MgMid,
12037:                        messageBody = MsgBody} ->
12038: 		MsgBody;
12039: 	    _ ->
12040: 		throw({error, {invalid_Message, Mess}})
12041: 	end,
12042:     Trans = 
12043: 	case Body of
12044:             {transactions, [Transactions]} ->
12045: 		Transactions;
12046: 	    _ ->
12047: 		throw({error, {invalid_messageBody, Body}})
12048: 	end,
12049:     TR = 
12050: 	case Trans of
12051:             {transactionReply, TransReply} ->
12052: 		TransReply;
12053: 	    _ ->
12054: 		throw({error, {invalid_transactions, Trans}})
12055: 	end,
12056:     TRes = 
12057: 	case TR of
12058:             #'TransactionReply'{transactionId = _Tid,
12059:                                 immAckRequired = asn1_NOVALUE,
12060:                                 transactionResult = TransRes} ->
12061: 		TransRes;
12062: 	    _ ->
12063: 		throw({error, {invalid_transactionReply, TR}})
12064: 	end,
12065:     AR = 
12066: 	case TRes of
12067:             {actionReplies, [ActRes]} ->
12068: 		ActRes;
12069: 	    _ ->
12070: 		throw({error, {invalid_transactionResult, TRes}})
12071: 	end,
12072:     CR = 
12073: 	case AR of
12074:             #'ActionReply'{contextId       = _Cid,
12075:                            errorDescriptor = asn1_NOVALUE,
12076:                            contextReply    = _CtxReq,
12077:                            commandReply    = [CmdRep]} ->
12078: 		CmdRep;
12079: 	    _ ->
12080: 		throw({error, {invalid_actionReplies, AR}})
12081: 	end,
12082:     SCR = 
12083: 	case CR of
12084:             {serviceChangeReply, ServChRep} ->
12085: 		ServChRep;
12086: 	    _ ->
12087: 		throw({error, {invalid_commandReply, CR}})
12088: 	end,
12089:     SCRes = 
12090: 	case SCR of
12091:             #'ServiceChangeReply'{terminationID       = _TermID,
12092:                                   serviceChangeResult = ServChRes} ->
12093: 		ServChRes;
12094: 	    _ ->
12095: 		throw({error, {invalid_serviceChangeReply, SCR}})
12096: 	end,
12097:     SCRP = 
12098: 	case SCRes of
12099:             {serviceChangeResParms, Parms} ->
12100: 		Parms;
12101: 	    _ ->
12102: 		throw({error, {invalid_serviceChangeResult, SCRes}})
12103: 	end,
12104:     case SCRP of
12105: 	#'ServiceChangeResParm'{serviceChangeMgcId = _MgcMid} ->
12106:             {ok, M};
12107: 	_ ->
12108: 	    {error, {invalid_serviceChangeResParms, SCRP}}
12109:     end;
12110: otp6865e2_mg_verify_service_change_rep_msg(Crap) ->
12111:     {error, {invalid_message, Crap}}.
12112: 
12113: -ifndef(megaco_hipe_special).
12114: otp6865e2_mg_verify_notify_rep_msg_fun(TermId, TransId, Rid, Cid, 
12115: 				       AckRequired) ->
12116:     fun(Msg) -> 
12117: 	    (catch otp6865e2_mg_verify_notify_rep_msg(Msg, 
12118: 						      TermId, TransId, 
12119: 						      Rid, Cid,
12120: 						      AckRequired)) 
12121:     end.
12122: -endif.

12124: otp6865e2_mg_verify_notify_rep_msg(#'MegacoMessage'{mess = Mess} = M,
12125: 				   TermId, TransId, Rid, Cid, AckRequired) ->
12126:     io:format("otp6865e2_mg_verify_notify_rep_msg -> entry with"
12127: 	      "~n   M:       ~p"
12128: 	      "~n   TermId:  ~p"
12129: 	      "~n   TransId: ~p"
12130: 	      "~n   Rid:     ~p"
12131: 	      "~n   Cid:     ~p"
12132: 	      "~n", [M, TermId, TransId, Rid, Cid]),
12133:     Body = 
12134: 	case Mess of 
12135: 	    #'Message'{version     = ?VERSION,
12136:                        mId         = _Mid,
12137:                        messageBody = MsgBody} ->
12138: 		MsgBody;
12139: 	    _ ->
12140: 		throw({error, {invalid_Message, Mess}})
12141: 	end,
12142:     io:format("otp6865e2_mg_verify_notify_rep_msg -> "
12143: 	      "~n   Body: ~p"
12144: 	      "~n", [Body]),
12145:     Trans = 
12146: 	case Body of
12147:             {transactions, [Transactions]} ->
12148: 		Transactions;
12149: 	    _ ->
12150: 		throw({error, {invalid_messageBody, Body}})
12151: 	end,
12152:     io:format("otp6865e2_mg_verify_notify_rep_msg -> "
12153: 	      "~n   Trans: ~p"
12154: 	      "~n", [Trans]),
12155:     TR = 
12156: 	case Trans of
12157:             {transactionReply, TransReply} ->
12158: 		TransReply;
12159: 	    _ ->
12160: 		throw({error, {invalid_transactions, Trans}})
12161: 	end,
12162:     io:format("otp6865e2_mg_verify_notify_rep_msg -> "
12163: 	      "~n   TR: ~p"
12164: 	      "~n", [TR]),
12165:     TRes = 
12166: 	case TR of
12167:             #'TransactionReply'{transactionId     = TransId,
12168:                                 immAckRequired    = asn1_NOVALUE,
12169:                                 transactionResult = TransRes} when (AckRequired == false) ->
12170: 		TransRes;
12171:             #'TransactionReply'{transactionId     = TransId,
12172:                                 immAckRequired    = 'NULL',
12173:                                 transactionResult = TransRes} when (AckRequired == true) ->
12174: 		TransRes;
12175: 	    _ ->
12176: 		throw({error, {invalid_transactionReply, TR}})
12177: 	end,
12178:     io:format("otp6865e2_mg_verify_notify_rep_msg -> "
12179: 	      "~n   TRes: ~p"
12180: 	      "~n", [TRes]),
12181:     AR = 
12182: 	case TRes of
12183:             {actionReplies, [ActRes]} ->
12184: 		ActRes;
12185: 	    _ ->
12186: 		throw({error, {invalid_transactionResult, TRes}})
12187: 	end,
12188:     io:format("otp6865e2_mg_verify_notify_rep_msg -> "
12189: 	      "~n   AR: ~p"
12190: 	      "~n", [AR]),
12191:     CR = 
12192: 	case AR of
12193:             #'ActionReply'{contextId       = Cid,
12194:                            errorDescriptor = asn1_NOVALUE,
12195:                            contextReply    = _CtxReq,
12196:                            commandReply    = [CmdRep]} ->
12197: 		CmdRep;
12198: 	    _ ->
12199: 		throw({error, {invalid_actionReplies, AR}})
12200: 	end,
12201:     NR = 
12202: 	case CR of
12203:             {notifyReply, NotifyReply} ->
12204: 		NotifyReply;
12205: 	    _ ->
12206: 		throw({error, {invalid_commandReply, CR}})
12207: 	end,
12208:     case NR of
12209: 	#'NotifyReply'{terminationID   = [TermId],
12210: 		       errorDescriptor = asn1_NOVALUE} ->
12211: 	    {ok, M};
12212: 	_ ->
12213: 	    {error, {invalid_notifyReply, NR}}
12214:     end;
12215: otp6865e2_mg_verify_notify_rep_msg(Crap, _TermId, _TransId, _Rid, _Cid, _AckRequired) ->
12216:     {error, {invalid_message, Crap}}.
12217:

12219: otp6865e2_mg_verify_notify_req_msg_fun() ->
12220:     fun(M) ->
12221: 	    otp6865e2_mg_verify_notify_req_msg(M)
12222:     end.
12223: -endif.

12225: otp6865e2_mg_verify_notify_req_msg(#'MegacoMessage'{mess = Mess} = M) -> 
12226:     io:format("otp6865e2_mg_verify_notify_req_msg -> entry with"
12227: 	      "~n   M:       ~p"
12228: 	      "~n", [M]),
12229:     Body = 
12230: 	case Mess of 
12231: 	    #'Message'{version     = ?VERSION,
12232:                        mId         = _Mid,
12233:                        messageBody = MsgBody} ->
12234: 		MsgBody;
12235: 	    _ ->
12236: 		throw({error, {invalid_Message, Mess}})
12237: 	end,
12238:     io:format("otp6865e2_mg_verify_notify_req_msg -> "
12239: 	      "~n   Body: ~p"
12240: 	      "~n", [Body]),
12241:     Trans = 
12242: 	case Body of
12243:             {transactions, [Transactions]} ->
12244: 		Transactions;
12245: 	    _ ->
12246: 		throw({error, {invalid_messageBody, Body}})
12247: 	end,
12248:     io:format("otp6865e2_mg_verify_notify_req_msg -> "
12249: 	      "~n   Trans: ~p"
12250: 	      "~n", [Trans]),
12251:     TR = 
12252: 	case Trans of
12253:             {transactionRequest, TransRequest} ->
12254: 		TransRequest;
12255: 	    _ ->
12256: 		throw({error, {invalid_transactions, Trans}})
12257: 	end,
12258:     io:format("otp6865e2_mg_verify_notify_req_msg -> "
12259: 	      "~n   TR: ~p"
12260: 	      "~n", [TR]),
12261:     AR = 
12262: 	case TR of
12263:             #'TransactionRequest'{transactionId = _TransId,
12264: 				  actions       = [ActReq]} ->
12265: 		ActReq;
12266: 	    _ ->
12267: 		throw({error, {invalid_transactionRequest, TR}})
12268: 	end,
12269:     io:format("otp6865e2_mg_verify_notify_req_msg -> "
12270: 	      "~n   AR: ~p"
12271: 	      "~n", [AR]),
12272:     CR = 
12273: 	case AR of
12274: 	    #'ActionRequest'{contextId       = _Cid,
12275: 			     commandRequests = [CmdReq]} ->
12276: 		CmdReq;
12277: 	    _ ->
12278: 		throw({error, {invalid_actions, AR}})
12279: 	end,
12280:     io:format("otp6865e2_mg_verify_notify_req_msg -> "
12281: 	      "~n   CR: ~p"
12282: 	      "~n", [CR]),
12283:     Cmd = 
12284: 	case CR of
12285: 	    #'CommandRequest'{command = Command} ->
12286: 		Command;
12287: 	    _ ->
12288: 		throw({error, {invalid_commandRequests, CR}})
12289: 	end,
12290:     io:format("otp6865e2_mg_verify_notify_req_msg -> "
12291: 	      "~n   Cmd: ~p"
12292: 	      "~n", [Cmd]),
12293:     NR = 
12294: 	case Cmd of
12295: 	    {notifyReq, NotifReq} ->
12296: 		NotifReq;
12297: 	    _ ->
12298: 		throw({error, {invalid_command, Cmd}})
12299: 	end,
12300:     io:format("otp6865e2_mg_verify_notify_req_msg -> "
12301: 	      "~n   NR: ~p"
12302: 	      "~n", [NR]),
12303:     OED = 
12304: 	case NR of
12305: 	    #'NotifyRequest'{terminationID            = [_TermId],
12306: 			     observedEventsDescriptor = ObsEvsDesc,
12307: 			     errorDescriptor          = asn1_NOVALUE} ->
12308: 		ObsEvsDesc;
12309: 	    _ ->
12310: 		throw({error, {invalid_notifyReq, NR}})
12311: 	end,
12312:     io:format("otp6865e2_mg_verify_notify_req_msg -> "
12313: 	      "~n   OED: ~p"
12314: 	      "~n", [OED]),
12315:     OE = 
12316: 	case OED of 
12317: 	    #'ObservedEventsDescriptor'{observedEventLst = [ObsEvLst]} ->
12318: 		ObsEvLst;
12319: 	    _ ->
12320: 		throw({error, {invalid_observedEventsDescriptor, OED}})
12321: 	end,
12322:     io:format("otp6865e2_mg_verify_notify_req_msg -> "
12323: 	      "~n   OE: ~p"
12324: 	      "~n", [OE]),
12325:     case OE of
12326: 	#'ObservedEvent'{eventName = "al/of"} ->
12327: 	    io:format("otp6865e2_mg_verify_notify_req_msg -> verifyed"
12328: 		      "~n", []),
12329: 	    {ok, M};
12330: 	_ ->
12331: 	    throw({error, {invalid_observedEventLst, OE}})
12332:     end;
12333: otp6865e2_mg_verify_notify_req_msg(M) ->
12334:     {error, {invalid_message, M}}.
12335: 
12336: otp6865e2_mg_service_change_request_ar(_Mid, Cid) ->
12337:     Prof  = cre_serviceChangeProf("resgw", 1),
12338:     SCP   = cre_serviceChangeParm(restart, ["901 mg col boot"], Prof),
12339:     Root  = #megaco_term_id{id = ["root"]},
12340:     SCR   = cre_serviceChangeReq([Root], SCP),
12341:     CMD   = cre_command(SCR),
12342:     CR    = cre_cmdReq(CMD),
12343:     cre_actionReq(Cid, [CR]).
12344: 
12345: otp6865e2_mg_service_change_request_msg(Mid, TransId, Cid) ->
12346:     AR    = otp6865e2_mg_service_change_request_ar(Mid, Cid),
12347:     TR    = cre_transReq(TransId, [AR]),
12348:     Trans = cre_transaction(TR),
12349:     Mess  = cre_message(?VERSION, Mid, cre_transactions([Trans])),
12350:     cre_megacoMessage(Mess).
12351: 
12352: otp6865e2_mg_notify_request_ar(Rid, Tid, Cid) ->
12353:     TT      = cre_timeNotation("19990729", "22000000"),
12354:     Ev      = cre_obsEvent("al/of", TT),
12355:     EvsDesc = cre_obsEvsDesc(Rid, [Ev]),
12356:     NR      = cre_notifyReq([Tid], EvsDesc),
12357:     CMD     = cre_command(NR),
12358:     CR      = cre_cmdReq(CMD),
12359:     cre_actionReq(Cid, [CR]).
12360: 
12361: otp6865e2_mg_notify_request_msg(Mid, TermId, TransId, Rid, Cid) ->
12362:     AR      = otp6865e2_mg_notify_request_ar(Rid, TermId, Cid),
12363:     TR      = cre_transReq(TransId, [AR]),
12364:     Trans   = cre_transaction(TR),
12365:     Mess    = cre_message(?VERSION, Mid, cre_transactions([Trans])),
12366:     cre_megacoMessage(Mess).
12367: 
12368: otp6865e2_mg_notify_reply_msg(Mid, TransId, Cid, TermId) ->
12369:     NR    = cre_notifyReply([TermId]),
12370:     CR    = cre_cmdReply(NR), 
12371:     AR    = cre_actionReply(Cid, [CR]),
12372:     TRes  = {actionReplies, [AR]},
12373:     TR    = cre_transReply(TransId, TRes),
12374:     Trans = cre_transaction(TR),
12375:     Mess  = cre_message(?VERSION, Mid, cre_transactions([Trans])),
12376:     cre_megacoMessage(Mess).
12377: 
12378: otp6865e2_mg_trans_ack_msg(Mid, TransId) ->
12379:     TR    = cre_transRespAck(cre_transAck(TransId)),
12380:     Trans = cre_transaction(TR),
12381:     Mess  = cre_message(?VERSION, Mid, cre_transactions([Trans])),
12382:     cre_megacoMessage(Mess).

12387: otp_7189(suite) ->
12388:     [];
12389: otp_7189(doc) ->
12390:     "...";
12391: otp_7189(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
12392:     Pre = fun() ->
12393:                   MgcNode = make_node_name(mgc),
12394:                   MgNode  = make_node_name(mg),
12395:                   d("start nodes: "
12396:                     "~n      MgcNode: ~p"
12397:                     "~n      MgNode:  ~p", 
12398:                     [MgcNode, MgNode]),
12399:                   Nodes = [MgcNode, MgNode], 
12400:                   ok = ?START_NODES(Nodes, true),
12401:                   Nodes
12402:           end,
12403:     Case = fun(Nodes) -> do_otp_7189(Config, Nodes) end,
12404:     Post = fun(Nodes) ->
12405:                    d("stop nodes"),
12406:                    ?STOP_NODES(lists:reverse(Nodes))
12407:            end,
12408:     try_tc(otp_7189, Pre, Case, Post).
12409: 
12410: do_otp_7189(Config,
12411:             [MgcNode, MgNode]) ->
12412:     d("[MGC] start the simulator "),
12413:     {ok, Mgc} = megaco_test_megaco_generator:start_link("MGC", MgcNode),
12414: 
12415:     d("[MGC] create the event sequence"),
12416:     MgcEvSeq = otp_7189_mgc_event_sequence(Config,
12417:                                            text, tcp),
12418: 
12419:     i("wait some time before starting the MGC simulation"),
12420:     sleep(1000),
12421: 
12422:     d("[MGC] start the simulation"),
12423:     {ok, MgcId} = megaco_test_megaco_generator:exec(Mgc, MgcEvSeq),
12424: 
12425:     %% i("wait some time before starting the MG simulator"),
12426:     %% sleep(1000),
12427: 
12428:     i("await MGC ready announcement"),
12429:     receive
12430:         announce_mgc ->
12431:             i("received MGC ready announcement"),
12432:             ok
12433:     end,
12434: 
12435:     d("[MG] start the simulator (generator)"),
12436:     {ok, Mg} = megaco_test_tcp_generator:start_link("MG", MgNode),
12437: 
12438:     d("[MG] create the event sequence"),
12439:     MgEvSeq = otp_7189_mg_event_sequence(text, tcp),
12440: 
12441:     i("wait some time before starting the MG simulation"),
12442:     sleep(1000),
12443: 
12444:     d("[MG] start the simulation"),
12445:     {ok, MgId} = megaco_test_tcp_generator:exec(Mg, MgEvSeq),
12446: 
12447:     d("await the generator reply(s)"),
12448:     await_completion([MgcId, MgId], 60000),
12449: 
12450:     %% Tell Mgc to stop
12451:     i("[MGC] stop generator"),
12452:     megaco_test_megaco_generator:stop(Mgc),
12453: 
12454:     %% Tell Mg to stop
12455:     i("[MG] stop generator"),
12456:     megaco_test_tcp_generator:stop(Mg),
12457: 
12458:     i("done", []),
12459:     ok.

12485: otp_7189_mgc_event_sequence(Config,
12486:                             text, tcp) ->
12487:     CTRL = self(),
12488:     Mid = {deviceName,"ctrl"},
12489:     RI = [
12490:           {port,             2944},
12491:           {encoding_module,  megaco_pretty_text_encoder},
12492:           {encoding_config,  []},
12493:           {transport_module, megaco_tcp}
12494:          ],
12495:     Tid = #megaco_term_id{id = ["00000000","00000000","01101101"]},
12496:     NotifyReq     = [otp_7189_mgc_notify_req_ar(1, Tid, 1)],
12497:     ConnectVerify = ?otp_7189_mgc_verify_handle_connect_fun(),
12498:     ScrVerify     = ?otp_7189_mgc_verify_service_change_req_fun(Mid),
12499:     TransReplyVerify = ?otp_7189_mgc_verify_handle_trans_rep_fun(),
12500:     PendingCountersVerify1 = 
12501: 	fun([{Counter, 1}]) ->
12502: 		   io:format("received expected recv pending counter:"
12503: 			     "~n   Counter: ~p"
12504: 			     "~n", [Counter]),
12505: 		ok;
12506: 	   (BadCounters) ->
12507: 		io:format("ERROR: "
12508: 			  "received unexpected number of "
12509: 			  "recv pending counters "
12510: 			  "(expected one with counter value 1):"
12511: 			  "~n   BadCounters: ~p"
12512: 			  "~n", [BadCounters]),
12513: 		{error, {invalid_pending_counters, BadCounters}}
12514: 	end,
12515:     PendingCountersVerify2 = 
12516: 	fun([]) ->
12517: 		io:format("received expected number of recv pending counters (none)"
12518: 			  "~n", []),
12519: 		ok;
12520: 	   (BadCounters) ->
12521: 		io:format("ERROR: "
12522: 			  "received unexpected number of "
12523: 			  "recv pending counters "
12524: 			  "(expected none):"
12525: 			  "~n   BadCounters: ~p"
12526: 			  "~n", [BadCounters]),
12527: 		{error, {invalid_pending_counters, BadCounters}}
12528: 	end,
12529:     EvSeq = [
12530:              {debug, true},
12531: 	     {megaco_trace, disable},
12532: 	     ?MEGACO_TRACE(Config, max), % {megaco_trace, max},
12533:              megaco_start,
12534:              {megaco_start_user, Mid, RI, []},
12535: 	     {megaco_update_user_info, recv_pending_limit, 10},
12536: 
12537: 	     {megaco_update_user_info, long_request_timer, timer:seconds(10)},
12538: 	     {megaco_user_info, all},
12539:              start_transport,
12540:              listen,
12541: 
12542:              %% ANNOUNCE READY
12543:              {trigger, fun() -> CTRL ! announce_mgc end}, 
12544: 
12545:              {megaco_callback, handle_connect, ConnectVerify},
12546: 	     {megaco_conn_info, all},
12547:              {megaco_callback, handle_trans_request, ScrVerify},
12548: 	     {sleep, 500}, 
12549:              {megaco_cast, NotifyReq, []},
12550: 
12551: 	     %% Wait for 5 seconds to make sure we are on track
12552:              {megaco_callback, nocall, timer:seconds(5)},
12553: 	     {megaco_system_info, recv_pending_counters, PendingCountersVerify1}, 
12554: 	     
12555: 	     %% Now wait for the timeout to hit
12556: 	     {megaco_callback, handle_trans_reply, TransReplyVerify}, 
12557: 	     {megaco_system_info, recv_pending_counters, PendingCountersVerify2}, 
12558: 
12559:              megaco_stop_user,
12560:              megaco_stop
12561:             ],
12562:     EvSeq.
