12584: otp_7189_mgc_verify_service_change_req(
12585:   {handle_trans_request, _, ?VERSION, [AR]}, Mid) ->
12586:     io:format("otp_7189_mgc_verify_service_change_req -> ok"
12587: 	      "~n   AR: ~p~n", [AR]),
12588:     case AR of
12589: 	#'ActionRequest'{commandRequests = [CR]} ->
12590: 	    case CR of
12591: 		#'CommandRequest'{command = Cmd} ->
12592: 		    case Cmd of
12593: 			{serviceChangeReq, 
12594: 			 #'ServiceChangeRequest'{terminationID = [Tid],
12595: 						 serviceChangeParms = Parms}} ->
12596: 			    case Tid of
12597: 				#megaco_term_id{contains_wildcards = false, 
12598: 						id = ["root"]} ->
12599: 				    case Parms of
12600: 					#'ServiceChangeParm'{
12601: 						 serviceChangeMethod = restart,
12602: 						 serviceChangeReason = [[$9,$0,$1|_]]} ->
12603: 					    Reply = 
12604: 						{discard_ack, 
12605: 						 [otp_7189_mgc_service_change_reply_ar(Mid, 1)]},
12606: 					    {ok, AR, Reply};
12607: 					_ ->
12608: 					    Err = {invalid_SCP, Parms},
12609: 					    ED = otp_7189_err_desc(Parms),
12610: 					    ErrReply = {discard_ack, ED},
12611: 					    {error, Err, ErrReply}
12612: 				    end;
12613: 				_ ->
12614: 				    Err = {invalid_termination_id, Tid},
12615: 				    ED = otp_7189_err_desc(Tid),
12616: 				    ErrReply = {discard_ack, ED},
12617: 				    {error, Err, ErrReply}
12618: 			    end;
12619: 			_ ->
12620: 			    Err = {invalid_command, Cmd},
12621: 			    ED = otp_7189_err_desc(Cmd),
12622: 			    ErrReply = {discard_ack, ED},
12623: 			    {error, Err, ErrReply}
12624: 		    end;
12625: 		_ ->
12626: 		    Err = {invalid_command_request, CR},
12627: 		    ED = otp_7189_err_desc(CR),
12628: 		    ErrReply = {discard_ack, ED},
12629: 		    {error, Err, ErrReply}
12630: 	    end;
12631: 	_ ->
12632: 	    Err = {invalid_action_request, AR},
12633: 	    ED = otp_7189_err_desc(AR),
12634: 	    ErrReply = {discard_ack, ED},
12635: 	    {error, Err, ErrReply}
12636:     end;
12637: otp_7189_mgc_verify_service_change_req(Else, _Mid) ->
12638:     io:format("otp_7189_mgc_verify_service_change_req -> unknown"
12639: 	      "~n   Else: ~p~n", [Else]),
12640:     ED       = otp_7189_err_desc(Else),
12641:     ErrReply = {discard_ack, ED},
12642:     {error, Else, ErrReply}.
12643: 
12644: otp_7189_mgc_notify_req_ar(Rid, Tid, Cid) ->
12645:     TT      = cre_timeNotation("19990729", "22000000"),
12646:     Ev      = cre_obsEvent("al/of", TT),
12647:     EvsDesc = cre_obsEvsDesc(Rid, [Ev]),
12648:     NR      = cre_notifyReq([Tid], EvsDesc),
12649:     CMD     = cre_command(NR),
12650:     CR      = cre_cmdReq(CMD),
12651:     cre_actionReq(Cid, [CR]).
12652: 
12653: otp_7189_mgc_service_change_reply_ar(Mid, Cid) ->
12654:     SCRP  = cre_serviceChangeResParm(Mid),
12655:     SCRes = cre_serviceChangeResult(SCRP),
12656:     Root  = #megaco_term_id{id = ["root"]},
12657:     SCR   = cre_serviceChangeReply([Root], SCRes),
12658:     CR    = cre_cmdReply(SCR),
12659:     AR    = cre_actionReply(Cid, [CR]),
12660:     AR.

12679:               "~n", [Error]),
12680:     {error, Error, error};

12682:     io:format("otp_6275_mg_verify_handle_trans_rep -> unknown"

12684:     {error, Else, error}.

12711: otp_7189_mg_event_sequence(text, tcp) ->
12712:     DecodeFun = ?otp_7189_mg_decode_msg_fun(megaco_pretty_text_encoder, []),
12713:     EncodeFun = ?otp_7189_mg_encode_msg_fun(megaco_pretty_text_encoder, []),
12714:     Mid = {deviceName,"mg"},
12715:     ServiceChangeReq = otp_7189_mg_service_change_request_msg(Mid, 1, 0),
12716:     TermId    =
12717:         #megaco_term_id{id = ["00000000","00000000","01101101"]},
12718:     TransId   = 1,
12719:     ReqId     = 1,
12720:     CtxId     = 1,
12721:     Pending   = otp_7189_mg_trans_pending_msg(Mid, TransId),
12722:     ServiceChangeReplyVerifyFun = 
12723: 	?otp_7189_mg_verify_service_change_rep_msg_fun(),
12724:     NotifyReqVerify = ?otp_7189_mg_verify_notify_req_msg_fun(TermId, TransId, ReqId, CtxId),
12725:     EvSeq = [
12726: 	     ?GD_ENABLE(),
12727: 	     {decode, DecodeFun},
12728: 	     {encode, EncodeFun},
12729: 	     {connect, 2944},
12730: 	     ?GSND("service-change-request", ServiceChangeReq), 
12731: 	     ?GERCV("service-change-reply", ServiceChangeReplyVerifyFun, ?SECS(5)), 
12732: 	     ?GERCV("notify request",       NotifyReqVerify,             ?SECS(5)),
12733: 	     ?GS(100),
12734: 	     ?GSND("pending", Pending), 
12735: 	     {expect_closed, timer:seconds(120)},
12736: 	     disconnect
12737: 	    ],
12738:     EvSeq.

12747:             decode_msg(M, Mod, Conf)

12750: otp_7189_mg_service_change_request_ar(_Mid, Cid) ->
12751:     Prof  = cre_serviceChangeProf("resgw", 1),
12752:     SCP   = cre_serviceChangeParm(restart, ["901 mg col boot"], Prof),
12753:     Root  = #megaco_term_id{id = ["root"]},
12754:     SCR   = cre_serviceChangeReq([Root], SCP),
12755:     CMD   = cre_command(SCR),
12756:     CR    = cre_cmdReq(CMD),
12757:     cre_actionReq(Cid, [CR]).
12758: 
12759: otp_7189_mg_service_change_request_msg(Mid, TransId, Cid) ->
12760:     AR    = otp_7189_mg_service_change_request_ar(Mid, Cid),
12761:     TR    = cre_transReq(TransId, [AR]),
12762:     Trans = cre_transaction(TR),
12763:     Mess  = cre_message(?VERSION, Mid, cre_transactions([Trans])),
12764:     cre_megacoMessage(Mess).

12773: otp_7189_mg_verify_service_change_rep_msg(
12774:   #'MegacoMessage'{mess = Mess} = M) -> 
12775:     io:format("otp_7189_mg_verify_service_change_rep_msg -> "
12776: 	      "ok so far~n",[]),
12777:     #'Message'{version     = _V,
12778: 	       mId         = _MgMid,
12779: 	       messageBody = Body} = Mess,
12780:     {transactions, [Trans]} = Body,
12781:     {transactionReply, TR} = Trans,
12782:     #'TransactionReply'{transactionId = _Tid,
12783: 			immAckRequired = asn1_NOVALUE,
12784: 			transactionResult = Res} = TR,
12785:     {actionReplies, [AR]} = Res,
12786:     #'ActionReply'{contextId = _Cid,
12787: 		   errorDescriptor = asn1_NOVALUE,
12788: 		   contextReply = _CtxReq,
12789: 		   commandReply = [CR]} = AR,
12790:     {serviceChangeReply, SCR} = CR,
12791:     #'ServiceChangeReply'{terminationID = _TermID,
12792: 			  serviceChangeResult = SCRes} = SCR,
12793:     {serviceChangeResParms, SCRP} = SCRes,
12794:     #'ServiceChangeResParm'{serviceChangeMgcId = _MgcMid} = SCRP,
12795:     {ok, M};
12796: otp_7189_mg_verify_service_change_rep_msg(M) ->
12797:     {error, {invalid_message, M}}.

12800: otp_7189_mg_verify_notify_req_msg_fun(TermId, TransId, Rid, Cid) ->
12801:     fun(Msg) ->
12802:             (catch otp_7189_mg_verify_notify_req_msg(Msg,
12803: 						     TermId,
12804: 						     TransId, Rid, Cid))
12805:     end.
12806: -endif.
12807: 
12808: otp_7189_mg_verify_notify_req_msg(#'MegacoMessage'{mess = Mess} = M,
12809: 				  TermId, TransId, Rid, Cid) ->
12810:     io:format("otp_7189_mgc_verify_notify_req_msg -> entry with"
12811:               "~n   M:       ~p"
12812:               "~n   TermId:  ~p"
12813:               "~n   TransId: ~p"
12814:               "~n   Rid:     ~p"
12815:               "~n   Cid:     ~p"
12816:               "~n", [M, TermId, TransId, Rid, Cid]),
12817:     Body =
12818:         case Mess of
12819:             #'Message'{version     = ?VERSION,
12820:                        mId         = _Mid,
12821:                        messageBody = MsgBody} ->
12822:                 MsgBody;
12823:             _ ->
12824:                 throw({error, {invalid_Message, Mess}})
12825:         end,
12826:     Trans =
12827:         case Body of
12828:             {transactions, [Transactions]} ->
12829:                 Transactions;
12830:             _ ->
12831:                 throw({error, {invalid_messageBody, Body}})
12832:         end,
12833:     TR =
12834:         case Trans of
12835:             {transactionRequest, TransRequest} ->
12836:                 TransRequest;
12837:             _ ->
12838:                 throw({error, {invalid_transactions, Trans}})
12839:         end,
12840:     AR =
12841:         case TR of
12842:             #'TransactionRequest'{transactionId = TransId,
12843:                                   actions       = [ActReq]} ->
12844:                 ActReq;
12845:             _ ->
12846:                 throw({error, {invalid_transactionRequest, TR, TransId}})
12847:         end,
12848:     CR =
12849:         case AR of
12850:             #'ActionRequest'{contextId       = Cid,
12851:                              commandRequests = [CmdReq]} ->
12852:                 CmdReq;
12853:             _ ->
12854:                 throw({error, {invalid_actions, AR}})
12855:         end,
12856:     Cmd =
12857:         case CR of
12858:             #'CommandRequest'{command = Command} ->
12859:                 Command;
12860:             _ ->
12861:                 throw({error, {invalid_commandRequests, CR}})
12862:         end,
12863:     NR =
12864:         case Cmd of
12865:             {notifyReq, NotifReq} ->
12866:                 NotifReq;
12867:             _ ->
12868:                 throw({error, {invalid_command, Cmd}})
12869:         end,
12870:     OED =
12871:         case NR of
12872:             #'NotifyRequest'{terminationID            = [TermId],
12873:                              observedEventsDescriptor = ObsEvsDesc,
12874:                              errorDescriptor          = asn1_NOVALUE} ->
12875:                 ObsEvsDesc;
12876:             _ ->
12877:                 throw({error, {invalid_notifyReq, NR}})
12878:         end,
12879:     OE =
12880:         case OED of
12881:             #'ObservedEventsDescriptor'{observedEventLst = [ObsEvLst]} ->
12882:                 ObsEvLst;
12883:             _ ->
12884:                 throw({error, {invalid_observedEventsDescriptor, OED}})
12885:         end,
12886:     case OE of
12887:         #'ObservedEvent'{eventName = "al/of"} ->
12888:             {ok, M};
12889:         _ ->
12890:             throw({error, {invalid_observedEventLst, OE}})
12891:     end;
12892: otp_7189_mg_verify_notify_req_msg(Crap, _TermId, _TransId, _Rid, _Cid) ->
12893:     {error, {invalid_MegacoMessage, Crap}}.
12894: 
12895:

12897:     TP   = #'TransactionPending'{transactionId = TransId},
12898:     Body = {transactions, [{transactionPending, TP}]},
12899:     Mess = #'Message'{version     = 1,
12900:                       mId         = Mid,
12901:                       messageBody = Body},
12902:     #'MegacoMessage'{mess = Mess}.
12903:

12906:     EC = ?megaco_internal_gateway_error,
12907:     ET = lists:flatten(io_lib:format("~w",[T])),
12908:     #'ErrorDescriptor'{errorCode = EC, errorText = ET}.

12914: otp_7259(suite) ->
12915:     [];
12916: otp_7259(doc) ->
12917:     ["This is a variant of ticket OTP-6442"];
12918: otp_7259(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
12919:     Pre = fun() ->
12920:                   MgNode = make_node_name(mg),
12921:                   d("start (MG) node: ~p", [MgNode]),
12922:                   Nodes = [MgNode], 
12923:                   ok = ?START_NODES(Nodes, true),
12924:                   Nodes
12925:           end,
12926:     Case = fun do_otp_7259/1,
12927:     Post = fun(Nodes) ->
12928:                    d("stop nodes"),
12929:                    ?STOP_NODES(lists:reverse(Nodes))
12930:            end,
12931:     try_tc(otp7259rr, Pre, Case, Post).
12932: 
12933: do_otp_7259([MgNode]) ->
12934:     d("[MG] start the simulator "),
12935:     {ok, Mg} = megaco_test_megaco_generator:start_link("MG", MgNode),
12936: 
12937:     d("[MG] create the event sequence"),
12938:     MgMid = {deviceName,"mg"},
12939:     MgEvSeq = otp_7259_mg_event_sequence(MgMid),
12940: 
12941:     i("wait some time before starting the MG simulation"),
12942:     sleep(1000),
12943: 
12944:     d("[MG] start the simulation"),
12945:     {ok, MgId} = megaco_test_megaco_generator:exec(Mg, MgEvSeq),
12946: 
12947:     i("await the transport module service change send_message event"),
12948:     Pid = otp_7259_expect(fun otp_7259_verify_scr_msg/1, 5000),
12949: 
12950:     i("wait some before issuing the service change reply"),
12951:     sleep(500),
12952: 
12953:     i("send the service change reply"),
12954:     MgcMid = {deviceName,"mgc"},
12955:     ServiceChangeReply = otp_7259_mgc_service_change_reply_msg(MgcMid, 1, 1),
12956:     megaco_test_generic_transport:incomming_message(Pid, ServiceChangeReply),
12957: 
12958:     i("await the transport module "
12959:       "notify-request send_message event from MG: "
12960:       "ignore"),
12961:     ok = otp_7259_expect(fun otp_7259_verify_first_nr_msg/1, 5000),
12962: 
12963:     i("await the transport module "
12964:       "notify-request resend_message event from MG: "
12965:       "reply"),
12966:     {TransId2, Cid2, TermId2} = 
12967: 	otp_7259_expect(fun otp_7259_verify_second_nr_msg/1, 10000),
12968: 
12969:     i("wait some before issuing the notify reply"),
12970:     sleep(500),
12971: 
12972:     i("send the notify reply"),
12973:     NotifyReply = 
12974: 	otp_7259_mgc_notify_reply_msg(MgcMid, TransId2, Cid2, TermId2),
12975:     megaco_test_generic_transport:incomming_message(Pid, NotifyReply),
12976: 
12977:     d("[MG] await the generator reply"),
12978:     await_completion([MgId], 7000),
12979: 
12980:     %% Tell Mg to stop
12981:     i("[MG] stop generator"),
12982:     megaco_test_megaco_generator:stop(Mg),
12983: 
12984:     i("done", []),
12985:     ok.

12987: 
12988: otp_7259_expect(Verify, Timeout) when (Timeout > 0) ->
12989:     T = mtime(),
12990:     receive
12991: 	Msg ->
12992: 	    case (catch Verify(Msg)) of
12993: 		{ok, Result} ->
12994: 		    d("verified after ~p msec", [mtime() - T]),
12995: 		    Result;
12996: 		skip ->
12997: 		    otp_7259_expect(Verify, to(Timeout, T));
12998: 		{error, Reason} ->
12999: 		    exit({verification_failed, Reason})
13000: 	    end
13001:     after Timeout ->
13002: 	    exit(timeout)
13003:     end;
13004: otp_7259_expect(_, _Timeout) ->
13005:     exit(timeout).

13007: otp_7259_verify_scr_msg(
13008:   {transport_event, {send_message, _SH, {message, Msg, Resend}}, Pid}) 
13009:   when is_record(Msg, 'MegacoMessage') andalso ((Resend =:= true) orelse (Resend =:= false)) ->
13010:     d("received expected service change request message: "
13011:       "~n   Msg:    ~p"
13012:       "~n   Resend: ~p", [Msg, Resend]),
13013:     Reply = ok, 
13014:     Pid ! {transport_reply, Reply, self()},
13015:     {ok, Pid};
13016: otp_7259_verify_scr_msg(Msg) ->
13017:     {error, {invalid_message, Msg}}.
13018: 
13019: otp_7259_verify_first_nr_msg(
13020:   {transport_event, {send_message, _SH, {message, Msg, Resend}}, Pid}) 
13021:   when is_record(Msg, 'MegacoMessage') andalso ((Resend =:= true) orelse (Resend =:= false)) ->
13022:     d("received expected first notify request send message: "
13023:       "~n   Msg: ~p", [Msg]),
13024:     Reply = ok, 
13025:     Pid ! {transport_reply, Reply, self()},
13026:     {ok, ok};
13027: otp_7259_verify_first_nr_msg(Msg) ->
13028:     {error, {invalid_message, Msg}}.
13029: 
13030: otp_7259_verify_second_nr_msg(
13031:   {transport_event, {send_message, _SH, {message, Msg, Resend}}, Pid}) 
13032:   when is_record(Msg, 'MegacoMessage') andalso ((Resend =:= true) orelse (Resend =:= false)) ->
13033:     d("received expected second notify request send message: "
13034:       "~n   Msg: ~p", [Msg]),
13035:     Reply = ok, 
13036:     Pid ! {transport_reply, Reply, self()},
13037:     #'MegacoMessage'{mess = Mess} = Msg,
13038:     #'Message'{mId         = _Mid,
13039: 	       messageBody = Body} = Mess, 
13040:     {transactions, Transactions} = Body,
13041:     [Transaction] = Transactions,
13042:     {transactionRequest, TransReq} = Transaction,
13043:     #'TransactionRequest'{transactionId = TransId,
13044: 			  actions       = Actions} = TransReq,
13045:     [Action] = Actions,
13046:     #'ActionRequest'{contextId       = Cid,
13047: 		     commandRequests = CmdReqs} = Action,
13048:     [CmdReq] = CmdReqs,
13049:     #'CommandRequest'{command = Cmd} = CmdReq,
13050:     {notifyReq, NR} = Cmd,
13051:     #'NotifyRequest'{terminationID = [TermId]} = NR,
13052:     {ok, {TransId, Cid, TermId}};
13053: otp_7259_verify_second_nr_msg(Msg) ->
13054:     {error, {invalid_message, Msg}}.

13060:     Root  = #megaco_term_id{id = ["root"]},
13061:     SCR   = #'ServiceChangeReply'{terminationID       = [Root],
13062:                                   serviceChangeResult = SCRPs},
13063:     CR    = {serviceChangeReply, SCR},
13064:     otp_7259_mgc_reply_msg(Mid, TransId, CR, Cid).

13066: otp_7259_mgc_notify_reply_msg(Mid, TransId, Cid, TermId) ->
13067:     NR  = #'NotifyReply'{terminationID = [TermId]},
13068:     CR  = {notifyReply, NR},
13069:     otp_7259_mgc_reply_msg(Mid, TransId, CR, Cid).

13071: otp_7259_mgc_reply_msg(Mid, TransId, CR, Cid) ->

13073:                          commandReply = [CR]},
13074:     ARs  = {actionReplies, [AR]},
13075:     TR   = #'TransactionReply'{transactionId     = TransId,
13076:                                transactionResult = ARs},
13077:     Body = {transactions, [{transactionReply, TR}]},
13078:     Mess = #'Message'{version     = 1,
13079:                       mId         = Mid,
13080:                       messageBody = Body},
13081:     #'MegacoMessage'{mess = Mess}.

13104:     RI = [

13112:     Tid = #megaco_term_id{id = ["00000000","00000000","01101101"]},
13113:     NotifyReq = otp_7259_mg_notify_request_ar(1, Tid, 1),
13114:     ConnectVerify = 
13115: 	?otp_7259_mg_verify_handle_connect_fun(),
13116:     ServiceChangeReplyVerify = 
13117: 	?otp_7259_mg_verify_service_change_rep_fun(),

13121:              {debug, false},
13122:              megaco_start,
13123:              {megaco_start_user, Mid, RI, []},
13124: 	     {megaco_update_user_info, resend_indication, flag},
13125:              start_transport,

13130:              {megaco_callback, handle_connect, ConnectVerify},
13131:              megaco_connect,
13132:              {megaco_cast,     [ServiceChangeReq], []},
13133:              {megaco_callback, handle_connect,     ConnectVerify},
13134:              {megaco_callback, handle_trans_reply, ServiceChangeReplyVerify},
13135:              {sleep, 1000},
13136:              {megaco_cast,     [NotifyReq],        []},
13137:              {megaco_callback, handle_trans_reply, NotifyReplyVerify},
13138:              {sleep, 1000},
13139:              megaco_stop_user,

13169: otp_7259_mg_verify_service_change_rep(
13170:   {handle_trans_reply, _CH, ?VERSION, {ok, [AR]}, _}) ->
13171:     (catch otp_7259_mg_do_verify_service_change_rep(AR));
13172: otp_7259_mg_verify_service_change_rep(Crap) ->
13173:     {error, Crap, ok}.
13174: 
13175: otp_7259_mg_do_verify_service_change_rep(AR) ->
13176:     io:format("otp_7259_mg_verify_service_change_rep -> ok"
13177: 	      "~n   AR: ~p~n", [AR]),
13178:     CR = 
13179: 	case AR of
13180: 	    #'ActionReply'{commandReply = [CmdRep]} ->
13181: 		CmdRep;
13182: 	    _ ->
13183: 		Reason1 = {invalid_action_reply, AR},
13184: 		throw({error, Reason1, ok})
13185: 	end,
13186:     SCR = 
13187: 	case CR of
13188: 	    {serviceChangeReply, ServChRep} ->
13189: 		ServChRep;
13190: 	    _ ->
13191: 		Reason2 = {invalid_command_reply, CR},
13192: 		throw({error, Reason2, ok})
13193: 	end,
13194:     {Tid, SCRes} = 
13195: 	case SCR of
13196: 	    #'ServiceChangeReply'{terminationID       = [TermID],
13197: 				  serviceChangeResult = Res} ->
13198: 		{TermID, Res};
13199: 	    _ ->
13200: 		Reason3 = {invalid_service_change_reply, SCR},
13201: 		throw({error, Reason3, ok})
13202: 	end,
13203:     case Tid of
13204: 	#megaco_term_id{contains_wildcards = false, id = ["root"]} ->
13205: 	    ok;
13206: 	_ ->
13207: 	    Reason4 = {invalid_termination_id, Tid},
13208: 	    throw({error, Reason4, ok})
13209:     end,
13210:     SCRParm = 
13211: 	case SCRes of
13212: 	    {serviceChangeResParms, ServChResParms} ->
13213: 		ServChResParms;
13214: 	    _ ->
13215: 		Reason5 = {invalid_serviceChangeResult, SCRes},
13216: 		throw({error, Reason5, ok})
13217: 	end,
13218:     case SCRParm of
13219: 	#'ServiceChangeResParm'{serviceChangeMgcId = _RemoteMid} ->
13220: 	    {ok, AR, ok};
13221: 	_ ->
13222: 	    Reason6 = {invalid_service_change_result, SCRParm},
13223: 	    {error, Reason6, ok}
13224:     end.
13225:

13230:     end.
13231: -endif.

13238: otp_7259_mg_verify_notify_rep(Else) ->
13239:     io:format("otp_7259_mg_verify_notify_rep -> unknown"
13240: 	      "~n   Else: ~p~n", [Else]),
13241:     {error, Else, ok}.

13244: otp_7259_mg_service_change_request_ar(_Mid, Cid) ->
13245:     Prof  = cre_serviceChangeProf("resgw", 1),
13246:     SCP   = cre_serviceChangeParm(restart, ["901 mg col boot"], Prof),
13247:     Root  = #megaco_term_id{id = ["root"]},
13248:     SCR   = cre_serviceChangeReq([Root], SCP),
13249:     CMD   = cre_command(SCR),
13250:     CR    = cre_cmdReq(CMD),
13251:     cre_actionReq(Cid, [CR]).
13252: 
13253: otp_7259_mg_notify_request_ar(Rid, Tid, Cid) ->
13254:     TT      = cre_timeNotation("19990729", "22000000"),
13255:     Ev      = cre_obsEvent("al/of", TT),
13256:     EvsDesc = cre_obsEvsDesc(Rid, [Ev]),
13257:     NR      = cre_notifyReq([Tid], EvsDesc),
13258:     CMD     = cre_command(NR),
13259:     CR      = cre_cmdReq(CMD),
13260:     cre_actionReq(Cid, [CR]).

13265: otp_7713(suite) ->
13266:     [];
13267: otp_7713(doc) ->
13268:     [];
13269: otp_7713(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
13270:     ?ACQUIRE_NODES(1, Config),
13271: 
13272:     put(verbosity, debug),
13273:     put(sname,     "TEST"),
13274:     put(tc,        otp7713),
13275:     i("starting"),
13276: 
13277:     d("start proxy",[]),
13278:     ?USER_MOD:start_proxy(),
13279: 
13280:     Extra = otp7713_extra, 
13281:     PrelMid = preliminary_mid,
13282:     MgMid   = ipv4_mid(4711),
13283:     MgcMid  = ipv4_mid(),
13284:     UserMod = ?USER_MOD,
13285:     d("start megaco app",[]),
13286:     ?VERIFY(ok, application:start(megaco)),
13287:     UserConfig = [{user_mod, UserMod}, {send_mod, UserMod},
13288: 		  {request_timer, infinity}, {reply_timer, infinity}],
13289:     d("start (MG) user ~p",[MgMid]),
13290:     ?VERIFY(ok,	megaco:start_user(MgMid, UserConfig)),
13291: 
13292:     d("start (MGC) user ~p",[MgcMid]),
13293:     ?VERIFY(ok,	megaco:start_user(MgcMid, UserConfig)),
13294: 
13295:     d("get receive info for ~p",[MgMid]),
13296:     MgRH = user_info(MgMid, receive_handle),
13297:     d("get receive info for ~p",[MgcMid]),
13298:     MgcRH = user_info(MgcMid, receive_handle), 
13299:     d("start transport",[]),
13300:     {ok, MgPid, MgSH} =
13301: 	?VERIFY({ok, _, _}, UserMod:start_transport(MgRH, MgcRH)),
13302:     PrelMgCH = #megaco_conn_handle{local_mid = MgMid,
13303: 				   remote_mid = preliminary_mid},
13304:     MgCH  = #megaco_conn_handle{local_mid = MgMid,
13305: 				remote_mid = MgcMid},
13306:     MgcCH = #megaco_conn_handle{local_mid = MgcMid,
13307: 				remote_mid = MgMid},
13308:     d("(MG) try connect to MGC",[]),
13309:     ?SEND(megaco:connect(MgRH, PrelMid, MgSH, MgPid, Extra)), % Mg prel
13310:     d("await connect from MG", []),
13311:     ?USER({connect, PrelMgCH, _V, [Extra]}, ok),
13312:     ?RECEIVE([{res, _, {ok, PrelMgCH}}]),
13313: 
13314:     d("(MG) send service change request",[]),
13315:     Req = service_change_request(),
13316:     ?SEND(megaco:call(PrelMgCH, [Req], [])),
13317: 
13318:     d("(MGC) send service change reply",[]),
13319:     ?USER({connect, MgcCH, _V, []}, ok), % Mgc auto
13320:     Rep = service_change_reply(MgcMid),
13321:     ?USER({request, MgcCH, _V, [[Req]]}, {discard_ack, [Rep]}),
13322:     ?USER({connect, MgCH, _V, []}, ok), % Mg confirm
13323:     ?RECEIVE([{res, _, {1, {ok, [Rep]}}}]),
13324: 
13325:     d("get (system info) connections",[]),
13326:     connections([MgCH, MgcCH]),
13327:     d("get (~p) connections",[MgMid]),
13328:     ?VERIFY([MgCH], megaco:user_info(MgMid, connections)),
13329:     d("get (~p) connections",[MgcMid]),
13330:     ?VERIFY([MgcCH], megaco:user_info(MgcMid, connections)),
13331: 
13332:     Reason = shutdown,
13333:     d("(MG) disconnect",[]),
13334:     ?SEND(megaco:disconnect(MgCH, Reason)),
13335:     ?USER({disconnect, MgCH, _V, [{user_disconnect, Reason}]}, ok),
13336:     ?RECEIVE([{res, _, ok}]),
13337:     ?VERIFY(ok,	megaco:stop_user(MgMid)),
13338: 
13339:     d("(MGC) disconnect",[]),
13340:     ?SEND(megaco:disconnect(MgcCH, Reason)),
13341:     ?USER({disconnect, MgcCH, _V, [{user_disconnect, Reason}]}, ok),
13342:     ?RECEIVE([{res, _, ok}]),
13343:     ?VERIFY(ok,	megaco:stop_user(MgcMid)),
13344: 
13345:     d("stop megaco app",[]),
13346:     ?VERIFY(ok, application:stop(megaco)),
13347:     ?RECEIVE([]),
13348: 
13349:     d("done",[]),
13350:     ok.

13355: otp_8183_request1(suite) ->
13356:     [];
13357: otp_8183_request1(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
13358:     Pre = fun() ->
13359:     put(verbosity, debug),
13360:     put(sname,     "TEST"),
13361:     put(tc,        otp8183r1),
13362:     i("starting"),
13363: 
13364:                   MgNode = make_node_name(mg),
13365:                   d("start (MG) node: ~p", [MgNode]),
13366:                   Nodes = [MgNode], 
13367:                   ok = ?START_NODES(Nodes, true),
13368:                   Nodes
13369:           end,
13370:     Case = fun do_otp_8183_request1/1,
13371:     Post = fun(Nodes) ->
13372:                    d("stop nodes"),
13373:                    ?STOP_NODES(lists:reverse(Nodes))
13374:            end,
13375:     try_tc(otp8183r1, Pre, Case, Post).
13376: 
13377: do_otp_8183_request1([MgNode]) ->
13378:     i("[MG] start the simulator "),
13379:     {ok, Mg} = megaco_test_megaco_generator:start_link("MG", MgNode),
13380: 
13381:     i("[MG] create the event sequence"),
13382:     MgMid = {deviceName,"mg"},
13383:     MgEvSeq = otp_8183_r1_mg_event_sequence(MgMid),
13384: 
13385:     i("wait some time before starting the MG simulation"),
13386:     sleep(1000),
13387: 
13388:     i("[MG] start the simulation"),
13389:     {ok, MgId} = megaco_test_megaco_generator:exec(Mg, MgEvSeq),
13390: 
13391:     i("await the transport module service change send_message event"),
13392:     Pid = otp_8183_expect(fun(Ev) -> otp_8183_r1_verify_scr_msg(Ev) end, 5000),
13393: 
13394:     i("wait some before issuing the service change reply"),
13395:     sleep(500),
13396: 
13397:     i("send the service change reply"),
13398:     MgcMid = {deviceName,"mgc"},
13399:     ServiceChangeReply = otp_8183_r1_mgc_service_change_reply_msg(MgcMid, 1, 1),
13400:     megaco_test_generic_transport:incomming_message(Pid, ServiceChangeReply),
13401: 
13402:     i("await the transport module "
13403:       "notify-request send_message event from MG: "
13404:       "ignore"),
13405:     {TransId2, Cid2, TermId2} =
13406: 	otp_8183_expect(fun(Ev) -> otp_8183_r1_verify_nr_msg(Ev) end, 5000),
13407: 
13408:     i("wait some before issuing the notify reply (twice)"),
13409:     sleep(500),
13410: 
13411:     i("create notify reply"),
13412:     NotifyReply = 
13413: 	otp_8183_r1_mgc_notify_reply_msg(MgcMid, TransId2, Cid2, TermId2),
13414:     i("send the first notify reply"),
13415:     megaco_test_generic_transport:incomming_message(Pid, NotifyReply),
13416:     sleep(100), %% This is to "make sure" the events come in the "right" order
13417:     i("send the second notify reply"),
13418:     megaco_test_generic_transport:incomming_message(Pid, NotifyReply),
13419: 
13420:     d("await the generator reply"),
13421:     await_completion([MgId]), 
13422: 
13423:     %% Tell Mg to stop
13424:     i("[MG] stop generator"),
13425:     megaco_test_megaco_generator:stop(Mg),
13426: 
13427:     i("done", []),
13428:     ok.

13430: 
13431: otp_8183_expect(Verify, Timeout) when (Timeout > 0) ->
13432:     T = mtime(),
13433:     receive
13434: 	Msg ->
13435: 	    case (catch Verify(Msg)) of
13436: 		{ok, Result} ->
13437: 		    d("verified after ~p msec", [mtime() - T]),
13438: 		    Result;
13439: 		skip ->
13440: 		    otp_8183_expect(Verify, to(Timeout, T));
13441: 		{error, Reason} ->
13442: 		    exit({verification_failed, Reason})
13443: 	    end
13444:     after Timeout ->
13445: 	    exit(timeout)
13446:     end;
13447: otp_8183_expect(_, _Timeout) ->
13448:     exit(timeout).

13450: otp_8183_r1_verify_scr_msg(
13451:   {transport_event, {send_message, _SH, {message, Msg}}, Pid}) 
13452:   when is_record(Msg, 'MegacoMessage') ->
13453:     d("received expected service change request message: "
13454:       "~n   Msg: ~p", [Msg]),
13455:     Reply = ok, 
13456:     Pid ! {transport_reply, Reply, self()},
13457:     {ok, Pid};
13458: otp_8183_r1_verify_scr_msg(
13459:   {transport_event, {send_message, _SH, BadMsg}, _Pid}) ->
13460:     io:format("otp_8183_r1_verify_scr_msg -> error: "
13461: 	      "~n   BadMsg: ~p"
13462: 	      "~n", [BadMsg]),
13463:     {error, {invalid_message, BadMsg}};
13464: otp_8183_r1_verify_scr_msg({transport_event, BadEvent, _Pid}) ->
13465:     io:format("otp_8183_r1_verify_scr_msg -> error: "
13466: 	      "~n   BadEvent: ~p"
13467: 	      "~n", [BadEvent]),
13468:     {error, {invalid_message, BadEvent}};
13469: otp_8183_r1_verify_scr_msg(Msg) ->
13470:     io:format("otp_8183_r1_verify_scr_msg -> error: "
13471: 	      "~n   Msg: ~p"
13472: 	      "~n", [Msg]),
13473:     {error, {invalid_message, Msg}}.

13475: otp_8183_r1_verify_nr_msg(
13476:   {transport_event, {send_message, _SH, {message, Msg}}, Pid})
13477:   when is_record(Msg, 'MegacoMessage') ->
13478:     io:format("otp_8183_r1_verify_nr_msg -> "
13479:               "entry when received expected message with"
13480:               "~n   Msg: ~p"
13481:               "~n", [Msg]),
13482:     Reply = ok,
13483:     Pid ! {transport_reply, Reply, self()},
13484:     #'MegacoMessage'{mess = Mess} = Msg,
13485:     #'Message'{mId         = _Mid,
13486:                messageBody = Body} = Mess,
13487:     {transactions, Transactions} = Body,
13488:     [Transaction] = Transactions,
13489:     {transactionRequest, TransReq} = Transaction,
13490:     #'TransactionRequest'{transactionId = TransId,
13491:                           actions       = Actions} = TransReq,
13492:     [Action] = Actions,
13493:     #'ActionRequest'{contextId       = Cid,
13494:                      commandRequests = CmdReqs} = Action,
13495:     [CmdReq] = CmdReqs,
13496:     #'CommandRequest'{command = Cmd} = CmdReq,
13497:     {notifyReq, NR} = Cmd,
13498:     #'NotifyRequest'{terminationID = [TermId]} = NR,
13499:     {ok, {TransId, Cid, TermId}};
13500: otp_8183_r1_verify_nr_msg(Msg) ->
13501:     io:format("otp_8183_r1_verify_nr_msg -> entry when error with"
13502:               "~n   Msg: ~p"
13503:               "~n", [Msg]),
13504:     {error, {invalid_message, Msg}}.

13506: otp_8183_r1_mgc_service_change_reply_msg(Mid, TransId, Cid) ->
13507:     SCRP  = #'ServiceChangeResParm'{serviceChangeMgcId = Mid},
13508:     SCRPs = {serviceChangeResParms, SCRP},
13509:     Root  = #megaco_term_id{id = ["root"]},
13510:     SCR   = #'ServiceChangeReply'{terminationID       = [Root],
13511:                                   serviceChangeResult = SCRPs},
13512:     CR    = {serviceChangeReply, SCR},
13513:     otp_8183_r1_mgc_reply_msg(Mid, TransId, CR, Cid).
13514: 
13515: otp_8183_r1_mgc_notify_reply_msg(Mid, TransId, Cid, TermId) ->
13516:     NR  = #'NotifyReply'{terminationID = [TermId]},
13517:     CR  = {notifyReply, NR},
13518:     otp_8183_r1_mgc_reply_msg(Mid, TransId, CR, Cid).
13519: 
13520: otp_8183_r1_mgc_reply_msg(Mid, TransId, CR, Cid) ->
13521:     AR  = #'ActionReply'{contextId    = Cid,
13522:                          commandReply = [CR]},
13523:     ARs  = {actionReplies, [AR]},
13524:     TR   = #'TransactionReply'{transactionId     = TransId,
13525:                                transactionResult = ARs},
13526:     Body = {transactions, [{transactionReply, TR}]},
13527:     Mess = #'Message'{version     = 1,
13528:                       mId         = Mid,
13529:                       messageBody = Body},
13530:     #'MegacoMessage'{mess = Mess}.

13552: otp_8183_r1_mg_event_sequence(Mid) ->
13553:     RI = [
13554:           {port,             self()}, % This is just a trick to get my pid to the transport module
13555:           {encoding_module,  megaco_pretty_text_encoder},
13556:           {encoding_config,  []},
13557:           {transport_module, megaco_test_generic_transport}
13558:          ],
13559:     ServiceChangeReq = 
13560: 	otp_8183_r1_mg_service_change_request_ar(Mid, 1),
13561:     Tid = #megaco_term_id{id = ["00000000","00000000","01101101"]},
13562:     NotifyReq = otp_8183_r1_mg_notify_request_ar(1, Tid, 1),
13563:     ConnectVerify = 
13564: 	?otp_8183_r1_mg_verify_handle_connect_fun(),
13565:     ServiceChangeReplyVerify = 
13566: 	?otp_8183_r1_mg_verify_service_change_rep_fun(),
13567:     NotifyReplyVerify = 
13568: 	fun(Nr) -> 
13569: 		?otp_8183_r1_mg_verify_notify_rep_fun(Nr) 
13570: 	end, 
13571:     EvSeq = [
13572:              {debug, true}, % false},
13573:              megaco_start,
13574:              {megaco_start_user, Mid, RI, []},
13575:              start_transport,
13576:              {megaco_trace, disable},
13577:              {megaco_system_info, users},
13578:              {megaco_system_info, connections},
13579:              connect,
13580:              {megaco_callback, handle_connect, ConnectVerify},
13581:              megaco_connect,
13582:              {megaco_cast,     [ServiceChangeReq], []},
13583:              {megaco_callback, handle_connect,     ConnectVerify},
13584:              {megaco_callback, handle_trans_reply, ServiceChangeReplyVerify},
13585: 
13586:              {sleep, 1000},
13587:              {megaco_cast,     [NotifyReq],        [{request_keep_alive_timeout, 5000}]},
13588:              {megaco_callback, handle_trans_reply, NotifyReplyVerify(1)},
13589:              {megaco_callback, handle_trans_reply, NotifyReplyVerify(2)},
13590:              {sleep, 1000},
13591:              megaco_stop_user,
13592:              megaco_stop,
13593:              {sleep, 1000}
13594:             ],
13595:     EvSeq.

13621: otp_8183_r1_mg_verify_service_change_rep(
13622:   {handle_trans_reply, _CH, ?VERSION, {ok, [AR]}, _}) ->
13623:     (catch otp_8183_r1_mg_do_verify_service_change_rep(AR));
13624: otp_8183_r1_mg_verify_service_change_rep(Crap) ->
13625:     io:format("otp_8183_r1_mg_verify_service_change_rep -> crap"
13626: 	      "~n   Crap: ~p"
13627: 	      "~n", [Crap]),
13628:     {error, Crap, ok}.
13629: 
13630: otp_8183_r1_mg_do_verify_service_change_rep(AR) ->
13631:     io:format("otp_8183_r1_mg_do_verify_service_change_rep -> ok"
13632: 	      "~n   AR: ~p~n", [AR]),
13633:     CR = 
13634: 	case AR of
13635: 	    #'ActionReply'{commandReply = [CmdRep]} ->
13636: 		CmdRep;
13637: 	    _ ->
13638: 		Reason1 = {invalid_action_reply, AR},
13639: 		throw({error, Reason1, ok})
13640: 	end,
13641:     SCR = 
13642: 	case CR of
13643: 	    {serviceChangeReply, ServChRep} ->
13644: 		ServChRep;
13645: 	    _ ->
13646: 		Reason2 = {invalid_command_reply, CR},
13647: 		throw({error, Reason2, ok})
13648: 	end,
13649:     {Tid, SCRes} = 
13650: 	case SCR of
13651: 	    #'ServiceChangeReply'{terminationID       = [TermID],
13652: 				  serviceChangeResult = Res} ->
13653: 		{TermID, Res};
13654: 	    _ ->
13655: 		Reason3 = {invalid_service_change_reply, SCR},
13656: 		throw({error, Reason3, ok})
13657: 	end,
13658:     case Tid of
13659: 	#megaco_term_id{contains_wildcards = false, id = ["root"]} ->
13660: 	    ok;
13661: 	_ ->
13662: 	    Reason4 = {invalid_termination_id, Tid},
13663: 	    throw({error, Reason4, ok})
13664:     end,
13665:     SCRParm = 
13666: 	case SCRes of
13667: 	    {serviceChangeResParms, ServChResParms} ->
13668: 		ServChResParms;
13669: 	    _ ->
13670: 		Reason5 = {invalid_serviceChangeResult, SCRes},
13671: 		throw({error, Reason5, ok})
13672: 	end,
13673:     case SCRParm of
13674: 	#'ServiceChangeResParm'{serviceChangeMgcId = _RemoteMid} ->
13675: 	    {ok, AR, ok};
13676: 	_ ->
13677: 	    Reason6 = {invalid_service_change_result, SCRParm},
13678: 	    {error, Reason6, ok}
13679:     end.
13680:

13684: 	    otp_8183_r1_mg_verify_notify_rep(Nr, Rep) 
13685:     end.
13686: -endif.

13688: otp_8183_r1_mg_verify_notify_rep(
13689:   Nr,

13692: 	      "~n   Nr: ~p"
13693: 	      "~n   AR: ~p"
13694: 	      "~n", [Nr, AR]),
13695:     {ok, AR, ok};
13696: otp_8183_r1_mg_verify_notify_rep(
13697:   ExpNr, 
13698:   {handle_trans_reply, _CH, ?VERSION, {ok, ActNr, [AR]}, _}) ->
13699:     io:format("otp_8183_r1_mg_verify_notify_rep -> error"
13700: 	      "~n   Expected Nr: ~p"
13701: 	      "~n   Actual Nr:   ~p"
13702: 	      "~n   AR:          ~p"
13703: 	      "~n", [ExpNr, ActNr, AR]),
13704:     Error = {unexpected_nr, ExpNr, ActNr},
13705:     {error, Error, ok};
13706: otp_8183_r1_mg_verify_notify_rep(
13707:   Nr, 
13708:   {handle_trans_reply, _CH, ?VERSION, Res, _}) ->
13709:     io:format("otp_8183_r1_mg_verify_notify_rep -> error"
13710: 	      "~n   Nr:  ~p"
13711: 	      "~n   Res: ~p"
13712: 	      "~n", [Nr, Res]),
13713:     Error = {unexpected_result, Nr, Res},
13714:     {error, Error, ok};
13715: otp_8183_r1_mg_verify_notify_rep(Nr, Else) ->
13716:     io:format("otp_8183_r1_mg_verify_notify_rep -> unknown"
13717: 	      "~n   Nr:   ~p"
13718: 	      "~n   Else: ~p"
13719: 	      "~n", [Nr, Else]),
13720:     {error, Else, ok}.

13723: otp_8183_r1_mg_service_change_request_ar(_Mid, Cid) ->
13724:     Prof  = cre_serviceChangeProf("resgw", 1),
13725:     SCP   = cre_serviceChangeParm(restart, ["901 mg col boot"], Prof),
13726:     Root  = #megaco_term_id{id = ["root"]},
13727:     SCR   = cre_serviceChangeReq([Root], SCP),
13728:     CMD   = cre_command(SCR),
13729:     CR    = cre_cmdReq(CMD),
13730:     cre_actionReq(Cid, [CR]).
13731: 
13732: otp_8183_r1_mg_notify_request_ar(Rid, Tid, Cid) ->

13734:     Ev      = cre_obsEvent("al/of", TT),
13735:     EvsDesc = cre_obsEvsDesc(Rid, [Ev]),
13736:     NR      = cre_notifyReq([Tid], EvsDesc),
13737:     CMD     = cre_command(NR),
13738:     CR      = cre_cmdReq(CMD),

13744: otp8212_scr(MidStr) ->
13745:     Msg = "!/1 " ++ MidStr ++ " T=19731{C=-{SC=ROOT{SV{MT=RS,RE=\"901\"}}}}",
13746:     list_to_binary(Msg).

13748: otp_8212(suite) ->
13749:     [];
13750: otp_8212(doc) ->
13751:     [];
13752: otp_8212(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
13753:     %% ?ACQUIRE_NODES(1, Config),
13754: 
13755:     put(verbosity, debug),
13756:     put(sname,     "TEST"),
13757:     put(tc,        otp8212),
13758:     i("starting"),
13759: 
13760:     Extra         = otp8212_extra, 
13761:     NoMid         = preliminary_mid,
13762:     LocalMid      = {deviceName, "MGC"}, 
13763:     RemoteMidStr1 = "bgf1", 
13764:     RemoteMid1    = {deviceName, RemoteMidStr1}, 
13765:     RemoteMidStr2 = "bgf2", 
13766:     RemoteMid2    = {deviceName, RemoteMidStr2}, 
13767:     UserMod       = megaco_mess_otp8212_test,
13768: 
13769:     d("(maybe) enable megaco trace at level to max with dest io", []),
13770:     ?ENABLE_TRACE(Config, max, io),
13771: 
13772:     d("start megaco app",[]),
13773:     ?VERIFY(ok, application:start(megaco)),
13774: 
13775:     d("start local user (MGC) ~p", [LocalMid]),
13776:     UserConfig = [{user_mod, UserMod}, {send_mod, UserMod}],
13777:     ?VERIFY(ok,	megaco:start_user(LocalMid, UserConfig)),
13778: 
13779:     d("get (MGC) receive info for ~p", [LocalMid]),
13780:     RH0 = user_info(LocalMid, receive_handle),
13781:     RH  = RH0#megaco_receive_handle{encoding_mod = megaco_mess_otp8212_test,
13782: 				    encoding_config = []},
13783:     
13784:     d("do a pre-connect for ~p", [LocalMid]),
13785:     ControlPid = self(), 
13786:     SendHandle = {RH, ControlPid, RemoteMidStr1, RemoteMidStr2}, 
13787:     ?VERIFY({ok, _}, megaco:connect(RH, NoMid, SendHandle, ControlPid)),
13788:     
13789:     d("simulate incomming service change message from ~p", 
13790:       [RemoteMidStr1]),
13791:     ?VERIFY(ok, 
13792: 	    megaco:process_received_message(RH, ControlPid, 
13793: 					    otp8212_scr, 
13794: 					    otp8212_scr(RemoteMidStr1))),
13795: 
13796:     d("get the updated connection handle", []),
13797:     [CH] = megaco:user_info(LocalMid, connections),
13798:     
13799:     d("verify connection with ~p", [RemoteMidStr1]),
13800:     ?VERIFY(RemoteMid1, megaco:conn_info(CH, remote_mid)),
13801:     
13802:     d("send a request to ~p but receive no reply but an unexpected call", 
13803:       [RemoteMidStr1]),
13804:     Res = megaco:call(CH, ["action request"], [{request_timer, 2000}]), 
13805:     d("request result: ~p", [Res]),
13806:     ?VERIFY({1, [{error, {wrong_mid, RemoteMid2, RemoteMid1, _}, {Extra, _}}]}, Res),
13807: 
13808:     Conns = disconnect_all(LocalMid), 
13809:     await_disconnected(Conns),
13810: 
13811:     d("stop megaco user ~p",[LocalMid]),
13812:     ok = await_stopped_user(LocalMid), 
13813: 
13814:     d("stop megaco app",[]),
13815:     ?VERIFY(ok, application:stop(megaco)),
13816:     ?RECEIVE([]),
13817: 
13818:     d("done",[]),
13819:     ok.
13820: 
13821: disconnect_all(LocalMid) ->
13822:     Conns = megaco:user_info(LocalMid, connections), 
13823:     d("[~p] disconnect from all connections: ~n~p", [LocalMid, Conns]),
13824:     lists:foreach(
13825:       fun(Conn) ->
13826: 	      d("[~p] disconnect from connection ~p", [LocalMid, Conn]),
13827: 	      DiscoRes = megaco:disconnect(Conn, {otp8212_done, self()}),
13828: 	      d("[~p] disconnect result: ~p", [LocalMid, DiscoRes])
13829:       end,
13830:       Conns),
13831:     Conns.
13832:     
13833: await_disconnected([]) ->
13834:     ok;
13835: await_disconnected(Conns) ->
13836:     receive
13837: 	{disconnected, Conn} ->
13838: 	    d("disconnected: ~p", [Conn]),
13839: 	    Conns2 = lists:delete(Conn, Conns),
13840: 	    await_disconnected(Conns2)
13841:     end.
13842: 
13843: 
13844: await_stopped_user(LocalMid) ->
13845:     await_stopped_user(LocalMid, 10).
13846: 
13847: await_stopped_user(LocalMid, N) when N =< 0 ->
13848:     ?ERROR({failed_stopping_user, LocalMid});
13849: await_stopped_user(LocalMid, N) ->
13850:     case megaco:stop_user(LocalMid) of
13851: 	ok ->
13852: 	    d("user stopped(~w)", [N]),
13853: 	    ok;
13854: 	{error, {active_connections, _}} ->
13855: 	    d("still active connections when N = ~w", [N]),
13856: 	    Conns = disconnect_all(LocalMid), 
13857: 	    await_disconnected(Conns), 
13858: 	    ?SLEEP(500),
13859: 	    await_stopped_user(LocalMid, N-1)
13860:     end.
13861:

14038:     ok.

14046:     reply.

14050:     ED = #'ErrorDescriptor'{errorCode = ?megaco_not_implemented,

14057: 			    errorText = "not implemented yet"},

14119: make_node_name(Name) ->
14120:     case string:tokens(atom_to_list(node()), [$@]) of
14121: 	[_,Host] ->
14122: 	    list_to_atom(lists:concat([atom_to_list(Name) ++ "@" ++ Host]));
14123: 	_ ->
14124: 	    exit("Test node must be started with '-sname'")
14125:     end.

14130: user_info(Mid, Key) ->
14131:     case (catch megaco:user_info(Mid, Key)) of
14132: 	{'EXIT', _} = Error ->
14133: 	    ?ERROR(Error);
14134: 	Val ->
14135: 	    ?LOG("user_info -> ok: "
14136: 		 "~n   ~p"
14137: 		 "~n", [Val]),
14138: 	    Val
14139:     end.
14140: 
14141: 
14142: stop_user(Mid) ->
14143:     case (catch megaco:stop_user(Mid)) of
14144: 	{'EXIT', _} = Error ->
14145: 	    ?ERROR(Error);
14146: 	Val ->
14147: 	    ?LOG("stop_user -> ok:"
14148: 		 "~n   ~p"
14149: 		 "~n", [Val]),
14150: 	    Val
14151:     end.
14152: 
14153: connections() ->
14154:     system_info(connections).
14155: 
14156: connections(Conns0) ->
14157:     Conns1 = lists:sort(Conns0),
14158:     case lists:sort(connections()) of
14159: 	Conns1 ->
14160: 	    ?LOG("connections -> ok:"
14161: 		 "~n   ~p"
14162: 		 "~n", [Conns1]),
14163: 	    Conns1;
14164: 	Conns2 ->
14165: 	    ?ERROR({Conns1, Conns2}),
14166: 	    Conns2
14167:     end.
14168: 
14169: system_info(Key) ->
14170:     megaco:system_info(Key).

14228: %%     p(F, []).

14231:     p(get(sname), F, A).
14232: 
14233: p(S, F, A) when is_list(S) ->
14234:     io:format("*** [~s] ~p ~s ***" 
14235: 	      "~n   " ++ F ++ "~n", 
14236: 	      [?FTS(), self(), S | A]);
14237: p(_S, F, A) ->
14238:     io:format("*** [~s] ~p *** "

14240: 	      [?FTS(), self() | A]).

14244: 
14245: i(F) ->
14246:     i(F, []).
14247: 
14248: i(F, A) ->
14249:     print(info, "INF", F, A).
14250: 
14251: 
14252: d(F) ->
14253:     d(F, []).
14254: 
14255: d(F, A) ->
14256:     print(debug, "DBG", F, A).
14257: 
14258: 
14259: print(Severity, PRE, FMT, ARGS) ->
14260:     print(Severity, get(verbosity), erlang:timestamp(), get(tc), PRE, FMT, ARGS).
14261: 
14262: print(Severity, Verbosity, Ts, Tc, P, F, A) ->
14263:     print(printable(Severity,Verbosity), Ts, Tc, P, F, A).
14264: 
14265: print(true, TS, TC, P, F, A) ->
14266:     S = ?F("*** [~s] ~s ~p ~s:~w ***"
14267:            "~n   " ++ F ++ "~n", 
14268:            [?FTS(TS), P, self(), get(sname), TC | A]),
14269:     io:format("~s", [S]),
14270:     io:format(user, "~s", [S]);
14271: print(_, _, _, _, _, _) ->
14272:     ok.
14273: 
14274: 
14275: printable(_, debug)   -> true;
14276: printable(info, info) -> true;
14277: printable(_,_)        -> false.
